title: been
description:
Keep track of countries and US states that you have visited, and if you wish, also when you visited. The app visualizes the visited countries both as a list, along with a ratio for each continent, and as a world map. The map can be shared on social networks, such as Instagram, Twitter and Facebook, using the standard iOS sharing functionality. You can compare your map with friends that also have the app, by sharing your map with them.

- If you miss the old look of the app, you can enable Classic Mode to get the old experience back. We hope you will like the new experience though, as we will continue to improve it.

PREMIUM MODE

There is a Premium Mode in the app that you can unlock, if you wish, by a single ONE-TIME In-App Purchase. It unlocks all features in the app.

Features unlocked with Premium Mode:

- In addition to states and regions in the US, with Premium, you can select regions in 25+ countries.
- Select cities and airports.
- More 3D globe filters.
- More visualizers, such as a chronologic map.
- Add local profiles, to allow for multiple maps and country selections.
- More detailed comparisons with more information.
- Share your timeline as a video.

CONTACT US

Feel free to give us feedback by email or on Twitter or Instagram. Our username on Instagram and Twitter is @been_app. Email address available in Contact section in the Profile tab in the app.
releaseNotes:
- Fix for crash on iOS 17 when achievement is unlocked.
- Other small iOS 17 fixes and tweaks.
reviews:
Very good app, very simple and premium account is cheap, | Hi, I am experoencing app and it is confusing i am not able to find some turist populat towns in Italy. For example "Saturnia" "Punta Ala" etc. What mapping api you are using?? | Great update but still a few things to improve. Organization of the app is confusing. I have hard time knowing where is what, it just doesn’t come naturally, actually the opposite. Marking countries (visited, lived, wished) is hard to find and complicated to do so. I love the chronology (isn’t it just better timeline?) but putting dates into countries is again complicated. I would like a map to see not just visited (+lived) countries but also wished ones. Watch out for making Been too complicated with the possibility to put every freaking detail. | Great app! I would just love to be able to break countries into smaller areas… e.g. in Spain that could be Balearic Islands and Canary Islands, Asturias, Galicia, Catalunya, Andalucia… i think it would give much more accurate representation of where we’ve actually been! And also give us satisfaction when we revisit the country but end up in a completely new place. | I love the app, is user friendly - very easy to use, but has a mistake - Scotland is not a country, is a part of United Kingdom. 

I am thinking to tick it off, so it counts into a percentage of land, but then it would give me total 71 countries visited, instead of 70. Any chance of upgrading this version?:) | I love the app, I would like to see a feature where you click on the map where you've been | Very nice app, but unfortunately I miss some states. title: Tripadvisor: Plan & Book Trips
description:
As a travel guidance company, Tripadvisor brings people, passions and places together. We aim to help make you a better traveller, from travel planning, to booking, to taking a trip. Our app lets you get the most out of your trip – whether you’re planning or on-the-go. Discover where to stay, what to do and where to eat based on guidance from millions of travellers who have been there before. Find deals on hotels, book experiences, reserve tables at great restaurants and discover great places nearby. No matter what type of trip you’re looking to take, the Tripadvisor app makes planning it easy and also lets you guide others on their way.

GET TRAVEL GUIDANCE
Access millions of reviews about hotels, restaurants, tours, attractions and other experiences from travellers just like you

Discover traveller-recommended places nearby and view them on a map

Read Travel Guides to discover new ways to experience a destination with tips from travel experts

DO ALL YOUR TRAVEL PLANNING IN ONE PLACE
Book hotels, tours, activities, experiences and other things to do with free cancellation

Find great places to eat nearby and make restaurant bookings 

Get great deals on hotels by comparing the lowest prices from more than 200 booking sites worldwide

Use our planning tool, Trips, to save and organise traveller-recommended places. See your saves on a map, as well as share and collaborate with your travel companions.

Access mobile tickets for booked tours, attractions, experiences and other things to do

TRAVEL SAFELY
Travel confidently with health and safety information for hotels, restaurants, tours, and attractions

GUIDE OTHER TRAVELLERS
Submit your own reviews and photos of places you’ve visited to guide fellow travellers 

Post and answer questions from other like-minded travellers in the Tripadvisor forums

title: Visited: My Travel Map & Lists
description:
Beat your own travel stats. Get inspired to visit exotic new destinations. Track your experiences around the world as you tick off your bucket list.



MAP YOUR TRAVELS
-Design your personal travel map by displaying countries, states / provinces / regions and cities of where you have been or want to visit.


TRAVEL ITINERARY

- Wondering where to travel next? We got you covered. Select different destinations and places based on travel lists, experiences and inspirational photos. We'll show you which countries have the highest numbers of places you wish to visit. So you can go down the list and optimize your travel plans. 
- Picking your next travel destination just got a lot easier with the Visited App!


GET INSPIRED
-Visualize your future travels by swiping through beautiful photos and adding them to your wishlist.


TRAVEL BUCKET LIST
-Keep up with your travel life goals by selecting all the countries of the world that you want to visit.

-Add travel journal notes by country of your travel dates, points of interest or personal memories.


KEEP TRACK OF YOUR TRAVEL JOURNEY
-Share your personalized stats with others! You can share your travel ranking, percentage of the world seen and countries you’ve visited.
-See your top 5 most frequently visited countries.
-Create regional maps for over 20 countries, including United States, Canada, Australia, Germany, UK, Russia, France and others.


TRAVEL EXPERIENCES
-Want to see how many of the worlds’ capital cities you have been to? Or how about how many art museums you’ve visited? Using the list feature, check off places you have been to or want to visit by category. Travel Lists include: African Safaris, Capitals of the World, Wonders of the World, Pyramids, Culinary Experiences, Ancient Sites, Churches, Greek & Roman Ruins, Cruise Ports, Beer Destinations, Palaces, Ski Slops, World's Top Beaches, Shopping Destinations, LGBTQ+ Destinations, Popular Hiking Trails, Lakes, Bridges, Snorkelling/Diving Locations, Chocolate Destinations, Castles, Wine Regions, Kids Attractions, Temples, Mountain Ranges, Rock Climbing Locations, Monasteries, Opera Houses, Funicular Railways, Waterfalls, Volcanos, Mosques, US National Monuments, Hot Springs, Tunnels, Dance Shows, Deserts, Famous Prisons, Canal Cruises, Formula One Circuits, Top Surf Spots, Underground Cities, Whale Watching Spots, Synagogues, Caves, US National Historic Site, Tennis Destinations, Film Festivals, UK National Parks and Scotch Distillery Regions. 
-Track your experiences by country such as where you’ve gone golfing, snorkelling/diving, skiing, wine tours and others.


FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE
-Select different colors or design your own based on your travel type
-Pick fully accessible, high contrast colors for your map.
-Dark mode is supported to make the app easier to use while taking a red eye flight
-Adjust the sovereignty for disputed territories


SEE HOW YOU COMPARE TO OTHER TRAVELLERS:
- Compare your travel stats with other global travellers or friends
- See the top 10 most popular countries to visit from your home city
- Share your travel map, stats and bucket list with your family and friends


Have you ever had a problem where you can’t actually remember all the countries you’ve been to? That’s why we created Visited – a simple and fun travel tracker. With Visited, you will be able to not only keep a log of all the countries, regions, and cities you’ve been to, but you’ll also be able to see your accomplishments beautifully rendered on a world map that you can share proudly. A digital scratch map if you will! You can also use Visited to plan your upcoming adventures by being inspired by breathtaking travel photos and building up your bucket list.
releaseNotes:
- Adding New Video
- Adding New Lists

title: GetYourGuide: Travel & Tickets
description:
Download the GetYourGuide app to discover and book unforgettable travel experiences anywhere in the world

Whether you're planning a vacation or looking for last-minute things to do in any destination, we make booking tours, day trips, and activities easier than ever. Choose from culture, food, adventure, nature, and more experiences.

Maximize your trip with exclusive access to the world's top attractions and museums, find the highlights and hidden gems, and keep up with last-minute travel deals using the app — we make travel planning easy, and making memories easier.

Find over 75,000 experiences

Booking tickets for unmissable sights has never been easier — experience the Colosseum, Eiffel Tower, London Eye, TV Tower, Sagrada Familia, and more.

Discover expert-guided tours — explore unforgettable travel highlights in Paris, Dubai, London, Florence, New York City, Berlin, Vienna, New Orleans, Cancun, Tuscany, Lisbon, and more. Our app will be your city guide for destinations around the world, and our local experts help you get fully immersed.

Travel with flexibility

Reserve now, pay later — save your place for popular experiences early and make your payment at a later date.
Instant confirmation — whether you're booking tours in advance or need last-minute tickets, receive your tickets and booking confirmation instantly.
Offline tickets — Conveniently access your booking information offline. Download, store, and present your tickets on your mobile device

Book with confidence

24/7 customer service — Easily find help when you have questions. We offer customer service by email, phone, and in the app across multiple languages.
Flexible cancellation — Don’t stress if your plans change. We offer free cancellation up to 24 hours before your activity for most bookings.

With tours and activities for any interest, you can plan your trips your way. Dive into nature and explore fjords in Norway, try local cuisine across Europe, or uncover fascinating history in the United States.

Whether you're living the magic of the wizarding world on a Harry Potter experience, savoring delicious culinary delights on a food tour of Barcelona, booking top rated tours to see the Vatican, or following a city guide through Berlin, we guarantee you'll find something unforgettable to do — make the most of your travel and leisure time.

Uncover the top tourist activities in the world's bucket-list destinations:
Book museum tours and tickets in Rome, food trips through Naples, trekking in Iceland, river cruises around Prague, outdoor adventures in Bali, sightseeing in Budapest, and more.

Use the app as a travel planner or for travel guidance, then book travel experiences for the world's must-see highlights with excursions and last-minute tickets.

Tell us how we’re doing
Leave us a review if you’re enjoying your GetYourGuide app experience or head over to our help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/contact
releaseNotes:
We update our app every few weeks to ensure that searching for activities feels like being upgraded to first class. Here's a quick overview of what the app team has been up to:

Bugs? Bashed
Crashes? Banished
Design? Beautified

Has our hard work paid off? Tell us what you think by leaving a review.

Something not quite right with the app? Head over to our help page for further assistance: getyourguide.com/contact

title: TravelBoast: My Journey Routes
description:
Do you like to travel and do you have Instagram? Excellent! This app will help you to create awesome posts and stories about your travels for your Instagram profile!

It's really simple. Choose transport, enter your route, press the START button, and enjoy a fun animation of your trip. Share your trips with your friends in the language of video maps.

Show off the interesting trips you've taken to your friends and post them on social media. 

-Create your own unique trip routes.
-Choose any transport and hit the road. 
-Save the results as a video.
-Send videos to your friends or post them on social media.

100 unique means of transport await you, including real and imaginary ones. The number of vehicles will regularly increase with each update. Leave comments about vehicles you'd like to take for a spin, but aren't in the app.

Don’t forget to visit our Instagram profile @TravelBoast
releaseNotes: - Fixed minor errors
reviews: It is cool | App is good but you need it once a year | It is very usedli app because I can make youtube shorts with + I can uplacen it to TikTok or/and Instargram! title: Kiwi.com - Book Cheap Flights
description:
We hack the system, you fly for less. 

Tired of cross-checking websites, dates, flights and destinations when planning a trip? We offer great travel deals, and connect flights, buses and trains to get you where you want to go. Book tickets and travel for less with Kiwi.com!

No hidden fees, no ads, no hassle. Just travel.

Kiwi.com’s flight search, powered by our Kiwi-Code, gives you the prices airlines won’t advertise.
-Find the lowest prices for trains, buses and plane tickets.
-Use Deals to get tailored recommendations for cheap flights to popular destinations.
-Set price alerts for a selected route so you don’t miss out on flight tickets at the best prices

Use our travel hacks to get the best deals.
-Throwaway ticketing – book a cheaper round-trip ticket instead of a more expensive one-way fare.
-Itineraries with self-transfer – combine separate flights for a lower price compared to carrier connections, or find itineraries with different modes of transport operated by carriers that don’t usually cooperate.
-Hidden cities – book flights with a layover in your intended destination instead of overpaying for direct plane tickets.

Save all your travel in one place.
-View your itinerary, change details and add extras to your flight booking.
-Access all your boarding documents offline.
-Get instant alerts about the cheapest travel options.

Download our flight scanner app now and get low-cost tickets for your next journey. For questions and feedback, don’t hesitate to contact us directly at support@kiwi.com.

We’re here for you!
If you have any issues or questions about your booking, we’ve got your back. Go to our Help & Support articles to find answers to frequently asked questions, get assistance quickly with our chatbot, or reach out to our team directly.

More about Kiwi.com
Website: www.kiwi.com
Instagram: @kiwicom247
Twitter: @kiwicom247
Facebook: www.facebook.com/kiwicom247

Find the best travel deals tailored to you: www.kiwi.com/cheap-flights

Enjoy your travels with Kiwi.com!
releaseNotes: We're passionate about making your travel experience unforgettable. In our latest release, we've fine-tuned our app to ensure seamless usability and enhanced performance. Upgrade now and unlock a world of possibilities!

Everything should be easy just QR codes and biometeic passport. No more kiwi sorry 👎 | ordered via website yet forcing me to install app to access even my boarding passes. Which cant even be added to apple wallet and you must screenshot them or print them. 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻 | Kdyby to šlo, dám 0. Katastrofální zákaznický servis a přístup k reklamacím. Doporučuji vyhnout se obloukem. | Aplikace je aktuální, stručná a přehledná. Propojené nabídky i již zakoupené cesty s děním v právě danou chvílí. Paráda 👍 | The app was great, now you slowly replace parts of it with mobile web. Terrible user experience, worse functionality offline. | Beware of their dodgy practices. They also have few weird "services" like nonsense insurance that they will push on you, they randomly change ticket prices by up to 20% and they like to tell you that "there are last 2 seats available" and so on to make you buy, lock in and so on. If you don't pay for these extra services then there is no way you are getting any kind of support. Not to mention nonsense like "saver ticket" and so on. Before Covid they stole for me tickets worth thousands of dollars - never had any response from them, not even when my bank tried to help me. Scammers.
Do yourself a favor, find tickets through them, and then book straight through carrier and not them. | Děláte si předrezervaci a tu zaplatíte. Pak zjistíte, že vám nedošel notifikační email s potvrzením a číslem objednávky. na stránkách otázek a odpovědí dočtete že do 24 hod. nemáte panikařit protože to je běžné, že reakce dojde později. Po 24 hod. nic a tak zavoláte na zákaznickou linku. Anglické číslo pouze v angličtině kde se základní angličtinu nemáte šanci a nejste si jistí jestli ten člověk na druhé straně na tom není  jazykově náhodou ještě hůř. Nicméně zjistíte české telefonní číslo. Světlo v tunelo to však není. Telefon zvedne robot který vás vyzve třikrát za sebou aby jste zadali číslo objednávky které vám chybí protože nemáte notifikační email. Tak vám doporučuji abyste zavolali znovu až to číslo najdete a zavěsí. Necháte si přeložit email pošlete ho na zákaznickou podporu, a žádná odpověď. počet letenek se tenčí a vy začnete propadat panice. Nakonec půjdete a koupíte si to u konkurence a vynadáte si že za to že jste si pořádně nepřečetl recenze. Je velmi zajímavé jak někde pořád drží poměrně vysoké hodnocení, ale recenze od českých zákazníků jsou bohužel velmi podobné jako ta má. tuto společnost se sídlem v Brně pokud to ještě platí už dávno žádný český zákazník nezajímá. | i made many good trips thanks to this app thank you | Vsude jinde poslou listky rovnou na email jen tady vas nuti se prihlasovat do apky jako ovce, v budoucnu se pokusim vyhnout vam | You somehow cancelled my reservation and returned the money to my kiwi account??? | If you would like to check available flights, it’s a good service.
But if you want to use their service, you better don’t 
They charge money for each small details. But if something goes wrong, they will just say that they can’t do anything. 
Examples:
1. Two way ticket. They cancel one part, and you have to have a premium to refund the second. Or buy 1 way for a full price
2. I didn’t show up to the flight. My return flight was canceled. My fault. Kiwi didn’t even inform me about that
…and I have more | Beware of extra payment at the airport. Kiwis are hiding the facts from you. Once I had to pay extra for check-in for 70 Euros. Today 50 Euros for a standard small piece of luggage, which is a matter of course when shopping outside of Kiwi. With a ticket through Kiwi, many things pay off in the chaos of the airport. There is nothing to deal with the company because they only have a Chatbot and it goes round and round in the same stages. Maybe and sometimes you can probably save a little, but at the expense of getting huge problems and no certainty about anything. | Kupovaly jsme s dcerou letenky s kiwi.com potřetí, před poslední cestou mě zmátly negativní komentáře, tak jsem trochu zpanikařila, ale vše proběhlo i napotřetí přesně podle plánu, a to včetně letenek s Ryanair… Za mě ok 👍 | App is ok, but the help, if you need one, is terrible. I had problems with Ryanair ID verification and Kiwi did not help me even a little. They simply are not responsible for anything, they do not know anything, and can noth help me with anything. If I want to make any change, first I should pay to Kiwi and that is important. Terrible experiance!!! | Cheaters, liaers and they are Staling money. Company like TV news. They ´ ve just bought stars. Business like this have to be closed. | Bought tickets for Ryanair. Had to pay for additional verification. Didn't work twice. Customer support offered no help nor refund even though I'm from EU. | Both apple pay or card, no additional information | I had to pay 30€ service fee for correcting one misspelled letter in my name. Something that would be free if I booked directly through the airline. I’ve since used this app just to look up the flights, will never book directly through kiwi again. | When you cannot log into the app in the day of the flight, it's not a big fun | Switch to CZK is rolled back to EUR by the app. 🫤 | I like the ux/ui, very intuitive. Good at finding flights. I hate how they try to upsell you so many times it gets annoying. Also when the flight gets cancelled they are not very helpful. Plus I would never book car or anything else then plane via them | I had a cancelled flight booking in April 2022. I had to wait over a year only to learn that “no compensation would be provided by the carrier”. The carrier was the Czech Airlines. The whole process was absolutely non-intransparent, I never received any official statement from the airline about the decision, even after requesting it. I honestly used to be a fan of this Czech startup couple of years ago, well not anymore. | Jste skvělí❤️ | Ужасное отношение к покупателям, никогда больше не буду пользоваться вашими услугами и никому не советую | Super👍👍👏 | The app won't launch on iOS 15.1.1. Please resolve the issue. | Perfektní vyhledávač, pro ty kteří nevědí  kdy a kam na poslední chvíli. Najde vhodne destinace a letenky za dobrou cenu. Vše vc.on-line odbavení bylo na 1*. Děkuji Marketa | I have bought plane tickets via web page, and after installed app. It took me 30 min to make visible my trip in app. It wasn’t cool. 

(Kiwi guys, you don’t have to be so much aggressive and pushy in marketing - I had already pursued trip and had already installed app - I just needed one to be seen in other one)

Two weeks after Kiwi wrote me that they failed to book my flights… 

Money have been returned in few days. But I have deleted the app and bought my flight via airline company directly - I cannot afford uncertainty and loosing more time. | Thanks to Kiwi we have awsome trip to Barcelona.On time updates and Boarding Pass and all service was 5 stars.
Definitely Recommended.
Thank You | Použili jsme jednou a už vždy budu používat pouze Kiwi.com. 
Aplikace připraví i letenky. 
Vše bez starosti. 👏👏👏👏 | Be careful if you buy flight ticket via Kiwi. There is many problems if there is change flight or transfer to another flight. Full refund even though you have insurance is big problem! | I love the option to look for flights from/to many countries at once.
I love how quickly and hassle free I can book the flight then. | After fulfilling all information, unable to proceed the payment w/ comment “please try it later”. Next day, same issue. At the end, flight tickets were proceed on main website of the flight company w/out any issues. | After booking a flight that I found unreasonable for me, I tried to change the flight and was willing to pay more. Unfortunately, the app wouldn't let me even do that. 

So I decided to cancel my flights with the airlines who agreed and refunded the money. Kiwi.com asks for proof of refund, I send it to them only for them to tell me they need to request for the refund themselves and I need to make a request. I make the request and they tell me I may (no guarantee) get a refund in 90 days.

Goodness. 90 days yet the airline told me this would take 5-7 days. No, I am not interested in Kiwi credit as I want to book my flight with my money directly with the airline. 

I don't recommend this app/company because cheap things are often more expensive. That expense may not be monetary as in this case.

Please just give me my money. | Such a good and optimized app. | Přes Kiwi.com je nákup letenek prostě pecka!!! | Do not buy tickets with kiwi and rather find other companies. 

Other companies have cheaper ticket, more options and when it comes to refunds or changes in flights they will not scam you like kiwi does.

Just check TrustPilot reviews and you will see. | Booked like 15 times and never had any bad experience. The app works really smooth and fast. Love the search options. | Kiwi does not consider adding a carry on as a basic service, so they charge you not only its price but also a fee of 30€. Hence my carry on would cost me more than the flight ticket itself.
I asked for complete refund for obvious reasons, and they rejected to refund more than 10€ it bc it is a Saver Fare ticket. 
I don’t cancel my flight because i want to, but because i need to carry my things too, no? And i won’t pay more for than 25€ for an small carry on jeez | Мошенники! Обманули на 350 евро! При отмене рейса (в независимости от времени) деньги не возвращают! Точнее, возвращают всего 10 евро! Не советую | AVOID USING THIS APP!! 
They have no control over airlines and no refund policy. 5-star for worst service!!
Worst airlines #aeroitalia.com and worst planner/scammer #kiwi.com

I have booked flight via Kiwi.com from Milan to Rome on 13.1.2023 flight no. XZ2122  and my PNR L7XKW9 which was scheduled first on 13.00 and then your airline rescheduled it to 11.00 and now today again you have rescheduled it to 06.30. Because of your airlines i can't board the flight XZ2122.

I am flying from Prague by Ryanair scheduled at 07.40 and will reach Milan at 9.00 on the 13.1.2023
Now tell me how am I supposed to board the Aeroitalia flight which you stupidly rescheduled at 06.30?

I have experienced the worst ever experience from the airlines and kiwi.com | Kiwi never more. I ordered some flights through kiwi. But two of them were canceled and more than half of the year had to wait. In the first case only credited, no money back. Second case still without success. I'm nearly sure that airlines already sent money to kiwi. Because I got directly from them compensation. But from kiwi no money for a tickets. It was bought for 11 persons!!! | It happened to me 3 times that i booked a flight and after few hours i get this message that carrier has increased the price and even though i paid the difference, again after few hours i got this message that  “we are sorry we couldn’t book your flight “
Don’t buy tickets from this app if you are in rush because otherwise your whole trip will be ruined thanks to their mismanagement ! | I was on their website with the flight in the basket but still wasn t convinced if I should buy or not, but a message popped out saying that: I will receive a discount of 25 euros if I book within 24h, which I did. I was waiting for the email with the promotional code on my mail. But it never came.
I contacted the customer support, and they were playing dump on me. | Kiwi agency in Brno is scam. No email, no customer line. I have booked my flight tickets via kiwi mobile app (booking number #253 471 724: flight from Prague on 8 August 2022 to Venice and back on 12 August ). Wizz Air cancelled my flight on the day of flight and i requested refund through kiwi application on the same day. The next day I received an email from kiwi stating that “carrier informed us they won't provide a refund for the return flight. I have contacted Wizz Air and contrary to your email, they told me kiwi didn’t contact them and verified by email that I’m eligible to receive full monetary refund for both flights (outbound and inbound). And moreover, i was able to make the verification of my flights and they already processed the refund of both my flights and sent it to Kiwi’s bank account (I believe you already received full money from Wizz Air). Bank transaction code of this transfer was also provided to me (can sent it to you if needed). I live in Czech Republic and I am eligible for full monetary refund of both flights. In case I don’t receive the full monetary refund, I am going to take this matter further and continue filling my complaint with all relevant EU and CZ regulators (Czech Republic Civil aviation authorities, Europe Direct Contact Centre according to EU air passengers right regulation act. I was not able to contact you neither via help desk, or bot to explain you my case. | I travel with Kiwi.com for more than 5 years and everything is ok if you don’t need any help. In that case you will not be able to get any feedback to your call’s massages etc… | When you try to open the Price table, kiwi app crashes, again and again :-( | Reálnou cenu letenky se dozvíte až těsně před platbou a tato cena je o cca 20-30% vyšší, než proklamovaná cena na srovnávačích. Nenese žádnou odpovědnost - v obchodních podmínkách je disclaimer na všechno. Zrušení letu nám oznámili 3 hodiny před odletem a to bez nároku na vrácení peněz, kompenzaci nebo cokoliv jiného. Dovolat se na helpdesk trvá hodiny a voláte někam do Indie. Nikdy více!!! | So when buying And choosing seat, there were around 20 free seats And after 5 hours of processing they told me that flight is sold out. Of course i did not paid any extra insurance so my 500GBP may take months to come back. NEVER EVER USING KIWI AGAIN !!!!!! Other companies take max 1 hour to confirm flight And do not lie to you . | Scam flight tickets terrible support

title: Worldee Trip Planner & Journal
description:
Introducing Worldee - the ultimate travel companion. Plan, share, get inspired, and discover unique itineraries from experienced travelers all around the world. Worldee is your guide to authentic and unforgettable experiences. Don't wait, embark on the adventure of your dreams without any unnecessary worries.

Find out why travelers like you love Worldee:

>> Travel Journal
Are you afraid of losing precious memories from your trips? With Worldee, you can easily browse all your experiences in one place. Your memories will be safe and always at hand.
• Color your online scratch-off world map
• Create an itinerary with all the details
• Capture the complete experience - photos, maps, and timelines
• Keep all your travel memories together
• Share captivating presentations of your adventures
• View your travel statistics
• Get extra storage for your photos and videos
Start filling your travel journal with experiences and details you might not remember in a year.

>> Trip Planner
Turn your dreams into real plans. Worldee will help you prepare a detailed itinerary for your new journey. Explore this comprehensive planning method and immerse yourself in the atmosphere of your future experiences!
• Add places you want to visit to your itinerary
• Choose transportation and accommodation options
• Display your itinerary and map on a single screen
• Share your travel plans with fellow travelers
• Check off items in your personal checklist
• Write down all your thoughts, wishes, and notes
Then just head towards your dream vacation stress-free!

>> Endless Inspiration
Do you want to share your itineraries with the community of travelers?
• Yes? Great! Don't hesitate to share your story with other travelers.
• No? No problem. Lock your trips and photos in privacy.
Did a specific trip catch your eye that you're eager to experience? Click the "Get Inspired" button and convert the itinerary into your own plan! The perfect way to easily embark on a new journey. Discover amazing places with Worldee.
Follow more inspirational travelers and share your enthusiasm with the world!

>> Travel with Worldee
Don't enjoy planning? Missing a travel buddy? Want to experience authentic travel? Experience what you won't with traditional travel agencies!
• Embark on an adventure with an experienced traveler or set off on your own
• With just one click, we'll take care of flights, accommodation, experiences, and everything you need
• Discover beautiful destinations in small groups
Choose a non-traditional adventure according to your preferences and let us handle the rest!

>> Become a Travel Buddy and earn money while traveling
Are you a guide or want to become one? Living abroad and helping (not only) Czechs explore the world? Partner with us and start offering your services legally on Worldee!
• Create trips according to your requirements
• Sell your trips under our license
• Build your own brand
We will help you turn your dreams into reality!

Download the app and start creating your world of travel!
Let us know how you like and use the app.
Do you have any questions? We'd love to hear from you at info@worldee.com
releaseNotes:
Our news in the app is here!
- Insurance in the order
- Deeplink to a specific term
- Private links for travel dates
- Launch screen
- We found and fixed minor bugs to make the app even smoother.
Thanks for exploring the world with Worldee
reviews:
Ještě nedávno se na aplikaci daly vyhledat itineráře ostatních cestovatelů, teď už mi naskakují jen cesty, které jsou vedeny pro prodej (aspoň mi to tak přijde). Nikde jsem nenašla, kde najít ty normální cesty a ne tohle, aplikace pořád hrozně padá, když nahrávám třeba fotky z cesty. 
Nějak se to celé pokazilo koukám 😕 | Po určité době nejdou vkládat fotky. Hlásí to chybu 400. | Ráda si zde prohlížím své výlety | Aplikace naprosto dokonala, jen mi od 23.8 nejdou nahrat fotky. Do te doby vse v poradku. | Спасибо вам за это приложение, все собрано в одном месте, реальные люди и абсолютно разные поездки, все расписано с фотографиями - ну просто супер ! | Appka vypadá fajn, jen nevím, proč nemohu zobrazit polohu na mapě. Píše mi to jen, ze nemám oprávnění ale už ne jak jo získat. Taky jdou zadat jen celá čísla měn a když kliknu na naplánovaný bod v mapě, nezobrazí se mi podrobnosti… | Hrozna opravdu! Nefunguje ani obnova hesla, strasny format pro ios.
Nemluvim o tom ze nelze zakoupit. | Aplikace skvela, akorat pri prohlizeni prezentace ve fotkach spadne cela aplikace. | Pecková appka, využívám pro záznam cesty i pro plány. 
Jen když dám “uložit a odejít” tak mi to šíleně dlouho načítání a ukládá. Nejvíce, když plánuji nějakou delší trasu. Kolikrát se mi stalo že se mi plán ani neuložil.
Ale jinak. Doporučuji👏🏼 | Neaktualizuje se mi profil, hodně menších chyb na kterých by se mělo zapracovat , nepřehlednost | Vždycky když cestuji, naplánuji si cestu přes tuto aplikaci od A do Z. S worldee je cetování jednodušší💙. | Finally a great travel diary. | Worldee is such a cool concept and vision that helps everyone in the travel space. | After reading reviews for this app and actually going through functionality of the service, my conclusions is that the app is highly overrated and many reviews are far-fetched. To my view, functionality is typical/generic to many travel diary/planner applications available on the AppStore 🤷🏻‍♂️.

Trip/plan creation functionality is somehow counter-intuitive, it took me a while to get around it. Finally, I have discovered that there is a 10GB storage limitation to your uploaded content - be aware if you have a lot of good quality photos/videos to upload, you might end up paying 💵 Hmm.. just to note - other apps will handle the same functionality without any Subscription 💰😀

To summarize: the app will handle trip planning, but at the same time many other travel apps will do that task easily and without storage limitation (therefore 1 ⭐️). Overall design - good, but not enough to encourage me to use the app. | Its so nice and pretty application for my traveling. Its very intuitive for planning my trips and create my trips memories as well. I recommend this nice app for everyone who travel.😍😊 | I really appreciate the travel diary feauture, where I can save all my travel experiences and create my own travel app. In the same time I can find inspiration from other travellers, which is cool as well, because it saves me a lot of time | Spousta inspirace na cesty po česku i ve světě. | Do appky si můžu ukládat všechny fotky a rozdělit je podle místa a data. Skvělá je taky možnost podívat se na cesty ostatních uživatelů a inspirovat se jimi. | Aplikace se neda ovladat. Pri prvnim prihlaseni jsem vyplnila vsechny mnou navstivene zeme, nic se mi neulozilo a tedjiz  upravit nejde. Nejsou k disposici settings a muzu pouze pridavat celkove vylety. Fotografie mi taky nejde nahrat. Uz jsem zkousela i appku smazat a znovu nainstalovat a nepomohlo to. Odhlaseni taky neni mozne. Kde je problem?? | Worldee používám už nějakou dobu a jsem naprosto spokojený. Pomáhá mi rychleji naplánovat cesty a také prezentovat lépe zážitky z cest mé rodině/ kamarádům. Aplikace vypadá famózně! Potěšila mě. | Pre mna prilis zložité zadávanie minulých ciest, niekoľko krát appku vyplo, ďalej  napr pri písaní dátumu pri cestách mi nechce akceptovať formát, musím naklikat dátum z kalendára, ten sa neulozi a musím znova 🤦🏻‍♀️ chyba mi tam tlačidlo “naspäť” keď si pozerám niekoho profil, ale možno je to len o zvyku..  po prvých a rozhodujúcich 10 minútach chcem zmazať svoj účet ale nemám kde.. žiadne “profil menu/nastavenia” nenachádzam 🤷🏻‍♀️ | Super aplikace! Konečně mám svůj cestovatelský deník u sebe vždy když jsem na cestách. 😊 | Skvělá appka pro plánování cest a uložení vzpomínek z již uplynulých cest. Přehledná, jednoduchá appka a pro každého cestovatele. | Tak tahle appka mě vážně nadchla! Naprosto skvělá vychytávka pro každého, kdo rád cestuje. Hodí se pro celý proces cestování, jak před cestou, tak během ní i po ní. Worldee už znám a používám a s novou appkou mi vývojáři udělali obrovskou radost, skvěle se s ní pracuje! Díky a rozhodně appku doporučuji každému cestovateli! | Must have app for every traveller. An easy way to have all your memories in one place and backed up in the cloud.  Also great for inspiration and travel planning.  I really highly recommend! | Doporučuji. Je to skvělá aplikace pro každého cestovatele. | Amazing application, providing a lot of inspiration, the ability to share your photos and stories from trips, communicate with the community of amazing and experienced travelers, save all your memories in one place, where you will have everything beautifully organized.  Love it. This app is must-have before your next trip. | Worldee používám téměř od začátku. Je to super napstroj na cestování. Teď se podařilo vytvořit i mobilní appku a tak mužete mít naplánovaný itinerář pořád po ruce. Každý cestovatel to určitě ocení. | Webovou aplikaci Worldee používám už nějakou dobu a hned od počátku mě nadchla.
Mobilní appka posunula Worldee o velký kus dopředu a je super, že teď můžu mít plán cesty stále při ruce. Aplikace funguje svěle a je možné v ní využívat všechny funkce co má webová veze. Už se těším až ji vyzkouším přímo na cestách. Využívám appku už od beta verze a musím říct, že se velmi povedla!!!
Aplikaci doporučuji všem, kdo si chtějí jednoduše a přehledně organizovat plány svých cest a současně si budovat svůj cestovatelský deník s fotkami a popisky, tak aby se k nim mohli kdykoliv později vrátit.

title: Booking.com Travel Deals
description:
Download the highest-rated travel app and join thousands of people finding hotel, motel and holiday home travel deals. Find a stay for your holiday, weekend getaway or business trip, anywhere in the world!

Search for hotels, motels & holiday homes

• 27 million hotels, holiday rentals, homes, apartments and other unique places to stay
• Search by city, attraction, landmark or hotel name with just one tap
• Filter by price, review score, amenities and other things important to you
• Find your last-minute stay or book far in advance

Find a great travel deal

• Daily deals for every budget
• Free cancellation on most rooms
• Browse over 135 million verified guest reviews

Manage your booking on the go

• Get paperless confirmation
• Make changes whenever, wherever
• 24/7 customer service in more than 40 languages
• Contact your host, view check-in times and write reviews
• No booking or credit card fees
releaseNotes: Thanks for using Booking.com! This update contains several bug fixes and performance improvements, so you can enjoy the latest and greatest version of our app.
reviews:
Mám výborné zkušenosti s rezervacemi , jsem spokojená i s hotely a penziony které Booking.com nabízí | Spokehlivost | Spokojená | Booking takes around 20% from the price of accomodation. It is usefull as a hotel finder per filters, however the stays are more expensive than in the hotels directly (even with Genius membership). It is sad, it was great several years ago but now they dont know how high Booking’s margin should be. | Není třeba se moc rozepisovat prostě krátce vše bylo v nejlepším pořádku | Aplikace nemá možnost kontaktovat zákaznickou podporu - není uveden ani telefon, ani e-mail a ani formulář. | Thank you for such professional service | I recommend it. Great service. | Na vsetky svoje dovolenky pouzivam iba booking | Tato aplikace je přehledná, dá se vyhledávat i podle mapy. Služby jsou spolehlivé, vždy mám všechny informace, které potřebuji. | Hotel byl 3 stanice od Hbf nádraží, on stanice pak 5 minut pěšky. Na recepci milá obsluha. Nefungoval výtah tak nám vyměnili pokoj v nižším patře ( měli jsme velké kufry). Pokoj byl krásný a čistý. Matrace byli příjemně tvrdé. Zároveň stanice u hotelu byla na trase na letiště (30 minut cesta) - stejná stanice co jela z Hbf, i stejný směr. Navštívila bych znovu 😊 | Je to perfektní aplikace | Aplikaci Booking používán už léta ,a vždy velká spokojenost ,,dekuji,, | Ubytováni předčilo mé očekávání. Úžasné a útulné welness se saunou (parní a nomalní), jacuzzi, bázen. V hotelu jsme se cítili opravdu krásně. Snídaně byla výborná a bohatý výběr. Celý personál byl velmi vstřícný a milý! title: Ryanair
description:
With this App at your fingertips, Europe is at your feet.

We’re Ryanair, so of course you’ll find the lowest fares in Europe on our app. But you’ll also get handy extras like being able to check in while you’re on the move, a mobile boarding pass delivered straight to your phone and a choice of in-flight extras in one quick click.

So why are you still reading? Download it now and get flying!
releaseNotes: We are always working hard to improve your experience on the Ryanair app. In this release, we have improved usability issues and fixed general bugs.
reviews:
In case you are family, it is not possible to view all boarding passes. You can always see first member of family, but other boarding passes cant be seen in app. App doesnt rect to scroll to left/right to see other boarding passes. You have to go to web, log in and print. Not possible to download boarding passes in the app. | I am extremely disappointed and frustrated with my recent experience with Ryanair. My partner and I thought we found a great deal on flight tickets, but our excitement quickly turned into dismay upon arrival at the airport.

Unbeknownst to us, Ryanair has a policy requiring passengers to check in online. Failure to do so results in a hefty fee, which, in our case, was €110 for the two of us. This was not clearly communicated at any point during our booking process. There was no mention or warning of such a significant penalty for something as minor as not checking in online.

This lack of transparency feels like a deliberate trap for unsuspecting customers to extract more money. The fee we had to pay was more than 100% of our entire trip’s budget, completely throwing off our travel plans and finances.

The whole situation cast a dark shadow over our trip, turning what should have been a joyful getaway into a stressful financial burden. It’s disheartening to encounter such hidden traps and customer-unfriendly policies.

I urge Ryanair to reconsider their approach to communication and fees. Transparency and customer care should be paramount, not profit-making schemes that ruin trips and tarnish your company’s reputation.

Sincerely disappointed,
Andrey Kulchitskiy | Bad, the app app is not available in my country, so how do I check in by app? Ryanair should not save money on this and complicates our life | Its very cheap but they try to scam you in any possible way. They made the app and the website very hard to use so people make more  mistakes. | the company is the least customer centric service of all times. Either you print out (who want to do that hassle) or download an app. Otherwise, there is a fee for presenting the boarding pass on a phone. absolute rubbish | Musite si rezervovat sedacku a zaplatit, vlastne nemusite a na letisti zaplatite 55€, banda kretenu, nikdy vic.
Appka zahnojena reklamama. | Super app | It is problem od all low cost airlines but Ryanair is the ‘best’. 🙁 If anything is no in exact plan or application ot webportal there practicaly neexist posibilty for things changed or get to right. (There are not life people in Ryan…). It is very humiliating for customer.
Thanks for your question    Tom B. | i can’t choose the return tickets, after choosing tickets to destination and choosing bags, screen turns white and nothing is responding, sometimes app turns off on its own. please fix it | Нет Украинского и Русского языков | Příliš hodně “vnucování” věci a nabídek, které vůbec nechci. Poměr cena a výkon je v pořádku! | I just cant understand why the app is not optimized for iphone 13. It is not on the whole screen, black lines in the top and bottom of screen like this app is from ios 8 and just not fit my screen (I have latest version) | Offer, offer and another offer on every step.

Are you sure you want a stressful, not smooth flight? No? Then buy all these extras and we will change your experience of the flight you bought with us from a misserable one to a fantastic one! 

Guys, upsell with reason. 

It would have been a good, functional, quality app it not turned into a spam maschine. | Totally useless applications. When I try to login it always says that user doesnt exist or wrong password. Even when I am logged on website under same account. Also tried to reset password and still same error msg. Please fix it | Everything used to work fine, but with the latest update I am unable to log in, it shows loading but it never actually loads and log me in. Not even via Apple id. Please fix the bug. iPhone 14 pro max | Logging in via email and password does not work. It is not possible to actually use the application. | app reguralry crashes when i try to book a return flight and is unfortunately unusable | Šupáci | There's no way to add the flights to my calendar. | …. constantly keeps logging me off, and login with facebook does not work at all now. | App now works terribly, constantly need to enter write login and password, the face-up does not work, app itself freezes and closes all the time. | They keep trying to scare you and on the top of it, they offer you options that are not applicable or do not work. Get some UX professional next time, please. | I had to pay for a seat (although wanted to be seated randomly) to be able to do the check-in! | Eveytime I want to see my trips I need to retrieve it via form with Reservation number and email. Why is that, this is ridiculous. iOS 16 | I definitely recommend to the ryanair team to improve the app! From my experience it’s vey frustrating full of errors. The older version gave an error do I installed the new one and unfortunately after all steps done, flight choosen, luggage, seats, all data entered including the bank card data and… nothing, the payment didn’t go through, no progress was saved. So i had to do all the same again. And again the app just dropped at the last step! I hope the bugs get fixed and progress gets saved if the app suddenly stops working! | All prices were in EUR, then I used my EUR account card. You made two currency exchange and stolen 12%. | Idiotska aplikace pro idiotskou aerolinku | A bit difficult pathway to checkout due to many times repeating xsell of insurance and bags and so on. Not necessary. | Super | Zkuste mít pobočku na vyřizování v ČR.Ta plechová huba někde v Irsku nám nevyhovuje.Asi je to úmysl.Ceny letenek šly samozřejmě nahoru,bohužel kvalita produktu dolů. | The worst service from you which I have never seem from the  competitors. This will be my last flight with your company. | ... | Asking for app update and blocking the app right at the airport? That does not help at all! Please think before you do such things. | Whenever I just switch apps and then back again all my progress is lost! I lost a good taxi price because of this, and had to redo it 10x because I had to switch there and back between apps and Ryanair kept resetting itself. | I’ve tried to book a flight but unfortunately it shows me some sort of mistake while other person can easily book it at the same time | Při zakoupení více letenek na 1 e-mail adresu není možné v aplikaci přidat všechny letenky a udělat řádný on-line chceckin. 

Údajně je to chybou operátora (Pelikan), který zadává automaticky nefunkční e-mail adresy na další letenky. To se mi jeví jako lež, protože u jiných leteckých společnosti vše přes Pelikan funguje správně. 

Dělá to vše Ryanair proto, aby mohl schválně poplatkovat své klienty za neuskutečneny on-line check-in? Který ale není klientovou chybou, ale tím, že se není možné do systému přihlásit!!!

Velké zklamání směrem k Vaši společnosti. | This company is a rip off. Unfortunately… I was about to buy flight ticket and there was something wrong with the website and could not purchase it it was saying there is a mistake and the price is not avalaible it couldnt be sold out yet at the time - there were always same amount of seats so this website didnt not allow me to buy ticket and tricked me (by saying that the price is not avalaible) i was trying to buy ticket a whole day. After unsuccesful monday for 100€ (2tickets) i bought it on tuesday the price was 93x2 (186€ - 2tickets). Day after purchasiing i was looking for the price online now  it’s only 100€ for 2 tickets )back to the same first price which i was trying to get tickets on monday.. This is ridiculous…. I want my 86€ euros back | After downloading the application. Only Ryanair's page appears and I can't open it. I tried to install and uninstall. Restart the phone and the application still cannot be opened. :-( | Utterly useless as Ryanair is incredibly incompetent to inform its passengers (customers). | A tragicomic attempt at application. Trying to check-in I fill in the details, I want to verify them from the message. I return and the app cancels the check-in and returns to the home screen. Try maybe Easy Jet there the app is functional even on the latest iP13 pro. | Cheep flying, but aplication and prices for seats, drinks,…Never again | Impossibility to access through Facebook | Vydíráte a stresujete své zákazníky. Styďte se!!! | Jist | Jsem velmi spokojena jak s aplikaci tak se společnosti a jejími službami | Are tou trying to get your boarding pass? Well good luck.. App is full of ads, trying to sell tou anything during the check in process, but it fails to deliver one thing that is important - boarding pass. It happened to me multiple tines that I went through painfull process of check in, battling all annoying ads, just to learn in last step that it didn't went through and I need to start again from scratch. Painfull and frustrating | Ryanair provides a really bad service. Sales representatives in Madrid airport was very rude and unhelpful, will never flight again with Ryanair. | Dobrý den, bylo by super kdyby aplikace měla český jazyk | DanaPech | Becouse I am forced to download it, instead of just giving me mobile board pass via apple wallet. Horrible experience

title: Flightradar24 | Flight Tracker
description:
The world's best flight tracker app - #1 Travel app in over 150 countries.

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a live flight tracker and see planes around the world move in real-time on a detailed map. Or point your device at a plane to find out where it’s going and what kind of aircraft it is. Download for free today and discover why millions are already tracking flights and checking flight status with Flightradar24.

• Watch aircraft move around the world in real-time
• Identify flights overhead & see flight information—including a photo of the actual aircraft—by simply pointing your device at the sky 
• See what the pilot of an aircraft sees in 3D 
• Tap on a plane for flight details such as route, estimated time of arrival, actual time of departure, aircraft type, speed, altitude, high-resolution photos of the actual aircraft & more.
• See historical data & watch playback of past flights
• Tap on an airport icon for arrival & departure boards, flight status, aircraft on the ground, current delay stats, & detailed weather conditions
• Search and bookmark individual flights using flight number, airport, or airline
• Filter flights by airline, aircraft, altitude, speed, & more
• Get a detailed list of all flights in your area.
• NEW - view aircraft in 3D with hundreds of new aircraft and airline liveries added.

Flightradar24 is a free app and includes all the above features. If you want even more great features from Flightradar24 | Flight Tracker there are upgrade options—Silver & Gold—and each comes with a free trial.
 
SILVER

• 90 days of flight history
• More aircraft details
• More flight details, like vertical speed & squawk
• Filters and alerts to find and track flights
• Current weather at 3,000+ airports overlaid on the map
 
GOLD

• All the features included in Flightradar24 Silver +
• 365 days of flight history
• Detailed live map weather layers for clouds & precipitation
• Aeronautical charts & oceanic tracks showing the pathways flights follow across the sky
• Air traffic control boundaries that show which controllers are responsible for a flight
• Extended Mode S data— even more information about a flight’s altitude, speed, and wind & temperature conditions during flight, when available
 
If you choose to upgrade to a Silver or Gold subscription, a payment will be charged to your iTunes account at the end of the free trial period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your account settings in the iTunes Store. Silver and Gold upgrade prices are listed in the app as they vary depending on your country and currency. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

HOW IT WORKS

Most aircraft today are equipped with ADS-B transponders that transmit positional data. Flightradar24 has a rapidly growing network of 35,000 ground stations around the world to receive this data that then shows up as aircraft moving on a map in the app. In an expanding number of regions, with the help of multilateration (MLAT), we’re able to calculate the positions of aircraft that don’t have ADS-B transponders. 

CONNECT WITH FLIGHTRADAR24

We love getting feedback on FR24. Since we’re unable to respond directly to reviews, you can contact us directly and we’ll be happy to assist.
• Email (support@fr24.com)
• X (@Flightradar24)
• Facebook (@Flightradar24)
• YouTube (@Flightradar24DotCom)

DISCLAIMER

The use of this app is strictly limited to entertainment purposes. This specifically excludes activities that might endanger yourself or the lives of others. Under no circumstances will the developer of this app be held responsible for incidents resulting from the use of the data or its interpretation or its use contrary to this agreement.

Terms of Service: https://www.flightradar24.com/terms-and-conditions
releaseNotes:
We regularly update Flightradar24 in order to bring you the best flight tracking experience. In this latest update you'll find:
 • Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Enjoy using Flightradar24? Rate the app and leave a review!

title: trivago: Compare hotel prices
description:
The trivago app is the easy way to search and compare hotel prices from your favourite booking sites so you can find a hotel or accommodation in the location you want, with the amenities you need, and for a deal you’ll feel amazing about.

- Compare accommodation prices from major booking sites with one search
- Get exclusive mobile rates on your phone or tablet
- Get price drop alerts for your favourite hotels 
- Save favourite accommodations and compare them side-by-side
- Read aggregated guest reviews from multiple booking sites
- Search over 5 million properties in more than 190 countries and find amazing hotel deals

No matter what type of traveler you are, or what type of budget you have, the trivago app makes your hotel search simpler than ever.

Compare prices from hundreds of booking sites
With trivago, you don’t just search for hotel offers in your dream vacation destinations, you also get to compare prices from the major booking sites like Expedia, Hotels.com, ebookers, Travel Republic, Booking.com, Priceline, Trip.com, ZenHotels, TUI, TravelUp, loveholidays.com, and more. With over 5 million hotels and other accommodations to choose from worldwide, finding the right stay at the right price doesn’t get much easier than this.

Mobile rates for deal-hunters on the go
The trivago app features deals on hotels that you can only access on your mobile device — something all you deal-hunters out there won’t want to miss out on. Just search for your hotel like you normally would, and keep an eye out for the “mobile rate” badge to know when you’ve found a special deal.

Get a heads-up when prices drop
Have a trip coming up and want to try and book your stay for cheap? Now you can sign up for price drop alerts on the trivago app to stay on top of price changes for your favourite hotels. Instead of constantly searching, you’ll get notified as soon as prices drop so you can act fast and get an awesome deal.

Save favourites and compare them side-by-side
Whether your dream hotel is pet-friendly, has late-checkout, offers free cancellation, or includes a breakfast buffet, the trivago app makes it easy to save your favourite stays. When you feel like booking your trip, you can compare hotels from your favourites list side-by-side to see how they match up before making your decision, so can always be confident you got the right stay at the right price.

Real talk from real guests
Along with always-updating price information, the trivago app aggregates guest ratings from major booking sites to give you the best understanding of real-world experiences at each hotel. The trivago rating index creates a combined score of available ratings so that you can see what other guests have to say, and always be ready to book your room with confidence.

5 million hotel beds and counting
With over over 5 million properties in more than 190 countries, you can find the perfect stay for every trip on the trivago app. Find rooms at boutique hotels, luxury hotels, airport hotels, hostels, bed and breakfasts, lodges, vacation rentals, resorts, and everything in between with one simple search.

Download trivago’s free app today and start searching, comparing, and saving on your next adventure.

Visit trivago.co.uk for more info.
releaseNotes: Ready to find your perfect stay? Well, good thing we’ve updated our app in this latest release. Let’s just say we’ve been busy bees implementing all sorts of bug fixes and performance improvements to give you the best app experience yet.
reviews:

title: Omio: Trains, buses & flights
description:
Omio: Plan, book, love the journey

Our pioneering and practical booking platform helps travellers worldwide explore Europe, the United States and Canada. With Omio, customers can compare trains, buses, flights and ferries in one simple search. Choosing Omio means saving time and money while loving the journey you’re on. 
-Our trip planner always helps you find the best ticket for your trip. Compare and book travel tickets in 37 countries (and counting!). 

Join the mobile travel revolution today—more than 27 million monthly users have magical experiences with the Omio travel app, with 22 million app downloads to date. 

Explore different ways to travel

- Endless possibilities: Countless ways to find meaningful new journeys. 
- Skip the line: Waiting to buy paper tickets are a thing of the past.
- Book on the go: On-the-go booking so you can spend more time loving your trip!
- Safety first: We're dedicated to ensuring your journey is as safe and comfortable as possible—from mobile tickets to travel safety updates. 

Book all your tickets in one place

- All your travel options: The best train, bus, flight and ferry options that suit you.
- Transport companies you believe in: More than 1000 trusted transport companies you can count on to get you where you're going.
- Explore the continent and beyond: Travel seamlessly to thousands of destinations, from bustling cities in the United States to quaint towns in the European countryside and, even, Canada’s great outdoors.
- Exclusive offers: Exclusive offers you can't find anywhere else.
- Discount cards accepted: Save even more on your trip by using your bus or train discount cards.

Support you can count on

- Local response. International support: A customer service team that speaks your language, no matter where you are.
- Need a little more help? We have English customer service 24/7.
- Security. Privacy. Trust: Your privacy is important to us. All payments are secure (Apple Pay, PayPal, SOFORT, Alipay, credit cards, etc.).
- Live trip updates and platform info: Get live updates on the status of your SNCF and Italo train as well as trains in Great Britain and National Express buses plus important platform info for SNCF trains.

Our ever-expanding selection of partners includes most transportation companies in Europe, the US, and Canada!

• Trains: National Rail, LNER, Amtrak, Deutsche Bahn, Eurostar, Italo NTV, NS International, Renfe, Renfe AVLO, Renfe AVE, Iryo, Ouigo, SBB, SNCB, SNCF, Scotrail, Thalys, Trenitalia, Via Rail

• Buses: ALSA, BlaBlaBus, Eurolines, Flixbus, Go Buses, National Express, Ourbus, Redcoach, Rede Expressos, RegioJet

• Flights: Air Canada, Alaska, American, Delta, easyJet, Eurowings, Frontier, Hawaiian, JetBlue Airways, Porter Airlines, Ryanair, Spirit, United, Vueling, WestJet, Wizz Air

Contact
How can we help? 
Need to change, cancel or alter your plans?
Our customer service team is only a call or email away.
Email: apps@omio.com
help.omio.com/hc/en-us
releaseNotes: Update your app to avoid being bugged by reduced speeds! Omio is now faster, better and stronger.

title: Wanderlog - Travel Planner
description:
Wanderlog is a free travel app (with an optional subscription) for planning every kind of trip, including road trips and group travel: create a trip itinerary, budget costs, organize flight and hotel reservations, view places to visit on a map, and collaborate with friends. With an optional subscription, you can also export your trip to Google Maps and link your Gmail account. After your trip, share a travel guide to inspire other travelers.

- See flights, hotels, and attractions in one place (like TripIt and Tripcase)
- View plans on a travel map & map your route (like Roadtrippers)
- Rearrange the order of places easily by drag-and-drop
- Planning a road trip? Add unlimited stops for free, optimize your route, view times & distances between places, and export places to Google Maps
- Planning group travel? Invite friends and collaborate in real-time just (like Google Docs)
- Automatically import reservations by forwarding emails or connecting your Gmail
- Add things to do from top guides with 1 click (like Tripadvisor and Google Trips/Google Travel)
- Access your trip plans offline
- Add notes and links to your stops
- Have your trip plans automatically sync across devices
- Set budget, track expenses, and split bills with a group

-------

SEE IT ON A MAP

Every time you add a place to visit, it’s immediately pinned on your Google Maps-based travel map. No need to pull up different travel apps and websites to organize plans and see them on a map - you can do it all in the Wanderlog trip planner app! Plus, if you’re visiting points in order, lines will connect the different pins on the map so you can see your route (perfect for road trips!). You can also export all your places to Google Maps too.

STORE PLANS OFFLINE

All your plans are automatically stored offline on the Wanderlog travel planner app - especially helpful during a road trip with poor signal and international travel.

GET ON THE ROAD

Looking for a road trip planner? Travelers can plan their trips and stops with Wanderlog. See your route on a map, or try our route optimizer to automatically rearrange and plan your route to save travel time. See estimated times & distance traveled between places to make sure it all fits, and total time and distance traveled for a given day to make sure you’re not driving too long. Plus, you can add unlimited stops along your road trip for free.

COLLABORATE WITH FRIENDS

For group travel planning, add your tripmates with their email address or by sharing a link to the itinerary. Like for Google Docs, everyone can collaborate in real-time. Set permissions and choose whether people can edit or just view your travel plans.

STAY ORGANIZED

Access flights, hotels, and attractions in one app. Forward flight and hotel confirmation emails to import them directly into your trip plan, or connect your Gmail to automatically add them. Prefer to keep high-level plans? Make generic lists like ‘Things to do’ and ‘Restaurants’ you want to eat at. Traveling on a tight schedule and want to create a detailed itinerary? Organize your day by adding start (and end) times, perfect for keeping track of tickets and reservations.

GET INSPIRATION & INFORMATION

For each place, see key info like a description and picture of the place, average user ratings with links to reviews, opening hours, address, website, and phone number. Stay inspired by exploring top travel guides from the web that feature viewpoints, attractions, and restaurants, and from lists from Google Trips and Google Travel, as well as by other Wanderlog users, and add things to do from those guides to your trip plan with 1 click.

CONTROL YOUR SPENDING

Set a budget for yourself or a group. Take control of your spending and keep track of all expenses. For a group trip, split a bill with other people and easily calculate the cost. Keep a record of who paid for what, how much everyone owes or is owed, and settle debts between tripmates.
releaseNotes: Wanderlog is more reliable: we fixed various small issues, and also launched the Dream Trip Contest for a chance to win a $1,000 trip to anywhere in the world! We also fixed a bug related to manually adding reservations and Chinese translations.
developer: Travel and Vacation Planner App LLC
reviews:
I like the app but I would expect a bit more. I love the option to put in bunch of pdfs, but honestly for the tickets I will prefere the Apple Wallet at the airport.

It’s good for storing places to visit and helps you to have better idea about the trip.

What I’m missing
- Option to start a week on Monday
- Widgets of “what’s next” (TripIt has the upper hand)
- “just for me” option in the expenses
I realize that the expenses section is kind of app in the app, but since it’s there, let’s do it right. If you travel in group I would like to know how much has the trip cost me. If there are expenses shared just with some nebere of the party, i would like to have the option not to see that and have a very personalized chart of how much I ended up paying for the trip. 

(Would appreciate answer if any of that is something developers are planning to do) | I use it to plan my work trips as well as planning road trips with others. So far didn’t run into any issues, i love everything this app has to offer.
So far using the free version, might upgrade for my next trip. | I could not find how to set the night ferry as a hotel and change location from one harbour to another. Otherwise, it is a perfect app in Pro version. You can save all PDF travel documents and share all details about a trip with others. It helps me a lot to plan 2 weeks road trip by car from the Czech Republic to Ireland and back. | Coolest travel planing app ever

title: Couchsurfing Travel App
description:
You have friends around the world, you just haven’t met them yet. 

Couchsurfing is the best way to stay with amazing locals, make lifelong travel friends, or host travelers coming to your hometown. Over 12 million travel enthusiasts use Couchsurfing in more than 230,000 cities around the world.

Use the Couchsurfing app to plan and manage your trip itinerary.

Find hosts in your next destination
• Browse the millions of local hosts offering a place to stay in thousands of cities and towns
• Stay with and meet locals and have an authentic travel experience
• Explore accommodations options near where you are right now, or near your future destination

Make New Friends
• Discover thousands of fun events planned by other Couchsurfers in your hometown or in your next travel destination
• Use Couchsurfing Hangouts to show you who’s nearby your current location and available to meet up right now 

Meet Travellers Without Traveling
• Host or meet up with incoming travellers coming to your city
• Can’t travel right now? Let new cultures and friends come to you 

And More
• Easily create and manage a Couchsurfing profile 
• Manage your incoming or outgoing requests, messages, and more
• Add pictures to document your travel adventures
• See which of your Facebook friends also have a Couchsurfing account
releaseNotes: Hey Couchsurfers! In this release, you'll find a few bug fixes and usability improvements.

Maybe CS could do something about it? I hope the good days are still ahead… | Couchsurfing was good app. Its still good way to meet new people but you have to be very careful of your money. So its regular theft. Im so disapointed of evolution of this app. If you want money back, contact you bank. I was successful! ;) Dont waste time with contact CF support. They made bussines on this “verification”. | You destroyed the couchsurfing community with your greediness. I used to be a verified user, paid 50 euros and you still forced me to pay subscription. Now the app is so broken, I can’t even pay a subscription to check my old messages and friends. It’s a shame, you intentionally destroyed the community and are refusing to change your policy, trying to squeeze every last penny out of it. You don’t even need that much money to maintain this kind of app.. just trying to stuff your pockets with money. Now you lost most of the activity on the platform, it’s dead. | I am a member since 2015.

The original-real-CS-spirit, which excludes money 100%. It was build by volunteers and now it is just another company which is focusing mainly on profit, rather than on humanity, good, positive, helpful atmosphere. 

The sadest part of it is: the volunteers who build it up back then, are now mostly blocked and gone - since they weren’t allowed to say their opinions. 
Also lots of my CS-friends, with many reviews and experience have left.

Use to be an amazing place… | After downloading the app, I paid the monthly subscription as per their COVID 19 regulations. The subscription is confirmed by my bank as well as Apple Pay but I still cannot use the app norme access the website. is just pure impudence and chutzpah. | Would a 100% recommend using this platform while travelling | The poorest decisions from the company to block, persecute and damage the users that made it possible. title: Citymapper: Your Transport App
description:
Instantly compare your travel options in real-time across all transport modes globally, with live departures and bus locations!

Easily navigate your area with turn-by-turn directions for all your public transport, walking, cycling and scooter trips. 

THOUSANDS OF 5 STAR REVIEWS

* "Life changing. This app really changes the way you travel."
* "The only true five star app."
* "BEST TRANSPORT APP EVER."
* "It's become a weird and possibly sad fact of my life that waiting and receiving Citymapper updates have overtaken Christmases and birthdays on the anticipation and excitometer."

FIND THE BEST ROUTE ► Simple trip planning combining all transport modes: bus, tube, train, tram, ferry, cabs, rideshare, carshare, bike hire, e-scooters and walking. Discover routes you never knew existed

HIT THE GO BUTTON FOR STEP-BY-STEP DIRECTIONS ► Turn-by-turn navigation for all your transport, walking, personal cycling, bike shares and scooter trips. Choose between 3 different map views, see the charge levels of e-bikes around you, we even help you avoid no-parking zones. We take care of the logistical thinking so you are free to enjoy the ride

BEAT THE RUSH HOUR CROWD ► Live wait times and ETA so you'll never miss a bus, train or tram again. Follow your bus / train as it's approaching on a real-time map, see the best carriage to board, get alerted when it's time to get off, and get in and out from the best exit at any underground / train station 

PERSONALISE YOUR APP ► Save Home, Work and your go-to stops or stations for lightning fast trip planning. Subscribe to your favourite tube, train, bus or tram line for automatic disruption, delay, and status alerts

GET SOCIAL ► Share your live trip: let friends follow your live trip to know when you'll arrive. Share any location or address: one tap for others to get directions

TRAVEL OFFLINE ► Access offline the official TfL underground map and many other local network maps

EXPERIENCE ONE-STOP-SHOP MOBILITY ► Compare cab fares, hail a ride, grab the closest carshare, hop on a shared bike all from within the app. Our partners include: Uber, Gett, Zipcar, Ola, Getaround, FREENOW, LIME, Santander Cycles, Forest, Beryl, Anywheel

COVERAGE ► London and the South East | Birmingham and the Midlands | Manchester | Liverpool | Yorkshire | Edinburgh | Dublin | Paris | New York | Singapore | Taiwan | Hong Kong | Los Angeles | Barcelona | Berlin | Rome | Madrid | Hamburg | Milan | Stockholm | Chicago | Toronto | Sydney + many more in the UK worldwide!

PUBLIC TRANSPORT AGENCIES ► We use open data from public transport agencies including:

UK WIDE | National Rail, Arriva, Stagecoach, First bus
LONDON | TfL (Transport for London), Underground, Overground, Docklands Light Railway (DLR), Tramlink 
MANCHESTER | TfGM (Transport for Greater Manchester), Manchester Metrolink 
LIVERPOOL | Merseytravel, Merseyrail
YORKSHIRE | WYCA (West Yorkshire Combined Authority), SYPTE (South Yorkshire Public Transport Executive), Sheffield Supertram
WEST MIDLANDS | TfWM (Transport for West Midlands), West Midlands Railway, Midland Metro, National Express West Midlands, National Express Coventry, Travel Telford, Worcestershire County Council, Diamond Bus
NOTTINGHAM | NCT, NET
EDINBURGH | TfE, Lothian Bus, Edinburgh Tram
GLASGOW | SPT
BRISTOL | Travelwest, MetroBus, Bristol Ferries
CARDIFF | Transport for Wales, Cardiff Bus
NEWCASTLE | NEXUS, Tyne and Wear Metro
BRIGHTON | Brighton & Hove Buses
DUBLIN | TFI, NTA, Bus Éireann, Dublin Bus, Iarnród Éireann (Irish Rail)
HONG KONG | MTR, HK Tramways, Light Rail, Kowloon Motor Bus, Citybus, First Bus, First Ferry, Star Ferry, Discovery Bay Ferry & Bus, Park Island Ferry & Bus, Green Mini Bus
SINGAPORE | LTA, SMRT, SBS

KEEP IN TOUCH ► Questions, feedback or something we have missed in your city? Email us at support@citymapper.com

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Citymapper
Visit our website: http://citymapper.com
releaseNotes: Tickets! Tickets! Get your tickets! If you’re in Birmingham UK, you can now get tickets for National Express buses! Buy from homescreen and scan on board. And while you wait, see your bus on the map. Bostin.

title: FlixBus - Bus travel
description:
Welcome to the FlixBus app!


We are thrilled to announce that FlixBus, the world's largest bus network, is now available in India! 


With FlixBus, you can effortlessly book bus tickets from all our brands including FlixBus, Greyhound, Kamil Koç and FlixTrain, across Europe, North America, India, and South America. 


Easy and Sustainable Travel 

FlixBus simplifies travel by offering convenient and eco-friendly options. With the FlixBus app you can book bus tickets across Europe, North America, South America and India. 


Looking for travel inspiration?

Explore our route map and live timetables to find your next destination, whether you are looking for an exciting adventure in a bustling city or a tranquil getaway, FlixBus has you covered.


Why Choose the FlixBus App?
•	Keep all your bus tickets in one place.
•	Receive exclusive discounts only available on the app.
•	Quickly discover the cheapest bus tickets to your chosen destination.
•	Use the app to locate your stop effortlessly and navigate your way to it.
•	Travel without luggage hassles: enjoy one free checked bag and one carry-on with each ticket.
•	Reserve seats, book additional baggage, and manage your bookings effortlessly within the app.
•	Book bus tickets well in advance or opt for same-day travel for spontaneous trips.
•	Receive important trip updates directly to your phone. Stay up to date on delays or stop changes.
•	Whether you’ve lost something or have questions, our app has you covered with FAQs and convenient contact options.
•	Benefit from the extensive reach of the world's largest bus network.

How to book a bus ticket with FlixBus?

It's easy to buy a bus ticket with the FlixBus app: simply select your departure and arrival cities, pick your date to travel and then checkout with your preferred payment method! After booking you will receive a booking confirmation by email containing all your trip details


Why Travel with FlixBus?

Travel with FlixBus for a journey that combines comfort, safety, and convenience. Our buses are equipped with adjustable seats, air conditioning, personal power outlets, free Wi-Fi and onboard toilets. Safety is a priority for us, so rest assured that your journey will be in capable hands.
No need to worry about packing light - FlixBus offers a generous luggage policy: carry one 7kg bag (30cm x 18cm x 42cm), and one 20kg checked bag (50cm x 30cm x 80cm). Need more? Add an extra bag of carry-on dimensions directly through our app. Travel comfortably, knowing your belongings you don’t have to pack light.


Live Tracking and Timetables

Stay informed in real time with our live coach times and bus tracking features. Easily access e-tickets, keep an eye on live bus times while waiting for your bus, and track the progress of your journey. Use our live timetables to conveniently plan trips that fit your schedule and receive updates directly in the app.


Green Travel Initiative

FlixBus is dedicated to eco-friendly travel. We continuously strive to reduce our ecological footprint by using the latest environmentally friendly buses, optimizing routes, and utilizing efficient driving techniques. Our commitment to sustainability means every journey you take with us contributes to a greener future.


Join us on a journey that's not just about reaching your destination, but also about traveling responsibly and comfortably. With FlixBus, every trip is an experience.
releaseNotes:
Just saying Hi with some performance improvements.
Have a great day and happy traveling!
