title: Sygic Travel Maps Trip Planner
description:
Discover things to do anywhere you go. Plan detailed trip itineraries. Get around with useful travel guides. An ultimate all-in-one app for every traveler.

ADVANCED TRIP PLANNER
Build a complete day-to-day itinerary for your trip with an easy-to-use trip planner. See estimated travel times and walking distances and keep realistic plans. Invite your friends to collaborate on your trips.

WORLDWIDE OFFLINE MAPS
Buy Sygic Travel Premium to use the app without any internet connection, including unlimited offline maps download and walking navigation.

50 MILLION PLACES
Sights, museums, parks, cafés, restaurants, hotels, beaches, waterfalls, caves or even bird observatories. Whether you're a tourist up to sightseeing, out on a shopping trip or a romantic weekend getaway, we've got you covered.

PHOTOS, DESCRIPTIONS, WIKIPEDIA
Popular places come with descriptions, photos, opening hours, admission fees, links and additional data written by professional travel editors or sourced from Wikipedia and other databases.

CITY GUIDES
Get all sorts of useful information about a destination on this new screen. Collections make it easy to discover interesting and popular places, such as "Best Beaches" or "Modern Architecture". Read up on local history, get useful tips on getting around, understand local culture and learn about the dos and don'ts. Insightful guides are available for thousands of cities including London, Paris, New York City, Rome, Barcelona, San Francisco, Las Vegas and other popular destinations.

360° VIDEOS
Take a look around top sights in exclusive 360° videos. Over 500 professional videos from Prague, Barcelona, Valencia, Madrid, Granada, Seville, Marrakech, Gran Canaria, Porto, Lisbon, Athens, Istanbul, Cairo, Tel Aviv, Jerusalem, Bethlehem and Vienna. 360° videos also support Cardboard.

POWERFUL SEARCH AND FILTERS
Find any place by name or address. Use filters to show attractions, museums, shopping malls, restaurants, bars down to art galleries featuring Van Gogh paintings.

TOURS AND ACTIVITIES
Find the best sightseeing tours, cruises, or even local cuisine cooking classes. Buy skip-the-line tickets to top attractions straight from the app.

ACCOMMODATION
Find a hotel, hostel, apartment or b&b. Add it to your trip and see it in your daily itinerary including travel times. Book your accommodation with booking.com straight from the app.

USE ON ALL DEVICES
Your trips will sync automatically between all your devices and our web planner available at https://maps.sygic.com

Using Google Trips? Beware that the trip planning app will be retired on August 5, 2019. Sygic Travel is a great alternative to consider.

SYGIC TRAVEL PREMIUM
Unlock all the features of Sygic Travel on all devices signed in with the same account. You can choose from the following subscription options:

Sygic Travel Premium Monthly Subscription for £3.49*
Sygic Travel Premium Yearly Subscription for £13.49*

You can subscribe and pay through your iTunes account. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the 'Manage Subscription' page in settings.

*The price might differ in your local currency due to different taxes and exchange rates.

GET IN TOUCH WITH US
Check out our online travel maps at https://maps.sygic.com
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SygicTravel
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SygicTravel/
Contact our support team: team@travel.sygic.com
Privacy policy: https://www.sygic.com/company/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://travel.sygic.com/lp/terms/
releaseNotes:
Performance and stability improvements, including:
- Support for new devices and capabilities (iPhone 14 Pro, Apple Watch Ultra, Stage Manager)
- Map reworked with new rendering library
- Map markers load faster

Jinak smer a mista naviguje velmi dobre. | Sygic je má nejoblíbenější navigace. Moc mi pomáhá na cestách. 
Sygic travel je strašně nestabilní. Pořád padá appka a pořád se zasekava. 
Chtělo by to update. 
Mám IP7.
Filip | Výborný plánovač výletu s offline mapou a doporučením na zajímavá místa či výlety a možnosti zakoupit vstupné, podrobný popis míst + informace o otevírací době, vstupném a popis. Lze si sestavit plán na každý den a na mapě vidíte místa, trasu a kolik času to bude trvat. 
Opravdu úžasná aplikace, přesně toto jsem hledal. | Je to dobrá navigace. | Mám velice rád Sygic. Pomáhá mi moc při cestách autem i na moto. | Perfect tips, comprehensive content | Rozhodne nejvyssi pokryti ze vsech cestovatelskych apek | zatím jediný hledač turistických atrakci co jsem našel | absolvoval jsem s touto appkou Madeiru, Barcelonu, informace byly aktuální, stručné a jasné. Pro toho, kdo hledá základní přehled, propojení s mapou moc dobré | Opravdu nejlepší průvodce. Byl jsem v Hongkongu a všechna místa ty nej... jsem navštívil díky aplikaci Sygic. Dík | Super nemá chybu. Jsem velmi spokojený 😊 | Very useful travel app! | Best app ever!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! | Nejsem bůhví jaký plánovač, ale tato appka hodně krát pomohla na cestách, proto 5* | Each new version surprises me by adding useful features. Good job. | Naplanujete body a potom v sygicu navigujete | Great | Super apka 👍 | Výborná appka, informace užitečné, ale v angličtině | I really enjoy this application and has my all points. I used it in NYC with premium purchase and due to its I discovered hidden and most famous places immediately. | Super nápady a funkce. Bohužel jsem za 10€ koupil premium a mapa je hůře použitelná, protože se nenačítá. Musím zoomovat sem a tam a doufat že se načte. Blbý, když jedete na motorce a chcete se podle mapy orienovat :) Navíc obsahem premium nejsou často ani fotky u POI ani wiki články. A jen street mapa, ne zbývající dvě. | My favourite spp for trip planning | Works very good, good off-line maps and nice planing of the trip.

title: BlaBlaCar: Carpooling and Bus
description:
Carpooling
Driving somewhere?
Share your ride and start saving on travel costs!
• Publish your next ride in just minutes: it’s easy and fast
• Decide who goes with you: review passengers’ profiles and ratings to know who you’re travelling with.
• Enjoy the ride: that’s how easy it is to start saving on travel costs!

Want to go somewhere?
Book, meet and travel at low prices no matter where you’re going.
• Search for a ride among thousands of destinations.
• Find the ride closest to you: there’s maybe one leaving from just around the corner.
• Book a seat instantly or request a seat: it’s simple!
• Get closer to where you want to go, thanks to thousands of carpool options.

BlaBlaCar buses
Book your next bus ride and travel at low prices.
• Choose among a wide choice of destinations.
• Bag a bargain with bus tickets from just €3.99 for trips in France or in Germany.
• Book your bus ticket easily and enjoy the ride.

-------------------------
Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
TELL US WHAT YOU THINK: https://www.blablacar.co.uk/contact
releaseNotes: In this version of BlaBlaCar, we've made a few tweaks and done a bit of fine-tuning to make the app even easier to use!
reviews:

The developers of this app dont do anything to help other than monetize this app to the maximum. For some reason they added a completely greedy feed that make every ride much more expensive. And they didnt even fix all the problems like having no notifications. Theres nothing we can do. | Sorry, but to ask 5€ for a shared ride is stealing from app's perspective. Also conversion rate czk/eur is horrible so my "customers" have even higher price shown. Therefore it's not very cheap as sharing a ride should be until certain point. | Prosím vás vyřešte si ty přetrvávající problémy s nekompatibilními smskami k dávno schváleným cestujícím. title: Cheap flights - WayAway
description:
Search for cheap airline tickets

- We analyze air tickets - we compare prices and layover options, finding the cheapest air tickets and the most convenient flight options (direct or with a comfortable layover).
- Searching for air tickets doesn't take much time - we filter and sort all the options for you. And you can buy cheap air tickets. How do you like the idea?
- You can subscribe to notifications about the cheapest air ticket, the most convenient one or the most direct flight (yes, this is possible as well). This way you can keep track of changes in the cost of plane tickets. As soon as the price changes, we will send you a notification.
- But these are not all of the subscriptions! You can also subscribe to the search for air tickets from your city and catch cheap tickets for a plane that flies in the most unexpected direction. What a surprise!
- We also have a "Price Schedule" - it helps you buy a cheap ticket if you are not tied to the departure date.
- And the "Price Map" - in case you have not yet decided on your destination. The map shows both domestic and international flights.
- We save the passengers' passport information so that next time booking a flight won't take much time.
- It's so comfortable to plan weekend trips with us, to fly on Saturday morning and to go back on Sunday evening.
- And maybe you want to see around during the stopover - we will tell you which option is the most convenient if you want to see another city during the trip (also this type of air tickets is cheaper).
- Our developers made app filters for any occasion, including for tickets with luggage and filtering for aircraft models.
- If you don't want to search for flights on exact dates, you can choose one or several months and we will find plane tickets in a given range.

By the way, it's not only plane tickets search. We can also search for:

- Accommodation with recommendations according to your interests: business trip, family, romantic, good for instagram and so on.
- Guided and self-guided tours.
- Cars and transfers to get from the airport to the hotel. And wherever else you want to go

Download the WayAway app now to start traveling and buy tickets.

*** The application from WayAway.com allows you to find the lowest possible cost of an air ticket. We do not sell anything, we help you find flights online with the best conditions.
releaseNotes: We're constantly working to improve your flight search experience. In this update, we are preparing the app for the future amazing features and made several improvements to speed up the search process.
reviews: Superb

title: Skyscanner – travel deals
description:
Skyscanner makes planning your next trip easy. 
No matter where you are - search for flights, hotels and car hire deals to anywhere in the world, on the move. Save time and money by comparing and booking from your favourite travel brands like Ryanair, easyJet, British Airways all in one place too. There are no booking fees or hidden charges – just the best prices. Here’s how to use our app: 

Find inspiration
Can’t decide where? Excellent. Start by exploring everywhere first. Tap ‘Everywhere’ in our search bar to find cheap flights literally anywhere around the world and get ideas for your next holiday.

Filter your search
Know what you’re looking for? Use our smart filters to search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure and arrival times.

The best time to fly
You’ve chosen where it will be, now to find the best dates to book your holiday. Our calendar view breaks down the cheapest dates in a chosen month so you can find the right flight deal. Not ready to book yet? Set up a Price Alert and we’ll let you know when the flight price changes so you’re always booking at the right time.

The right hotel at the right price
Thought we were just about cheap flights? Nope, we’ve got your stay covered too. Compare and book cheap deals from thousands of hotels, resorts, apartments, motels and hostels all over the world. Or find rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute deal for your next holiday. 

Hire a car
Choose where and when to pick up your car hire, and we’ll show you cheap prices and deals. You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure you’re not paying too much on fuel – we’ve got your back.

Book with who you trust
Compare all your top travel brands in one place - Easyjet, Ryanair, British Airways, American Airlines, Wizz Air, Expedia, Booking.com, lastminute.com and more. Plus, get recent reviews on our travel partners from our community of travellers. 

No added fees ever
Did we mention we don’t charge any booking fees? Never. None at all.

Save your flights
Want to look but not ready to book? No problem. We have a ‘saved’ feature where you can ‘heart’ flights or hotels you like. Then it’ll show up on your trips, so you can pick up where you left off and get booking. 

Why Skyscanner?
•	The Telegraph; “The only 20 travel apps you’ll ever need”
•	The New York Times; “Apps for Travelers Dreaming of Their Next Trip”
•	Elite Daily; “7 holiday travel apps that’ll let you jingle around the world’
•	Pocket-lint; “4 apps to get you ready for summer”
	
Let’s get social
•	Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/skyscanner 
•	Instagram: @skyscanner 
•	Twitter: @skyscanner
•	LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/skyscanner/ 
•	Website: www.skyscanner.net
releaseNotes: This update includes a filter to search the cheapest month to fly. If you don’t know which month to take your trip, you can easily find the cheapest month to fly to a certain destination. Just tap “Search Anytime” when selecting your dates and we’ll show you the cheapest price available for flights in each month over the next year. Up, up, and away!

Proste pokud chci vyhledat lety z konkretnich letist do konkretnich zemi s mnou pozadovanou delkou pobytu, tak mam smulu, pritom, kdo by letel do Mexika na 4 noci nebo vikend? Mozna dobre na poskakovani po evrope, ale seriozni cestovani ne. | Je to super vyhledávací program, ale ceny nejsou nejak závratné | V minulosti byl skvělý graf letů jako hlavní nástroj vyhledávání. Škoda, že je teď schován v okně zadávání dne letu jako vedlejší způsob zadávání a s potlačeným zobrazením této volby. Našel jsem ho až na základě upozornění vývojáře.
Tak prosím, do příště opravit = lépe nabídnout tuto skvělou funkci :-) | Skyscanner je nejlepší nástroj, který je na trhu. Narozdíl od ostatních opravdu nachází nejnižší ceny a nabízí k tomu pokročilé možnosti. Takže pokud nevíte kam jet, nesejde vám na přesném termínu,nebo vám nevadí přestupy mezi letišti tak mohu tuto aplikaci jen doporučit. | Skvela aplikace, dobre vyladena, rychla, snadna, designove hezka jen problem je v tom ze pokud se objevi akce tak nez se letenka fakticky nakoupi muze tam byt prodleva i nekolik hodin a na cloveka uz ta letenka holt nezbyde a proto se doporucuje nakupovat primo u aerolinek. | It's great! | excellent app, highly recommend! :) | Opravdu jsem spokojený | Super | Vetsinou opravdu najdou nejlevnější variantu | Jednoduchá a přehledná aplikace!

title: AllTrails: Hike, Run & Walk
description:
Find your way outside with the 2023 iPhone App of the Year

Whether you hike, bike, run, or walk, AllTrails is your companion and guide to the outdoors. Find detailed reviews and inspiration from a community of trail-goers like you. We’ll help you discover new places, keep records of old favourites and share all of your outdoor adventures.

AllTrails offers more than a running app or fitness activity tracker. It’s built on the idea that the outside isn’t a place to seek, but rather a part of us all. Custom route planning helps you search for dog-friendly, child-friendly, pram-friendly, or wheelchair-friendly trails, and more.

◆ Discover trails: Search over 400,000 trails around the world by location, interest, skill level, and more.
◆ Plan your next adventure: Get in-depth trail info, from reviews to conditions to GPS driving directions — and save your favourite trails for later.
◆ Stay on course: Stick to your planned route or chart your own course with confidence when you navigate on the trail.
◆ Grow your community: Celebrate outdoor adventures and find inspiration by connecting with trail-goers who share your passion. 
◆ Share your outdoor adventures: Easily post trails and activities on Facebook, Instagram, or WhatsApp.

Discover trails that fit your nature. Trails for workout planners, hikers, walkers, mountain bikers, trail runners, and casual cyclists. Whether you’re pushing your limits or pushing a pram, there’s something out there for everyone. Let AllTrails help you find it.

► Do more outdoors with AllTrails+ ►
Spend less time figuring out where you want to be, and more time enjoying where you are. With offline maps, wrong-turn alerts, and extra safety and planning features, your annual subscription gives you more tools for more adventures.

◆ Search by distance from you to find your nearest woodland walk or a new hill to scale, a little further afield. 
◆ Stay informed with live route planner details like air quality, pollen, and light pollution.
◆ Unplug completely or plan ahead and take a printed map. 
◆ Download offline maps ahead of time and track your GPS location, even without mobile signal.
◆ Keep your trusted safety contacts or loved ones in the loop with Live Share.
◆ Prepare for the hills ahead: Follow topo maps and trail maps in 3D.
◆ Focus on the view, not the map, with wrong-turn alerts.
◆ Get satellite weather with real-time map details.
◆ Record your activity with stats and photos of your favourite weekend walking paths, your longest bike route or even your most successful spot to bird watch.
◆ Stay on track: Automatically export your records to the Apple Health app.
◆ Give back: AllTrails donates a portion of every subscription to 1% for the Planet.
◆ Explore ad-free: Remove occasional ads by subscribing.

Whether you’re geocaching in a national park, browsing bucket-list mountain bike routes, or planning a walk in the countryside to clear your head, AllTrails+ makes the great outdoors even greater.
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using AllTrails! This update includes:
• Minor bug fixes
reviews: Mapa neobsahuje české turistické značky ani alpské značení. Znám lepší aplikace pro naše evropské podmínky | Totally worth it. Every pence, or koruna! 🙂 | Naprosto úžasná aplikace, za mě 10* | App its wery Good for hiking. We was with my friend on the hiking on the mountain. We got All information for app AllTrails 😊 | Great app for planning trips | App has great potential. Super useful content but performance of maps is very bad and it greatly impairs the user experience. Even if I have latest iPhone Pro device. | As a beginner hiker,I firstly used it for Fuji hiking. I felt more confident about seeing where exactly I'm. In the other hand, I underestimated condition needed there, so I didn't make it to the summit. But anyway, with all information needed in pocket by app, I'll try again soon in Hawaii. | .... bohužel

title: Polarsteps - Travel Tracker
description:
Plan, track, and relive your travels. Record your route automatically, keeping your phone in your pocket and eyes on the world.

Over 5 million explorers have chosen Polarsteps to create and capture their adventures. This all-in-one travel app shows you the world’s most enticing travel destinations, gives you insider tips and plots your route, locations and photos when the journey is underway. The result? A beautiful digital world map that is unique to you! As well as the chance to turn it all into a hardback Travel Book when you’re done. And it doesn’t stop there...

Doesn’t drain your battery, works offline and you have full privacy control.

PLAN

■ Polarsteps Guides, created by our travel-loving editors and other explorers like you, show you the best of the world (as well as giving you top tips for once you get there).
■ Itinerary Planner to build your dream (editable) itinerary.
■ Transport Planner helping you get from A to B with clear transport options between destinations.

TRACK

■ Automatically track and plot your path on a digital world map (that grows fuller as your passport does).
■ Add photos, video, and thoughts to your steps along the way making your memories all the more vivid.
■ Save spots that you love so that you can always find your way back.

SHARE

■ Leave tips for the travelling community on where to go and what to see.
■ Share your journey with friends and family if you want to. Or keep it to yourself. You have full privacy controls.
■ Follow others and share in their adventures.

RELIVE

■ Retrace your steps – scrolling through places, photos, and your travel stats.
■ Create a unique Travel Book filled with your pictures and stories with the touch of a button.

WHAT THE PRESS ARE SAYING ABOUT POLARSTEPS

"The Polarsteps app replaces your travel journal, making it easier and more beautiful." - National Geographic

"Polarsteps helps you track and share your journeys in an easy and visually appealing way." - The Next Web

"Polarsteps' resulting travel log is impressive, and is the source of a severe case of itchy feet in your correspondent." - TechCrunch

FEEDBACK

Questions, thoughts, or feedback? We'd love to hear what you think about Polarsteps. Get in touch via support@polarsteps.com.
releaseNotes: Hey travelers, we updated the app and squashed some bugs you were reporting. Thanks for the feedback! We're always listening on support@polarsteps.com
reviews: PLEASE PLEASE give us more freedom effectively use space on page. Is there any chance to future development to rearrange the pictures on page? Love the app have already 11 books but, would appreciate more freedom with picture sizing and resizing. | I really like this app! | I have had problem with photo quality. It's maybe problem of photo export but it is impossible to find out problem. I have tried to write my problem on your facebook site (my initials are N.P.) but support this doesn't work :( | Polarsteps makes it super enjoyable and convenient to track your trip and to share it with your family & friends. I challenged my bf to make a step every day on our trip to China thinking he would fail after couple of days and he got so hooked up that once the trip was over he told me he missed his polarsteps. Also the map was pretty useful and accurate especially when we were in the in the midst of the Sichuan countryside and neither Google maps or Baidu maps were able to tell us wether there was a passage through the forrest or not. Thank you Polarsteps team! Keep up the good work! Eva & Lars | Rychle dodani, kvalitni papir, ferova cena v porovnani s podobnymi nastroji. Mohu jen doporucit. Spokojenost | The best part is the printed book! I ordered one, professional quality. And it arrived in a week! Great as a present. Thank you. | Good idea, I use it everyday to share location with my family. There are still some bugs though and the timeline is freezing and jumping at times. I would also appreciate being able to track my position but not publish it immediately. | ... doesn't count steps on the iPhone. Other than that it's a clear winner!

title: EasyPark - Parking made easy
description:
EasyPark has been making cities more livable since 2001. With millions of drivers, businesses, and operators using our services in more than 20 countries, we continue to develop convenient, easy-to-use solutions to save you time, and money and remove the unnecessary stress of car parking.

EasyPark is the nr. 1 parking app in Europe when it comes to coverage. With our mobile parking solution, you can pay for parking in a garage or find a parking spot in the street, in the city center or in the airport, at home or abroad - wherever life takes you! You can also charge your EV, and go even further.

Price: In most locations, we charge a service fee on top of the parking cost the operator charges. The total price and fee breakdown are shown in the EasyPark app when you set your end time and before you start to park, as well as in your parking receipt when the session has ended, so you are confident about how much you’re paying. Please see your local easypark.com site for more details.

With the EasyPark app, you can:
- Start your session from your mobile phone.
- Stop your session at any time, paying for the active time.
- Remotely extend your session if you need more time.
- Find parking near your location or destination before traveling.
- Charge your electric car with the same app.
- Pay for parking, whether privately or for work.
- Split your private and work-related parking or charging costs.
- Pay with secure methods such as Visa, Mastercard, ApplePay, or monthly invoices for business accounts.
- Get notified when your parking is close to expiration.

You can pay for parking and EV charging with the EasyPark app in: Rome, Madrid, Melbourne, Berlin, Copenhagen, Paris, Amsterdam, Stockholm, Helsinki and so many more!

Please note that the EasyPark app is unavailable in the United Kingdom. To park in the UK, please use the RingGo app instead.
releaseNotes: We update the app often to give you a fast, reliable service so you can park with confidence. Activate automatic updates to have the best experience. Let us know of ways to make your parking or charging sessions better.
reviews:
Aplikace super, funguje po cele Evropě. 
Jediné velké minus, tak kolečko na nastavování času. Kdy omylem přejedu prstem při nastavování do středu a aktivují parkování se špatným časem. A k tomu ještě zjistím ze mám nataveno jiné auto. 
Takže musím zaplatit znovu. A vlastně parkování vyjde mnohem dráž než u automatu a nebo se starou aplikaci MPLa která fungovala perfektně. | Za každé parkování berou servisní poplatek. Jsou aplikace kde to jde bez poplatků, takže radši budu používat jiné. | Za každé parkování platíte servisní poplatek, dejte si pozor. Citymove a ostatní aplikace jsou zcela zdarma! | Aplikace už funguje bez problému. | Is this a joke? how come you lot taking a 7kr commission for a 20kr parking? incredible | Now they added a service fee that's up to 20% of the parking price. Insane. And no other good options. Classic business model. Offer great service. Screw customers once addicted. | Moc nerozumim existenci těhle dalších aplikací | Za mě není této aplikaci to vytknout splňuje všechny moje požadavky na jednoduché zaplacení za parkování ve městě. | Udělali ze staré funkční aplikace novou a v Brně nefunkční. Bravo, tleskám! | Od března 2024 si aplikace účtuje navíc 15% za parkovací poplatek! A to není málo. Jsou aplikace, kde nic neplatite. Pro mě zklamání jinak výborné aplikace, ale platit 15% !!! navíc mi přijde mimo. | The blue zones are bigger in the app than in reality... They charge on free area. Checked in  Valencia. Scammers... | Zlatá předchozí MPLA aplikace. Neuctovala servisní poplatek. Ale co je o dost horší, ze když potřebujete zaplatit na zóně nebo zónách více vozidel najednou, tak to nelze! Předchozí app bez problému. | A service fee of 15% for being able to pay to the public service(city)? 100 czk/month to get an invoice? This is ransom. | I used this app twice and I wont use it ever again. They charge you money and you wont even know that yoo actually gave the agreement to it. I accodentaly bought a praking time just by touching the wheel in app. The worst parking app I’ve ever seen tbh. | Aplikace dobrá, ale drahé poplatky. V dnešní době nesmyslně vysoké! Jsou podobné aplikace bez poplatků. | They just charge you 15% for their services on top what you’re paying for parking. 15% for facilitating a parking booking is insane. Use mpla.io instead and save yourselves a lot of money. | Dnes mi aplikace oznámila že začnou účtovat servisní poplatek 15%. To vnímám jako naprostou nehoráznost. Nic není zadarmo, ale z mého pohledu 3% maximálně je adekvátní, jako u různých jiných služeb kde si zprostředkovatele služeb účtují například jedno až 3%. 15% naprosto žádném případě. 
Argument že díky tomuto poplatku mohou vůbec fungovat a přinášet nám úsporu času, vnímám jako alibismus. To by mohli říct i U 90 procentní ho poplatku. Měli by mít nastaven poplatek takový že se určitě nejedná o 15% ceny. To je prostě mimo mísu. Aplikaci tady mažu a snad někdy dojde ke změně. | During acquisition of MPLA app I was been forced to start using this app, and I’m not satisfied at all.

1. Paying 15% fee of each parking especially in places where the price is 80 CZK/ hour I consider as too much.
2. Spinning wheel for setup ending time is not comfortable. Have a calendar picker with roller like alarm in iOS will be much better.

Please consider changing pricing model, because receiving fees from city for using your service and also from customers is very unfair. | Pokud budete nastavovat parkovací dobu a omylem se u kliknete do středu růžového kolečka aplikace vám okamžitě strhne peníze bez ohledu na to zda s tím souhlasíte nebo nesouhlasíte. A i když na místě vůbec ne parkujete. Žádná možnost zrušení či odvolání. | Šílenost , draha , platba za předčasně ukončení parkování je lež , zlata MPLA | EasyPark je super, ale v praze si uctuji prilis vysokou provizi a pritom stejnou sluzbu plni PID Litacka, ktera si neuctuje zadny poplatek. | Je to spolehlivá aplikace | Zlatá jednoduchá aplikace MPLA. Škoda, tímto končím s online parkováním 😞 | I does not find nearby parking zones | The spinning wheel is a terrible interface for choosing the time.

And even if I selected e.g. 30min parking for 20CZK and confirmed that, the app charged me 50CZK for 1h parking. How is that possible??? | Aplikace je skvělá. Zaplatím jen tolik, kolik reálně využiju. | Musel jsem přejít z MPLA, kterou jsem léta používal a byl s ní nad míru spokojen. Tohle je ale skutečná katastrofa, která si nezaslouží ani tu jednu hvězdičku.

Co se mi nelíbí:
- design je příšerný
- EasyPark se chlubí větším pokrytím, proč tedy nemohu najít parkovací zóny v Kosmonosech a Mladé Boleslavi, když s MPLA tu platit šlo?
- servisní poplatek 15 %!?
- lze nainstalovat pouze na iOS 16, takže pro mě použitelné pouze na iPadu (který ne vždy vozím). Na mém iPhonu s 15.8 už nepoužitelné.

Co se mi líbí:
- na nic jsem nepřišel.

Nastal čas přejít ke konkurenční aplikaci, kterou už mám delší dobu staženou, ale díky MPLA jsem neměl potřebu ji důkladněji vyzkoušet. Teď ten čas nadešel. Sbohem! | Jako účtovat si servisní poplatky za to, že někomu platíte mi přijde už opravdu přes čáru.
Prostředí aplikace je hrozné, kombinace růžůvé a fialové je k blinkání. Nastavování hodin je náročné a celkově nechápu, že to apple pustil. | The app has several big flaws:

1) It does not show parking lot available in the location in map, based on your location. It's possible to find it using street search though. 

2) the parking zone mentioned in the app does not match the one shown on parking sign 

3) server not responding, unable to pay for parking 

4) when it works, the reservation is made for 1 minute only (ignoring the period requested) | Aplikaci jsem pouzival, ale koncim s ni po zavedeni 15% poplatku za parkovaci sluzby v Praze. Tady se nekdo uplne zblaznil...! Good luck... | Update: Aplikace byla naprosto čerstvá. Musel jsem ji nainstalovat hned poté, co mi MPLA oznámilo, že už si nezaparkuju. Asi jste holt předběhli sami sebe. Teď už je to stejně fuk. Nakonec jsem radši zaplatil v automatu kartou 😏

Jak zadat požadované 4 cifry, když v SMS přijde 6místný kód? A ne, nechtějte, abych kontaktoval podporu - předejte si to sami. Už jen to, že zapnu MPLA, chci zadat parkování a bez jakéhokoli upozornění s rozumným předstihem se objeví jen strohá hláška, že už nemůžu. WTF? | For my perspective, you are providing a service more benefiting the city than the parking person. I will find an app that I don’t pay a service fee for. The parking fees are high enough | Jsem zklamán. Předchozí app byla bez správních poplatků. Což o to to by mi nevadilo kdyby se poplatek nezvyšoval na základě délky parkování.. čím déle parkuji tim je poplatek vyšší což nechápu a je to pro mě signál že něco není ok a že na mě chce nekdo vydělat, asi se jdu podívat se po jiné app. | Při spuštění aplikace to chce telefonní cislo na které prijde sms s 6 čísly ale aplikace chce jen 4 to nechápu . | I got transferred from MPLA and so far I really liked the app and the option to pay precisely for the time being parked, so much that I even ignored the personal data leak incident. 
However, I just received an email from EasyPark that they will start charging an additional fee on top of the parking price. This means that I should pay... to pay. Well, it's not happening. Worst business decision. Bye. | Aplikace není schopná odečíst si peníze za parkovné předem! Zaparkuji, nastavím v aplikaci čas, zaplatím a odejdu z auta. Druhý den ráno mi píšou, že nemám zaplaceno, že mám zablokovaný účet. Oni si ty peníze z účtu snažili vzít až po skoro 24 hodinách od parkování. V tu chvíli jsem si říkala, zda jsem opravdu měla pokryté parkovné v době, co jsem parkovala. Podpora absolutně nereagovala, původně jsem totiž vůbec nechápala, za co dlužím. Nakonec mi přijde email, že mi začnou účtovat poplatek k parkovnému? Účet i aplikaci jsem smazala, raději dojdu k automatu nebo použiji něco jiného. | The last time I had paid parking in the app was a year ago. Last night the EasyPark app stole money from my account even though I didn't park anywhere and didn't use the app. What he is trying is beyond human behavior. They are thieves! | Aplikace je tak intuitivní, ze jsem za hodinu parkovani zaplatila trojnásobek 👌🏻 zlata MPLA se mi nikdy nestalo, abych měla jakýkoliv problém s aplikaci a placením parkovani… | Tedy aspon v Liberci | nemuzu z jendoho mobilu zaroven obslouzit dve ruzna auta | Nejen, že se platí poplatek za platbu, ale i ceny jsou úplně jiné, než v automatu na ulici!!! Přijde mi to jako podvod. Hledám jinou aplikaci. | aplikace mi neposlala kód k ověření, takže ji nemohu použít | MPLA byla lepší z pohledu férovosti poplatků. | SMS code for registration dis not arrived on any phone mumber. Unable to register and use app. | Původní aplikace MPLA byla o 1000% použitelnější než je toto. Nekonečné kroucení kolečkem pro to aby člověk zjistil kolik stojí jaká doba parkování mě přivádí ke vzteku. Nakonec když se rozhodnu zaplatit, tak se platba strhne z karty až druhý den, takže si vlastně ani nejsem jistý jestli mám zaplaceno. Opravdu skvělá práce. Zrušit aplikaci co fungovala a nahradit ji tímhle diletantským pokusem jak co nejvíc naštvat lidi. | Doesn't work freezes and you think it's payed then you get a fine so they don't respect privacy and send you sms on Sunday or at 3 am | Stáhnul jsem aplikaci a ani po 3 hodinách mi nepřišel potvrzovací sms kód. | Platit další fee za kazde parkovani nechci. Diky | Po uniku uzivatelskych dat firmy me z aplikace byla vymazana platebni metoda a po parkovani me na druhy den firma kontaktovala, ze nemam zaplacene parkovani aniz by me nekdo informoval o tom, ze to z preventivnich duvodu smazali. Nemluvim o tom, ze zadaji o zmenu hesla, kterou v aplikaci udelat nemuzu. :-) | Tohle vyrobil opravdový IT expert. Aplikace nemá potřebnou funkčnost, rychlé změny platebních metod nebo karet a je zcela neintuitivní.

title: easyJet: Travel App
description:
Wherever you’re going, take us with you.

Search, book and manage your flights all from the palm of your hand.​

SEARCH & BOOK CHEAP FLIGHTS – Booking a trip to your favourite European location has never been easier with the easyJet app. You can also use Apple Pay or a saved payment card to check out swiftly and securely.​

MANAGE FLIGHT BOOKINGS - Keep track of your easyJet flight bookings all in one place. Change your flights, manage delays and disruption, plus add seats, baggage, sports equipment and more.​

EASYJET HOLIDAYS BOOKINGS – Add your easyJet holiday booking to get instant access to all the information you need for your package holiday, including hotels & accommodation, airport transfers and other important information. You can also view your holiday countdown to build the holiday excitement.​

WORLDWIDE – The world is now at your fingertips. Let us take you within and beyond Europe flying with easyJet and one of our carefully selected Airline partners.​

MOBILE BOARDING PASSES – Use your mobile boarding pass to travel through the airport quickly, speed up boarding and reduce paper waste. You can store up to eight boarding passes per flight, which will be available offline, so you'll not need a data connection. For even more convenience, you can also save your boarding passes to Apple Wallet. Visit https://www.easyjet.com/en/mobile-app/mobile-boarding-passes for more details.​

FLIGHT TRACKER – Track your plane's location in real-time. Plus, check the latest arrival and departure information with live updates direct from easyJet’s Control Centre. You also see your plane’s journey, live in the air, with the addition of the FlightRadar24 map.​

FLIGHT NOTIFICATIONS – We'll notify you of any important flight changes as soon as we know, remind you when it's time to check-in, tell you your boarding gate and inform you of your baggage reclaim belt.​

TRIP WIDGET – Wherever you’re going, we'll be with you every step of your journey. Whether it’s a reminder to check in, check your baggage allowance or download your boarding pass, we’ll let you know.​

TRIP ANCILLARIES AND PARTNERS – Manage your extras all in one place. Easily add excursions, insurance, car hire, and parking to make your trip seamless. Plus, save money by purchasing in-flight vouchers in advance or even pre-order onboard products from our Bistro and Boutique range.​

VOICE SEARCH – Why not try our voice search feature to search for your next flight? Using the latest voice recognition technology you can find flight options by simply saying the destination, dates of travel and airports you want to fly from - all completely hands-free, making booking a flight easier and more accessible.​

LOOK & BOOK – Search for a flight using just a photo of your perfect holiday destination! Simply upload a screenshot of your ideal destination and we'll tell you where it is and which flights will get you there!​

CABIN BAG SIZER – Our handy bag sizing tool uses augmented reality to check whether your cabin bag fits within the maximum dimensions to take on board.​

ADD TO SIRI – Create a Siri shortcut directly from your Itinerary screen to view your trip quickly and easily anytime.​

ACCESSIBILITY – Our app works with your phone's screen reader functionality to audibly describe what is featured and happening on each screen, making your booking and trip management navigation easy and simple.
releaseNotes:
In this version of the app we continue to improve the app's look and feel to further improve your easyJet app experience. 

We have also made it easier to download all your boarding passes to the app with on simple tap.

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com.
reviews:
Disgraceful. Hate this approach. Their web is not functional and customer service a disaster. | By far the best lowcost airline app yet. Works well, check in is easy. | They should add apple pay or google pay payment gateway instead of manual card insertion 
Overall everything is good | I never write reviews untill now. The experience when cancelling your flight at the very last moment was horrible. 

I undestand things can happen but then you have to make sure the clients are refunded and instead you send them theough compensation forms that dont work and wait on a customer chat about 40min each time to respond. 

Will never fly this airline again | Jsem absolutne nespokojen!!!!! 
Spolecnost zrusila muj let a presto ze uz jsem poslal 4 maily abych si vyridil nahradni let, stale nikdo nekomunikuje a neodpovida mi!!! title: Currency converter calculator!
description:
All world currencies.
App works without the internet.
Search currencies by countries.
Mid-market exchange rates.
Ability to set own exchange rates.
Update every hour.
App size only 12 MB.
Cryptocurrencies.
Embedded calculator.
iOS and macOS versions.
Exchange rates widget.

To disable ads, you can buy Premium for $3 per year.
The price is in US dollars and may vary by country.

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase.

title: PackPoint Travel Packing List
description:
As Featured On The App Store's "Best New Apps", The Washington Post, BBC, LA Times, Lifehacker, Fast Company's Co.DESIGN, and The Next Web.
"A Travel App That Practically Packs Your Bags For You"

Never Forget Your ______ Again!

PackPoint is an intelligent packing app and packing list builder for serious travelers. PackPoint will tell you what you need to pack based on length of travel, weather at your destination, and any activities planned during your trip.

Punch in the city you're traveling to, the departure date, and the number of nights you'll be staying there.

PRO TIPS:
- Tap and hold to re-order packing list items
- Select "hide checked items" for a minimal packing list as you pack.
- Check out the Customize menu within PackPoint for Premium features
- Swipe left to remove an item from your packing list
- Tap the "+" sign to change quantities for each packing list item
- Check off "Repeat Basics" if you're willing to repeat wearing basics like shirts and pants
- Check off "Laundry" if you will have access to laundry facilities

PackPoint will build a packing list for you that takes into account:
- Business or Leisure travel
- Activities you plan on doing
- What you need for an international trip
- Warm weather clothes
- Cold weather clothes
- An umbrella if the forecast calls for rain

Have a packing app feature request, or feedback? E-mail info@packpnt.com or visit https://ideas.packpnt.com
Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/packpoint
Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/packpnt @packpnt
releaseNotes: Fixed startup crash for iOS 17

Odemčení plné verze se mi nabídlo zdarma. | Trochu neohrabané, ale perfektní nápad! | The App helps me lot in planning the Trip. Now, I don't forget anything when going to any trip. | This is The best aplication ever. It helps me evry my trip. When I get this I never lost my things. | . | Velice vhodna app 😊

title: Airbnb
description:
FIND YOUR PERFECT STAY WITH AIRBNB CATEGORIES
Explore our curated collections of homes chosen for their style, location or nearby activities. Whether you’re looking for a cosy cabin with views or apartments by the beach, Airbnb Categories helps you find places to stay that are right for your trip. 

CUSTOMISE YOUR SEARCH WITH 100+ FILTERS
Narrow down your choices easily with filters that help you book homes that meet your needs. Search by certain amenities, like pools and fireplaces, or filter for confirmed accessibility features, like step-free bedroom access.

MANAGE ALL YOUR TRAVEL DETAILS EASILY
The Airbnb app keeps all your essential trip info in one convenient place, so you can quickly revisit or share your travel details with others. You’re also able to chat with your Host and receive up-to-the-minute booking updates, making it easier to get there, get inside and get connected to wifi.

TRY FUN EXPERIENCES LED BY LOCALS
Airbnb Experiences are fun activities led by Hosts. They’re a great way to immerse yourself in a new place with a local expert as your guide. Browse both in-person and online options, whether you want an Experience that gets you out and about or one you can enjoy from the comfort of your couch. Book, save or share your favourites – all with the Airbnb app.

IT’S NEVER BEEN EASIER TO AIRBNB YOUR HOME
As a new Host, Airbnb Setup matches you with an experienced Superhost in your area who’ll provide one-to-one help from your first question to your first booking – by phone, video call or chat. You’ll also have one-tap access to Community Support agents to guide you through anything from account issues to billing support.
releaseNotes: Feel at home wherever you travel with Airbnb. We’re always working to better your experience through improvements and updates to the app.
reviews:
