title: Rekola
description:
Rekola - bikesharing for quick rides around the city

Get on the pink bikes and enjoy a ride in different cities of the Czech Republic and Slovakia. It's easy, fast and comfortable. Every time you ride a bike, you change the city for the better, because it is an efficient, sustainable and often the fastest way of urban transport.

Bikes are available 24/7, whenever you need them. You can find out their location directly in the app, and most often find them parked in bike racks and designated areas.

It literally takes a minute to register. Then just scan the QR code on your bike and you're good to go.  

For up-to-date info on prices and tariffs, visit www.rekola.cz/en.

Add a Lítačka to your account and get 2 free 15-minute rides per day. You can also load your MultiSport card. It gives you 2 extra hourly rides every day.

Got a question? Email us at info@rekola.cz.


Disclaimer:
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes:
- better view of parking spots
- quicker renting of the bike
- fixed random app crash after returning the bike
reviews:
Aplikace občas zlobí. Uplatnil jsem kupon na delší jízdu zdarma a naskočilo 5990 jízd zdarma. O par dní později opraveno a svítí tam už jen jedna volná jízda. Projel jsem ji a strhly se mi peníze. Nepoužitý kupon tam svítil dále. (Podpora mi ale peníze na žádost vrátila.)

Jeden den při používání aplikace jsem ztratil signál internetu. O dva dny později mi aplikace pořad tvrdí, ze jsem offline, i když koukám na plný signál 5G. Až restart aplikace pomohl. A tak podobně. Většinou funguje bez problémů, ale ne vždy. 

 Tip na přidání funkce: synchronizace aktivit do Apple Health. Rozhodně znám lidi, které by to motivovalo více jezdit, když by jim rovnou aplikace zaznamenávala jízdy jako aktivity. | Používám rekolu už několik let a jsem velmi spokojená. Moc ráda kola půjčuji, nemusím se o něj starat a  ani mít na to místo doma. Občas mám problém s odemknutím, ale je to v zimním počasí, takže úplně tomu rozumím a naopak vítám to, že kola mohu půjčovat téměr celoročně. Též občas mi vyskakuje nesprávná ujetá vzdálenost. 

Děkuji všem developerům!

Poznámka pro zlepšení: Uvítala bych integraci s Apple Zdraví ať každá jízda je započtena do aktivity. | If you are in Czech Republic, then the Nextbike is a better option. 
1. Rekola app loads slower. 
2. sometimes Litachka gets disconnected.
3. you need to take a photo of the bike, when returning it - makes the process slower
4. Rekola Bikes have only 3 speeds, comparing to 8 in NextBike | Za poslední 3 mesice jsem nemel jizdu, pri ktery bych nemusel hard vypnout appku. Prechazim cim dal vic na next bikes. | Posledni 2-3 mesice, se aplikace velmi dlouho nacita. Pri otevreni apky, pri vraceni kola, a celkova odezva apky je velmi pomala. Momentalne mam verzi 1325 a iP13Pro ios16 a ted nove 17. 
Navic aplikace porad pise ze jsem offline. Mam unlimited data a 5G | V životě jsem neviděla hůř fungující aplikaci na půjčování kol snad nikde na světě. GPS se nechytá, aplikace padá, nelze kolo vrátit, atd. atd. Hlavně že je to růžové. | Jsem opravdu velky fanousek rekol, ale posledni rok je aplikace ve strasnem stavu. Je velmi pomala a casto se musi restartovat jen pro moznost vraceni kola. Nevim co se stalo, ale rekola jsou momentalne velmi narocna na pouzivani prave kvuli nefunkcnosti aplikace. | Pokrytií hlavně u stanic metra, kde už MHD jede. Takže mimo centrum nanic | Doufam ze kola vam spravuje nekdo jiny nez autori aplikace protoze nemoct dokoncit registraci/prihlaseni, to je damy a panove tragedie. Vzdavam to. (O tech trech crashich behem toho nemluve.) | Vzdy vse naprosto super az na posledni aktualizaci/ je fakt super, ze si muzu cist hlasky o kole (proc probuh?) , kazdopadne aplikace se mi rozbehne jen na pujceni kola, nasledne vraceni vede k opakovanymu spadnuti, pomaha jen restart telefonu :( stalo se mi to pokazde ( 5 jizd) od noveho updatu | Service is GREAT! 
But everytime I return the bike the app freeze. 
Hence more minutes 😬
But I believe this can be easily fixed.
Pleeeeease 🙏 | I downloaded app cannot enter email neither can sing in with apple id.
I tried to delete and downloard app multiple times but its not working | I've been using Rekola for months now as it is convenient for me whenever I am around Prague. I have both subscription using multisport(2*60) and Litacka (2*15) per day. I was happy until I noticed they were charging me extra. Apparently, if you would use the bike for more than 15 mins it would be deducted both on your multisport and litacka. So, you end up using the service twice only per day unless you ride the 2*15mins (lack subscription) first before riding 2*60mins (multisport subscription), not the other way around. I don't know if others realized this. | Kdyz chci vratit kolo a probudim appku z backgroundu, hrozne dlouho cekam - bezi loading. A to i v Praze na 5G. Rychlejsi pak je appku killnout a pustit znovu. | Služba jako taková je úžasná. Nicméně aplikace by si zasloužila údržbu. Zpravidla každá druhá jízda mne neuvěřitelně vytočí… po skončení jízdy zapnu aplikaci s tím, že bych rád zadal ukončení jízdy, ale místo toho koukám minuty jen na piktogram kola a aplikace se nerozběhne. Pomůže buď několikrát shodit aplikaci, nebo hodit telefon do letadla a opět ho nahodit. Když máte vypočtenou jízdu do 15 minut na lítačku, tak vás aplikace vypeče a zbytečně platíte navíc. Velká škoda! | The service is great. The bikes are in good condition, they could been placed to more spots even further from the city center but that is understandable. The app on the other hand is terrible. I’m running latest version, on the latest iOS on the latest iPhone and it is so slow, a lot of crashes freezing and stuff. | Posledních pár týdnů je aplikace neskutečně pomalá. Obrazovka s načítáním často zůstává i dvě minuty než se objeví mapa/shrnutí cesty atd... | App doesn’t work. Server error 500 | Nekolik dni jsem aplikaci nemohla ani spustit (aktualizovana appka, aktualni iOS), po nekolika dnech se totalne pokazila, nelze se prihlasit. Hodilo me to na screenu, kde to predvyplnuje nejaky “example” email. Kdyz ho chci zmenit, nic se nestane, problikne stranka a dal to zustane na te screene. Zkousela jsem odinstalovat, ale stejne me to vraci na stejnou chybovou stranku, jako kdyby se aplikace zasekla v nejakem loopu. | Cannot use it at all now. Ridiculous. | Podpora- projevuje velkou ochotu cokoliv vyřešit. 
Neustále odkazuje na e-mailovou komunikaci. Super. To tam ten livechat nemusíte vůbec mít;) je to k ničemu když tam nejsou schopni poradit ani s tím, proc nelze přidat Apple Pay do apky ( Apple Pay je nastavené a funkční- denodenne to využívám,iph12) | Aplikace je nepresna a extremne pomala. Uz x let. | Složitější příběh zapříčiněný špatnou funkčností aplikace při přídávání platební karty. Celý jeden den řeším s pánem na podpoře bez úspěchu - prudí mě a tvrdí, že jsem dlužník. Druhý den s paní vyřešeno během hovoru za 5 minut. I tak hořká vzpomínka... Doporučení pro vývojáře - otestujte pořádně aplikaci před publikací!!! | Aplikace nefunguje, hlásí mi, že nejsem na internetu i když jsem. | Appka dopredu neupozornuje na moznosti parkovani - mimo parkoviste za 500 CZK a pri zajizdeni na parkoviste pak appka ztraci vyznam. Dal kolum chybi povinna vybava, nutna pro provoz na verejnych komunikacich a s policajtama se asi nikdo handrkovat nechceme. Predni brzda je na spatne strane riditek v rozporu se zvyklosti ve vsech evropskych zemich (krome UK), a tak nemuzu rict, ze by rekola byla bezpecna volba do provozu v Praze a ani jinde. To ze v mape nejsou vrstevnice uz je jen drobnost…
Celkove jako sluzba hodne daleko za pcekavanim. | Experiencing huge amount of bugs on the app. App shows there is a bike on the map and there is none. Trying to give back the bike and the app does not let me do it. It said: “The app is experiencing internal error”. | kdykolik to kolo potrebuju, appka je odhlasena, musim verifikovat maily, vytvaret novy hesla, ktery si nebudu pamatovat, protoze uz jsou asi milionty. A jako grande finale znova propojovat litacku a platit 1 korunu kartou, cely proces v noci, kdy je zima a nejedou spoje. Kdybych sla pesky, je to rychlejsi a nebudu nasrana. Toto se opaluje s kazdou altualizaci, bohuzel vzdy kdyz se to nejmene hodi... | Rekola jsou super a rada je vyuzivam, kvuli cemu me vic stve, kdyz je neco nefunguje Casto prijdu ke kolu, kde je vypustena duse nebo zablokovany zamek. Aplikace se pri vraceni kol obcas seka. To vsechno chapu, rekola nejsou gigant jako lime nebo next, jenom je to skoda | Jsem velmi nespokojena s vašimi službami | Love these, not just because the way hove to move around the city, but also because it started like a tiny project that grew up,not as a part of large corporation. | Best and cutest shared bicycles in the world. | Nejde vratit kolo piciii | Kola sú super, super servisovane, maximálna spokojnosť. Ostatní poskytovatelia by sa mali priučiť, hlavne customer support.

Jedna vec ale chýba v appke, možnosť ohodnotiť stav kola, prípadne možnosť nahlásiť problém aj bez vyradenia bajku z obehu.

Dík čau | Podpora večer nefunguje. Což není problém, ale:

Když se vám, jako mně stane to, že kolo nejde zamknout a tedy i vrátit, jste prostě a jednoduše v háji.

Celou noc platíte pronájem za kolo, které nezamčené stojí venku a je na vaši odpovědnost, jestli ho někdo neukradne. 

Fakt skvělé… třeba se někdy dočkáme opravy, ale když jsem jim to nahlašoval napřímo, jen se mi ti vtipálci vysmáli se slovy, jestli mi při zamykání nepřekážel výplet kola.

Dokud toto neopraví, vždy raději sáhnu po konkurenci a vám řadím to stejné. | Asi tak v 50 % se stane, že kolo není na místě, které ukazuje mapa. Je to celkem k vzteku jít 5 min pěšky pro kolo, abych zjistil že tam kolo není. | Jako všechno fajn a tak, ale:
- appka pomalá a občas divný záseky
- mimo centrum málo zón a některé mizí
- někdy málo kol a jejich stav nic extra | Rekola jsou dobré priblizovadlo po Praze, ale mají svoje mouchy. Když pominu fakt, že to jsou úplné vraky (napr. absence vzorku na pneumatikách me stala poradny drzkopad) tak mi vadí hlavně nedomyšlenost automatického prodlužování pujceni z multisportky, tedy místo načtení druhé jízdy zdarma to začne účtovat peníze. | Kolo bylo zamcene neslo zamknout do pipnuti nevsiml jsem si toho protoze pri zkousce pojizdnosti pipat zacalo.  Odjel jsem tedy domu po sleze jsem na zaklade vasi sms zjistil, ze kolo neni vracene. Na podpore se nikdo neozval, takze jsem se z domu vratil 5km ke kolu kde se mi podarilo kolo zamknout asi na paty pokus a velkou silou. Prosim o vraceni castky na ucet. Dekuji Kovar | Dnes jsem měl 2 nepříjemné zážitky, jak ráno tak v poledne se zopakovala situace, kdy aplikace ukazovala kolo, ale reálné tam žádné kolo nebylo - ráno na křižovatce Veverkova a Lwtohradska a v poledne na Staroměstské kde to dokonce ukazovalo dvě kola ale reálně nula. Už mě nebaví běhat ulicemi a hrát geocaching jestli tam nahodou nenajdu bonus v podobě kola ;) i když uznávám ze je to docela vzrůšo pokud zrovna nevaĺte do práce ;) | Super. To chceš! | The customer support is just great and they are better every year.
Rekola is setting up standard for a bike sharing app! | Nikdy více! 🤮 | I returned the bike, took the picture - still it was running like I was using it | Rekola mi opakovaně autorizuje drobné částky na platební kartě připojené do app.
Následně částku vrátí. 
Tímto Rekola velice narušuje mou důvěru, když muže z mě karty bez důvodně čerpat peníze a nemohu to ovlivnit jinak než kartu zrušit. 
Zákaznická podpora, reaguje ve smyslu že je to normální. S tím nemohu souhlasit a službu ruším. | Ta administrativa okolo je otravna. Aplikace vas napred nechce prihlasit kvuli technickym problem. Pak zase prudi, ze na tel cislo uz je registrovan jiny email. Ja chci jet na kole, ne si s vama 2 h dopisovat, na to fakt nemam cas. | Kedysi apka fungovala skvele. Teraz mrzne, neotvara sa fotak pri vrateni kola, nechyta sa gps. Nutne neustale apku resetovat nez sa chyti. Frustrujuce hlavne ked sa clovek na kole niekam ponahla a dufa, ze si na rekole skrati cestu. | Rekola sú super a je ich dosť ale samotná aplikácia je hrozne zabugovana. A zároveň má prístup k mojej karte. Veľmi zlá kombinácia | I když mám předplatné na 5 jízd za měsíc, tak mě aplikace nenechá půjčit v rámci předplatného 2 kola na jednou (jedno z nich musím platit zvlášť), proč? Jak často jedou na rekolech 2 lidi spolu? To je to tak výjimečné, ze s tím systém nepočítá?

Když chci jedno z půjčených kol vrátit, nedá se na nich fyzicky poznat, které je které, není na nich žádná originální značka, ze které by se to dalo vyčíst. | Stačí nějakou dobu nepoužívat a už se vám nepovede přihlásit. Aplikace vás pošle do smyčky přihlášení -> potřebujeme ověřit telefon -> tento telefon už máme v databázi, změňte si heslo -> změna hesla -> potřebujeme ověřit telefon -> tento telefon už máme v databázi, změňte si heslo… | Vse funguje jak ma, prehľadne a rýchle 👑

title: PicCollage: Photo Video Editor
description:
Create the best moments in your life with PicCollage! Design collages, invitations, greeting cards and more with over 3000 designs for every occasion - birthdays, weddings, anniversaries.

Always find the right template, layout, or grid. With simple photo editing tools, you can edit, crop and retouch your photos & videos. Use filters to enhance your photos or videos, and add fonts, drawings, doodles and stickers to your design. Join over 200 million people worldwide and create collages, cards and much more with PicCollage!

PICCOLLAGE AT A GLANCE
• Create collages, greeting cards, Insta stories & more
• Edit photos & videos easily - filter, effects, retouch
• Simply remove & change backgrounds thanks to AI
• Use ready-to-use layouts, grids & animated templates
• Decorate with fonts, stickers, and doodles

Try PicCollage now! The free starter pack is full of stickers, layouts, grids and templates to help you edit photos, create collages and design cards instantly.

CREATE COLLAGES AND DESIGN CARDS
Whether you want to design cards, create a photo collage or just remove the background from a photo - it's possible with PicCollage! Use features like cutouts, drawings and animations to add a personal touch to any design. Even add videos to create a video collage or slideshow. Expand your creations, and save them as videos or GIFs.

EDIT VIDEOS AND PHOTOS - CROP, FILTER, RETOUCH
Our video and photo editor offers you simple image editing tools so that your photos and videos fit perfectly into the collage. You can cut out, retouch and edit images. Plus, use filters and photo effects to optimize your photo editing.

USE A LAYOUT, TEMPLATE, GRID, OR CREATE FREESTYLE
With PicCollage you can create a collage, slideshow or invitation card in no time at all. Use layouts, templates and grids to create fascinating cards. Add a frame around your photos and bring your collage to life with animations. Our AI-powered highlight detection keeps the focus of the photo front and center. Of course, you can also design it yourself with freestyle.

REMOVE BACKGROUNDS WITH AI
With our cutout tool, you can easily remove the background from a photo to isolate people and pets - like scissors, but better! There are also fun designs that let you cut out photos as stars, hearts, and squares. With the new AI-based Magic Cutouts, you can also magically swap the background of photos.

USE FONTS AND CURVED TEXT
Our editing app offers you a lot of fonts. Plus, with the Curve Text Editor, you can easily display your text in a rounded arc, circle, around your photos, or in other creative ways. With the AI-powered font pairing in our speedy suggested layouts mode, you'll always find the right font for your design.

ADD BACKGROUNDS, STICKERS AND DOODLES
Thanks to our worldwide partnerships with famous artists, we have thousands of exclusive backgrounds and stickers. Add a background to your photos and collages and decorate them with trendy stickers! To add a personal touch to your collage, card, or slideshow, you can create your own drawings and doodles.

USE A TEMPLATE FOR INSTAGRAM
Whenever you're on Insta and want to create impressive posts, try a template. Create an Instagram Story or Reel and share it directly with your followers!

PICCOLLAGE VIP
PicCollage VIP is a subscription that offers advanced features and removes watermarks and ads. With the 7-day trial version, you can test it for free! As a VIP, you get access to thousands of stickers and backgrounds, as well as exclusive fonts and layouts.

Get the PicCollage photo and video editor and add a magic touch to your photos and videos!

PicCollage(TM) and “Pic Collage” are trademarks of Cardinal Blue Software.
Terms of Service: http://cardinalblue.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://cardinalblue.com/privacy
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
releaseNotes:
Introducing Magic Cam: Tap on the new camera icon from the homepage and you will be transported into an enchanted world of photo options. Start with snapping a pic and then try out Magic Cam's selection of Magic Effects to see your photo change from a watercolor painting to an animated cartoon, or even a snow wonderland in a few moments! 

Crafty Borders: Create the nostalgic feel of handmade valentines with our new glitter and paper tear borders. These templates automatically apply just the right amount of old and new to your photos! 

Love & Family: We hope you love browsing the colorful choices to send a sweet creation to someone you love for Valentine's Day, Lunar New Year, birthdays, and more! 

Smooth Sailing: This update also includes navigation improvements in filters and templates to keep you cruising through your collages!
reviews:
Krasné a jednoduché | Super | 👍🏼 | Usee friendly app. | IT works nicely, until you want to use some vip predefs  or remove water label. Of course with use of my debit Card...I cant set new card, even type card number to Pay for this app and its services.
So, i used it once, and unistall. | Všechno placené | Nej apka pro tvorbu koláží 🥰🙏 | Mxudjd | Kíťové | I am thrilled with how easy this app is to understand. I had it installed on my phone a long time. And I don’t understand why I subscribed to others before. The only one subscription does not seem expensive compared to other apps. | Super aplikace pěkné koláže | Ok options for a free app | The best app ever👍👍👍 | It’s just super to make memories or wallpapers!!! | Opravdu povedené | Opravdu perfektní nástroj, kdyby byla cena na premium verzi nižší bylo by to fajn ☺️ | Nice app really useful | Easy creation with personalised text a and animation | Vše bezvadně funguje. Krásné koláže zdarma! | Super | Is cool photo game🤪😜😝🤩 | Top | Very nice app | I am using free version and if is easy and useful. I am not very talented with technologies but this is friendly to me 😉 | Spousta možností zdarma | Super, super, super!!! | . | Vánoce | Fun ;), love it... | Bad | Rychlé a pěkné | Skvela aplikace! Jednoducha. Inspirativni. Variabilni. Bavi vas neco si vytvorit a hrat si pro vytvoreni perfektniho vysledku podle vas👍 | Some layouts and templates are free, the nice ones are for fee. | 👍👍👍 | Je docela super jenom mě štve🤬😡😠 to VIP a to placení ,protože jsem ještě dítě a nemůžu to platit…jinak skvělá aplikace jen kvůli tomu VIP mi tam hodně věcí chybí..😞😔 | Super | Vhbb | My favouritte app | Hi, i think this app is sooooo good! But some things arent free....please make all for free, and i had to give you 5stars!! | Spokojenost 👍 | Tato Aplikace mi ušetří čas | Velmi dobra aplikace snadne zachazeni rychle se naucite jen je skoda ze nejdou delat delsi videa jinak vsem doporucuji🤗👌
Davam:⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ | I’m very happy with this app | Not too much for free but fine. | Ale je škoda že se tam nedá přidat zvuk(hudba) a také se nedá vytvářet dlouhé video. | Perfektní aplikace na koláže - krásné vzpomínky.... | Již jednou zakoupeno a znovu chtějí peníze. Ani náhodou. Nespolehlivý vývojář. | Aaaaauto 👍😉🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣 | I really dont like the fact that I have to buy backgrounds and other stuff for money when the app is for free. That is also a reason why I dont use the app very often because I cant do the things that i would like to do, without paying and my parents wont pay this for me so i just simply cant use it.
Except that I think the app is pretty good and i like it, but i think the stuff that i wrote about earlier is a huge and unnessesary mistake the app managers are doing.
Oh and I forgot U HAVE TO PAY EVERY MONTH!!! NOT JUST ONCE! AND ITS VERY EXPENSIVE FOR BACKGROUNDS AND STICKERS AND I DONT KNOW WHAT ELSE! I JUST THING THAT IS AUFUL | Great app for collages and creating various cards!

title: Citymove: Parking & Transport
description:
The smartest way to pay for parking and move around the city of Prague. Citymove enables parking payments for all residential zones, P+R parking, and shopping centres. Save all your number plates, including a description or image of your car, select the parking zone and the length of parking and pay with one click. You can even terminate the parking session prematurely.

Citymove is a great partner for public transport in Prague. Search for public transport routes, explore timetables and routes of all lines or check out the location of your tram or bus on the map in real-time!

Citymove supports:

- Parking payments (including CCS cards)
- Public transport routes and timetables
- Live positions of buses and trams
- Smart parking notifications
- Locations of shared bicycles, cars and charging stations

Just type in your destination, and Citymove will find you the best public transport routes. And if you prefer a car, it will list all parking options nearby. After that, you can click on your parking zone and pay for parking in the easiest way imaginable. And if you plan to stay longer, you can prolong the parking with one click. This makes it an essential app for all drivers parking in Prague.
releaseNotes:
Welcome to Citymove 3.6.2!
Simplify your traveling around Prague. Pay for parking in residential zones or plan your route with public transport and follow the live locations of trams and buses. We've added new services and small improvements in the new version.
 
What is new:
- New user interface for parking. You can now shorten the length of your parking session or terminate it entirely if you choose to leave early. Never pay more than what you use.
- New administration of cards to enable personal and business parking payments
- New payment getaway
- Public transport tickets have been replaced by sms tickets
reviews:
Po poslední aktualizaci není možné prodlužovat parkování. Po žádosti na uložení nového času aplikace odmítne požadavek provést a napíše, že parkování na zóně je již zaplacené a musí se počkat až aktuální parkovací relace skončí. Předchozí verze v tomto ohledu fungovala bez jakýchkoliv problémů. Bylo by možné chybu opravit? | Proč už nefunguje služba “zaplatit jízdenku kartou”??? Proč musím přes sms, které přes služební telefony jsou blokované… | I was only using the app to pay for parking. But the the app regularly logs out after some time or when they do an update.
This is so annoying that I'm stopping to use the app and going for an alternative instead. The app is unusable with logouts.
Moreover in the last update there's no Apple Pay option so I have to fill in my card detail like in the middle ages. | Uprostřed platby se iniciovala aktualizace která se těsně před koncem zasekla | Aplikace v 90% případů nefunguje, resp. není schopná zajistit platbu kartou, hlásí karty jako neplatné a když už jsem tam jednu konečne narvala, za měsíc už nebyla v paměti uložená a podruhé už neprošla 🤦‍♀️

Reinstalace ani 7 různých karet nepomohlo. | Aplikace jako nejkrtsi dobu parkovani mabizi 30 minut. Ostatni aplikace nabizeji i kratsi casy, tak nechapu proc to zrovna tahle aplikace nenabizi. | Nekdy se aut. nezobrazi, kde v Praze prave parkuji. Pak me to zdrzuje. Starsi app byla lepsi.., | Jednou za čas aplikace zahlásí problém s profilem a uživatele odhlásí. Po přihlášení je nutné opět zadat kartu. | K CityMove jsem před nedávnem přešel z MPLA, když se změnila na EasyPark. Bohužel (nebo vlastně bohudík) jsem si na CityMove nestihl ještě pořádně zvyknout, protože nemá pokrytou Ml. Boleslav (jak překvapivé, když je to produkt od Škoda X) a do Prahy jsem v poslední době jezdil sporadicky. Naštěstí už si ani zvykat nemusím - jarní novinka v podobě servisních poplatků při platbě parkovného mě přiměje k návratu k platebním automatům a tisku papírových lístků. Díky a mějte se fajn. | I appreciate the whole concept of the app. But: 1 / The Apple Pay button is missing terribly. If the payment gateway doesn't support it, simply change it. It is 2024. 2 / I would love to use it for business trips. The ability to input my invoice information would be great. 3 / Not being able to input more payment cards is just bad. 4 / The button “Check and vote for new features” sends you to - Oopsie, portal not found. 5 / When using it for the first time, I had to restart the App twice. After saving the card and after saving the licence place. Thank you for your work. | Dears,

without ApplePay payment option is your application useless for me.

ApplePay a GooglePay methods are currently becoming de facto standard due to security reason.

I’ll reconsider my score and give you 5 stars as soon as you add ApplePay option.

Thank you in advance and best regards, JK | Malý servisní poplatek za platbu parkování? Zvážili jste to dobře? Myslím, že zdaleka nebudu sám, kdo v takovém případě končí s Vaší aplikací. | Nepoužitelné. Vyžaduje uložit data platební karty. Naopak stále neumožňuje využít služby Apple Pay. Kdy umožníte tuto variantu platby? | Application does not allow me the bank card. I was even calling the bank and the problem is not on their side. So I tried to reinstall the application and I tried to make a different account but nothing worked. No clue what to do :( | Škoda že chybí možnost platit parkováni přes Apple Pay. Také jsem nepochopil proč čas parkování není možné volit po minutách a nebo co by mi dávalo největší smysl - po korunách s tím že by se nabízeli jen možné částky (např. by to začínalo na 10 Kč) a aplikace by koupila za příslušnou částku nejdelší možný čas.
Teď když EasyPark začal účtovat servisní poplatek 15 % je tahle aplikace asi nejvýhodnější řešeni, ale Lítačka umí zase platbu přes ApplePay. | Po pár použití musím říci, že aplikace je velmi dobrá a rozhodně doporučuji. Skvělé jsou push notifikace. Navíc podpora CCS, kterou MPLA nebylo schopné zavést do aplikace nikdy. 

K 5 hvězdám chybí už jen možnost přidat widget a hlavně, odpočítávání na zamčené obrazovce jako Live Activities. | Po aktualizaci se nejde přihlásit | Po poslední aktuakizaci nefunguje přihlášení pres apple a ani nelze přidat jakoukoliv  kartu. | There is a bug that i cant add my payment card, 
When i get to the page to add the card,
I add card details,
Then card needs to be authorized via card provider.
I need to switch to the provider app to press authorization 
When i exit the app the information is lost. 
Cant pass to next step. | Že není možné platit Apple Pay je skandál, ale jako že fakt. | Appka nefunguje. Hazi jen errory pri snaze o vytvoreni uctu. Velky spatny. | Již po několikáté mě aplikace zradila.Nebyla schopna dokončit zadání parkování v Praze…. | I just needed to pay for a parking ten minutes ago with Citimove app. But I could not - does not offer Apple Pay, but ot required me to type in information from my bank card manually! I am sure I have it somewhere at home, because when I enabled Apple Pay two years ago, I had to insert it to the Wallet app. But I have not used it since then, as all street shops, restaurants, and ATM which I met accept Apple Pay. I am sure I will forget to insert card number to the CityMove app at home, which means the app will be useless next time, when I would need it. So bye, I am uninstalling this app with pay methods designed in previous century! | Prosím, bude App v nějaké reálné době podporovat Apple pay? | Dnes jsem si stahl a instaloval appku. Je potrebne odstranit chybu, kdy nedochazi pri registraci k nacitani dalsiho kroku. Po stisknuti souhlasu s lokalizaci se zasekne a je nutne shodit a nastartonat znovu. Takto je nutne pokracovat pres kazdou vyzvu - notifikace, onchodni podminky. Jinak to vypada dobre. | Plánujete možnost platby přes apple pay? | Continue button doesn’t do anything, can’t enroll. | After the iOS 17 update the bottom sheet scrolling is not behaving correctly. When panning down in the table view, the bottom sheet is not colapsing | K ničemu prý neznámá chyba a abych si mohl přidat kartu bez které to prý nejde jsem musel zaplatit 1 Kč | Aplikace mi strhla peníze za jednu platbu jízdenky 2x, při reklamaci, mě dámy ujišťovaly, že platba zpět je v běhu… Po půl roce peníze stále nikde. Aplikaci jsem smazal, o tohle nestojím!
Edit
A kam myslíte, že celou tu dobu píší? | Everything works well.

Lítačka app has this option and it’s very convenient.

U výběru času se jen toči loading kolečko, a k platbě parkování jsem se ani neměl možnost dostat. Případnou pokutu mám pak rovnou přeposlat k úhradě na Škoda DigiLab nebo..? | Přestalo fungovat placení za parkování. Kolečko se točí, tlačítko je nefunkční. | Po aktualizaci nelze vybrat čas parkování, stále se točí “busy loader” | Support is not working.  No one responds to the form on the website even after reminders.  Not by email either.  So I'm trying the "do the laundry in public" technique and hope it catches on.  When that happens I will change the review.

Podpora nefunguje. Na formulář na webu nikdo nereaguje ani po urgencích. Na email také ne. Takže zkouším techniku "praní prádla na veřejnosti" a doufám, že se chytí za hlavu. Když se tak stane, recenzi změním. | hruza,po prikazu zaplaceni appka spadla a doklad prisel na mail,az jsem odjel hledat misto jinam | Spojit mapu next biku a rekol by bylo bezva. Navíc není v appce integrovaný ApplePay. | Самое лучшее приложение для тех, кто привык перемещаться на личном транспорте! 👍🏻 | App used to work great. I am no longer able to choose how long I will be parking and therefore unable to pay for the parking. Had to move to a different app which works better | Please add this payment method for the 5-star rating :) | I am disappointed. I had been using the app for more than a year and I was happy. After the recent updates, the app only offers a limited choice of parking times: for example 30 minutes for 30 CZK, 60 minutes for 60 CZK and so on. Previously, I was able to choose a much more precise time (10 minutes, 15 minutes etc). I have checked another app and they offer more granular options. I am sorry, guys, small things matter. Probably I will switch to the other one. | Po updatu zhoršení funkcionalit.
- nelze jednoduše vyhledávat spojení, 
je vidět pouze odjezdy ze zastávky.
Dříve apka navrhovala několik možností, 
jak se dostat z bodu A do B.
- parkování nově a lá MAPLA nepřehledné. Dříve bylo jednoznačně vidět, která část ulice je pod jakou zónou. Jsou běžně ulice, kde v jednom směru je zóna jedné barvy a v druhém směru jiné barvy nebo žádné. 
Toto rozlišení je nyní zcela znemožněno. | V nové verzi aplikace neukazuje žádné odjezdy MHD, spoje na mapě a neumí plánovat cestu. Pokud nechci koupit jízdenku nebo platit za parkování, je aplikace k ničemu. Mažu. | Updated:
The update came with the worst possible timing - during parking in the middle of city with no time to spend several minutes with setting up the entite app. Neverthless when all is done application works just fine and fullfills everything you need from it. Original:
Developer updated recently application with following results - automated logout from account and not possible to login again unless password is reset, removed payment method so it is not possible to pay for parking unless you add, register and process testing payment again. That is crazy! Sitting in car, want to pay for short term parking, control cars passing by and I have to spend 20 minutes with setting the app completely again from the scratch. Have you ever thought about customer journeys, added value, etc.!?

title: Google Translate
description:
Translate between up to 133 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Translations between the following languages are supported:
Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Bambara, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chichewa, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Corsican, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dhivehi, Dogri, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Ewe, Filipino, Finnish, French, Frisian, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Guarani, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hawaiian, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Ilocano, Indonesian, Irish Gaelic, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Korean, Krio, Kurdish (Kurmanji), Kurdish (Sorani), Kyrgyz, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Luganda, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Maithili, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Meiteilon (Manipuri), Mizo, Mongolian, Myanmar (Burmese), Nepali, Norwegian, Odia (Oriya), Oromo, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Quechua, Romanian, Russian, Samoan, Sanskrit, Scots Gaelic, Sepedi, Serbian, Sesotho, Shona, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Tigrinya, Tsonga, Turkish, Turkmen, Twi, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yiddish, Yoruba, Zulu

When I just want to copy and paste some text, mostly from Arabic language , I’ve always sent a picture here and I got the original variant and the translated one. Now I only can see the translated one + it’s using google lens and searching that translated word on the internet. What the hell is this??? I just want that original variant so I don’t need to annoy my friends to rewrite it from the picture. Also some Japanese text and Chinese. Horrible. | Была у Google Переводчик очень полезная функция: перевод текста с изображения. Как она работала. Загружаешь в переводчик файл, выделяешь нужный фрагмент и, или смотришь перевод тут же в строке, или загружаешь в переводчик. 
Теперь это «работает» совсем по-другому, через заднее место. Загружаешь файл в переводчик и он сразу начинает переводить полностью всю страницу. Попытка выделить фрагмент работает криво и со сбоями. При попытке загрузить текст в переводчик получаешь результат после двойного перевода, т.е. переведённый текст переводится обратно на первоначальный язык и результат снова переводится. 

Вывод.

Chtěl bych vidět toho kdo ten překlad psal😂 | Čau | I’m translating something from English to German then I’m using some other translator and sometimes words or pronunciation is accurate but almost always the pronunciation is so inaccurate. | اوقفوا دعم للصهيونيه وجرائم اسرائيل | It gives you just one word unlike the web version where it gives you all the possible translations, and on top of that, the word it chooses to show is the least applicable most of the time.

It limits a lot, especially, if you are reading in foreign languages and time to time translation of a single word is needed 😞 | Why does the screen dim during photo translation??

title: DoKapsy od ČSOB
description:
The DoKapsy od ČSOB app is free for everyone, regardless of where you bank.

Take advantage of convenient payment using your mobile phone for parking, public transport tickets and refuelling. The app also gives you free access to paid media, and you can even upload your loyalty cards. With an ČSOB or ČSOB Poštovní spořitelna account in the app, you also have an overview of payment cards and the ČSOB Na cesty service for more convenient shopping abroad.

Public transport tickets
You can conveniently pay for public transport tickets in Prague, Liberec, Olomouc and other cities directly from your mobile phone using a payment card or Apple Pay. Simply show the driver or inspector your electronic ticket on your smartphone’s screen.

Parking 
Forget about having to look for a parking machine ever again – with the app you can simply pay for parking in all zones, at selected shopping centres or at private car parks in Prague, Brno and many other cities across the Czech Republic. And you can even extend your parking time right on your mobile phone using your payment card or Apple Pay.

Trips 
Discover many beautiful and unusual places with us. You can select tips for trips directly from the map or sort by the level of difficulty and time requirements.

Foodies

Maybe there is an interesting foodie event nearby. Or perhaps you have a just a short walk from your workplace to a wonderful cake shop. All you need to do is to look into DoKapsy and reach out for some interesting foodie ideas. 

Chargers
Find your nearest charging point, get a ride to it and pay with a QR code from the stand. You can search with your finger on the map, by name, or filter by parameters. You can easily save frequently used chargers to your favorites. 

Tankuj
At Globus filling stations, you can pay for fuel directly at the pump. Simply scan the QR code to pay and you're on your way.

Loyalty cards
Upload the loyalty cards from your favourite supermarkets, chemists, fashion boutiques, cafes and bookshops to your mobile phone. At the checkout, simply select the right card in the app and scan the barcode on the display.

Discounts 
Choose from promotional offers from our partners – with the DoKapsy app, you can take advantage of our Svět odměn loyalty programme, even if you are not a ČSOB client.

Other services
And that's not all! Try out other new functions: buy highway stamps, enjoy free access to paid news and articles, donate to charity or get an energy assessment for your home.

Extra benefits for ČSOB clients

Overview 
The app shows you all your payment cards, providing you an immediate overview of balances and payment history. 

ČSOB Na cesty 
With your year-long travel insurance, you get free ATM withdrawals abroad. And we'll refund you 1.5% on every card payment you make abroad.

DoKapsy od ČSOB offers extreme security.
Sign in to your app using Touch ID, Face ID or PIN. The app provides you only passive access to the funds on your account – you can view the balance and history, but you can’t send money.
releaseNotes: This version allows you to view digital receipts for selected merchants in the client version of the app. It also bring other minor improvements.

Nejde mi to ani po smazání aplikace a novém nainstalovaní, při kterém je třeba znova potvrdit bankovní identitu (ani to nebylo moc intuitivní).Restartovala jsem telefon. Píše mi to hlášku: “Při generování kódu došlo k chybě. Zkuste prosím vygenerovat kód znovu.” To jsem udělala už asi 20x a nic. Není uvedena žádná podpora - na koho se obrátit? E-mail či telefon. Píší už podruhé právě proto, že není kam se obrátit. | Praktická a bezproblémová apka . | Když v obchodě, kde potřebujete svoji věrnostní kartičku, zjistíte, že se k ni nedostane protože je celodenní odstávka (Komunikace mezi DoKapsy od ČSOB a smart klíčem nám trochu zaskřípala )… Proboha proč nejsou základní věci dostupné v “offline” režimu? Whitelabel Error Page

null

Kdyžtak rád pošlu screenshot erroru. | Přes Smart klíč se nejde, už nejméně dva měsíce, přihlásit. Přes otisk prstu také ne 😡. | Nejhorší aplikace na světě! Nelze se přihlásit přes KB klíč! Jste normální? | Nejlepší apka👍 | I přes zapnutou biometriku se aplikace dnes rozhodla požadovat přihlášení smart klíčem. Po přihlášení smart klíčem probíhá ověřování. Jenže stále a stále a stále. To je moc fajn, když jste v Praze našli se štěstím místo na parkovišti a teď nemůžete zaplatit! | Aplikace se sekla, už týden mám mrtvou obrazovku, nedostanu se na ani jednu kartu. | Bezva. Uvítal bych widget pro slevové karty jako má Stocard. title: Merge Mansion
description:
Welcome to Hopewell Bay! A crumbling old mansion needs some serious TLC… and there’s also a mystery to solve. Can you get to the bottom of what Grandma is hiding?

Unlock spaces and rooms in the garden and mansion, and uncover clues about the Boulton family’s many secrets. Meet fascinating characters, find new clues and complete tasks to unlock more of the story.

Relax into this cozy merge game and story packed with more twists and turns than Grandma’s knitting.

MATCH & MERGE
Merge matching items to create new ones and complete the tasks. Enjoy the satisfaction of restoring the mansion and let the story unfold.


RESTORE & DESIGN
Restore the mansion and grounds to their former glory, collect themed decorations and customize your cottage and garden.


INVESTIGATE & SOLVE
Uncover secret areas and collect clues to find out what Grandma is hiding. , and how far the roots of these secrets really reach…

EXCITING EVENTS
Play events to score points, claim gorgeous decorations, and win awesome prizes.

Hopewell Bay is the number one destination for a cozy getaway - and it never gets boring! Download Merge Mansion now and start your journey.

——————————

Did you get stuck or run into a problem? Visit our support page in the Merge Mansion app or send us a message at mergemansionsupport@metacoregames.com.
releaseNotes:
Time flies and it's April already! Here's what's coming in this update:

-A new area: The Lounge!
-An Inventory sort button!
-All Lamps from levels 6 to 10 now produce Moths.
-New levels for Gloves, Detergent, and Cleaning items.
-More special Events running during April!
-Bug fixes and improvements.
reviews:
Hraju uz delsi dobu, a opravdu zabavi i na delsi dobu | Clean up event was supposed to last a few days but ended up without any notice. So why I wasted so much energy on it? If I knew you would kill it down so quick I would never even start it. Also a note about other events - you finish them at time that’s not suitable for all players and they can’t claim all rewards afterwards. | Hours of calm and interesting play. Without adds and super free to play!!! Love you devs and creators of this game. Additionally in nowadays almost all games with excellent graphics are with adds and short gameplay. THANKS! | After the last update it’s impossible to play because the game falls out each 1-2 minutes. Any solutions? | Zdravím , musím si trochu postěžovat . Nevím kdo tohle vymyslel ale zahrát si dvě vteřiny a pak čekat hodinu na další možnost mě teda docela štve . Jestli je to proto aby si lidi něco koupili tak u spousty lidí máte smůlu . Asi hru odinstaluji. 🥴 | … gameplay: impossible to get to some results without paying … everything is extremely long (like waiting 3 hours for charging broom without paying to merge some high level item last a week !!!!!). Extremely imbalanced.
… story: We cannot talk about story here? Those few useless dialogs in game does not create story. To see part of story means to play it 2-4 weeks just to see few sentences which, who doesn’t awaited, move story nowhere.

Who is this game for? Millionaires… or playing on toilet when you have nothing better to do. | I cannot express how much I love this game. I’ve been playing it for quite some time and it seems that you guys are really putting into it a lot of great work. Updating regularly and the updates and new features are wonderful. I never miss buying mystery pass so I can at least support you this way. And they are so worth it. 
Keep up the good work. Thank you. | Jak získám plavidlo, kdo mi pořadí prosím ??? | After the newest update I lost half of the items on the board and I can’t restore them. I am pretty annoyed because I lost a lot of high leveled stuff and it took a lot of time. If there is any way of help I would be glad because I really enjoy this game.:( | COMPLAINT! Why can't the game be logged in via Game Center (iphone) I lost my account..😡😡😭😭 | Nice job changing the buttons for “trow to the bin” or “buy for diamonds”.

Now I accidentally spent almost all of my diamonds.. | I like this game, but 1 star done, because rewards for completing a task are minimal, mostly still the same. And that is approximately 10xp, box of energy, or box of coins. No brown boxes and no blue ones at all. | Za mne dobra hra 👍🏼 | Fun game not much adds which is rare to see now. | Hi I’ve been trying to update but it’s not at all downloading nothing happens. | The last update quite destroy the gameplay. Bubles dont give money, level 3 pig gives almost none of the coins and gems (before update i got maybe 2-4k coins and 20-40 gems - and now 500 hundred coins and 8 gems) makes the game slow and unjoyable | I like the game very much. 
But since the recent update the Metacore logo appears before the loading screen.
It is like 5 seconds of staring at nothing. 
It actually made me consider uninstalling.

Remove it. It ruins the game. I don’t care about the company logo/name. I am already playing and enjoying your game. | After last update, I have number 1 (finished task) in tasks, but I haven't no more tasks. And another I don’t see. Thank you for fixing. | The worst game ever, if you don’t pay for the pink stones, you will spend weeks with achieving one thing, that you need to get (small) reward. It’s totally unbalanced! | Po aktualizaci nejde hra načíst! | Almost every day.. 3-4 hours maintenance services?? Really?? | “Sorry, the servers are under mainetance.” Again and again and again, all the time! Hate it. | Every Day is problem with your server for few hours. | I like this game but what i absolutely hate about in that its under maintenance All the FRICKING time when i want to play. Bro like let me play. | After the update few days ago, he “daily tasks” are going to refresh in 22 days. Recall them, please, or change it back to daily as used to be before the huge update. 

Also, I am now needing 3 cans of paint and for a day or so I have not got a single paint level 1 from two tool boxes. Do I need another month to do this task? I find this ridiculous. Either open more than one tasks or make the only task doable and not in a month. 

Thank you! | After the last  update I miss daily tasks in app. | The newest update is a pleasure for my heart, I love like everything became easier and more available! | are you really going to make me wait four levels before you open up the next garden modification? | Hra o ničem. Něco vyrobit trvá věčnost, žádný děj, samé bedny a spojováni věci, na které si musíte sakra dlouho počkat. Mažu 🤷🏻‍♀️ | Hello, can anyone tell me how do I get the seeds for the planted flowers please? Thanks a lot | Mám stejny problem jako ostatni - level 40 a konec. Pockejte na novy update. Jak dlouho? Hra je pekna ale cekani na update je nekonecne. | So many mistakes in the game after the last update 😕 Is there a plan to fix them soon? | Hru mám moc ráda, odreaguji se u ní, ale jsem v level 40 a finish?! I kdyz to ukazuje, ze v levelu 41 se otevře nová oblast, tak nic, dál to píše: dosáhli jste maximalního levelu, počkejte na další update.. a nehnu se prostě.. nebavěj mě ty “sezonní” jahodový a další akce, chápu, že je potřeba to nějak zpestřit, ale k čemu to je, když se už pak stejně nejde dostat dál.. škoda.. | I cannot download the newest upgrade | How can I download something when there is no download available? | Hra mě baví jenže nemůžu hrát když už nemám ty blesky nebo co to je a je hrozný čekat dlouho než jich zase budu par mít | Guys, it keeps falling out back on the home screen and everything takes so much time | I love this game and i spent tens of hours there. But - in The morning (8 hours until my event should end) i started Time booster (not The instant one but The tower). I went to school knowing my items dropping xps are high level so i need to go to The game often. I forgot about it, but i went there like an hour after. And guess what? They were maintaining The servers. Like what The hell Dude? You didnt say anything before? And because i went from school to work I couldnt update (i dont have so much data to download updates our of Wi-Fi) The game. And guess what. Not only The booster was wasted, but i coudnt even get hands on The 16 xp things because my event ended. I am never playing this game where people maintaining it are of this kind. | Hello, we are playing this game with my friends, and it will be so cool if we can send thing to each other. But this game is super good :) | Po stáhnutí update se hra nechce rozjet. It always stops on 56% | Po stáhnutí update hra nelze načíst (spustit)
Pouze načte 56% a dál nic . Čekala jsem půl hodiny a stále nic . 
Prosim opravte chybu , nechci začínat od začátku to už by bylo po 3. 
Děkuji | The game is stuck at 50% of loading. | After the last update the application cannot be opened… will it be repaired someday? | Po poslední aktualizace, se mi hra nenačítá a tak nemohu hrát. | After the last update game wont load. Its stuck on 55% | Je to úžasná aplikace jen si nesmíte omylem něco důležitého vymazat.😃 | It's this type of game which you hate but still play... | The game says it needs an update but theres no update available. | Málo místa.

title: Alice's Dream ： Merge Games
description:
Summary:

Alice, as a child, heard stories about adventures in Wonderland. However, she journeyed through time to a Fairyland she had dreamed of. As Alice navigated Wonderland, she encountered residents and resolved their issues. Over time, Alice has come to know the truth about Wonderland's destruction.

What will she do when she encounters bizarre situations and new challenges?

Features:

A vast worldview
Delicate scenes
Merge and scene repair
Order System and Magic Cuisine
Download and explore the world of Merging and Fairy Tales now! This is the best merge game! Let's play with your friends. Friends are waiting for you to match, morph, and merge!

By downloading and using this app, you agree to the Terms of Use at:
https://sites.google.com/view/pipepuzzletermsofservice/home
https://sites.google.com/view/pipepuzzlesprivacypolicy
releaseNotes:
Welcome to "Alice's Dream: Merge Games", the new version has been released, come and experience it now!
·Fixed some bugs
·New activity updates
reviews: Downloaded this game based on an ad, but deleted after one minute of playing. The ad with the rings portraits just a minor mini game which may occur once in a while. But otherwise it is a painful merge game as many others planted in a boring story which should keep you interested for a longer time. | After update is imposibile to buy (for real money) life in event :-( | I paid 149 CZK for a pig with 800 energy and I got nothing!!!! | Played couple of merge type games and this is probably the cutest and most creative one.

title: Sunshine Island Adventure Farm
description:
Sunshine Island is an island-building tycoon game where you can turn your new home into a paradise. Harvest crops, craft products, play with your friends, team up with other islanders worldwide, and trade with the inhabitants! 

BUILD the island of your dreams
Start from scratch, expand and upgrade your tropical village. Plant, grow, and harvest your favorite exotic fruits and vegetables. Send your workers around the island to explore and gather resources to craft goods!

EXPLORE magnificent archipelago
Start expeditions and locate new areas around your home paradise. Discover different islands and learn more about their secret treasures and rare resources. 

Go on an Adventure with FRIENDS
Join a guild and grow together! Team up and compete against other players and guilds.

MEET the Islanders
Be a beloved member of the tropical island community. Meet all unforgettable characters, become close friends with the islanders, discover their stories, and enjoy the vacation feeling!

Have fun with CUTE ANIMALS
Take care of your village by raising lovely farm animals like chickens, cows, goats, horses, pigs, and many other cuddly companions. 

Sunshine Island is completely free to play with optional in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings. This game requires an internet connection. Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, Imprint: https://policies.altigi.de/en/terms/
releaseNotes:
Aloha, Islanders,

With this update, we make your island life a bit better!

FEATURES:
* Season Festival - Upon reaching the final milestone, no further tasks will be available
* Festival Pass - Unlock a Grand Reward upon reaching the final milestone with your Festival Pass purchase
* Bug Fixes and improvements


Follow us:
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Sunshine-Island-100984132678848 
Discord https://discord.gg/bGf7tq3Hnr

Je potřeba zavřít a znova spustit jinak dobré na nudu a pořád je co dělat... | Nejlepší hra za poslední dobu, furt je co dělat. Nechápu některé recenze, že reklamy jsou dlouhé. Nikdo vás na reklamy nenutí koukat, vždy za ně něco dostanete.

Takže všem doporučuju, určitě nebudete litovat👍 | Nechutně dlouhé reklamy. Hra krásná, ale reklamy to opravdu kazí 😡 | Hra chce pekárnu ale hra zamrzne a nereaguje | Hra je parádní, v případě zájmu o cech: České Společenstvo Ostrovů | Après de multiples recherches dans le store, j’ai enfin trouvé un jeu qui ne te force pas à faire des achats.
