title: Sygic GPS Navigation & Maps
description:
Sygic GPS Navigation & Maps is innovative  GPS navigation app with monthly-updated offline maps and with precise live traffic & speed camera alerts, both updated in real-time. It‘s trusted by more than 200 million drivers worldwide. Offline 3D maps are stored on your phone for GPS navigation without an internet connection. We update the maps multiple times per year for free, so that you can always rely on Sygic GPS Navigation.

NAVIGATE ANYWHERE, EVEN WITHOUT AN INTERNET CONNECTION
• 3D Offline maps of all countries in the world, from TomTom and other providers
• Free map updates multiple times per year
• Voice-guided GPS navigation with precise directions and spoken street names
• Millions of interesting Places (POI)
• Pedestrian GPS navigation with walking directions and tourist attractions (POI)
• Customize your navigation arrow. Try everyday car, van or even formula.

ESCAPE THE TRAFFIC
• Avoid traffic jams with the most accurate real-time traffic information with data collected from more than 200 million users worldwide*

STAY SAFE
• Advanced safety features make driving in unfamiliar territories easier
• Speed limit warnings show you the current speed limit and the upcoming speed limit changes
• Dynamic Lane Assistant guides you into the correct lane
• Head-up Display (HUD) projects navigation onto the windshield of your car, making driving at night safer
• Dashcam records the road ahead and automatically saves a video in case of an accident
• Real View Navigation is an augmented reality feature for even better and safer driving experience
• Real-time route sharing lets you share your estimated time of arrival & current position on a map*
• Apple CarPlay Connectivity - all navigation features on your car’s built-in display.
• Cockpit shows you the real-time performance of your car. 
• Wrong-way warning (in partnership with Bosch)**. If you are driving in the wrong way or someone is driving in the opposite direction, we will warn you.*

SAVE MONEY ALONG YOUR ROUTE
• Park easily with parking place suggestions and live info about prices and availability*
• Set your fuel type and fill up for the best price with live information about fuel prices*
• Avoid speeding tickets with Speed camera warnings*
• Save money on roaming charges with offline maps

Do you want to find out how it feels to have Premium+? Try our 7-day trial for free and discover all Premium+ features. After that, you can decide if you want to prolong your subscription or use basic features only.

Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will not be able to cancel the subscription once activated. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase.

Should you have any questions, please visit sygic.com/support. We are here for you 7 days a week. 
If you like our app, please leave a review or spread the word at sygic.com/love. Thank you for your support.

*Please note that this feature requires the internet connection.

Privacy Policy: www.sygic.com/company/privacy-policy
Terms of Use:  www.sygic.com/company/terms-of-use

Note: Sharing videos from Dashcam is forbidden by law in these countries: Austria, Belgium, Luxembourg, Switzerland, Slovakia, Spain.

Note 2: Dashcam, Traffic Sign Recognition, and Real View are part of the new feature SmartCam. SmartCam merge all camera features into one. The SmartCam is a part of our Premium+ subscription.

**Wrong-way driver feature is available in Sygic GPS Navigation for iOS, version 22.2. or higher.

More information about features can be find in glossary: https://www.sygic.com/what-is

By installing, copying or using all or any portion of this software you accept all the terms and conditions of this agreement: https://www.sygic.com/company/eula
releaseNotes: Lots of improvements and bug fixes based on your feedback.
reviews:
1) navigace mě 31.3.2024 nevedla do zákazu motorových vozidel. Když sem se na ni vykašlal a jel jinudy, stále přepočítávala trasu do toho zákazu. Stará Boleslav - Hradec Králové.
2) mám zaplacené Premium a při každém spuštění navigace mě otravuje hláška s Premium Plus. Kolik těch Premium si člověk musí koupit, aby ho to přestalo otravovat. Nechci žádné Premium Plus, nechci!!! Premium sem zaplatil, aby to bylo bez reklam a teď tohle. A ještě mě bude navádět do protisměru? Cože? Měl sem tuhle navigaci rád. MĚL… | Chci vrátit své peníze!!! Proč si mám kupovat něco, co mi pak nabízí si koupit zase něco dalšího???!!! S tím jděte... Vraťte mi peníze za něco, co jsem nechtěl a dám vám klidně kladnou recenzi. Doporučení potenciálním kupujícím - nekupujte to. | Po aktualizaci jsem asi měsíc řešil, že mám zakoupenou lifetime licenci a stejně po mě pořád chtěli, abych přešel na premium+ a platil to znovu a znovu. Aplikace neustále padá a vede mě na nesmyslné odbočky. Někdy je to opravdu nepříjemné, když jedete v plném provozu městem a zrovna se to vypne... Kontaktoval jsem vývojáře a nikdo neodpověděl... | Po deseti letech používání se Sygicem končím. Přešel jsem na nový telefon a při snaze obnovit zakoupenou licenci se mi opakovaně objevuje hláška, že žádné licence zakoupené nemám. Znova za licenci platit nechci.

A když jsem před dvěma týdny psal na podporu, žádné reakce jsem se taky nedočkal.

Celkově tedy zklamání a přecházím na navigaci Waze. | Od jistého update komplikované přehrávání hudby na pozadí navigace. Sygic stále přepíná hudbu do reproduktoru telefonu, namísto audio systému vozidla. Když Sygic vypnu, hudba zase hraje přes autorádio. Aktuálně používám konkurenci, protože ta funguje bez problému. | Rất tốt | Please remove “sweet deal” splash screen! How many times do i have say no to your promotion offer? It keeps showing even when driving! I paid for the app, I did not pay to watch your promotion. I will not spend a cent on your app anymore because there are better navigations, offline maps as well, no agresive sales and no stupid splash screens. | Navigace neprepocitava  náhradní trasu!!!! | Nechápu jedno, mám licenci koupeno už asi 6 let kde je aktualizace doživotní Basic.
Přešel jsem z Androidu na IOS. S problém. Aplikace chcete po mě další 499 KČ Proč? Mám licenční číslo sále nemohu ho nikdy zadat Proč. Celou dobu vše fungovalo. A na jedno už ses někdy probudil že bychom chtěl nějakého penze? Čekáme na odpověď. | On my 12 pro Max and also now 15 pro Max this navigation resets often, gives wrong directions, can't find shorties way, navigates through fields, etc... Uninstalled. This app was perfect 5 years ago. | UI je skvělý, ale špatně naviguje. Naviguje mne přes vesnice i když mám vedle dálnici anebo hlavní tah. Díky tomu si rozbíjím auto po nezpevněných cestách. V Itálii se mi stalo, že mne navigovala i do uzkých uliček kde se z autem ani nevejdu a přitom vedle je hned hlavní cesta. | Cập nhật bản mới tệ hơn bản cũ, Icon nằm chính giữa màn hình rất khó nhìn, la bàn lúc chạy lúc không. Nên cân nhắc khi cập nhật. | V současnosti je to pro mě nejlepší navigace, 3 D objekty v pojetí Sygicu je moc fajn. Jen tak dál, nezaspěte na vavřínech:) | Koupil jsem plnou verzi. Teď jsem chtěl zkusit zase používat. Nějaké další premium+...Zlá doba subscriptionská, kdy i vývojáři se snaží zpoplatnit i obyčejnou kalkulačku. Chtít extra prachy za CarPlay, když konkurence to má zcela zdarma? Nevím no… Zaplatil jsem jednou a teď znova každý rok? | To pay quarterly or yearly is not what I want. Once and get the app fine but once a year 20usd does not make any sense to me and I’m curious who would pay for it. | Now they have new versiom and they want money again! It is a scam!!!!!
I do not like this app more and more. Why? Well, first of all they want you to subscribe for monthly payments - NO WAY! I already paid for it. Then they try to force you into subscription by limiting the use in carplay. How? No 3D maps, no speed limit on the screen. No lane following. Try anything else. Try Mapy.cz. It is free, you can download maps, you can choose amongst traffic, aerial, tourist, winter and basic map. No way Sygic. U no good!!! | Muze mi po X letech placeni Premuim prestat vyskakovat reklama na Premium pri kazdem spusteni aplikace, prosim? 🙏🏻 | I got premium and yet the app is neverending sales push spam to premium plus which is the stuff I pretty much already have, just without annoying subscription. I absolutely hate this customer milking attitude. Without the sales pitch, the navigation itself is not bad, but Apple free navigation is almost same and Waze is better and also free. | It suggest which lane lines to use, shows my current speed and speed limits and in iPhone Pro i shows directions even on lock screen. No other app that I tried provides all these combined. | Aktualizace 14.9.2023: po poslední aktualizaci neustále hledá pozici na silnici, skáče dopředu a dozadu a při dojíždění do cile je to díky tomu nepoužitelné v AppleCar. Čekám na opravu, jinak maźu a jdu na Waze. Po posledních dvou aktualizacích velice často bezdůvodně spadne. A skvělá nová funkce - spadne když se blížíte k cíli. Takže začnu hledat asi jinou navigaci :( | Psal jsem na zákaznickou podporu, ale nereagovali. | Při zadání konečné destinace nenabídne jaké mapy se mají stáhnout. Trasa přes několik velkých evropských státu, rozdělené na regiony nevím jaké stáhnout a složitě se mi to nechce hledat, takže jsem aplikaci zase ihned odinstaloval. | Sygic začíná být absolutně nepoužitelný, po každém spuštění chce znovu a znovu stahovat mapy i když jsou stažené. Smazal jsem ji a i když mám koupenou prémiovou verzi, tak ji nepoužívám. Vyhozené peníze. | There is a huge problem with the list of favorite places and the company is just stupid enough not to listen to feedback a user is giving them. 
A month ago I described the issue and asked to fix the bug. Yesterday I changed the Work address to a new one and today the app switched the address back to the old one. 
If not fixed asap, I will just unsubscribe and find a better solution. 
Even the navigation is buggy lately, while driving, it starts jumping to different places on the map and all of a sudden it tells you that you arrived to the destination but more than a half of driving is still in front of you. 
As I said, very buggy lately… | Po výměně telefonu nelze použit již před lety zakoupené heslo.Bohužel se musím po letech kouknout po jiné navigaci. | Eveme i open this app advertisment is showed to me! I did pay for the app!! | 👍👍 | Chỉ không chính xác. | Hodně zájmových bodů, informacemi nabité rozhraní a spousta zajímavých funkcí. Škoda, že nelze trasy snadno naplánovat na poditaciz a kompletně přenést do telefonu včetně všech průjezdních bodů, jako to umějí mapy.cz. A výpočet trasy občas dělá zvláštní věci. V Bavorsku po mě opakovaně chtěl sjet z (liduprázdné) hlavní cesty a prokličkovat vesničkou, přestože i na displeji bylo vidět, že za vesničkou se na hlavní silnici chce zase vrátit. | Navigace je super jsem moc spokojena | Přešel jsem z androidu na iOS a nemohu se přihlásit na premium účet i když se přihlašuji správnými údaji . | Dobry den nemohu tu nikde najít stahnout sygic voucher mám zaplaceno ale aplilce nikde | They tirelessly want to sell you something you don't want. You can't get rid of it. I bought the full version but now they keep asking me to pay for the monthly update. It can't be turned off. Lifetime 1/4 years of updates are artificially stuck so that they cannot be used slowly! Disgust. I do not recommend!!!!!!!!!!!!! It's a waste of money!

Neúnavně Vám chtějí něco prodat co nechcete. Nejde se toho zbavit. Koupil jsem plní verzi ale teď po mne furt chtějí abych platil za měsíční aktualizaci. Nejde to vypnout. Doživotní 1/4 lety aktualizace uměle zasekaly tak že nejdou pomalu použit! Hnus. Ne doporučuji!!!!!!!!!!!!! Jsou to vyhozené peníze!

Они неустанно хотят продать вам то, что вам не нужно. Вы не можете избавиться от этого. Я купил полную версию, но теперь они продолжают просить меня платить за ежемесячное обновление. Его нельзя отключить. Срок службы 1/4 года обновлений искусственно застревают, чтобы их нельзя было использовать медленно! Отвращение. не рекомендую!!!!!!!!!!!! Это пустая трата денег! | Zloději | Před lety jsem koupil doživotní premium  verzi na tři zařízení a když jsem týden nazpět přeinstaloval aplikaci na nové zařízení, přihlásil se, tak mám najednou základní verzi bez hlasového navádění a pod. Nikdo nekomunikuje, vyřešit to nejde. To mne vede k názoru že někdo je zloděj. | I purchased this navigation for our Dubai vacation and possibility of having offline navigation app. My first drive was to the gas station, navigation was horrible, many mistakes and first 2 gas stations were not exist ingredients in reality. After this experience I decided to download offline map from mapy.cz and my experience was much better. | Pokud mate aktivni predplatne a nechate se nachytat na aktualne levnejsi licenci Premium+, nezapomente zrusit puvodni predplatne. Na jednom uctu muzete mit nekolik predplatnych, tedy ackoliv jsem myslel ze novou rucni koupi licence budu mit poreseno, byla mi strzena platba i za obnoveni puvodni licence. Nyni mam zedy dve licence na jeden ucet 😒. | Určitě není žádané při každém spuštění aplikace aby na me vyskakovala “reklama” při zakoupené premium verze o rozšíření na premium +, hrozně otravný | Jste SUPER👍 | Zkusil jsem po dlouhé době dát opět Sygic šanci. Měl jsem koupenou lifetime licenci pro celý svět, ale lifetime evidentně není zase až tak moc lifetime v podání Sygic a v dnešní době je ta licence již k ničemu a bezcenná. Už to samo o sobě je podpásovka. Dal jsem ale Sygic druhou šanci a za 500 Kč si koupil roční licenci premium+. Teď už vím, že to byly vyhozené peníze. První věc je, že doba dojezdu se na trase dlouhé 40 minut několikrát změnila o řádově desítky minut nahoru nebo dolů, aniž by se měnila samotná trasa. Měřené úseky nejsou v mapě hlášeny jako měřené úseky, nýbrž jako dva radary, což je hloupost. Navíc data radarů jsou dost neaktuální a i Seznam mapy mají přesnější informace o radarech. V zatáčkách se obrazovka navigace různě podivně přetáčí tam a zpět, jako by aplikace nevěděla, kterým směrem ve skutečnosti jedu. Po chvíli navigování se navíc ztratilo barevné vyznačení trasy, takže jsem jel v podstatě po slepu. V průběhu cesty se mi navíc stalo, že z ničeho nic na dálnici mi navigace zahlásila, že jsem dojel do cíle, chvíli na to se vzpamatovala a pokračovala v navigaci. No a v neposlední řadě navigace ráda padá. Suma sumárum - škoda času a vyhozené peníze. | Mnohokrát jsem tomu dal šanci, ale naviguje opravdu špatně. Má hezké prostředí, ale to bohužel nestačí…. | Po dlouhé době jsem zkusil oprášit Sygic. Při výjezdu z Plzně mě to nutilo sjet na Rozvadov, otočit se pod mostem a najet zpět na dálnici tím samým nájezdem. Exit Rokycany - jeďte rovně. Až do Prahy otravné přeblikávání modré cedule na zelenou a naopak, na každém sjezdu asistent pro jízdu v pruzích. A v Praze rovnou šup do zácpy, dál už jsem na to neměl nervy. Představa, že mě to takhle naviguje tam, “kde jsou lvi”, je upřímně nic moc. | V poslední verzi aplikace 23.0.1 nefunguje navigace přes CarPlay. Okamžitě zamrzne, nefunguje ani jedno z dotykových tlačítek. Při průjezdu tunelem spadne totálně. Podpora klasicky hledá problém na straně uživatele (značka a model vozu, verze CarPlay). Vzhledem k tomu, že předchozí verze fungovala bezchybně, tento jejich alibismus nechápu. | Nejdřív Premium pak Premium + co bude dál Premium + + jenom aby vydělali víc ? | Drive jsmem měl neomezenou licenci ze Shell. Nyní nepoužitelné..Sygic jde cestou platby za vše. A přitom jsou mapy neaktuální..třeba nové Tesco v Kutné Hoře ani nenajde. 
Waze je zdarma a lepší aplikace 😉😅 | Ta aplikace byla dřív fakt skvělá. Ale dneska už je bohužel spíše podprůměrná. Největším problémem je, že není spoleh na základní věci jako je stabilita aplikace a samotná navigace, která poslední dobou často prostě naviguje špatně. Což jsou u navigace dost podstatné závady, řekl bych. | Aplikace pravidelne pri pozivani padá a pokud se to stane v tunelu,navigace se stane nepoužitelnou.  Pády aplikace přechází z verze do verze. Nepomohla aktualizace iOS ani výměna přístroje. iPhone 13, iOS 16.2 | po zaplacení doživotní licence vypnout hlasové navádění? krádež! | Podle názvu firmy to nenajde nic, dokonce ani na Slovensku. A pokud to přece jen nějakou adresu vyhledá, tak ta firma tam již deset let nesídlí. Jakákoli navigace zdarma je lepší, než tenhle trapný drahý paskvil. | Koupil jsem premium verzi a ani ta neumi CarPlay! Jsou lepsi aplikace zdarma, ktere funguji daleko lepe nez tahle placena slatanina ☹️

title: My BMW
description:
With a modern design and intuitive user guidance features, the My BMW App is made to help you navigate a completely new mobility experience. Check the status of your BMW, use one of the many remote control features, plan trips in advance, book your next service appointment, or discover the world of BMW – all from the convenience of your smartphone.

The My BMW App at a glance:
•Immediate access to vehicle status and functions
•Smart e-mobility services
•Extensive navigation and map features for planning trips 
•Stories and news from the world of BMW
•Direct access to your BMW Service
•Use app in demo mode even without owning vehicle
•Regular updates and upgrades for all features

Discover the highlights of the My BMW App:

CHECK YOUR VEHICLE STATUS 
“All Good” – The My BMW App provides you with an overview of crucial status information like your BMW’s drive-ready state, enabling you to:
•View your vehicle's location
•Check your current fuel level and range
•Check that doors and windows are locked
•Keep vehicle software up to date

OPERATE YOUR VEHICLE REMOTELY 
Control the functions of your BMW directly from your smartphone: 
•Schedule and activate air conditioning
•Lock and unlock the doors, operate the horn and flashers
•Record images from the vehicle environment
•Set up your BMW Digital Key

PLAN TRIPS 
Search for and send locations directly to the navigation system, including destinations, filling and charging stations, and car parks:
•Plan trips and keep an eye on the traffic situation
•Detailed information on filling stations and charging stations
•Find parking at your destination
•Consider charging stop and times in load-optimized route planning

ENHANCED ELECTROMOBILITY 
Smart support of your electromobility for range planning and charging management:
•Plan electric range and charging
•Find charging stations nearby
•View your charging history at any time
•Manage and redeem BMW Points

EXPLORE THE WORLD OF BMW
Stay up to date and find the right products for your BMW:
•Discover exclusive stories and news from BMW
•Receive messages in the Message Center
•Link directly to the BMW Shop and BMW Financial Services

MANAGE REQUIRED SERVICES
The My BMW App is your direct line to your retailer if service is needed:
•Keep an eye on required services
•Book service appointments via the app
•View maintenance and repair requirements by video

EXPERIENCE THE My BMW APP WITH DEMO MODE
Explore the benefits of the My BMW app even without owning a vehicle:
• Select an attractive BMW demo vehicle in the app garage
• Get to know the variety of app functions, e.g. for electric mobility
• Use of My BMW app to get you into the world of BMW

Download the My BMW App now and  try out its many features.

The My BMW App is optimised for vehicles built from 2014 onwards. The availability of individual app functions depends on your vehicle equipment and your BMW ConnectedDrive contract. The availability of app functions may vary between countries.
releaseNotes: We are continuously improving the user experience. This app-update includes bugfixes.
reviews:
Thank you very much for such intuitive and powerful app. I have two tips for improvement - things that I miss.
One is possibility to add more than one address for home or work. This is crucial for the statistics of charging locations. I have company car and we have more locations where I charge at company chargers. But in statistics I see only one location for work charging. The same is valid for home. You can have house, second flat, cottage...
Second thing is if there is a chance to view current charging speed. I just charge until I see 100kw and then I want to end it and go. But I do not see it in the app. I know there is statistics - but that is only history... Maybe just to see it upon request from the app if it is difficult to handle by servers?
Thank you for considering.
Peter | Aplikace je celkem dobrá ale nejde nastavit procenta na kolik chci nabít baterii. Vždy se nabijí na 100%. | Funguje jak má, možná udělat zkratku pro akční tlačítko na iP 15 ? | Опять не работает. | 👍, do města nejlepší volba vozu BMW i3 👌 aplikace také naprosto super 👌 | - please add the possibility to set up charge level (there was a workaround in bmw connected but not possible to stop charging remotely now in my bmw)
- please add notification for low battery level (mostly usefull for plugin hybrids)
- please add the statistics for range based on distance driven between chargings (probably weather based and gaussian because of different pace, but I would know how far can I go when I really try in similar weather)
- consumption based on mean from these stats can compete with others to see how eco you usually drive (at least same models) | Skvělá aplikace, využívám ji pro přehled spotřeby a plánování jízd. | Incorrect location on map, not showimg fuel, opening/closing csr, ventilation and horn last forever. | Moc dobře nefunguje | - features basically none unless you pay a regular fee
- very annoying updates requiring logging in to the app, several popups in phone after starting car after such update | There used to be the mileage of the car available to see for every entry of the charging history, is it gone with the latest update?! | Some features are now gone with the last update, such as mileage in charging history… I found it useful to keep track of the distance covered between charges, but oh well… A lot of (more or less) useful features otherwise… 👍 | I am getting error message - “an error occurred while assigning your BMW”… | Bit chaotic design, I can activate horn (very useful) but cannot close the windows, surround view doesn't work, repeatedly have to sign again and again. | Top  služba   Nemá konkureci | Po aktualizaci se pořad odhlašuje | Nefunkční | Dobrý pomocník člověk je vždy informuje vám nastavil svého vozu | Aplikace je fajn ale store na ktery odkazuje je eshop jak pred dvaceti lety vse se neustale seka, je nutne opakovane zadani. Jestli tohle reprezentuje BMW jsem zklamany. | Auto se aktualizuje a pořád něco nefunguje, aplikace se aktualizuje a …….
Nechci počítač s modrou obrazovkou, ale auto. | Phần mềm rất hữu ích , chỉ cần cải thiện thêm tốc độ sử lý nhanh hơn nữa thì hoàn hảo. 👍👍👍 | Super | V aplikaci nelze nastavit do kolika procent se má baterie vozidla nabít. Aktualizace stavu vozidla se načítá strašně dlouho. Odesíláni příkazů do vozidla trvá dlouhou dobu. Nelze pomoci příkazů zavřít okna. Někdy aplikace hlásí, že je vozidlo v úplně jiné lokalitě než se ve skutečnosti nachází. | Pomalé jako bych příkazy posílal českou poštou. 
Prosím, vytvořte kartu pro Apple Wallet🙏 | There is no possibility to login with the password. Iphone 14pro, ios 16.02 | IOS 16 - well, login is not working | Funguje skvěle, rozšiřuje možnosti využití vozu. | It's the best app ever and it's free | Apps je v pořádku a fajn, ale na dálku zamykání přes mobil se neaktivuje alarm a ani led světlo pod zpětným zrcátkem, škoda.
A žádné hlášení třeba typu nezamknuté auto. To me třeba MB. | User friendly app 😎👍 | The last version does not show  the correct amount of fuel and correct position of car on map. | Po updatu ukazuje že je vozidlo odemčeno přitom je zamčené .. pokud odešlu příkaz k zamknutí zareaguje ale žádná změna | Says that was not able to retrieve T&C and ask to try again later | Problém se změnou hesla, jinak spokojenost | 30.11.2021 Stále chybí podpora pro AppleWatch jinak aplikace funguje výborně. Minulá aktualizace přinesla detailní informace ohledně stavu dveří a oken. Škoda, že ID6 již nepodporuje přenos informace o tlaku kol. 

11.10.2021 Aplikace funguje výborně a má moderní vzhled. Nemá problémy s aktualizací stavu vozu jako aplikace předchozí. Škoda, že stále chybí podpora pro Apple Watch. Příjemná náhrada a budoucnost aplikace Connected. Nový svěží a moderní design po kterém je znát již pokročilý věk původní Connected aplikace. Funkčně stejná, zatím bez podpory/vlastní aplikace pro Apple Watch (proto o hvězdu méně). Aplikace pro Apple Watch snad dorazí brzy ;-) | Pitty, that apple watch support is missing. | No remote services after app update :-( | Kdy uz konečně vrátíte výbornou aplikaci zpět do hodinek?
Byla to super pomoc u EV. I3. | The new one is more stable with no crashes. Unfortunately some of the great features from the previous version are missing such as: no option of sharing yor location and the time of arrival with your friends, no option of travel scheduling - you can ´t plan the trip from app in advance and choose a certain time of getting in to a destination. Shame 😢 | With the new features added here and there the app is becoming even more useful and easier to use. When the feature to export the charging history it’s feature complete for me now. This was something I thought would be really nice to have and now having it I feel totally satisfied with the app. Also, unlike the old one, this one never fails for me. Works very reliably. | Žádné vylepšení jsem za poslední  dva roky od pořízení vozu nezaznamenal. Byly problémy s Office podporou, které vyřešili zrušením příslušných položek v menu systému auta. Aplikaci v Apple Watch, která docela fungovala, zrušili s nástupem verze “My BMW.” Údajně nebyla příliš využívaná. Argument nechápu. Upravena byla grafická podoba, která již není tak kompaktní a přehledná. Žádnou novou funkci jsem nenašel. Aktualizace SW vozí sice jsou, ale bez jakékoliv informace pro zákazníka. Nejdříve se ještě není odladěn a pak jsou funkce ořezávány, jak ukazuje zkušenost i potvrzení oficiální podpory. Je to škoda. | Pokud v aplikaci zadáte cíl cesty a odešlete do vozu, ve voze se na displeji neobjeví notifikace příchozí zprávy a vy tak musíte listovat do Connected drive a dále do zprávy BMW, což je samozřejmě opruz a zdržení. Stará apka fungovala v tomto směru bezvadně. | Jo appku do hodinek zapomeli | Právě mi z aplikace zmizel moje auta. Na webu je vidím. 🤷🏻‍♂️ | Krok zpět,  hrůza hruzoucí a to si říkají prémiová značka … Neukazuje tlak pneumatik, zda je zavřená kapota, kufr, plánování trasy kostrbaté. Předchozí trasy chybí | Zprávu o nové apce jsem přivítal s očekáváním že někdo konečně pochopil že BMW ujel vlak a je třeba přepřáhnout koně.
Bohužel appka je nadále co se týče funkčnosti na míle vzálená tomu co dokáže konkurence.
Na BMW jsem přešel od Mercedes. Doporučuju si někdy nechat ukázat jejich appku v činnosti
Tomu říkám appka co pomáhá. Jediné k čemu jsem potřeboval klíč bylo odjet.
Rychlá, nápomoná, stabilně funkční… prostě všechno co BMW nemá 🙁 | Ve starší verzi zasílání cílů vždy fungovalo bez problémů. V nové appce i po kontaktu s call centrem BMW nefunguje. Ostatní je stejný, takže vlastně nic nového tato appka kromě designu nepřináší. | Neukazuje dojezd ani stav paliva, ani po připojení kabelem, zmizela možnost klaksonu(ve staré furt funguje oboje) Klakson tak často nepoužívám ale stav nádrže a dojezd mi opravdu chybí... | In all aspects the older version of the app is better. I hope you are not going to discontinue usage of an old app, as the new one i really discourage anyone from using. | Jak se stalo již tradicí, tak byla znovu nahrazena aplikace, která postupně přestávala fungovat, novou verzí, která opět funguje, ale ztrácí některé funkce. Odhaduji, že do pěti let bude zachována jediná funkcionalita - zobrazení loga BMW.

title: GeoGuessr
description:
Explore the World with GeoGuessr: A Global Discovery Game

The World Awaits
Are you ready to navigate the globe, challenge your friends, and join a community of explorers? Download GeoGuessr now and start your journey!

Discover & Explore
Join millions in the ultimate adventure with GeoGuessr! Navigate from the secluded roads of Australia to the vibrant streets of New York City. Use your detective skills to identify locations based on clues like signs, languages, flags, and natural landscapes. Whether you’re deciphering internet top domains or analyzing architectural styles, every round is a step into the unknown.

Build Your World
As you navigate the world, your goal is to earn coins through your geographical expertise. These coins serve as your key to unlocking iconic landmarks on your personal globe. Each landmark not only symbolizes your achievements but also marks a step closer to becoming a geography expert.

Solo Adventures
Embark on solo games, delve into your favorite maps, and start country streaks to test how long you can go identifying countries correctly. With various single-player modes, including the popular Famous Places map, your quest for global mastery is endless.

Competitive Play
Face off against the world in exciting multiplayer modes. Engage in Duels, enter Battle Royales, and play challenges to prove your geographical prowess against others. Every game is a chance to prove your skill!

Play Together
Create parties, invite friends, and compete in diverse game modes. Discover who among you has the keenest sense of place, with bragging rights at stake. GeoGuessr's cross-platform functionality means you can play with players on both mobile devices and the web, ensuring no friend is left behind.

Express Yourself
Unleash your creativity with extensive customization options. Personalize your avatar with a wide selection of hats, shirts, and accessories, reflecting your unique style in every game.

Terms of Use: https://www.geoguessr.com/terms 
Privacy Policy: https://www.geoguessr.com/privacy

Support
Facing issues? Our support team is here to help! Email us at support@geoguessr.com
releaseNotes: This update brings bug fixes and stability improvements.
reviews: Change it right now to free because i want enjoy the created games, Very bad game | Not working after last update. | When you not found correct.. you cant see correct location on end match.. stupid | Extremely Pay to Use app, I better be playing geo tastic | ich muss mich anmelden damit ich das spiel spielen kann. ich will solche spiele nicht | First time playing and I get knocked out in 1 min then I have to wait 12 hour to play again or pay 4 euros 🤣🤣🤣 | 3rd task “tapping the arrow…” There is no any arrow. I have ip13pro / ios16 | Iphone 13 pro max - zero compatibility… cant go through the tutorial. Disappointment | I like Geoguessr on youtube but i don’t know how to login (i don’t have a account yet btw) so idk how to make a new one. Pls help | geoguesser hraju už rok a musím uznat že je to dobrá hra pro lidi kteří se chcou něco naučit nebo jen tak pro zábavu. jde hrát s kámošem takže celkově dobré | Warning! This game is not free! You have to pay monthly sub otherwise you can Play once every 12 hours. Leading and sad. Prepare your wallet. | Chtějí zaplatit za to že můžete hrát, už to není to co to bývalo, bohužel, další super hra umřela. | I love the game but in battle royale games it shows the same location as the guess before even though its supposed to be somewhere else and i obviously lose the game instantly. It happened to me 3 times already since I have bought my subscription two days ago. :((( | Last update limited this game to 3 games a day and introduced the pro version, which seems to be about the same price as the desktop version while offering about 10% of the content and you can't link desktop and mobile accounts. Some major course correction needs to be done. | In last version there is only battle royale option. But my favorite game was player vs. player on one device. | The game is nice. But making coins is very slow. And also the first map is very US-centric. I feel like guessing if this neighborhood is located on the East or the West coast... | The Game is great but i am experiencing a bug where when i try playing the game it says no internet connection,i have checkwd the internet and Its great it works for every other game but here it says “no internet connection” | Je to dobré, ale kdyby tam bylo více map, tak by to bylo ještě lepší. | Top game | It is a great game. It runs smoothly. But I would like more places. I feel like I am at the same place all over the time.

title: Radarbot: Speed Camera Alerts
description:
The only app that combines real time alerts with the best offline radar detection alert system. With Radarbot, you will have the best radar alerts, real time traffic alerts and specific speed limit alerts for different vehicles (cars, motorbikes, trucks and commercial vehicles) in one powerful app. Focus on what really matters while driving and enjoy your journey.

With Radarbot, drive more peacefully. Safer. Better.

SPEED CAMERA WARNINGS
Enjoy driving without having to worry about risking your safety or driving licence. Avoid traffic fines and penalties by receiving clear warnings before passing speed cameras:

- Fixed speed cameras.
- Possible mobile speed cameras (frequent areas).
- Tunnel speed cameras.
- Average speed cameras (the app displays the average speed).
- Traffic light cameras.

Plus:
- Dangerous driving areas.
- Seat belt or cell phone use cameras.
- Restricted area access control cameras.
- Potholes and speed bumps on the road.

* FEATURES:
- Works in any country.
- Compatible with other apps. You can use Radarbot together with other GPS navigators or your favourite music app. You will still receive alerts in the background or while the screen is turned off.
- Alerts only in the direction you are driving. The app automatically ignores speed cameras for traffic going in the opposite direction or off route.
- Voice alerts.
- Sound alerts when approaching a speed camera or going over the speed limit.
- Vibration mode for motorists.
- Fully configurable warning distances and parameters.
- Automatic Bluetooth connection and startup.
- Compatible with Apple Watch.

REAL TIME ALERTS
Real time alerts will warn you of any unexpected circumstances. Radarbot has a community of over 50 million drivers worldwide with whom you can share and receive alerts. Find out immediately what is happening on the road and avoid traffic jams, hazards, accidents, mobile speed cameras, police, helicopters, drones, and much more.

SPEED CAMERA UPDATE
Radarbot has the most powerful, up-to-date speed camera database in the world. Our team of experts perform daily updates to ensure that the database always contains the very latest information. Not a single speed camera can escape the prying eyes of Radarbot!

RADARBOT WORLDWIDE
Try our totally "FREE" version for as long as you like. If you want to get the full experience, you can try "Radarbot GOLD" and "Radarbot GOLD RoadPro" with integrated GPS navigation, unique advantages and, of course, no advertising.

GPS NAVIGATION AND SPEED LIMITS
Discover the power of Radarbot. The GOLD version offers everything you need on the road in a single app: GPS navigation, speed cameras and speed limits. Even if you don't have an internet connection, you will still arrive safe and sound at your destination. Get speed camera alerts wherever you are in the world without having to worry about using up your mobile data.

Where would you like to go?

* FEATURES:
- Offline navigation and 3D maps.
- Possibility of choosing a route with fewer speed cameras.
- Road speed limits.
- Alerts for school areas and associated speed cameras.
- Radarbot co-pilot. Put your seat belt on!

ARE YOU A PROFESSIONAL DRIVER?
"Radarbot GOLD RoadPro" includes everything a professional driver could need:

- Routes with special restrictions for lorries and commercial vehicles.
- Speed limits and specific speed cameras for lorries.
- Distance alerts adapted to heavy vehicles.

If you have any doubts or queries, we would be more than happy for you to get in touch with us at radarbot@iteration-mobile.com or by using the customer support option inside the app.

Download Radarbot now and become a member of the "Enjoy driving!" movement.

* Continuous use of GPS in the background can drastically reduce battery life.
releaseNotes: You asked for it... Now you can see all the radars in your country on the maps, not just the closest ones. Just zoom in on the map to discover them. We've also improved our customer service section, so resolving any queries is now quicker and easier. Lastly, we've spent time fixing bugs and adding aesthetic and functional improvements that you'll discover when you open Radarbot. Enjoy driving!

title: Clime: Weather Radar Live
description:
Real-time radar images, severe weather alerts, accurate weather forecasts and much more - precise & timely to help keep you safe!
 
STAY INFORMED:
- Radar overlay shows the areas of rain, snow & mixed precipitation in high resolution and vivid colors right on the interactive map;
- Precipitation map provides precipitation forecast for the next 24 hours; 
- Satellite map illustrates the cloud cover;
- Choose background maps (standard, hybrid, satellite), search locations, add them to bookmarks and stay out of harm’s way.

KEEP YOURSELF SAFE:
- Read weather alerts with all the details you might need; 
- Receive push notifications whenever there’s a weather alert for the bookmarked location.

VIEW WEATHER DETAILS:
- 24-hour and 7-day forecast;
- Current, today’s min & max and "Feels Like" temperature;
- Pressure, humidity, wind speed, visibility, dew point info;
- Chance of Precipitation;
- Sunrise & sunset time.

Coverage Info:
Radar images: the US (Continental US, Alaska (except northern), Hawaii, Northern Mariana Islands and Puerto Rico), Mexico (northern), Canada (southern), Australia, the UK, Ireland, Germany, France, the Netherlands, Italy (northern and north-western), Denmark, Austria, Sweden, Finland, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Norway, Poland, Andorra, Japan and more. See the full list on the developer’s website.
Precipitation, temperature, satellite maps; wind map; snow depth forecast; hurricane, wildfire, lightning trackers; detailed weather info, precipitation alerts: most of the world.
Governmental severe weather warnings: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, UK.

Get Clime Premium:
- Severe weather alerts for all saved locations
- Hurricane tracker
- Advanced precipitation forecast
- Lightning tracker
- Temperature map
- Rain alerts
- Air quality index
- Wildfire tracking
- RainScope
- Hourly forecast
- 14-day forecast
- Animated wind map
- Snow depth forecast 
- No ads 

Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase.  Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period.  Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose. 
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support.

Privacy Policy: https://climeradar.com/privacyPolicy 
Terms: https://climeradar.com/terms
releaseNotes:
When it comes to outwitting the weather, performance and stability matter. With this update, you'll be even more sure to get the weather info you need when you need it.
As always, we appreciate your continued support!
reviews:
Another quick app. withdrawn, deleted. 👍 | Overpriced, MANY ADS, not useful.

Přetáhnuté ceny, HODNĚ REKALM a aplikace je nepoužitelná. Bez peněz je takřka k ničemu, oznámení, live aktivita, předpověď, všechno za poplatek což je k smíchu. 
Chápu, premium funkce ať něco stojí, ale základní ? Vtipné. | I při použití trial verze, musíte nejprve potvrdit předplatné, tak bacha ať ho potom nezapomenete zrušit. | It works perfect. When we were on vacation, we always knew how’s the weather. | Pokud nebudete platit paušál ( ne zrovna malý ), nebude předpověď, jen to, jaké počasí už bylo… 🙁 | This app uses, as at least one other reviewer has pointed out, a so-called “dark pattern” subscription scheme. When you try to open the app fire the first time, you are required to sign up for a one week free trial—which will of course automatically be converted to take ninety crowns of your money each and every week after that until you remember to stop the Akrobatik subscription. It’s a scam. Why Apple allows this kind of thing, I can’t imagine. The app literally has zero functionality, unless you sign up for the free trial. It shows a blank screen demanding that you do that.
REPLY TO DEVELOPER RESPONSE: Sorry, but there is NO option to simply run the app in non-pay mode. The signup screen appears for the paid plan and you have no way to bypass that screen and get the app to do anything. So what you’re saying simply is not true. | A weather forecast app that only forecasts weather after you pay. Therefore a paid app disguised as a free one. Do not recommend. | Moc tomu není rozumět | Jen jedna z dalších aplikací, která nabízí možnost 7 dní zkušební verze, a poté si účtuje peníze. Pro tento typ aplikace je to směšné a vyplatí se stáhnout si aplikaci, která je naprosto zdarma a vykoná stejnou funkci. | Doesn't show accurate radar data in Czechia. Most of the apps showed rain but this one didn't although it was actually raining. | at the end of the trial period, the application automatically activates the paid version. don't install it! | There are better free apps with much more accurate local radar data. Also offer for trial is a typical design dark pattern. It seems free, but after the trial you are charged without ask. It’s mentioned, but in a way that user can easily overlook. I am getting sick from this kind of scam. I believe Apple should ban these apps from App Store - building business model on the fact that user is intentionally mistaken is simply BAD. | Stáhnete si Free trial verzi a když ji ke konci neodinstalujete nebo nezrušíte předplatné, automaticky Vám naběhne platba za týdení Pro verzi. Nesnáším tyhle vyjebávky a nejde o těch mizerných 89,- Kč. Běžte do prdele, křiváci | Good weather! 😉 | I po vymazání si aplikace účtuje platby. Pozor na to a ani ji nezkoušejte nebo se jí pak nezbavite

Vysvětlení pro vývojáře: Když aplikaci vymažu, tak to znamená, že ji NECHCI používat a když ji nechci používat, tak NECHCI ani předplatné. Když umí promptně po instalaci předplatné nastavit, tak by je měl po oddinstalaci stejně rychle zrušit. Škoda, že nejde ubrat i tu poslední hvězdu, protože za nefér jednání si ani tu jednu vývojář nezaslouží. | This app sneaks the subscription into your itunes billing. After a week they will charge you their overpriced subscription to their below average app. 
I am now in process of getting my money hopefully back. STAY AWAY!!! | It says it is free, but then offers only 7 days trial... | IT showes entire Europe so it is very handy. | Jasne obrazky, jednoduche ovladani, proste super | I like it | Ukazuje celou Evropu, což je super. | Ukazuje radar pro celou Evropu + animaci. | I like this game. | As

title: Grab: Taxi & Grocery Order
description:
Get everything delivered to your doorstep with Grab – the leading ride-hailing, taxi, food delivery, and grocery app in Southeast Asia!

We offer essential everyday services to over 670 million people across Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, Cambodia, and Myanmar.

Grab offers various ride-hailing options, including 4-wheel and 2-wheel rides, and taxi booking. Grab also offers a diverse range of services including food order delivery from restaurants, prompt package delivery, and groceries from supermarkets, making it a leading taxi app and delivery platform.

Experience convenience like never before with Grab – your all-in-one solution for ride-hailing, food delivery, groceries, and more!

Book a ride for any occasion and budget
Order a ride on Grab, the top ride-hailing and taxi app in Southeast Asia. Choose from a variety of transport modes, including cars, motorbikes, and buses, and get matched with a professional driver in minutes.

Food delivery for any craving
GrabFood: a leading food delivery app that allows you to easily order food from your favourite restaurants and get it delivered to your doorstep, making it convenient and hassle-free

Conveniently order food and groceries for delivery
GrabMart is a convenient food delivery app that allows you to order groceries and handpicked fresh produce from your favourite supermarket.

Secure and seamless cashless payments
GrabPay: A safe and secure mobile wallet where you can easily pay for Grab services, such as food and grocery delivery and taxis, as well as at local merchants

Reliable on-demand package delivery
GrabExpress: Order affordable, fast, and reliable courier service with insurance for your items

Rewards for using Grab
GrabRewards: Order food, ride and earn reward points for every dollar you spend and use them to redeem deals in the GrabRewards catalogue

Grab is the only ride-hailing and food-delivery app you need. Whether you are searching for a taxi app, express food delivery, or grocery delivery, Grab has got you covered.

In addition to our renowned ride-hailing, taxi, and food delivery services, we also strive to promote economic empowerment for everyone in the region. We provide financial services such as wealth management, lending, cashless payments, and insurance.

Find out more about us at www.grab.com.
Grab offers the ability for users to receive personalized targeted advertising, offers, and updates from Grab and its partners and communications/advertising from certain third-party apps based on activity on your devices. Users may exercise opt-out choices under the Privacy and Consent Management sections within Settings within the app. For further details, you may refer to our Privacy Policy at www.grab.com/privacy.
releaseNotes:
Did you know that a bee's wings beat 190 times a second? That's 11,400 times a minute! Impressive, isn't it?

But don't think all bugs are impressive. The only thing app bugs do is interfere with our experience. That's why our engineers beat them all the time.

Update to 5.300 now to get the bee-tter version of Grab app.

title: Journi Print | Photobooks
description:
Journi Print is like hiring a designer! It designs a photo book in seconds exactly the way you would have done. Our smart algorithm can find the best layouts for 1200 photos in just 34 seconds. Save time and money and start your photo book today because you already did the work when you took the photos.

▶ HOW IT WORKS 
▻ Choose your photo source: iPhone/iPad, iCloud, or Facebook
▻ Select a suggested album or hand-pick your photos.
▻ BOOM! In just a few seconds your photo book is ready for print!


▶ FAST & EASY  
▻ Want to add or edit something? Journi Print is beyond-easy. 
▻ Get beautiful & timeless collages - not just one photo per page.
▻ Don’t lose your head: Photos are NOT cropped! We never cut your precious memories.
▻ Dates & texts are beautifully arranged.
▻ Get amazing maps, automatically created by your photo locations!


▶ BEST QUALITY
▻ Enjoy the highest quality, printed in the Alps
▻ Environmentally friendly paper that is FSC certified
▻ Digital print on 170 g/m2 Plano Art Paper


▶ NEED MORE ARGUMENTS?
▻ Get it cheaper: Invite your friends and earn money.
▻ Your privacy is always protected 100%
▻ Want to create a photo book while travelling? Try our free photo journaling app: Journi Blog - Travel tracker

▶ QUESTIONS? 
For questions, assistance or other inquiries contact: 
Helpcenter - http://journiapp.com/faq
Email - support@journiapp.com
Facebook - http://facebook.com/journiapp
releaseNotes:
Introducing:
- New design to edit your photo book much faster
- Pick your favorite title color
- Wall Calendar: Pick your favorite background color
- Performance Improvements 
- Minor issues fixed

Tell us and other users if you like this version by writing a review in the store.

Dělám knihy a kalendáře naší široké rodině už roky, zatím jedna z nejlepších aplikací, co jsem kdy používala. | Trochu mě děsí, ze mám zaplatit tolik peněz za doručení a vůbec to po mne nechce nikam zadat e-mail. Kam mi přijdou informace o odeslání objednávky a jak mě bude kontaktovat dorucovaci společnost tady v ČR? Mám vše hotovo, ale platba se mi teda provádět nechce, tohle ve mě budí dost nedůvěryhodnosti. | Chtěla bych moc poděkovat kniha je dokonalá❣️ A aplikace opravdu super jen výběru fotky co chci a vše se samo urovná a já jen poupravila, opravdu jste mi moc ušetřili čas. Děkuji děkuji děkuji určitě budu objednávat pravidelně 🤍 | Během chvilky uděláte z fotek v mobilu krásnou vzpomínku... Během pár týdnů máte ve schránce... | Fotoknihy jsou pěkné, nenáročný a intuitivní návod. Doporučila jsem sestře a ta již také tvoří !😀👍 | Aplikace je prostě skvělá !!! Jednoduchá a originální příprava fotoknihy zabere oproti jiným aplikacím chvilku a výsledek je na jedničku. Stejně tak chválím kvalitu polaroidových fotek a pohlednic. Vřele všem DOPORUČUJI !! 😊❤️📸 | Velká spokojenost..aplikace přehledná a hlavně rychlá, kalendáře krásné a kvalitní. Trochu nás vylekal e-mail, že je náš balíček na celním, ale clo se nakonec vůbec neplatilo a i termín byl dodržen. Určitě objednám znovu..:) | No info on delivery day or time. Postman car only stopped before our house, without any attempt to call or ring the bell. No message on which post office is the parcel placed, so you need to investigate yourself. 45 minute queue to get it... You might have amazing product, however you ruin it all choosing wrong partner for the last mile... | Naprosto pohodlná aplikace. Vyberu fotky a samy se poskládají, rozvrhnou a velmi vkusně se doplní mapky s navštívenými místy. Všechno rychle a myslím, že i celkem za rozumnou cenu. Doporučuji!!! | Moje objednávka nedorazila včas(a ani nevim kdy dorazí | Aplikace mě zaujala a neustále mi na mail chodilo upozornění na slevu. Bohužel při vytvoření objednávky žádná sleva uplatnit nešla. Proč slibujete něco, co potom zákazník nedostane? Jednalo se o slevu na první objednávku, platila 7 dni, tudíž ještě 2 dny. | Již jsem vytvořila 2 fotoknihy a pracuji na dalších.
Stále se s aplikací učím a velmi oceňuji její jednoduchost.
Postrádám několik věcí:
- možnost přesunutí  fotek ve vybraném layoutu
- možnost dodatečného vložení mapy
- přidání textu k jednotlivým fotkám. Pokud přidám na stránku více textových polí je téměř nemožné docílit toho, aby popisovaly konkrétní fotku.

Jinak zpracování knihy je velmi kvalitní. Doba doručení v kolem 14 dnů - mohla by být kratší!

A dotaz na vývojáře na závěr: neuvažujeme o možnosti vložení ručně psaných textů (Apple Pencil)??? | Jsem zklamaná se servisem, který mi nemohl oddělit jména od data, ani samotné je to nenapadlo, ale hned měli řešení ze vyrobí novou knihu se slevou 50%. A ještě budu platit clo! Jsou lepší aplikace, za me tato ne!!! | Nikdy jsem knihy a kalendáře s fotografií nedělala protože mi to přišlo velmi pracné. Nyní dělám fotoknihy z každé zajímavé události. Vynikající aplikace. Jen je před odesláním nutné vše raději dvakrát zkontrolovat.

title: Gossip Harbor®: Merge & Story
description:
Welcome to Gossip Harbor 
Follow Quinn Castillo as her picture perfect life on Brimwave Island crumbles around her. Divorce, sabotage and secrets. Help answer the question everyone's thinking: Who's trying to ruin her life? 
Merge flavorful dishes, restore and decorate Quinn's restaurant and watch the mystery unfold. 
But who can you trust in Brimwave? 

Whip Up Tasty Dishes
Serve coffee, sandwiches, seafood, and a range of other dishes, to your customers. The more you play, the more dishes you’ll find to add to your menu!

Restore the Restaurant
Rebuild and design the best beach restaurant around! Choose the flooring, wallpaper and furniture to restore restaurant to its former glory! 

Build Relationships
Converse with customers and hang out with old friends. Or explore the possibility of a new budding romance. 

Catch up on the Gossip
You'll renovate and merged to reveal clues, and uncover hidden secrets of the residents on Brimwave Island. And perhaps even unveil the Castillo's hidden secrets…

Enjoying Gossip Harbor? Learn more about the game on our Facebook Fan Page!
https://www.facebook.com/GossipHarbor

Need help? Contact us by sending an email to serviceMergemerge@gmail.com
We're here to help you! 

Privacy Policy: https://diary.cdn.mergesigma.com/resources/privacy/privacy_2.0.html
Terms of Service: https://diary.cdn.mergesigma.com/resources/privacy/user_license_2.0.html
releaseNotes:
NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY!
- NEW EPISODE: With new chapter updates every Friday; follow Quinn as she exposes secrets and solves puzzles.
- NEW EVENT: Do you hear the thump-thump of excited bunny feet? The bunny citizens of Bunnywood are getting ready for the annual Easter celebration. Grab your egg basket and join Quinn, Amala and Olivia as they venture to Bunnywood for the egg-cellent Easter festival!
reviews:
Hra je hezky zpracována a fajn, ale když se jedna o nějaký event, tak není možné, aby jste ho dokončili bez reálných peněz. A i když uz člověk investuje do této hry, tak většinou stejně nesplní daný event k vůli jeho náročnosti. 
Za mě to kazí cely dojem ze hry, protože tady platí klasika “pay to win”. 😡👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻 | Btw the first pictures on the description of the game is not like that, is like the last ones.
If you make a purchase they will not give you the free box that they give daily anymore. | niceee | Zabavý | i really wish there weren’t so many pop ups when you open the game. once you learn how to play it’s easy and you’ll check that all yourself. it’s really annoying. otherwise really good game. | Найкраща гра, яка не надоїдає
My favourite game 😍 | good | Nemuzu prestat hrat❤️❤️ | Super | Super | Very Good! | Fajn odychovka :-) | Moc se mi hra líbí | Using weird pronouns, first romance you come across is between two dudes…deleted without looking back. | I love this gameee | Zbožňuju když si můžu dělat věci podle sebe | Udělejte ještě nějaký gildu nebo klan ať se mohou lidí připojit 🙂 | Hraje se dobre. Zabaví

title: FlyAway
description:
Aplikace FlyAway vás upozorní na akční letenky už od 250 Kč. Levné letenky už nemusíte nikde hledat, aplikace FlyAway monitoruje levné letenky za vás.

V aplikaci publikujeme jen ty nejlepší nabídky akčních letů, které opravdu stojí za to.
Upozorníme vás pouze na lety s atraktivní slevou
Vybíráme hlavně přímé lety nebo s krátkým mezipřistáním
Bereme v úvahu ideální počet dní strávených v destinaci

V APLIKACI FLYAWAY REZERVUJTE LETENKY VŽDY ZA NEJNIŽŠÍ CENU

V aplikaci FlyAway letenky přímo neprodáváme (=nenavyšujeme ceny o svou provizi), vždy odkazujeme na rezervaci přímo u aerolinky. Jedině to je způsob, jak získat nejnižší cenu, nepřeplácet za doplňkové služby a v případě zpoždění či zrušení letů řešit transparentně a rychle refundace a jiné požadavky.

VLASTNÍ FILTRY

V aplikaci si můžete nastavit své nejbližší odletové letiště a dostávat tak upozornění na letenky, které jsou pro vás nejvýhodnější.

K tomu si můžete nastavit sledování akčních letenek i z okolních letišť, která jsou brána jako sekundární letiště a upozornění dostanete vždy pouze na lety, které se výrazně vyplatí i s ohledem na dopravu.

Dále si můžete nastavit destinace, které chcete sledovat a dostávat upozornění na akční letenky jen do vybraných destinací.

ITINERÁŘE

Kromě akčních letenek v aplikaci najdete také připravené itineráře do různých destinací. Stačí rezervovat svůj let a vydat se na cestu s připraveným itinerářem.

DETAILNÍ INFORMACE KE KAŽDÉ LETENCE

U každé letenky vždy vidíte:
Počasí v destinaci na termín cesty
Základní info o destinaci
Termín letu
Rozmezí dnů, kdy je let operován
Cenu a odkaz na rezervaci
Počet dní strávených v destinaci
Rozměr zavazadel a případné příplatky za příruční, či odbavené zavazadlo
Informace o případných přestupech
COVID podmínky vstupu a návratu

ZÁKAZNICKÁ PODPORA

V aplikaci je dostupný live chat k vašim dotazům, na kterém jsme každý pracovní den od 9 do 18 h.

Pokud máte jakékoliv dotazy, můžete se také obrátit na naši podporu na emailu podpora@fly-away.cz

Cestujte super levně a stáhněte si FlyAway.
releaseNotes:
- Nově jsme přidali live chat podporu. Live chat najdeš v záložce Nastavení.
- V cestovních itinerářích nově najdeš graf s teplotou a počasím v destinaci v průběhu roku.
- Každý předplatitel PREMIUM účtu má nově PLATINUM účet až do 31.10.
- Vrátili jsme týdenní zkušební verzi i pro měsíční předplatné.

Pro krátké shrnutí, aplikace je zklamáním. | Perfektni přehledná a hlavně funkci aplikace. Neskutečné nabídky letenek, díky kterým dostane cestování jiny rozměr a usetri vám tisíce. Nice, easy, good for travelers 💙 | Flyaway, záruka perfektní dovolené.

title: Memrise: Speak a new language
description:
Unlike other language learning apps, Memrise is built around mastering specific conversations. 

1) Set your level and import your streak from other apps. 
2) Pick which conversations you want to master 
3) Learn practical vocab and phrases
4) Listen to native speakers, get used to their accents and tempo 
5) Practice speaking with your AI tutor, MemBot so you’re confident when you do the real thing.

Never get stuck learning a language but not knowing what to say. 

- Helping 65 million learners speak confidently 
- 190,00 4.6 star ratings 
- Featured in BBC World Service, Forbes, The Verge, The Financial Times and more 

Example conversations you’ll actually have: 
Beginner: Chatting about your holiday with your friends 
Beginner: Chatting with friends while studying abroad 
Intermediate: Order at a restaurant 
Intermediate: Greeting the receptionist …and hundreds more 

Why Memrise? 

Speak with our AI language tutor: Get unlimited speaking practice (and feedback) from MemBot, our AI language tutor. Build up confidence in private before speaking with natives for real. 

Hear how the locals actually speak: Watch 30,000+ conversations between real natives, so you can confidently understand their accents and listen to words and phrases they actually use. 

Learn words relevant to your life: Pick conversations that reflect your interests so you can show off your personality. 

--

What other learners are saying 

Voloúre - "Best app for getting experience listening and interacting with native speakers. Listening to conversations by native speakers is so much better for actually being able to understand people"

Beth Williams - "My Fiancé is Portuguese so I wanted to learn their language to communicate easily. Over the year I can now string small sentences together. I don't think I could have done it without the help of Memrise."

Serious about language learning? Build your confidence faster with Memrise Pro 

Memrise Pro: - Unlock all vocab lessons in Memrise-approved language courses - 30,000 native speaker videos - Unlimited speaking practice - 

Compare with our Free Plan: - Limited vocab lessons - Limited native speaker videos (2 per day) - Limited speaking practice (2 conversations per day) - Not Ad free 

--

Download our app for free and start learning with Memrise today: Learn French, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Mexico), German, Korean, Japanese, Japanese (no script), Turkish, Italian, Chinese (simplified), Dutch, Portuguese (Portugal), Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Swedish, Norwegian, Polish, Danish, Slovenian, Icelandic, Yoruba, Mongolian, English (UK) and English (US)! 

------
*PLEASE READ: A Memrise Pro subscription are designed for Memrise-approved courses. A subscription is required in order to access all our learning features. These features may vary depending on your device's language and language pair. Once purchased, subscriptions will automatically renew unless cancelled before the end of the current payment period. Subscriptions can be managed or cancelled in your Apple App Store account. In-app Permissions – To enable some of the features of the Memrise app we may need to ask for your permission. For example, we'll ask to access your microphone if you'd like to practice your pronunciation skills. You can change permissions at any time in your settings. 

Privacy Policy: https://www.memrise.com/privacy/  
Terms of Use: https://www.memrise.com/terms/
releaseNotes: We have retired community courses from the app in this build. All of your community courses and your learning progress in them have been moved to a new Community Courses website. To read more and head to this new site, please search for the Memrise blog.
reviews:
Completely useless with the recent update hiding reviews, there is a no benefit of learning new words if you are unable to remember the old ones. Memrise had a great and working space repetition system, but now I need to review thousands of words and I simple cannot unless I learn dozens of new words first… why???
The app got much worse with the recent updates, some content is great, but if you want to actually learn, you need to remember and Memrise now helps you forget, not remember:/ | Due to the cancellation of the community courses in app, I have to switch to another app. Memrise, please consider changing and returning the community courses in the app. In web browser it is very uncomfortable. :-( | The best app for foreing language words learning... until they decided to remove the community courses in February-March 2024. The Memrise website is really not as good as app for learning and I won’t continue with my subscription when the current one ends in a month. | They decided to remove community curses, the only reason why they were able to make community base, now it’s ruined, don’t even bother to download | Hi,
I have to say that this is a great learning app, genuinely being able to teach you the language that you want and I’ve had a great time with this app, however the recent updates removed the total words known feature, which is a shame in my opinion since it helps me track how much I know of the language I am learning. Could you please readd this feature? | Nenašla jsem po instalaci výchozí jazyk češtinu, přestože jsem na videu viděla, ze by ji aplikace měla mít jako výchozí jazyk k dispozici. Už tomu tak není? | The new version of Memrise is terrible. Because of the new version and the pointless effort to improve the application, I lost dozens of created courses and thousands of words with translations. | Memrise was great and is still very good, but recent changes absolutely crippled it. For instance, due to being busy I did not have time to practice for about a week. I want to really review what I’ve learned, but I have to simply go through this tedious gpt chat, video watching AND learning new words ‘questy’ thingy before being offered review. Guys, I’m paying for this and you made the app way less user friendly, make the questy crap optional!!! Some more exclamation marks!!! | I love this app and I have the membership but after finishing the German 1 course I can’t practice the German 2 in my app. I can only access the course via website. I tried to reinstall the app but it didn’t help… | Please bring back the old design of the main page! 

It was so much better when I could choose whether to learn new words, review or practice difficult words! Now it’s out of my control and I just keep clicking through the options vocabulary-listening-conversation hoping that at some point the vocabulary tab will give me what I need (reviews/new words/difficult words). 

My study time has gone down a lot since you introduced the new design because it is not user friendly and I end up feeling annoyed and frustrated😭 

I also miss having the streak and number of words I already know visible on the main page. 

I love Memrise app so much and the main page from which I decide what to learn today is the biggest part of it. I am really hoping you will change it back :( | Za mne, nejlepší aplikace na procvicovani spolu s prohlubovacim kurzem | All you need is a membership and some consistency. title: Seaside Escape®: Merge & Story
description:
Kryphos has changed almost beyond recognition in the last five years, and fallen celebrity Rowan needs your help to turn things around. Here, the right merge can change everything.

Come and join us, and get lost in the world of Seaside Escape!

Game Features
• All it takes is a simple drag of your finger, to turn two basic items into something incredible! 
• With hundreds of items, you can merge almost anything you can think of!
• Help the residents of Kryphos not only survive, but thrive!
• Help Rowan restore her shattered confidence and rebuild her life!
• Uncover hidden secrets as you rebuild Kryphos!
• There are surprises hiding around every corner, just waiting for you to find them!

Enjoying Seaside Escape? Learn more about the game on our Facebook Fan Page!
https://www.facebook.com/SeasideEscapeGame/

Need help? Contact us by sending an email to SeasideEscapecustomer@gmail.com.We're here to help you! 

Privacy Policy: https://www.microfun.com/privacy_EN.html
Terms of Service: https://www.microfun.com/userAgreementEN.html

NEW CONTENT EVERY WEEK

- Events! Spice up your gaming experience with this weeks' event!

We've also fixed bugs and added cool new features!

title: Eurowings
description:
With the Eurowings App you have your trip right in your pocket: Quickly and conveniently all important functions and information at a glance.

All advantages at a glance

# Mobile travel management
# Check in and create boarding pass
# Receive real-time flight information
# Earn miles (Miles & More)
# Use additional services, such as changing seats or adding luggage
# Special Assistance (information and assistance in case of flight cancellations and strikes)

Search & book trip
# Search and book flights
# 155 destinations in Europe
# Savings calendar (cheapest flights at the best tariff)
# Tariff overview for easy comparison for best alternatives

Manage bookings mobile
# All trips with flight schedule and history
# Personalized myEurowings account guarantees fast booking and administration of personal data

Online check-in
# Online check-in from 72h before departure
# Easy booking of seats (e.g. with more legroom)
# Information on permitted hand luggage

Create boarding passes
# Export to Apple Wallet
# Save locally in the app
# Send to e-mail
# Download as PDF

Real-time flight information
# Flight status & updates (terminal and gate changes, boarding time)
# Automatic push notifications

Frequent flyer benefits
# Earn valuable miles
# Lufthansa Miles & More

Book additional services
# Change seat
# Add luggage
# Rebook and cancel flights

Special Support
# Real-time information in case of flight cancellations and strikes
# Assistance on further procedure
# Contact and hotline

title: Turkish Airlines: Book Flights
description:
Are you ready to discover the World with Turkish Airlines privileges? Our mobile application helping you to experience the best travel experience speeds you up by remembering your selections and flights. You can use our application to benefit from features making your life easier such as reservation, ticketing and check-in.


USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN

• Either a vacations or a business trip, it now a lot easier to plan your travel! Our mobile application remembers your selections, likes and flights and makes recommendations exclusive to you.

•  We have created a new design focused on the ideal user experience. Now, you can easily make your travel plan, ticketing and Miles transactions. 

• Thanks to our easy to use application, you will buy tickets, arrange your reservations and view your registered flights a lot faster.


BRAND NEW DISCOVERIES

• Get ready to discover the world with the  airline operating between the most points of the world.  By viewing the special offers, you can fly with advantageous prices.

• By viewing the city guides, you will get to know about our recommendations that will color your travel. You prepare for an enjoyable travel by checking out the places to visit, the tastes to savor, airport transfer information and more for the cities you will visit.


RESERVATION METHOD

• You can make your reservation later by saving your flight. You can finish the payment whenever you want on all of your devices.

• From My Reservations section, you can add a new flight, you can change or cancel your flight and add infants to your flight.


FAST AND SECURE PAYMENT

• Among various payment methods and currencies available on our mobile application, you can select the most convenient ones and make payments easily.

• You can buy tickets a lot faster by saving your credit card or scanning your card with the camera at the payment stage.

• You can always feel safe by hiding your credit card and profile information.


MILES&SMILES PRIVILEGES

• We have developed a personalized Miles&Smiles experience exclusive to our mobile application. You can enter to your account with your finger print.

• You can get an award ticket or shop on Shop&Miles by using your Miles.
 
• Now, Miles transactions are much more extensive! Transactions like buying Miles and transferring Miles can be carried out on our mobile application.


ADDITIONAL SERVICES

• You can make reservations from any hotel you like and save time by renting your car before your travel with special prices or using your Miles. 

• If you wish, you can buy a travel insurance to take precautions against unexpected events during your travel. 

• In order to maximize your comfort, you can fly in the seat you wish by selecting your seat.


DETAILS MAKING YOUR TRAVEL BETTER

• It is now a lot easier to buy tickets for your travels including multiple flights. Just click on the multi-city selection.

• You can follow the status of any flight you wish by using flight status feature. 

• Before your travel, you can view the location of counters, cafes, restaurants, pharmacies and more on the maps with the uploaded airport maps.
releaseNotes:
We fixed some errors that we detected in our application and that we thought upset you.
Thank you for using the Turkish Airlines mobile application, see you in the sky!

title: Campu.eu
description:
Campu.eu - wild camping. With the consent of property owners. Over 1,300 properties on offer.

Escape!
From people. From the city. From work. From the stereotype. From the noise. From crowded campsites. Into nature. Into solitude. Into the silence. Into the countryside. Somewhere away.  



Find your place on the map. Search easily according to your preferences - alone, with amenities (toilet, water, electricity), with a view, with the possibility of fishing, in the middle of vineyards, property with playgrounds for children, properties suitable for dogs....



Book - reserve a place of your choice, even if it's just for you, only 5 minutes before check-in.



Enjoy! Go wild camping, with Campu.eu you don't have to worry about having to leave in the middle of the night.

- bug fixes and minor improvements

title: SmartGuide travel guide & map
description:
Smart Guide – Where All Journeys Begin
You Explore, We’ll Guide

SmartGuide is your personal tour guide to the world. Turn your phone into a personal audio tour guide to accompany you on your travel adventures.
Whether you are looking for a self-guided tour, audio traveler guide, city offline maps or you just want to know all the best sightseeing spots, fun activities, and authentic experiences for your travel destination, SmartGuide is the perfect choice for your travel guide needs.

ONE DIGITAL GUIDE APP FOR THE WHOLE WORLD
This personal guide app offers travel guides for over 1000 popular destinations around the world. Wherever your journey may take you, SmartGuide tours will meet you there!
You explore. We’ll guide.

SAFE CONTACT-LESS TOUR GUIDE
Crowded tour groups from all around the world are a prime breeding ground for respiratory viruses and similar bugs. This is not a souvenir you want to bring from your trip. Our virtual tour guide recommends different places to each tourist based on their individual interests and guides you safely outside of the crowds. Stay safe with a self-guided tour.

AUDIO GUIDE
The personal travel planner app is your audio guide to the world that lets you conveniently listen to a travel guide with interesting narratives from local guides that play automatically when you reach an interesting sight. Just let your phone talk to you and enjoy the scenery!

FREE SELF-GUIDED TOURS
SmartGuide won’t let you get lost and you won't miss any must-see sights. City-guide app uses GPS navigation to guide you around the city at your convenience at your own pace, for free. Gone are the days when you had to follow the crowd. Now you can use SmartGuide and travel whenever you want, however you want.
Sightseeing guide for the modern tripwolf on the hunt for undiscovered wonders of nature!

FIND HIDDEN GEMS AND ESCAPE TOURIST TRAPS
With extra local secrets, our guides provide you with inside information about the best spots off the beaten path. Escape the traps when you visit a city and immerse yourself in the culture trip. Get around like a local and discover the actual culture and heritage of any locality!

EVERYTHING IS OFFLINE.
Download your city guide and get the offline maps and guide with our premium option so you have the freedom to roam and discover the world like the tripwolf that you are, without worrying one bit about finding an internet connection. Your travel guide will be available offline in the form of verbal instructions from natives and if you are someone that prefers reading over listening, the transcripts of the audio guides are also available.

Get the most out of your world travel experience by exploring with SmartGuide: Your Personal Travel Audio Guide!
releaseNotes:
Thanks for updating SmartGuide! What's new in this version:

Various improvements & fixes
- Not very noticeable but make the app more useful :)

I was pleasantly surprised how the audio guide made my day trips more educational and exciting. I simply enjoyed to walk on the street and simultaneously listen about history, art or architecture of all iconic places. | SmartGuide’s the best! It’s like having a personal guide in my pocket. | Výborný pomocník na cestách. Taky super apka ve městě kde bydlím, o hodně místech toho teď vim mnohem víc díky této aplikaci. Nejenže mi poskytl všechny potřebné informace, ale také mě navigoval po skvělých trasách a odhalil mi skryté poklady. Je to nezbytná aplikace pro cestování. | SmartGuide has made traveling a breeze. It's like having a local expert in my pocket! | Absolutely loved touring around Auckland with SmartGuide. Excited to try it in other cities as well. | Skvělá aplikace! Moc nás baví s ní poznávat nová krásná mista | This is the best offline audio guide i have ever tried. Really user friendly and helps you to get oriented through out many different cities and countries.
