title: BeeSpeaker Learn English
description:
BzZzZz! Join our hive and start communicating smoothly in foreign languages. It has never been easier to learn English!

BeeSpeaker is a true revolution and the first-ever app totally devoted to learning to speak English. It’s a voice-controlled tool, based on modern machine learning technology, which offers much more than just one-sided learning - the interface recognizes the words and sentences pronounced by you and checks your progress when you learn English. This way, you know how you're doing and what you need to improve.

Are you bored with English flashcards or another English conversation app? Are you feeling stuck when you practice English? Well, you're in the right place! BeeSpeaker is the perfect fit for you.

Thanks to BeeSpeaker, the obstacles and excuses that have stood in your way of learning English no longer exist! Our app features short and quick English lessons that you can do at your own pace, anytime, anywhere. We put emphasis on learning to speak English as we believe it is a key skill that is useful in every aspect of life.
Why should you take advantage of our digital native speaker - English teacher?

Because it’s the first step to bringing down your speaking barrier which often hampers learning English! Do your lessons (available categories: vocabulary, useful phrases, grammar, listening and pronunciation) and short video cards and get the premium version to access all English lessons and master English conversation.

Are you looking to learn to speak English fluently? Our instructors are experienced teachers, native speakers from countries like Great Britain, the United States, and Australia. Thanks to them you will learn different accents and ways of pronouncing particular words. 

During your ‘conversations’, you will quickly gain self-confidence and get rid of your blockages in speaking.

We focus on a natural method of learning English, which is a novelty in mobile apps. Instead of swotting up on English words, grammar rules, or reading flashcards, you learn by listening and repeating in English. And if you make a mistake - BeeSpeaker will let you know that you need to try again. It's an extremely interesting, fun and effective method for you to learn English, which eliminates stress and allows you to focus on what is most important - talking freely in a foreign language. The teachers in our app always speak English, thanks to which you start to break it up and just speak! 

Become part of the BeeSpeaker revolution. Start learning English today and you'll soon realize that speaking foreign languages is easy. English is really simple! Try it out today by downloading your digital native speaker!

Terms of Use : https://beespeaker.com/terms/

Privacy policy : https://beespeaker.com/privacy-policy/
releaseNotes:
Cập nhật ứng dụng và xem điều gì mới đang chờ đợi bạn:
- Giao diện khóa học mới - sử dụng giao diện khóa học được làm mới, giúp tổ chức tốt hơn tài liệu và hỗ trợ học tập!
- Cải thiện cơ chế micro - bây giờ bạn có thể kích hoạt nó thủ công nếu bạn muốn. Kiểm tra "Tùy chọn" trong suốt bài học của bạn!
- Sửa lỗi - chúng tôi đang liên tục làm việc để cải thiện hiệu suất của BeeSpeaker.
- Từ điển - tất cả từ và cụm từ từ các bài học được tổng hợp ở một nơi dễ tiếp cận.
reviews: Zatím výborné | Super aplikace, jen skoda, ze je opět placená. Ročně .. | I love to learn English | very good！ | po prvním vyzkoušení skvělé. | Skvělá konverzační appka. | Skvela app, jednoducha a vse funguje jak ma. | Jsem spokojen | penize..vsechno je za prnize! bez penez se tady nic nenaucis..lepsi je duolingo

title: Babbel - Language Learning
description:
Millions of people learn languages with Babbel — the language app built by language experts. Why Babbel? Our short and effective language courses get you speaking with confidence.

BABBEL WORKS:

• 92% of Babbel users improved their proficiency in just two months*

• After 10 hours with Babbel, Michigan State University researchers found:
96% of learners saw better test scores on grammar and vocabulary
73% of study participants became better speakers**

====================

Our language experts build every language course tailored to your native language. This way you learn Spanish and 13 more languages quickly and effectively.

TRY BABBEL – DOWNLOAD THE APP AND TAKE A FREE LESSON

====================

LEARN 14 LANGUAGES:

Spanish, French, Italian, German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, Indonesian, and English

====================

Why learn languages with the Babbel language app?

SHORT, EFFECTIVE LESSONS
Easy to fit language lessons into your day

LESSONS FOR EVERY SITUATION
For travel, work, and more

LISTEN, SPEAK, WRITE
Well-rounded language practise

PERFECT YOUR PRONUNCIATION
Sophisticated speech-recognition technology

RETAIN WHAT YOU LEARN
Review feature that’s optimised to help you retain knowledge

LEARN GRAMMAR IN CONTEXT
Useful tips & tricks as you learn

OVER 5,000 LANGUAGE COURSES
Learn Spanish and 13 other languages with in-depth content, including more than 60,000 language lessons

OFFLINE MODE
Download lessons and learn anywhere

====================

Read Babbel Magazine to get tips, tricks, and interesting facts about how to learn languages:
* Babbel Magazine: https://www.babbel.com/en/magazine

Follow us on social media for tips on language learning!
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/babbel/
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/babbel.languages/

====================

You will need a subscription in order to get access to the full learning materials for one language. Each subscription will be automatically renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24-hour period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your iTunes Account Settings. When a subscription is cancelled, access to the app’s courses and features will expire at the end of the current payment period.

You'll get access to all courses for the following durations:

3 months
6 months
12 months

Privacy policy: https://about.babbel.com/en/privacy/
Terms of use: https://about.babbel.com/en/terms/

CONTACT US:

Ideas, comments, or feedback? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com


*Vesselinov, R. and Grego, J. The Babbel Efficacy Study. New York 2016

**Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Loewen, S., Isbell (both Michigan State University) & Sporn. Z (Babbel), 2018. “Learning Spanish with Babbel: Oral Proficiency Outcome in App-Based Foreign Language Learning”.
releaseNotes:
You learn from us, and we learn from you. We take your feedback seriously and never stop trying to improve our app. And you know what, we've just released the latest version. Fewer bugs, and more upgrades to your favourite courses!

Questions? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com
reviews:
I use for learning german language. I appreciate especially grammar exercises that are better prepared than for example in Duolingo. I am missing english learning from english - it is not possible. You have to speak different language to have option to learn english. However choice of other languages is limited. | Chybí podpora češtiny, nepoužitelne, lepší duolingo nebo jina konkurence | Platím si druhým rokem včetně neomezenych Live lekcí a díky tomu je progress při učení skutečně slušný. | Aplikace v plné verzi funguje spolehlivě a má krásný design. Společně s Duolingem velmi uživatelsky přívětivé aplikace na podporu učení cizích jazyků. | Je to asi nejlepší aplikace na výuku jazyků, kterou znám. Tady jen neopakuji slovíčka, ale opravdu se učím pracovat na gramatice a celkovém proniknutí do jazyka. Líbí se mi, jak si tvůrci vyhráli s namluvením rozhovorů, je to zábavné. Nevýhodou je platba za každý jazyk zvlášť,ale pokud se člověk rozhodne dělat pořádně jeden jazyk, je toto skvělá volba. | Після години використання iphone xs гріється так ніби я граю в pubg і додаток починає сильно глючити | I speak Czech, I want to learn English. I can’t even get through the initial setup | Občas padá, chtělo by to víc podcastů k poslechu. Jinak se mi líbí oddělené běžné lekce a lekce gramatiky, koncepce opakování - škoda, že se tam nedají ondividuálně přidat oblíbené věty z rozhovorů, které opravdu působí přirozeně a užitečně. Super aplikace. | I like my studying with babbel with this app. It's pretty well designed and easy to use. Just one thing I would like to see in newer versions: ways to report mistakes in lessons (doesn't happen often but spotted one at least once in the German course). | Good app! Miles better than its more well known competitor. There are two issues however: it is not possible to use writing with German without German keyboard. I'm not going to install it and I'd prefer the option to have reviews and stuff ignore umlauts and accept double S for gross S. Also it doesn't seem possible to configure I only ever wanna use writing in reviews. I have to select it every time. I use the app on the go without headphones and I'm not going to be listening to my phone aloud nor talking to out while out and about.

Update: The Babbel support is not very good. Downgraded the review to 3 stars not 4. | Excelente! Muchas gracias “nach” Berlin ☀️👍 | En lo personal, si eres una persona dedicada, luego de varias semanas de haber comenzando con la lengua italiana, comencé ya a estructurar oraciones con los verbos aprendidos y a mejorar mi fluidez. Definitivamente para comenzar la plataforma es recomendable. | If you look to learn Russian beyond A1, this is not the app you are looking for. | I enjoy getting back to learning foreign languages many years after my last attempt. It's not meant for linguists, but for an early start of speaking without being unconfident shy or whatever. Some essential simple grammar lightly infiltrates basic conversational topics. The course is far from being steep. Cons: * AFAIK no possibility not to start from scratch. * I miss Japanese. * My doughter would be glad to use Babbel to learn English based on Czech language, but it's not available (yet?). | The content is great but the app is wonky. Cant get iPad widget to work. | I learn Danish and I love it, the coversations (listening) and explanation of Danish lifestyle and tradition. I wish Babbel expand to Hebrew too! Are you planning to add Hebrew? Please consider it! | it’s very easy to use and it helps me to learn GER 👍 | very quick, efficient, funny, perfect graphics | When I do review with speaking it very often very poorly  recognizes my speaking, for Spanish. You can say whole sentence 5 times and always recognizes some nonsense words. But what is absolutely nonsense is that after you pres next it does no play the correct pronaunciation at all! Why it plays correct when you speak it correct and does no show you correct when you have troubles to say it!? | when you choose a language, it doesen't even ask you what your level is, you just start from the most basics and you need to go through it to unlock other lessons. if you dont pay, you can only play one lesson in which you learn how to say hello, please, good bye and yes. then you have to pay. its funny because even google translator teaches you more than this funny application that only cares about money. it would make a better sense if you put ads and by this way got the money, but forcing people who are trying to learn a language to pay right from the start is weird. | Everything works rather well, even the sync. Only problem I can’t get trough is the mic part. It’s absolutely random or too sensitive to for the sentence phonology. | The lessons are awesome. However after each exercise there is a lot of waiting till you get to a next slide. It makes it a little bit boring. But still worth it. | 3* - I am seriously missing this feature. When learning new words and expressions in Babbel, I want to add these to my note taking app open another window, having both apps side-by-side. Please implement it as soon as possible. I believe many iPad users will find it beneficial and practical. Thank you | I am happy with the language courses and options to learn. 

But please, make the in app keyboard more responsive like the iOS keyboard. It’s insanely slow and inaccurate when writing and it just drives me crazy to rewrite half of my inputs | I have been using the app for French for a while. At the beginning just the app (started from very basics), now (last 3 months) as a supplement for the official French course I am attending at language institute (A2). 

I am trying to do one lesson a day (10 min tops) in the app and I can say it follows the learning plan of my official course. I have got a bit ahead with a grammar in it ( the app explains it really well), so now I am basically reviewing stuff on class, which really helps me to build the knowledge fast. | Why the Review option is not available all the time? I wold like to review what I learned as much as I need before moving to the next lesson. Now I have to either repeat the whole lesson or just listen to all of the words one by one. It is very inconvenient. | This is a really good app, I tried to learn to speak italian. I remebered the first four words very quickly - but I cannot learn more - it needs to be upgraded to premium. I liked this app, but I don’t think it is worth so much money. | Please atd czech language. App is great but for Czech peoples is unusable. Thank you | I wrote once a word that the French guys are talking too quickly and I have the feeling that you slowdowned the Spanish ones :-)))) which we’re totally fine! I wish that the FRENCH speakers would talk way more clearly!!! Especially for the beginner like me is really difficult to catch the words they are saying even with listening again :-( 

But still very satisfied and happy to learn two nice languages, keep improving! | Die Lektionen sind zwar gut aufgebaut, jedoch fehlen mehr Übungen, um die wörte und Gramatik zu einprägen. | Hi, could you please add Japanese? I like the app and would like to try it, but I want to learn only Japanese. Thanks :) | Great app! I really like the way it teaches! It touches all the learning ways - through listening, writing, hearing and translating. Chapeau! | This app is great example of pure stupidity. I wanted to improve my english but you can ´t choose English as a language you wanted to learn........... 
Please use common sense or don ´t release unfinished apps. | I wanna practice my english but I cant chose to have this app in English language too. Could u do something with that? | Please add Czech. I want learn english but im from czech republic | A nicely done app, with useful vocabulary and varied exercises, a great tool for learning a little bit every day! | Great UI, the best way for language self learning. | This is really a 21st century way of learning languages. | Pro čecha, který si chce zlepšit angličtinu, nepoužitelné. Češtinu v této aplikaci nehledejte. | I was going to Brazil, so I paid for subscription for three months, My Phone get stollen and I forgot about it. They charged my several times before I noticed. No email, no thanks for paying. It's quite a trap so be careful about it !!! | I am learning German on this app an so far I like it. I would change order of some lessons but I general great. It learns you how to write, speak (improvement needed here as well, but this is issues for all apps that are using the same thing). Love it, affordable and recommend it! 4* from me since improvements are always welcome | The continue button after each part doesn't appear and it is not a possible finish a lesson.

Wasted money... | I just installed it. It is simple to learn basic words and grammar rules, however, I will see how it could explain more complicated grammar.

title: Busuu: Language Learning
description:
Busuu helps you communicate with confidence from day one. Combine expertly designed language lessons with feedback and tips from our global community of native speakers and harness the power of learning together. 

Looking for the best way to learn a new language on your phone? You’ve just discovered it, with Busuu, a Chegg service – we’re the app that makes learning new languages easier, more fun and more effective for all.

Whether you’re learning to get confident having new conversations, for a higher grade, a career boost, or for mind-blowing travel experiences, Busuu’s got your back.

We’re already helping millions of people overcome their learning struggles, from lack of time and motivation to problems with grammar and vocab. We help our learners achieve their goals, one milestone at a time – and we want to do the same for you.

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW FOR FREE LANGUAGE LEARNING

================

How are we doing this? We’re glad you asked. Whether you’re learning on your iPad or iPhone, Busuu helps you…

– Learn up to 14 languages
That’s right, 14! We’ve got complete courses in English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese (Brazilian), Polish, Russian, Arabic, Dutch or Turkish with Busuu. 

– Master languages with real people
You want to learn the relevant language, right? You’re in luck: we’ll connect you with our community of native speakers so you can get localised language knowledge and support. Feel even better when you help other learners in return.

– Learn from the experts
Busuu’s online courses are created by our ingenious language experts. Learn step-by-step with bite-sized lessons, plenty of practise and lots of opportunities to test your progress.

– Say hello to useful language skills
Learn the language that will really take you places! With regularly updated content, video flashcards featuring real people and useful cultural tips, you’ll be fully immersed in no time. 

– Kiss goodbye to stressful timetabling
We’re serious. We organise your learning time for you with a personalised Study Plan. Simply tell us when you want to study and for how long, and we’ll send you notifications to keep you on track.

– Revise with ease
There’ll be no forgetting on our watch. Smart Review cleverly saves all the grammar and vocab you learn in lessons and stores them in one handy place, so you can make those tricky words and rules stick.

– Show off achievements with official certificates
With our Busuu language certificates, you’ll have actual proof of your language capabilities.

– Access specialised courses for language lovers
You’ve learned the basics, and now you’re hungry for more. Learn about manga, advance your pronunciation or add travel-specific phrases to your skillset, plus much more. 

================

DON’T JUST TAKE OUR WORD FOR IT.
See what others have to say about Busuu:

● EDITOR RATING: EXCELLENT - PC MAG
● Named 'Best Buy' language learning app by the Independent in 2021
● Language Learning App of the Year at the EdTech Breakthrough Awards 2020 


================

PLEASE NOTE
A lot of the features are free, but you will need a subscription in order to get access to all features of this app. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current payment period. Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24-hour period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your Account Settings.
You can manage your subscriptions through your Account Settings after purchase.
Privacy policy: https://www.busuu.com/en/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.busuu.com/en/terms/
releaseNotes: Improved learning experience. New content. Bug fixes. Our experts have been working hard to make learning languages with Busuu easy and effective.
reviews:
Best app for Korean and French lesson | Good for training and learning English | <3 | . | I'm learning Spanish and French. It's very good٫ but there is too many ads before lessons. The Bussu premium pass cost lot of money٫ so I don't want it. I think I understand people ho speak Soanish or French٫ so I think this app is good. | I like it a lot | Great app, for learning languages the best I’ve ever had. | It’s really helpful | I find it very useful as it explains everything perfectly. Impossibly not to understand.
The only con is that if you don’t want to be bothered by optional videos in order to open the next section, you need to pay monthly fees, which are affordable, but more free exercises would be better. Overall thanks. | Supr Appka na učení jazyků. Učila jsem se německy před tím než jsem odjela na půl roku do Německa pracovně. Zkoušela jsem víc aplikací/ kurzů a nic lepšího jsem nenašla. Velmi doporučuji | Super aplikace na procvičení angličtiny. Krátká videa v angličtině a pak cvičení. Možnost zdarma. Super. | Very good to learn English for me! | Love it | the only spanish leading app i will never pay and not regret it! | Engaging learning in correct level. The app I didn’t hesitate to pay subscription. Worth the investment. | Jsem moc spokojena. 
Učím se anglicky na úrovni b2 a začala jsem s holandstinou. Je to snadné i pro úplného zacatecnika, stejne tak motivující pro pokročilého. | Super | It´s a very good educational app. It has a few little bugs, but when you want to learn some of main languages, it is a way better than Duolingo. | Jsem moc spokojená,takhle appka je mnohem lepší, než konkurenční Duolingo.. | Systém učení Busuu mně velmi vyhovuje, za rok jsem se naučil obstojně rozumět německy a domluvit se na dovolené. | I love the platform and the user friendly experience. C’est magnifique. I got no complaining on how they teach the languages they offer. | This app is very complex, I enjoy learnng with this. | Perfect app for everyday learning English! 🤩👍🏻 | That’s the perfect app for repeating some usual phrases and catching up new ones. I like it! | First of all I have to say I only use the free version.
There are many pluses - native speakers in the whole course, grammar lessons (very useful!), listening and reading exercises, native people can correct your speaking/writing. 
But- I don’t feel like I remember a lot of words from it, which is kinda crucial in language-learning app:). I believe that’s because of the free version, there’s no repetition and therefore I see a new word once and then I forget it. There is some feature to train words but it’s really weird and seems very random to me.
I wouldn’t use it for studying as a primary app.
Could be worse, but could be better too though. | App is very helpful and great fun but their paid version ad annoying. | help me with my English, huge vocabulary + phrases + explanation. I recommend you try this app | I’ve used every app under the sun, and also as an English teacher I was surprised by how good Busuu is. I feel like I have actually improved my German in one week just by making sense of what I had seen but not completely understood before. Such a great choice! | This app is really good | Super aplikace | S aplikací jsem spokojená - jak po technické stránce tak i obsahové. Lze použít i bezplatně, pak ale nejsou k dispozici cvičení v lekcích. Zároveň oceňuji i komunikaci uživatelské podpory.
V porovnání s Duolingo jsou lekce delší, ale lépe vysvětlují gramatiku, super jsou konverzace zahrnuté do lekcí. | Dobré až na ty reklamy. Protože když se učím jazyk tak mě to hrozně vyrušuje a nemohu se soustředit | This is just so awesome, its mixture of Duolingo- teaches writing system very nicely, but doesnt learn you any theory, and Drops- teaches words, but you can practise only for 5 minutes, then you need to wait 12 hours or pay

Thanks for keeping it free. | There is significant issue after the latest update. Voice record exercises do not work on iPhone 12 after the latest update. | My husband and I have been learning French to work in Switzerland. We absolutely love how all vocab is super high yield and natives correct your work! We have been getting premium version for 2 years now (and almost done with B2) and I can say, it’s worth every penny!!!! | Really | Naučím se s ní mnohem více gramatiky než ve škole a ještě mě to baví ;) | Great app for learning languages. | I am learning Japanese and German and its helping a lot :) | Skvělá app | It is great app | Very popular application, but there is no Ukrainian language. | Your enero can be corrected by natives and you can correct others in your mother tongue as well. I really love this community, you feel welcomed and it encourages you to keep going 💪🏼. 

PS: I have the free version and I would love to pay for more features | Die beste App, die hab ich gefunden. Es geht um die einzige App, wo kann ich direkt ins Niveau C1 springen und muss nicht mit dem Lernen  der Grundlagen wieder Zeit verlieren.   Und was kann ich empfehlen? Man soll die neue Wörter notieren und dann wiederholen, um die beste Ergebnisse zu erreichen. 

Best app for language learning, especially for intermediate or even C1 students. Thank you,  really great job! ❤️ | Wortho od that money! | I find it really useful. It is easy to practice every day by yourself through quizzes and you can also get in touch with teachers for private lessons. Those I haven’t tried yet but I’m planning to. | iPhone app have lot of bugs, and after 6 moths no big change or update. I can’t help
Others with correction. Setting study's plan doesn’t work as well. Some lessons are boring, meaning topic of lesson. From my point of view whole system of revision must be smarter and more focused for continuous learning key elements of English. Honestly the concept in general is good, but needs improvement to be best. If this improvement won’t come, I probably will not buy subscription next time any more. BR Jan | If you don’t mind paying subscription, this is much better option than Duolingo. I don’t feel tricked into learning by cheap addictive tricks. Just set my study plan, but learn at my own pace. Also grammar lessons and corrections by peers are great. | I cancelled all subscriptions still they charged me automatically again Awoid problems and don’t install it . | Интересное и полезное приложение !

title: Fischer
description: Stáhněte si svého osobního průvodce na dovolenou a mějte všechny potřebné informace o vašem zájezdu v kapse. Informace o vašem letu, zakoupených službách, kontakt na delegáta nebo třeba i to, v kolik hodin se otvírá večerní bar tak budete mít vždy po ruce. Objevujte nové aktivity a navštivte zajímavá místa, která si během dovolené nesmíte nechat ujít.
releaseNotes: Změnili jsme odpočet času do začátku dovolené a vylepšili další funkce na základě zpětné vazby od uživatelů.
reviews:
Jsme tady moc spokojení. Pokud bychom chtěli jet znovu do Egypta, zvolíme zase Fischer a hotel Hilton. | Litam s vami casto, poznala jsem vic mist i delegatu a vyuzila i vylety . Ti hosi jsou moc fajn , snazivi, ochotni . A to se tyka egypta . V recku diametralne odlisny pristup !! Mozna je to k zamysleni. Zajezdy radeji kupuji pres linku fischer nebot damy v pevnych obchodech ( nevim pric ) jsou mene ochotne, vstricne - proste je zrejme zdrzujeme ) 
Tot vse diky anitram
Anitramm | Super aplikace úžasně jednoduchá a chytrá :-) | První den v Melia | Aplikace ušetří spoustu času s hledáním důležitých informací o dovolené v e-mailech a na webu. Kdykoliv jsem se mohla velmi jednoduše a rychle podívat, v kolik hodin odlétá letadlo nebo třeba v kolik se otvírá bar na pláži nebo restaurace. Taky jsme vyzkoušeli tipy na zajímavá místa v okolí a moc oceňuji, že jsou i s mapkou, takže jsme na některá došli i pěšky. Příští rok beru appku určitě opět s námi. 👍👍 | Hezky zpracovaná aplikace, kde vidím jak letový řád,hotel či například kdy doplatit zájezd,který mám zakoupen…bonus je popis hotelu a veškeré info o destinaci, kde letím :-)

title: Leo Express
description:
All tickets in your pocket. And much more.

The Leo Express app lets you easily manage your tickets. In addition, you can find out about any changes on your route. So what are you waiting for? Download and travel for experiences right now!

* TICKETS FULLY UNDER CONTROL
You can make an order fast and easily. You can see all your travels and cancel the tickets without any problems.

* INFORMATION ABOUT YOUR JOURNEY
Is your connection delayed? You will find out immediately with our app.

* TICKETS OVERVIEW
All your tickets together. You have a full overview of when, where and for how much you traveled or will travel.

* INTEGRATED SMILE CLUB
Sign up to the Smile Club and enjoy our app to the fullest. You collect kilometers for every ride for which you will get a discount on next tickets. That makes traveling even more fun!

* BENEFITS OF LEO CREDITS
Recharge your leo credits and pay simply anywhere, anytime. When you cancel your ticket, you will get its full value back in leo credits.

Did we forget about something? Send us your comments and suggestions and help us improve the Leo Express app. Send your ideas via the app or via the email address app@leoexpress.com.
releaseNotes: → Live Activities for iOS systems
reviews:
Naprostá spokojenost :-) 
Milá, ochotná a příjemná obsluha. | Dnes se mi s vámi opět dobře cestovalo. Milá stevardka Nikola byla po celou dobu usměvavá a malé zpožděni cestu nijak neovlivnilo. | děkuji | If you travel with Leo Express it’s a must. If you don’t travel wit Leo express you should start. Good app, very nice travelling program with cash back option. 

And GIFs and tiny jokes from now and then are nice detail! | Při koupi jízdenky přes aplikaci a její storno se peníze nevrací, pouze "Leo kredity". Na to jsem nebyl nedostatecne nebo nijak upozorněn a tak to považuji za sprostý podvod. O tom, že mám nějaké kredity na účtu jsem se přitom dozvěděl jen náhodou, když jsem si na palubě něco koupil a obsluha po mě nechtěla zaplatit a já zapatral proč. Nebýt téhle náhody, tak mi peníze pravděpodobně za nějakou dobu propadnou.. | There is no option how to import already bought tickets into the app. | Velmi ochotná obsluha, aplikace na velmi dobré úrovni a skvělé propojení s věrnostním klubem, který přináší slevy na občerstvení v podobě připsaní Leo kreditů na osobní účet. Cestování s Leo a používání aplikace mohu jen doporučit. | Bylo by možné opravit chybu, že spoj nejde uložit jinam než do Apple kalendáře?
Nejen, že kalendář musí být povolen, ale i nastaven jako výchozí.

title: MAPS.ME: Offline Maps, GPS Nav
description:
Fast, detailed and entirely offline maps with turn-by-turn navigation – trusted by over 140 million travelers worldwide.

OFFLINE MAPS
Save mobile data; no internet is required.

NAVIGATION
Use driving, walking and cycle navigation anywhere in the world.

TRAVEL GUIDES
Save you time planning the trip and never miss an interesting place with our ready-made travel guides. We've partnered with the best travel content creators to build travel guide catalog for hunderds of destinations around the world. Whether you prefer city travel, car trips or outdoor activities you will find a great choice of guides for a perfect journey.

INCREDIBLY DETAILED
Directions to points of interest (POIs), hiking trails and places missing from other maps.

UP-TO-DATE
Maps are updated by millions of OpenStreetMap contributors daily. OSM is an open-source alternative to Google Maps and Apple Maps.

FAST AND RELIABLE
Offline search, GPS navigation along with optimized maps to effectively save memory space.

BOOKMARKS
Save locations you love and share them with your friends.

AVAILABLE WORLDWIDE
Essential for home and travel.

MAPS.ME is free to download and use. 

AND MORE!
– Search through different categories, e.g. restaurants, cafes, tourist attractions, hotels, ATMs and public transport (metro, bus, etc).
– Make hotel bookings via Booking.com directly from the app.
– Share your location via text message or social media.
– When cycling or walking, the app shows whether the way is uphill or downhill.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
If you have any questions, visit our Help Center: support.maps.me.
If you are unable to find the answer to your question, contact us at: ios@maps.me.
Follow us on FB: http://www.facebook.com/mapswithme | Twitter: @MAPS_ME

Privacy Policy: https://maps.me/policy/
Terms of Use: https://maps.me/terms/
releaseNotes:
This new version brings:

- The new Hub section features the best offers and discounts for travelers
- Up-to-date  traffic alerts on road events
- Brand new Bookmarks section design
- Brand new Search section design
- Updated Object card design with the ability to add your review

title: Lufthansa
description:
Book flights, reserve seats and manage your boarding passes – the Lufthansa app offers you all this and much more. The Lufthansa app: your mobile travel companion for smooth and seamless journeys with Lufthansa Group Network Airlines.
With push notifications and real-time flight information, relevant flight status updates and offers will be sent directly to your smartphone. This way you’ll be up to speed throughout your entire flight.
The Lufthansa app keeps you informed during your journey, from the moment you book your flight to when you arrive and even after you have landed, ensuring everything runs as smoothly as possible. With your personal profile, you can conveniently manage your data and personalized services.
In short: With the Lufthansa app, you’re well taken care of during your travels.
The key features of the Lufthansa app:

Before the flight
•	Book flights, reserve seats and add baggage: Book your desired flight and rent a car if you need to. You can also reserve or change your seat and add extra baggage.

•	Online check-in: Use the Lufthansa app to check in for all flights operated by Lufthansa Group Network Airlines. You will receive your digital flight ticket on your smartphone and can conveniently access your mobile boarding pass from the app.
•	Travel ID and Lufthansa Miles and More: With the new digital wallet, you can store multiple payment methods in your Travel ID account, allowing for seamless and easy payment any time and from anywhere. Use your Travel ID or Lufthansa Miles & More login for personalized services. For a greater level of convenience, you can save your personal information in the Lufthansa app.
•	Real-time information and flight status: Your personal travel assistant provides you with important flight details and updates about your trip starting 24 hours before your flight departure. You’ll receive push notifications for check-in and the flight status and any gate changes will be displayed clearly on your home screen. This way you are able to keep track of your flights and prepare for them accordingly so you can start your trip feeling as relaxed as possible.
During the flight
•	Flight ticket and onboard services: With the Lufthansa app, you always have your mobile boarding pass and onboard services at your fingertips – even when you’re offline. Access all relevant flight information as needed and always stay informed about any changes, without having to ask the flight crew.
After the flight
•	Track baggage: Your digital travel companion is still there to support you even after you’ve landed. Conveniently track your checked-in baggage in the smartphone app and stay informed about the next parts of your journey.
The Lufthansa app is the complete solution for a smooth travel experience. Conveniently book your flights and rental cars via the app, receive automatic notifications and updates about upcoming flights, and manage your personal data conveniently on the go.
Download the Lufthansa app now and enjoy your trip! Your personal travel assistant is there for you before, during and after your flight.
Find out about our flight offers at lufthansa.com and follow us on Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and X to stay up to date with the latest news.
If you have any questions or need support, please do not hesitate to contact us. You can get in touch with us at lufthansa.com/xx/en/help-and-contact.
releaseNotes: Minor bug fixes and improvements

title: Zelená karta
description:
Nechat se zastavit policií může být stresující. V ten moment nechcete obtížně hledat zelenou kartu v přihrádkách, nebo ještě hůř, dostat pokutu za to, že nejste schopní předložit doklad o pojištění. Řešením je mít k dispozici důkaz o povinném ručení přímo v telefonu. V Čechách je nyní možné při silniční kontrole předložit zelenou kartu v elektronické podobě na displeji mobilního telefonu.

Jak na to?
- Jednoduše v aplikaci vyfoťte zelenou kartu od svého vozu,
- zadejte datum její expirace,
- trefně ji pojmenujte, ať se v tom vyznáte.

Aplikace Zelená karta vám dá vědět, až se bude datum expirace blížit a připomene vám nahrát si novou. 

Řídíte více vozů? Není problém! Nahrajte si zelené karty od každého z nich a mějte je vždy po ruce.

Tak šťastnou cestu! :)
releaseNotes:
- Průvodce nehodou: Teď můžete snadno zaznamenat informace o dopravní nehodě přímo prostřednictvím naší aplikace. Stačí pár jednoduchých kroků a budete mít všechny potřebné informace na jednom místě.
- Fotografická dokumentace: K nové funkci průvodce nehodou jsme přidali možnost fotografování škod. Už nemusíte složitě popisovat škodu, stačí pár kliknutí a fotografie bude součástí vašeho záznamu.
- Odesílání reportů přímo na email účastníků: Po zaznamenání a zdokumentování nehody můžete rychle a snadno odeslat kompletní report všem relevantním stranám. Stačí vyplnit emailové adresy a report je na cestě.

Mám přehled o všech autech. Ještě by bylo vhodné doplnit výměny olejů. | 1🥇👍 | Aplikace dělá to co má a dělá to perfektně. Dík za to | Skvělý nápad pro správu vícero vozů. Uvítala bych, když by stejně jako zelená karta šel přidat i malý (případně i velký) TP. Malý jsem si tam dopasovala přidáním druhé zelené karty. 
Taky by se hodila viditelná kolonka pro VIN, když jdete pro díly, tak se to hodí. 
Skvělá věc! Ještě aspoň tyhle dvě položky přidat a naprosto geniální. Díky | U iPhone 8 tlačítko pro spuštění uvidíte jen když v nastavení zmenšíte text. Jinak je tlačítko mimo displej. | Aplikace zdá se funguje velice dobře bohužel si myslím že je zbytečné aby byla ještě další aplikace techničák který najde jenom podle čísla technického průkazu všechna data určitě bych aplikace propojil abych mohl mít v jedné aplikaci všechny informace o mém vozidle tzn. zelenou kartu osvědčení o registraci vozidla dálniční, Dálniční známku, STK, a určitě by se hodil i link do systému kde evidují všechny moje kontroly na servisu což vím že už existuje tak proč bych nemohl mít tyhle informace o tom kdy jsem měl auto servisované co přesně se tam servisováno kde se to servisováno a kolik to stálo tak to je vše. Držím palce s digitalizaci je to super i v téhle té podobě děkuji | Nemám co bych vytknul této aplikaci doporučuji těm co si nechtějí hlídat a pamatovat datumy | K dokonalosti chybí málo…

1. Možnost sdílení např. mezi členy rodiny
2. Možnost zapsat si VIN ke každému vozidlu
3. Propojit RZ (SPZ) s edalnice.cz a automaticky generovat platnost dálniční známky 

Ale i takto podařená appka 👍 | Dobrý den, s aplikací jsem spokojen, díky za ni. Neplánujete prosím doplnění termínu platnosti STK s upozorněním?
Děkuji. | Aplikace je docela dobra, alespon v porovnani s aplikacemi statni spravy, ale chybi mi moznost data sdilet (napr. s manzelku, nebo detmi). Erich | Velmi dobrá aplikace, pokud má člověk víc samohybů. K dokonalosti chybí sdílení databáze mezi více lidmi, např. členy domácnosti. | Vše je OK | Aplikace vypadá dobře, jednoduše, user-friendly.
Bez problémů jsem připojil dokumenty a informace k jednomu autu.
Bohužel, připojit zelenou kartu k druhému se již nepodařilo - soubor vyberu, chvíli se točí kolečko...a tím to skončí.

takže nic…😩 | Chybí možnost sdílení  celého vozidla se všemi informacemi s dalším řidičem. | Vše na jednom místě. | Naprosto geniální, mít vše pohromadě a přehledně v jedné aplikaci | Používal jsemjinou aplikaci která začala po dvou letech vykazovat chyby. Věřím ze tato aplikace mi vydrží déle Mám tu asi 35 vozidel a všechny podstatné informace. Jenom mne mrzí ze není možno propojit upozornění FO kalendáře 💁 | Po nahrání aplikace nejde otevřít | Nezvládá práci s daty. | Skvělá aplikace, abych nezapomněl kdy si obnovit pojištění nebo objednat na technickou 😉 | Dobře ty | Na iPhone SE2 po nainstalování je tlačítko PŘIDAT nedostupné (na displeji je ho jen kousek) - nedá se stisknout. Mám tam čtyři vozy ale vyskočí cca 10 připomínek protože ke každému autu mám více údajů než jen zelenou kartu TK, DZ. A nelze to vypnout. Když na to kliknu tak se to propadne do nějaké historie zpráv, ale tam nic není. Jestli to bude vyskakovat pořad tak vypnu oznámení a tím ztrácí aplikaci význam protože mě neupozorni na končící termíny. | Ještě bych uvítal, kdyby se u aplikace daly uchovat další informace, jako jsou tankovací nebo věrnostní karty, případně další poznámky. | Super aplikace, už nemusím řešit tiskárnu | Tomu říkám ZÁPLATA na pěkně velkou díru na trhu, v české legislativě i v českých mobilních aplikacích. title: LoungeKey
description:
Download the LoungeKey™ app today - the must-have travel companion for LoungeKey cardholders.
 
Register your account in the app with your payment card details to access a global network of airport lounges and experiences, including dining, spa and sleep pods in over 700 airports worldwide.
 
•Enjoy contactless entry with your Digital Card
 
•Stay up to date, check your current visit entitlement and history
 
•Search for lounges and experiences, and save your favourites
 
•Unlock more with access to additional Travel Services and benefits that elevate your travel journey
 
Enhance your airport experience with the LoungeKey app.
releaseNotes:
We regularly update the app to make it faster, safer and more engaging for you.
  
Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in this latest release:
  
 - Feature enhancements and bug fixes
reviews:
LoungeKey as a service is very good but the app deserves better care. Dark mode support si still missing and Apple Wallet support would be handy. | I cannot login. This app is total disaster! | After my bank replaced Mastercard with Visa I'm not able to activate new card. | Does not work properly | The app works as it should, however there are some features missing. It would be great to be able to save the LoungeKey card into Apple Wallet. Also I am missing the option to tie multiple cards (from different banks, to stack the free lounge passes) to the account. Could these be considered as new features? | The team who designed this should be sent to 12h Ryanair flight as punishment | A terrible log in system requires the one to create a new account when a new version is available, only to fail the account creation due to having the applicable card already registered with an account. This is after having been happy to have the app work for a few months after the very tedious and error ridden registration process mentioned by others. | Still no support for more cards from multiple providers 😟 Also no info on remaining free visits on the card. | Nejde změnit jazyk aplikace z Ukrajinstiny na cokoliv | Mají vnitřní preference pro vyšší třídu dle letenky a ve frekventovanem období se do salónku nelze dostat, upřednostňují bez ohledu na kartu Lounge key | Klientum ceske sporitelny nejde vymenit proslou kartu v systemu a nikdo nemi poradit. | Unable to register | They can’t show you just, if is or isn’t the longe where you want to go. You have to register, but if you want to register, you can’t put your country, because it doesn’t work. :/ | Worst login experience ever. After used my credentials it act like logged in, but they've forced me to create new account on top of it, but I was not able to use my original login name. I had to write card number three times and it took about half an hour to be able to use the app again. 
BTW if you have more key lounge supported payment cards, it's not possible to have more than one car per account  🤦‍♂️ | Nobody takes over accountability, when the the admission to the lounge is not granted due to “system” issues. | Asking myself for what purpose is this app made. It’s not helpful for me as Lounge Key services at all.
Plus, permanently refusing to verify my card…always responding “Oops! Something went wrong. Please again later.”

It’s very boring 😬 | Setting this up is really painful. They ask you for the same information multiple times, throw a bunch of marketing consents at you, bother you with filling your credit card number, that you used to register, again after log in. Give me a break. | it is not possible to verify my word elite mastercard.  application keeps losing connection, requires already entered data.  card registration requires all card authentication attributes, I'm concerned about security.  this does not seem like a premium service | I cannot verify my MC World Elite either in the app or on the website. I fill all the information and after I press Verify the response is: Your card number details are required. | I can not verify my credit card so the app is totally useless. Even if I try to verify my card on websites same error occurs. Useless service. I fill all card information and app response that they are not filled? WTF? | Totally useless app, support doesn't work at all. Even your own bank can't help you with this as it is a 3rd party app. As long as you have a credit card benefit. | Unable to authorize card | Hello 
I am trying to register my new card ( as old one is expiring ) but while registering I cannot find Czech Republic in country list . Actually there are like only around 25 countries in the list while you are registering your card . Can you fix the this asap . I dropped an email as well

Thanks | The app shows me some problem and tell me to try it later everytime I’m trying to registrate… | What is this app for, if I can’t see the remaining count of my free longe visits? That’s the only feature why I would use this app, and it’s missing. | App not working on my iPhone 12 Pro. Fields for username and password are locked (tapping on them does nothing), so I cannot enter my credentials.
Links for password reset and signing up work fine. | OK | Unable to create account | Velmi dobrá aplikace k získání informarmací, kde se nachází ten správný salónek. | Aplikace není v češtině :( | The application is not working. Just after you download it, there is a written that application need update. And of course no updated is available | QR code transfer to MyWallet is not working. 
And only an automatic answer after a long time, so no help from their support at all. | Nejde přidat do Apple Wallet, ackoliv to aplikace nabízí | I am not able to get my LoungeKey to Apple Wallet - Failed to retrieve pass data from server. Will there be possibility to have two payment / credit cards from different providers? | QR code transfer to MyWallet is not working | I am still getting unknown error when submitting name and card number | Zdlouhava a nesmyslná registrace vyžadující nejen cislo karty,ale i dalsi osobní údaje. Nedoporučuji

title: Royal Cooking: Kitchen Madness
description:
Enjoy cooking mania and fever, get ready to make food and open a restaurant or don't forget to work in a crazy kitchen! Are you ready for the madness of this crazy kitchen?

Do you love time management games? Or are you looking for a different food gameplay?
If so, this crazy kitchen is totally for you. You can be a creator of your own restaurant story and open a family style cafe or diner. Immerse yourself into the mania and fever of making food!

This restaurant game teaches you to make food & cook delicious burgers, good and great pizza and other popular street foods. Join this crazy kitchen with time management gameplay and simulation fun.

The Royal Cooking game is one of the most interesting restaurant games. Experience the fun of time management!

 FEATURES:
 - Enjoy gameplay, classic casual and time management games.
- Unlock advanced diaries, make food and become a star chef with mania and fever.
- Hundreds of fun levels: you need to cook good and great pizza, burgers, and sweet baked goods.
- Get combo streaks to earn big rewards.
- Upgrade your crazy kitchen equipment to become the star chef of mania and fever.
- Use powerful boosters to have more fun!

You can find the answers to many questions by contacting our in-game support team. The FAQ is available here: 
https://matryoshka.helpshift.com/hc/en/8-cookinglive/

Reach out to us regarding any questions or suggestions you have. We read all the messages!

Subscribe to our social media pages to stay up to date on the latest news and to get useful tips for the game: 
https://www.facebook.com/matryoshkagamescom

Sincerely, the Matryoshka Games team
releaseNotes:
Dive into a new restaurant!
- Master the art of cooking Peking duck, perfect the delicate Xiao Long Bao, and learn traditional tea service to enhance the dining experience. Take on new challenges and get rewards!
Don't lose your Prestige progress!
- Your progress stays with you forever. Come back and continue your quest for trophies right where you left off!
Enjoy a smoother gaming experience!
- Bugs fixed and game performance improved.

title: Qatar Airways
description:
Award-winning journeys, at your fingertips.

Book flights, manage your booking, check in and take full control of your journey with the Qatar Airways mobile app.



1. BOOK FLIGHTS

With the tap of a finger, find and book flights to enchanting destinations around the world. If you are undecided, you can hold your booking along with the guaranteed fare for up to 72 hours, for a minimum fee. Booking flights through our mobile app also streamlines the process, allowing you to enter your travel details by simply pointing your mobile phone camera at your passport.



2. COMPLEMENT YOUR JOURNEY 

Enhance your journey with an array of additional services. Through our mobile app, you can purchase extra baggage as well as book lounge access, meet and greet services, hotel stays and car rental. 

3. MANAGE YOUR BOOKING

Manage your booking conveniently through our mobile app, by adding your booking to “My Trips”. Once added, the app will help you keep track of every step throughout your journey. “My Trips” also allows you to seamlessly change your seat and meal preferences, modify your flight details and much more.



4. CHECK IN

Check in through our mobile app by simply pointing your mobile phone camera at your passport. Choose your seat, view/save your boarding pass and use the fast-bag-drop counters at the airport to check in your bags.



5. GET FLIGHT STATUS NOTIFICATIONS

Through our mobile app, you can request arrival and departure information on all Qatar Airways flights, and receive updated information on the status of your flight directly on your mobile phone, via SMS.



6. FIND EXCLUSIVE OFFERS

Through our mobile app, you can check our special fares for flying to the destinations you have longed to visit. You will always find the same fare available on the website at the time of search (and sometimes, you may even find reduced fares when booking through our mobile app).




7. MAKE THE MOST OF PRIVILEGE CLUB

Through our mobile app, Privilege Club members can easily view account details on their dashboard, use the My Calculator to check Avios and Qpoints that can be earned on flights, claim missing Avios on past flights, communicate with the Privilege Club member service centre, and much more.
releaseNotes:
We’ve made accessing the app a breeze. Stay logged in for longer and enjoy a smooth, uninterrupted experience to access all the features you love.
 
What’s more, you can now also book our meet and assist services or rent a car through ‘My Trips’ with a few simple taps.
 
We’d love to hear what you think about our mobile app. Share your thoughts by sending us an email at mobilepod@qatarairways.com.qa.
reviews:

All the time anwer is not valid password.
I try again diferend email, but the same again.

I will delete soon, because ist not function. | Not able to add my boarding pass to Apple Wallet. There's always an error. It works for the first person in the booking but not the other ones. | Cannot log in | Letecká společnost s nadstandardními službami!upřednostňuji ji!😊 | My favorite airline. | The worst airline i have dealt with.  Zero customer service.  We have been trying to change our name for 5 months because of the wedding, and after submitting all the documents, Qatar informed us that it is not possible.  GL with this company. | Trying to add my family members repeatedly, everytime some part of the process does not work properly, it consumed so much of my time, that I’m not sure if this worth | Canceled my flight let me 10 hours at layover with no hotel during night and didn’t get any compensation!!!! Never flying with qatar again!! | Not possible to add boarding pass to apple wallet :( | After last update cannot use without english keyboard, so useless | The app is very unstable, crashes often. Plus Qatar Airways is an airline that doesn't give a f uk about customers personal needs. Cannot recommend neither this app or the airlines itself. | Why you stop to support International keyboard on mobile devices?? iPhone 7 in my case??🙈 | Cannot login | Very poor application

- user interface is tragically outdated
- orientation difficult
- slow
- check flight status takes ages to load 
One of the worst application next to Air Asia | Can’t log in for some days...🤷🏻‍♀️ | Error | For 1 month I can not login to app.. | Very poor app. Never log in

title: Fotor - AI Headshot Generator
description:
Fotor is a powerful all-in-one photo editor app for everyone, including photo editing tools, design maker and photo collage maker. Powered by Artificial Intelligence technology, many tools of Fotor's photo editor can meet all your editing photo needs in seconds, such as One-Tap Enhance, AI Magic Remove, AI Retouch, AI Background Remove, AI Enlarger, Effects, Filters, Design Templates, Collages, Overlay, Colorize, AI Art Effects, Crop, HSL, Curve, Text and other features. 

[ONE-TAP ENHANCE]
With just one click, automatically adjust the light and tone, balance the light and dark changes, and quickly improve the image quality in no time. 

[REMOVE UNWANTED OBJECT]
With Fotor's magic eraser, quickly remove an image's unwanted objects, such as remove text, remove people, erase acne, erase building, and more. Our watermark remover is a good choice for better creation. Automatically remove watermark, and get perfect image in one click without losting image quality. 

[AI RETOUCH]
One click to have flawless skin, make it natural and delicate, create perfect makeup without effort. There are also beauty features of Fotor's photo editor such as Smoothing, Wrinkle Remover, Reshape, Clone, Red-eye Removal, Teeth Whitening, etc. retouch photo easily. 

[Remove Background & Photo Background Changer]
Try AI background remover to delete background or erase background from all kinds of images to get transparent background in one click. After remove bg, use fotor's photo background editor and photo background eraser to change background easily. Fotor's background remover also offers photo white background, blue background, background images, etc. You can change the photo to white background or any background you like by yourself instead of spending much money to hire white background studio shots.

[AI ENLARGER]
Use Fotor's photo enhancer to make blurry images clear instantly without quality loss. Whether it's portrait, photography, or products, Fotor's photo enhancer uses AI technology to analyze and transform your image into high-definition quickly.  Enhancing colors, reducing blur, increasing sharpness, removing haze, highlighting focus, and more photo enhancement. 

[PROFESSIONAL PHOTO EFFECTS]
With hundreds of professional filters and special-style effects, real analog film, retro filter, fresh, black and white filter, and other classic effects, easy to cope with all kinds of scenes and present various aesthetic styles.

[CREATIVE DESIGN TEMPLATES]
Various wallpaper, poster, Instagram post, Youtube video cover, card, logo, and more design templates, update weekly. Suitable for all graphic design occasions. 

[CLASSIC & POSTER COLLAGE]
Various collage templates, covering food, clothing, festivals, travel, and other scenes, easily make photos better.

[ART EFFECTS]
Turn ordinary photos into artwork with just a few taps. Based on a unique model algorithm and machine learning technique, quickly turn your photo into paintings by Van Gogh, Monet, Picasso, and other master artists, as well as the trendy art styles "cyberpunk".

[RICH IN ELEMENTS AND RESOURCES]
Stickers, frames, fonts, backgrounds, mosaics, stock photos, and massive elements resources. Provide more vitality for creativity and show the personal style.

The Fotor Pro subscription fee is charged monthly or yearly. The fees for the Fotor Pro plan are paid following purchase confirmation. The subscription will automatically renew on expiry unless the automatic renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the expiry of the current subscription period. Once the subscription is confirmed, your iTunes account will be charged according to the plan you chose. After purchase, you may go to the iTunes Settings to manage your subscription and turn the automatic renewal off. A canceled subscription becomes effective after one month.

https://www.fotor.com/service.html?f=iphoneapp&v=1

Privacy Policy:
https://www.fotor.com/privacy.html

title: Exim
description: Stáhněte si svého osobního průvodce na dovolenou a mějte všechny potřebné informace o vašem zájezdu v kapse. Informace o vašem letu, zakoupených službách, kontakt na delegáta nebo třeba i to, v kolik hodin se otvírá večerní bar tak budete mít vždy po ruce. Objevujte nové aktivity a navštivte zajímavá místa, která si během dovolené nesmíte nechat ujít.
releaseNotes: Změnili jsme odpočet času do začátku dovolené a vylepšili další funkce na základě zpětné vazby od uživatelů.
reviews: Mají tu výbornou kávu a vše tu je super | Neskutečně krásná dovolená. Byla jsem až překvapena. Určitě se tam chceme vrátit. Vše perfektní, jídlo, čistota, milý personál, bezvadná delegátka, nádherná zahrada a spousta krásných zážitků. Upřímně každému doporučuji. Helena😊 | Nádherné moře, skvělý výlet do Athén s českou průvodkyní. Moderně vybavený pokoj číslo 406. Strava chutná vždy se dalo vybrat. Velká spokojenost😊. Delegátka absolutně super.

title: Drops: Language Learning Games
description:
Join over 40 million people who use Drops for free language lessons. It’s fast, fun, and easy! Practice vocabulary in Spanish, Japanese, French, Korean, Chinese, German, English. Discover 50+ different new languages with Drops!

Learn new languages while playing games. You can become fluent, learn vocabulary and common phrases in English, German, French, Russian, and Italian. Set goals, unlock achievements, and get rewards!

• Become fluent in a foreign language with this language learning app
• Learn to read characters and scripts from different alphabets like Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Hebrew, Arabic, Russian, and Hindi 
• Custom illustrations for each vocabulary word makes it easy to remember
• From beginner to expert levels, grow your foreign language vocabulary
• A professionally curated vocabulary list with more than 3,000 words and phrases 
• Game-like language lessons that make language learning fun and effective
• Level up! Track your progress and get rewards
• Professional voice artists and sound design with correct dialect pronunciations
• Learn to speak languages like European Portuguese, Castilian Spanish, Korean, Japanese, Arabic, American English, British English, German, French, Russian, Italian, Mexican Spanish, Latin-American Spanish, Tagalog, Hebrew, Icelandic, Polish, Mandarin Chinese, Turkish, Cantonese Chinese, Dutch, Norwegian, Thai, Swedish, Vietnamese, Maori, Brazilian Portuguese, Farsi (Persian), Hungarian, Greek, Hindi, Danish, Samoan, Indonesian, Finnish, Serbian, Croatian, Esperanto, Estonian, Hawaiian, Ukrainian, Yoruba, Bosnian, Swahili, Igbo, Sanskrit and even Ainu!

"By focusing on visually appealing games and vocab, Drops aims to lower the barrier preventing users from exploring a new language and, ultimately, accessing the social and economic benefits knowing that language may provide." - TechCrunch

We are featured by CNET, Forbes, VentureBeat and many other places too!

Try Drops Premium with a 7 day free trial. Download the app to learn about different membership options, and register to learn all about exclusive discounts.

Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of Drops premium. Afterwards your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase. You can cancel your subscription anytime, and you won't be charged in the next billing cycle.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: http://languagedrops.com/privacypolicy.html
releaseNotes: We’ve made improvements to the Drops app! This update contains bug fixes and offers you a better play experience. Happy language learning!

title: Lyft
description:
Count on Lyft to take you where you need to go with safety first. Got an appointment? Need to pick up some groceries? We’ll match you with a driver, help you find the quickest bus route, or show you the nearest scooter — you’ll be on your way in minutes. If it gets you there, it’s on the app.

USING LYFT IS EASY
Choose your destination, find a ride in seconds, and pay directly in the app. It’s that simple.

CHOOSE HOW YOU RIDE
With Lyft, you’ve got options. Choose from a variety of different ways to travel, all available right from your app.* Whether you’re looking for an affordable ride, the most direct route, or a way to treat yourself – we’ve got the mode to suit your needs. 

* Lyft ride types may vary by region. Check the app to see what is available in your city.
—
Prices vary based on market condition.

By downloading the app, you agree to allow Lyft to collect your device's language settings.
releaseNotes: Thanks for using Lyft! We update our app regularly to make your rides even better. Every update of our Lyft app includes improvements in speed and reliability, as well as bug fixes and performance improvements. As new features are released, we’ll highlight those for you in the app.

title: Loopsie: AI Photo Generator
description:
We update new effects or presets every week!

Loopsie lets you create stunning photo edits with stickers, special effects, filters and theme presets! Our animation allows you to create 3D Photos, D3D Camera like videos and much more. All-in-one app without any professional equipment. Just a bit of creativity and your photos will come to life with a stunning cinematic effect!

Our motion photo effects make your short videos unique and let your content stand out from other photos and videos. Forget those old photo filters and photo editor, welcome our new breathtaking video loops.

— Popular Presets & Special Effects —
Anime, Legends, Vertigo, Motion blur
Butterfly, Neon, Sparkle, Cloud, Vapourware, vhs, Indie

— 3D Photo —
Add a new dimension to your photos.
You can use our integrated 3D camera or create a 3D photo starting from a normal photo.
You can choose between a vintage effect like a D3D camera, or a standard high quality 3D picture. Loopsie mimics many movement, from the classic 360 wiggle, to a vertical fast movement.

— Advanced Technologies —
Machine Learning Based Depth Prediction:
We built a Neural Network that accurately predicts the depth of every photo.

Augmented Reality Stickers:
Loopsie enriches the picture with 3D augmented reality stickers.

Advanced 3D Scene Reconstruction:
We developed a unique algorithm to fill the missing part of the 3D scene.

3D Segmentation:
The neural network we developed will segment the subjects from the scene for a more dimensional view.

— Subscription Information —
Subscribe to Loopsie Pro to unlock all the stickers, filters, effects and tools!

Subscription Plans:
Weekly, Monthly, Yearly or Unlimited Access

Payment & Cancellation:
Subscriptions are billed at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan. Alternatively a one-time payment plan is available to obtain “unlimited access”  (this is not a subscription). The subscription fee is charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
Subscriptions auto-renew at the cost of the chosen package, unless cancelled 24-hours in advance prior to the end of the current period.
You may manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

Free Trial Policy:
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

— Follow Us —
Instagram: @loopsieapp
TikTok: @loopsieapp

— User Feedback —
Developer e-mail: iOS.support@loopsie.it (Any feedback is appreciated!)

— Recruitment —
Loopsie is looking for creators to collaborate in our social media communities. If you’re interested to build Loopsie’s social presence together, feel free to contact us at info@loopsie.it
Thank you for your support!

Read more about our terms and conditions here:
https://bit.ly/2PWcXgi

Read more about our privacy policy here:
https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/8126812

title: Microsoft Translator
description:
Need to communicate with someone who uses a different language? Microsoft Translator is here to help you break through language barriers and connect with people from around the globe.

Microsoft Translator allows you  to translate text, speech, images, and group conversations in over 100 languages - for free. Whether you’re traveling and need help understanding a menu or navigating unfamiliar streets, or you’re trying to communicate with a colleague at work or school, Microsoft Translator has you covered. Download it now and see how it can help you break language barriers, stay on top of group conversations by navigating easily within transcripts via chapters.With an intuitive interface and real-time accurate translations, Microsoft Translator makes it easier to communicate with confidence. Plus, use features like chapters and transcripts to navigate within group conversations to stay on top of the conversation.

Don’t let language barriers hold you back. Download Microsoft Translator now and see how it can help you connect with people from different cultures and backgrounds. With support for over 100 languages (https://aka.ms/applanguages), you’ll be able to communicate with ease no matter where you are in the world.
releaseNotes:
This update includes the following:

- Copy only the translated text or both original and translated text.

- Bug fixes and general improvements.

Our latest update includes UX improvements and new features. Here is a quick rundown of what is new:
 
- Improved user experience: We have made a number of tweaks and adjustments to the app's interface to make it more intuitive, user-friendly, and easier to access microphone, camera, and text input controls.
 
- Different translation views: you will notice a panel of different views (split-screen, single or full-screen, history, and converse (multi-device conversation)) that is easy to access and switch between. The current view is saved as default view for the next time the app is relaunched.
 
- Split-screen view: with this feature, you can now have a 1:1 conversation with the other person viewing the translation on their side by flipping one half of the screen. You can adjust the height of original or translated text space in this view.
 
- Single or full-screen view: with this feature, you can view your original and translated text on a single screen.
 
- Turn on/off history: with this setting, you can choose to save history or turn off saving history. In the history view, you can delete all translations with a single tap.
 
- Languages: you can now swap source and target languages to let the app know which languages to translate from and to.
 
- Microphone customization: with this setting, you can keep the microphone always on which means it will identify the language as you speak. You can also turn it off which will require you to manually press the microphone whenever you speak.
 
- Auto-scroll translated text: with this setting, you can turn on/off the ability to auto-scroll translated text.
 
We hope you enjoy the update and welcome any feedback you may have.
  

Bug fixes and general improvements.

title: Splitwise
description:
Splitwise is the easiest way to share expenses with friends and family and stop stressing about “who owes who”. Millions of people around the world use Splitwise to organize group bills for households, trips, and more. Our mission is to reduce the stress and awkwardness that money places on our most important relationships.
 
Splitwise is great for:
- Roommates splitting rent and apartment bills
- Group trips around the world
- Splitting a vacation house for skiing or at the beach
- Weddings and bachelor/bachelorette parties
- Couples sharing relationship costs
- Friends and co-workers who go out to lunch or dinner together frequently
- Loans and IOUS between friends 
- And so much more
 
Splitwise is simple to use:
- Create groups or private friendships for any splitting situation
- Add expenses, IOUs, or informal debts in any currency, with support for offline entry
- Expenses are backed up online so everyone can log in, view their balances, and add expenses
- Keep track of who should pay next, or settle up by recording cash payments or using our integrations
 
We also have powerful features that can handle almost any money sharing situation. Here are some of our industry-leading features:
- Multi-platform support for smartphones and web
- Simplify debts into the easiest repayment plan
- Expense categorization
- Calculate group totals
- Export to CSV
- Comment directly on expenses
- Split expenses equally or unequally by percentages, shares, or exact amounts
- Add informal debts and IOUs
- Create bills that reccur monthly, weekly, yearly, fortnightly
- Add multiple payers on a single expense
- See total balances with a person across multiple groups and private expenses
- Custom user avatars
- Cover photos for groups 
- Activity feed and push notifications help you stay on top of changes
- View your edit history for changes to an expense
- Any deleted group or bill can be restored easily
- World-class customer support
- Pay back using our integrated payments: Venmo and PayPal (US only), Paytm (India only)
- 100+ currencies and growing
- 7+ supported languages

Endorsements:
“Makes it easy to split everything from your dinner bill to rent.” - NY Times
"Fundamental for tracking finances. As good as WhatsApp for containing awkwardness." – The Financial Times
“I never fight with roommates over bills because of this genius expense-splitting app”- Business Insider
“The Single Best App You Can Download for Group Trips of Any Kind” - Thrillist
“Life Changing! I don’t review many things, but this app has seriously improved my quality of life. It has saved my sanity when it comes to splitting utilities, mortgage, groceries, dog expenses...the list goes on. No more saving receipts, making spreadsheets, and manually calculating each month. So handy for group trips/weekends, too! THANK YOU!!” – Courtney via the App Store

We offer in-app purchases for “Splitwise Pro”, the benefits of which are described below. The subscription amount will be charged to your App Store account and will vary by plan and country. You’ll see the total price before completing your first payment. If you don’t choose to purchase “Splitwise Pro”, you can continue using Splitwise for free.

Premium Subscription Service “Splitwise Pro”:
1. Store high-resolution receipts in the cloud (10GB cloud storage)
2. OCR integration for scanning and itemizing receipts
3. Backups to JSON, downloadable from our website
4. Convert expenses to different currencies using our Open Exchange Rates integration
5. Access to “spending by category” budgeting tools and other charts
6. Search full expense history

“Splitwise Pro” subscriptions purchased in-app renew monthly or yearly depending on your plan. Plan pricing may vary by country. To avoid renewal, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before your subscription ends. You can turn off auto-renew at any time by visiting the App Store.

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: https://www.splitwise.com/terms
releaseNotes: Various fixes and improvements.

title: British Airways
description:
To Fly. To Serve.

The British Airways app makes booking, boarding and accessing everything about your flights easier than ever before. Personalised to you, the app gives you instant access to the information you need, when you need it.

Features:

- Personalised home screen
Your home screen is your personal gateway into the BA app. Themed around your next destination, it will give you easy access to important information surrounding your flight, including your mobile boarding pass.

You will also have quick access to flights you track, your most recent search and our best return fares to our most popular destinations.

- Book flights
Booking a flight with British Airways has never been easier. Browse our cheapest fares or quickly access your recent flight searches made from any device, and book a flight from over 130 countries.

- Manage your flights
Access and purchase upgrade offers from your phone, book seats in advance, add flights to your calendar or send them via email and get up-to-date arrival and departure times for all of your flights. Additionally, lounge users can access the British Airways Lounge Wi-Fi password.

- Apple Watch
The British Airways app on Apple Watch provides easy access to the most important flight information while you’re on the move. You can quickly view the flight number, route, departure time, flight status, a countdown to the departure time and the weather at your destination.

- Flight status and schedules
Search and track all British Airways flights for the latest arrival and departure times.

- Exclusive features for Executive Club Members
If you’re an Executive Club Member, you can check your Avios and Tier Points as well as view your full transaction history on your device. Optional enhanced services available for our Executive Club customers travelling with baggage to check in at the airport. Anyone can join the Executive Club for free on ba.com


- Siri Shortcuts
Add Siri Shortcuts to quickly check your next flight and Avios points

Please refer to the 'Application Licence Agreement', linked on this page, to view the terms of use of this application and use of mobile boarding passes. By downloading the BA application, you agree to the terms of the Application Licence Agreement.
British Airways Plc Web Site British Airways Support Application Licence Agreement.

title: Vueling Airlines-Cheap Flights
description:
Over 120 destinations await you on the Vueling app. Book cheap flights, choose the fare that best suits your trip and customise it with the most exclusive services.

BOOK YOUR FLIGHTS

Choose your destination and book flights at the best prices on your mobile app quickly and easily. Choose the fare that you prefer and book using your favourite payment method.

ONLINE CHECK-IN AND BOARDING PASSES

Check in online and forget about queueing at the airport. Download your boarding pass on your device, carry it with you at all times and check it whenever you want, even offline. We make your trip even more comfortable.

VUELING CLUB

Sign up for Vueling Club and collect Avios every time you book. The more Avios you collect, the more you'll save on your flights! And if you ever forget to collect Avios when you book, you can retrieve them on the app.

FLIGHT STATUS

Check the scheduled times, terminal and boarding gate for your next flight. All the information on arrivals, departures and possible incidents, just a click away.

MY BOOKINGS

Manage all your bookings easily. Add bags, choose your seat on the plane, change your flight, bring your flight forward... Everything you need at your fingertips.

FLEX PACK

Book our Flex Pack and enjoy more flexibility for your booking. If your plans change or something unexpected comes up, you can always choose the best solution for your trip: get the amount back as Flight Credit or change your flight at no extra cost.

Have we missed anything? Let us have your feedback and suggestions and help us improve so we can continue offering you new services and enhance your experience via the Vueling app.
releaseNotes: We are constantly testing our app to correct any possible errors and to optimise its performance. We hope you like the new version of the Vueling app. Thank you for your comments – they really help us to improve!

title: KLM - Book a flight
description:
Your journey with us starts when you open the KLM app.



With this pocket-sized travel assistant, you can book a ticket, customise your booking, check in and get real-time flight updates. Everything required for a smooth trip is at your fingertips!



BOOK A FLIGHT 
Select one of our many destinations and book your ticket. To save time on future bookings, add your contact information to your profile. Next time, we’ll pre-fill your details. 



MANAGE YOUR TRIP
View the pre-travel checklist and adjust your booking at any time until check-in. Lounge access or extra legroom? Enhance your travel experience yourself with just a few taps.


GET YOUR BOARDING PASS 
Travel with peace of mind – no need to print out your travel documents or wait in line at a check-in desk. Get your boarding pass directly in the app or add it to your Wallet. It’s so easy!



YOUR FLYING BLUE ACCOUNT
Check your Miles balance, book a reward ticket, modify your profile, or access your digital Flying Blue card in your personal dashboard.



STAY UP TO DATE
Turn on your notifications for real-time updates like gate changes and check-in times, and receive exclusive offers. Share your flight status to stay in touch with those on the ground. They’ll be happy to know you landed safely and sound.
