title: Norwegian Travel Assistant
description:
Manage your trip with Norwegian on the move! Book flights, add Fast Track and other extras, keep track of your travel plans and get important updates about your trip – everything in one handy app.



* You’ll have all your travel documents in one easy-to-access spot – both tickets and boarding passes are stored in one handy travel folder
* Book flights directly from the travel assistant
* Add and keep track of trips that haven’t been booked with your profile
* Check in on the go – convenient and quick
* Add Fast Track and skip the queues through security – handy when you’re running late or when you just feel like spending your time on other things than standing in line
* Travelling with more bags than expected? The travel assistant lets you add extra checked bags easily
* Add seat reservations to your flights and make sure you get your favourite seat
* Get push notifications with up-to-the-minute info about your flights
* Automatic login for faster access to your information and for booking flights
* Travel archive with your previous flights
* Check if flights are on time with our flight status overview 
* Offline access – your travel information’s always there when you need it
* Passbook support for your boarding passes when you’ve checked in online



Help us improve the app!
Got tips or suggestions on what we should improve or include in the travel assistant app? We’d be glad to hear from you. Contact us at travelassistant@norwegian.com

title: Vetus Maps
description:
Die Zeit vergeht, und die Landschaften ändern sich, es ist sehr schwierig, auf einem riesigen Feld ein uraltes Geisterdorf zu finden. Das schafft erhebliche Hindernisse für Lokalhistoriker und Liebhaber der Antike. Vetus Maps löst dieses Problem! Jetzt alle notwendigen Alte-Karten der Landkreise und Provinzen in Ihrem Smartphone. Die Anwendung ermöglicht es Ihnen, die alte Karte auf die entsprechnede moderne Karte zu übertragen.

Anwendungsmerkmale:

- Übertragung auf eine moderne Karte (Satellit, Hybrid, Gelände)
- Änderung der Transparenz der Karte
- Kartenkatalog zum Herunterladen
- Markierungen setzen
- GPS-Tracks aufzeichnen
- Suche nach Orten

Auf den alten Karten ist eine große Anzahl verschiedener Objekte angegeben, die man als wertvolle Datenquelle für die Toponymie verwenden kann, da viele Namen verloren gegangen sind - sie sind auf keiner topographischen topografischen Karte zu finden. Selbst in unserer heutigen Zeit, viele Jahre später, kann man mit Hilfe dieser Karten recht sicher durch die Landschaft navigieren.

Alte Karten sind immer offline verfügbar, für Satellitenkarten ist eine Internetverbindung erforderlich. Die Markerinstallation erfolgt durch langes Drücken auf die Karte

Premium Abonnement:
Mit dem Jahresabonnement erhalten Sie Zugang zu allen Karten zum kostenlosen Download und können auch Karten von Drittanbietern oder Ihre eigenen Karten mit Dropbox herunterladen. Die Zahlung für den ersten Abonnementzeitraum wird Ihrem iTunes-Konto bei Bestätigung des Kaufs belastet. Der Preis ist regional unterschiedlich und beträgt nun 14,99 € pro Jahr.

Ihr Abonnement wird automatisch jedes Jahr bzw. jeden Monat zum gültigen Abonnementpreis verrechnet, und dieser Betrag wird 24 Stunden vor Ende des Jahres-/Monats-Abonnements von Ihrem Konto abgehoben. Um Ihr Abonnement zu verwalten oder die automatische Verlängerung zu beenden, gehen Sie einfach zu Ihren Kontoeinstellungen und inaktivieren Sie die automatische Erneuerung mindestens 24 Stunden vor dem Verlängerungsdatum. Nach Berechnung der Jahres-Abonnements können keine Rückzahlungen mehr erfolgen. Jeglicher unverbrauchte Anteil der Probezeit verfällt bei Kauf eines Abonnements. Für weitere Informationen, sehen Sie bitte die Benutzungsbedingungen (http://www.vetusmaps.com/termsofuse.pdf) und die Datenschutzerklärung ein (http://www.vetusmaps.com/privacypolicy.pdf).

Die Aufnahme von GPS-Tracks läuft im Hintergrund. Die fortgesetzte Verwendung von GPS im Hintergrund kann die Akkulaufzeit Ihres Geräts erheblich verkürzen.

title: Yandex Go: Taxi Food Delivery
description:
Yandex Go is an app to request rides, order food from restaurants or send items across town. Request a ride or delivery with just a tap and track your driver in real time. Never waste time again with another call center or parking problem.

• AFFORDABLE FARES
Choose a service class for any occasion. Ride Economy for everyday errands, treat yourself to Comfort and Comfort+ to relax in a more spacious car, or go with Business when every detail counts. Use Delivery to ship items of any size by car. Fares and available service classes vary by location, but we always show the exact price (or a fair estimate) before you request a ride.

• PAY BY CARD OR CASH
You can pay for rides automatically if you add your card in the app, but drivers also accept cash. Payment method availability may vary depending on location.

• A SMART APP THAT SAVES YOU TIME
Yandex Go uses smart algorithms built on live traffic data to connect riders with drivers who can reach them fastest. Depending on your location, the app will also suggest alternative pickup points to help lower your fare.

• RIDES WITH MULTIPLE STOPS
Request a ride with multiple destinations, like if you’re dropping your kids off at school, picking up a friend on the way, or need to run a quick errand. Yandex Go maps all your stops on one route and calculates the fare for the entire trip upfront.

• CHILD SAFETY SEATS
Choose the Kids service class to ride safely with your child in a safety or booster seat.
Currently available in the capitals of Armenia, Georgia, Estonia and Latvia, as well as 13 cities across Russia.

• DELIVERY
It's just like requesting a ride: enter your address in the app, and a courier delivers your item. Both sender and recipient meet the courier at their car.

• FOOD FROM RESTAURANTS
Order food from local cafes and restaurants. Just enter your address and we’ll show you everything that’s available nearby. Narrow down your search with filters and find your favorites or try something new. Currently available in Russia and Kazakhstan.

• AVAILABLE IN 9 COUNTRIES
Russia, Armenia, Belarus, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Uzbekistan, Serbia and Moldova. Visit https://taxi.yandex.com to see rates and availability in your city.

If you’d like to share your opinion about our app, a driver or company that handled your ride, please send us feedback in the app.
releaseNotes: The new version of the app is available: everything's as convenient, but works a little faster and more consistently. Bug fixes and performance improvement.
reviews: Молодец!!! Все было очень профессионально, вежливый! | Vsjo otlichno! Rekomenduju!!!! | Ребята, что за говно постоянно с оплатой. Почему у меня никогда не получается нормально сделать заказа? Летом (июнь 2021) пытался заказать в лавке еду и не мог привязать карту для оплаты и оплатить ApplePay. Пришлось писать в тех поддержку, умолять Всевышнего и поклоняться Сатане, лишь бы хоть как-то заказать бедному программисту (себе любимому) покушать, чтоб не выходить из дома. Но как говорится, буй с ним, привязал - заказал - успокоился. Спустя пол года. У моего друга возникает день рождение (такое бывает). Я, находясь в другой стране, хотел его порадовать сочными бургерами из Макдональдса. К сожалению, на привязанных карточках денег не оказалось. Думаю, ну, ребята из Яндекса же не пальцем деланные. Все-таки крупный IT гигант не только на российском рынке, но и на международной арене. Явно уже всё починили, там же программистов всяких как дерьма в болоте, что-нибудь-то они умеют. Но, спойлер-спойлер, не умеют. Новую карту привязать не удалось. ApplePay использовать тоже не удалось. Пришлось, как в Древней Руси, переводить деньги с одной карты на другую, которая привязана, и потом платить. Может ещё пушнину Вам в офис привезти, только потом курьера начнёте искать для моих чизбуреров?! Естественно, пока я все это делал, подорожала доставка Яндекс еды. На 100₽. Не много, но сам факт - это неприятно. Что из-за недо программистов, приходится терять время и я же за эти ошибки потом ещё плачу. Вывод: так себе, Вы IT гигант. Вы как Джимми Браво - прическа и мускулы большие, а по факту - говно на палке. | Приложение ошибается в геолокации - в результате списывают дополнительную сумму за «ожидание водителя». Если отказываешься сразу от предложения - все равно списывают деньги за «ожидание», даже если уже уехали на другом авто от того же «Яндекс такси». Очень неприятно. | Yandex doesn’t seem to care much about public health in Russia as 90% of drivers don't wear masks. | Полный ноль | It works exactly as I would expect it shall :-). I just problem using iPal, but the same credit card used directly works perfectly. Good job, | Not for foreigners - Uber was mucj better | Ложка дегтя: была удобная опция: заказ такси к определенному времени, теперь её нет. | Cool app

title: Mytrip.com
description:
Welcome to the Mytrip app!

Our app puts the world in the palm of your hand. Fast, simple, safe and secure–instantly access your booking details and experience real-time updates and notifications so you never miss a flight again. Easily update your booking with baggage and other services from our pre-travel store. Get access to exclusive offers like early check-in for free (a $15 value), plus save up to 70% on flights, hotels rental cars and so much more!

What are you waiting for? Download now and let’s get traveling!  

FREE EARLY CHECK-IN
- Exclusively for our app users, passengers can now check-in for their flight, months in advance – for free! Let us do the hard work for you and we’ll send your boarding pass directly to your mobile device. 

BOOKING INFO AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Multiple bookings? No problem! All your bookings in one place–no need to head to the airline’s website or download their apps
- Easily access your booking info. From your reservation details, boarding passes the app has everything you need. Plus you’ll receive real-time notifications on gate or schedule changes in real-time, so you’ll never miss a flight again

BOOK FLIGHTS TO ANY DESTINATION, WORLDWIDE:
- Search and compare more than 650 airlines, big and small, to find the best deal there is.
- Flexible booking options – we get it, changes happen! Choose our Flexible Ticket option and change your flight when you need to.

AVAILABLE FOR A WIDE SELECTION OF BRANDS
- Get your booking info for many popular booking platforms including Gotogate, Supersaver, Supersavertravel, Flybillet, Travelstart, Travelfinder, Goleif, Travelpartner, Seat24, Flygvaruhuset, Avion, Budjet, Trip, Mytrip, Pamediakopes, Airtickets24, Flight Network and FlyFar.

ADD SERVICES ON THE FLY
- Already booked? Travel just the way you want by adding baggage, choosing your seat and more from our pre-travel store. 

PAY YOUR WAY
- Choose from a number of payment options available throughout the world.

FIND AND MAKE RESERVATIONS AT GREAT HOTELS
- The best places, the best prices – with more than 300,000 hotels to choose from, there’s something for everyone.

CHEAP CAR RENTAL ANYWHERE AND ANYTIME
- Search and find great deals on rental cars. Take the scenic route and explore your destination at your leisure.
releaseNotes: Problem with app crashing while entering the extra products store, is resolved

However, in app all looks ok and no change mention. This email confused me a lot, and I am still waiting for explanation. Otherwise app looks perfect. | Nedoporučuji. Radši koupit letenky přímo od wizz air atd. Bude tam trochu dražší než u Mytrip ale pak stejně tato společnost nemůže vás přihlásit přes aplikace na let a budete muset přeplatit ještě víc. Hnus…. | No vheck-in with low cost. No authorization, fake service. | The site has passed me around that another team has to take care of me and eventually they told me to contact the airline directly… I mean I booked through them wouldn’t they be able to get better info for me? No. Never again | Věcně nefunguje, letenky se snažím odbavit několik dni bez úspěchu! | Never use their services, they will steal your money | Se společností mytrip  máme velmi špatné zkušenosti a nedoporučuji  nikomu

title: EXA Bike Tracker
description:
Bike Tracker is an app for everyone who loves cycling and other sport activities like running, trekking, hiking or biking. 

Doesn't mater, you like winter or summer sports, you are a profesional cyclist, BMX fan, use electric bike or bike enduro trail, this app is perfect for you! 
It will measure your bike speed, the distance, altitude and GPS position,  record and mark your routes on the map and provide full statistics of your sport activities.

Inside the app you can activate 30 days free, premium app version, which is extended on many additional and useful functions.

Bike Tracker includes the following features:
- measure and recording the maximum biking speed and average speed
- measure and recording distance cycling tracks, 
- measure time, pace, slope and calories 
- marking your routes on the map
- light and dark color mode 
- monitoring the altitude above sea level, with recording min. and max. values (based on data from GPS, maps and barometer sensor) and elevation gain
- you can adjust and personalize data on bike computer main screen (from 1 to 9 tracking data on screen)  
- all data and statistics you can record all day and later view history

Our idea is - any bicycling activity statistics, maps, graph and others data in one app.

To use this app you don't need a mobile internet roaming data, just GPS is enough. Remember that the GPS work poorly inside the buildings and can generate inaccurate data. Sometimes outdoors GPS bike tracker may need more time to catch the good signal, especially in bad weather conditions.

This cycling app can also be used to training cross-country, enduro bike training, running, skiing, skating or any other sports practiced in the open. This app is useful for experienced professionals cyclists, but also novice bicycling users will have while using it a lot of fun.

With this bike app, you can compare your GPS bike tracker results with friends, organize sports competitions and other forms of competitive in cycle or any sport activities.
This bike computer - GPS cycling tracker, can also help you navigate on the enduro bike trails, in finding interesting routes and tourist attractions or touch with your friends.

You're going biking in popular EuroVelo routes? Or maybe Great Divide Mountain bike route? Check the weather and instal GPS Bike Tracker app. No matter where you'll be, this bike app certainly give you a lot of fun and impressions!

Over 50 millions satisfied worldwide users have installed our EXA apps - join them and have fun!



Information
We are continuously working to develop and improve this application. If you see something that can be improved, we will be grateful for a message on help@examobile.pl. We want to make our apps the best in App Store - Thank you in advance
releaseNotes:
- Fixed issues with loading calibration of the barometric altitude
- Bug fixes and stability improvements 
- Session Edit
- Total Distance & Time in History
- Export and Import All Data From Bike Tracker
- Black (AMOLED / OLED ) Color Theme
- GPX, TCX files from Endomondo, Garmin, etc. import
- Turkish, Danish, Slovak and Hungarian translations
- Sound and voice notifications about time or distance
- Fixed user-reported bugs
- Improved performance, lowered resources consumption

Dále pokud omylem zavřu aplikaci při měření, data se sice uloží, ale nelze pokračovat v měření. Diky | Super aplikace,  doporučuji

title: FREENOW
description:
FREENOW is Europe's largest multimobility app, available in 9 European countries. Book black cabs, Rides (private hire vehicles), taxis, eScooters and eBikes all directly through the app. You are in control to choose how you roll, book easily, pay in-app quickly and complete your trip safely!

HOW IT WORKS - RIDE-HAILING
1. Enter your destination
2. Book a car or a cab near you
3. Track your driver's arrival
4. Pay easily through the app

HOW IT WORKS - ESCOOTER & EBIKE
1. Switch to the 2-wheels tab
2. Find a eScooter or eBike nearby
3. Unlock the eScooter or eBike by scanning the QR code or by selecting it directly on the map
4. Go to your destination and pay easily through the app


FEATURES
- The only ride-hailing app where you can choose an electric Black Cab, Eco Taxi or Private Ride every time you take a trip! Same great service, lower environmental impact.
- You can choose a black cab or a taxi with a partition screen to allow for social distancing. 
- Highest quality drivers, fully licensed with all Ride drivers met and onboarded face-to-face
- Convenient prebook feature available up to 4 days in advance making planning ahead that bit easier.
- All black cabs and wheelchair accessible taxi options are available for those requiring extra assistance.
- All drivers are reminded to sanitize their vehicle after every trip. 


STREAMLINE YOUR BUSINESS TRAVEL
Automatically collect your receipt via email after each trip when you pay with the app, or skip manual expense reportings altogether by using a FREENOW for business account.

EASY AIRPORT TRANSFER
Book last minute or up to 4 days before your flight. Need a pickup? No problem, just collect your luggage, order your vehicle of choice through the app and follow the in-app walking directions to the FREENOW pickup point within your terminal.

FREENOW is available for both business and holiday travel at Europe's largest airports, including Heathrow, London City, Gatwick, Stansted, Dublin, Frankfurt, Madrid-Barajas, Barcelona El-Prat, Munich, Rome Fiumicino, Manchester, Düsseldorf, Vienna Schwechat, Milano Malpensa, Berlin, Paris Charles de Gaulle, Nice Côte d'Azur and Malaga.

BOOK THE RIGHT VEHICLE FOR YOU
UK:
Black cab: Iconic British taxi with high-quality knowledgeable drivers 
EV black cab: Electric black cab with high-quality knowledgeable drivers 
Ride: Private hire vehicles with professional drivers and the lowest fixed prices in London
EV Ride: London’s largest electric fleet of PHVs 
eScooter: Book an eScooter directly in the app in London 

Ireland:
Taxi: Book a taxi with a fully licenced driver with Ireland’s shortest waiting times
Taxi + Screen: Taxi with a partition screen offering you a more comfortable way to travel
Taxi XL: Taxi with more than 4 seats
Accessible Taxi: wheelchair accessible for those requiring extra assistance 
Eco Taxi: Ireland’s largest electric and hybrid taxi fleet offering you a greener way to travel

TRAVEL ALL OVER EUROPE
The FREENOW  service is available across 10 countries in over 100 European cities.

SUPPORT
If you have any questions, please visit the help & contact section of the app (via your profile) to see our most frequently asked questions.
releaseNotes:
Make sure to update your FREENOW app. The most recent version ensures that you have the fastest and most reliable service yet.

What’s changed?

- Bug fixes and improvements

Enjoying the app? Leave us a review.

title: BVG Tickets: Train, Bus & Tram
description:
BVG Tickets is the official ticket-purchasing app for public transport in Berlin! 


With BVG Tickets you can buy tickets for train, subway, tram, and bus from the official source and travel anywhere in Berlin. Purchase and download tickets straight to the app and enjoy your trip.


By the way: You can now order the new Deutschlandticket via the BVG website or in our customer centres. It costs €49 per month and is available as a personal season ticket without transferability. With the ticket, you can use the entire public transport system, including regional trains, throughout Germany. It is not possible to take other people, or bicycles with you on this ticket.


We will provide you with the ticket as a mobile phone ticket or as an electronic FahrCard in good time before the nationwide launch. Do you already have a BVG subscription? Great, you don't have to do anything at the moment, because we'll get in touch with you.


Travel anywhere with your BVG ticket, whether you are a Berlin local or a visiting tourist. Always as fast and as simple as possible!


So how does it work?


• Download the BVG Tickets app to your device 
• Connect your payment information 
• Select your ticket type
• Purchase the ticket 
• Download straight to your device and start your journey


BVG Tickets offers a ticket purchasing service only and does not contain any other kind of travel information. If you need further travel and transport connection information then please download our BVG Fahrinfo app. 


Avoid waiting for the ticket machine in busy train and metro stations by connecting the BVG Tickets app with payment methods such as Amazon Pay, Apple Pay, credit card, PayPal, prepaid, SEPA direct debit, or express purchase (registration and payment with Apple Pay, PayPal). 


In our app you can purchase tickets covering any of the following tariff zones: 


• Berlin AB
• Berlin BC (C area includes, for example, Potsdam and Berlin Airport BER)
• Berlin ABC (C area includes, for example, Potsdam and Berlin Airport BER)


All you need to do to get your next train, subway, tram or bus ticket straight to your phone is to register by using your email address, password, first and last name...that’s it. You’re good to go as soon as you purchase your ticket with the app. 


Do you already have a BVG account? Great, you don’t need to register again. You can use your current account information to log in and purchase tickets.


BVG Tickets can offer you any kind of ticket for traveling in Berlin. We have something for everybody whether you have lived here for 20 years or are only visiting for 2 days! 


With the BVG Tickets app, you can purchase any type of ticket for travel in Berlin, whether you are on your train journey to work or on the subway home. 


Our ticket app offers: 


• Monthly pass 
• 7-day card
• Monthly ticket trainee (AB)
• Berlin Ticket S (AB)
• 4-trip card
• 24-hour-ticket
• Single ticket
• Short haul
• Connection ticket
• Tourist tickets
• Bicycle ticket


We’ve got you covered for any type of ticket you need in Berlin whether you’re taking the train to Schöneberg, taking the subway in Kreuzberg, getting the bus in Neukölln or riding the tram in Prenzlauer Berg. Just purchase any of these tickets to suit your needs and away you go


We guarantee that buying your Berlin transport tickets through the app will save you time on any purchase. Don’t wait around in line at the service desk or ticket machine ever again. With the BVG Tickets app, your transport links throughout Berlin just got a whole lot easier and faster! 


We welcome your feedback or suggestions. If we can do anything to help, you can contact us at appsupport@bvg.de and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.


Accessibility disclaimer for the BVG Tickets app:
https://www.bvg.de/en/subscriptions-and-tickets/all-apps/ticket-app/accessibility-disclaimer

title: Flighty – Live Flight Tracker
description:
"Truly phenomenal" NYTimes • iPhone App of The Year 2023 Finalist • Apple Design Award 2023 • Made for passengers first

LIMITED TIME: Pro is free on your 1st flight. No credit card. No trial.

▶ INDUSTRY-FIRST FEATURES
- 25-hour where's my plane
- private friends/family following
- pilot-grade FAA integration (direct data feed)
- delay forecast
- taxi times
- ground radar
- proximity radar

▶ FULLY AUTOMATED
- calendar sync
- TripIt sync
- email forwarding
- Flighty Friends: private sharing with friends

▶ PILOT-GRADE DATA
- live-streaming
- actual flight plans
- commercial data – same source used by your pilot
- FAA advisories, warnings, and delays
- your tail number with birthday and type
- pilot flight timetable
- proximity radar - see flights around you

▶ PREDICT DELAYS
- Alerts for late or canceled inbound aircraft
- Alerts for airport weather or traffic

▶ ASSISTANTS
- Morning-Of Assistant - wake up informed
- Check In Assistant - your reservation number and check in link at the right time
- Connection Assistant - make tight connections a breeze

▶ WORLDWIDE + LIVE + UNLIMITED

▶ FLIGHTY FRIENDS
- Often sharing with Family and Friends? Invite them to see your flights and never manually share again!
- Picking someone up, excited for a friend to visit, meeting a colleague? Share your live flight status with one tap.

▶ WHATS FREE?
- no ads
- unlimited flights

- personal flight log and map
- personal all-time and annual stats

▶ WHATS PRO?
- industry's fastest push alerts

- unlimited past flight lookup
- delay predictions
- arrival forecast
- TripIt sync
- calendar sync
- email forwarding
- Apple Watch complications
- tail number
- taxi times
- and more

Pro is included on your first flight. No trial required.

title: Austrian
description:
Book flights, reserve seats and keep track of your boarding passes - the Austrian app accompanies you throughout your journey with the Lufthansa Group network airlines.
You receive real-time information and all relevant updates about your flight directly on your smartphone in the form of push notifications. The Austrian App ensures you are always up to date.
Experience a smooth journey with the Austrian app. From booking your flight to landing and beyond, you can stay informed at all times. You can also conveniently manage your data and access personalized services via your personal profile.
In short: The Austrian App keeps you well informed throughout your journey.
Here’s how the Austrian App makes your journey easier:

Before departure
•	Book your flight, reserve your seat and add your baggage: Search for your desired flight, book it, and rent a car that will be waiting for you at your destination. You can also add any additional pieces of luggage directly in the app and reserve or change your seat.
•	Online check-in: With the Austrian app, you can check in online for all Lufthansa Group Network Airlines flights. Your digital flight ticket will then appear directly on your smartphone. When boarding, simply open the app to show your mobile boarding pass.
•	Travel ID and Austrian Miles and More: You can now save several payment methods directly to your Travel ID account thanks to the new digital wallet. This means you can pay with ease anytime and anywhere. Enter your personal details and select your personalized services to make the Austrian app even easier to use. To do this, use your Travel ID or your Austrian Miles & More login.
•	Real-time information and flight status: Starting 47 hours before your departure, your personal travel assistant will provide you with all important updates and information about your flight. Push notifications about check-in, flight status and gate changes make sure you are always up to date. With messages that pop up on your home screen, you always have an overview of your trip and can relax and enjoy your journey.

During the flight
•	Flight ticket and on-board services: With the Austrian app, you always have your mobile boarding pass and all on-board services with you – even when you are offline. That way you can keep track of all important flight information and changes at all times.

After the flight
•	Track your baggage: Even after landing, the Austrian app will keep you informed of further steps that need to be taken. This means you always have an overview of your checked baggage and can track it easily.

The Austrian app is the perfect companion to ensure a relaxed journey. You can use the app to book your flights and rental cars, receive automatic notifications and updates on your next flight and edit your personal data easily and conveniently while on the move.
Download the Austrian app now for a relaxed travel experience with a personal digital travel assistant that accompanies you before, during and after your flight.
Learn more about our flight offers at austrian.com and follow us on Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and X to stay up to date.
If you have any questions or need any assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us. You can get in touch at https://www.austrian.com/at/en/contact#/.

title: Get Out Fun
description:
Zvládnete na své cestě posbírat všechny indície, abyste věděli kudy dál? Jste všímaví a baví Vás namáhat si hlavu při vašich netradičních výletech? Venkovní únikové hry v aplikaci Get Out Fun vás provedou těmi nejkrásnějšími místy významných měst. Nejedná se však o průvodce, kterého budete slepě následovat, naopak si cestu musíte najít sami pomocí někdy i velice obtížných úkolů. Složité úkoly pro vás však nemusí být překážkou, ke každému je možnost zvolit si nápovědu, která vás navede na správnou cestu ke zdárnému cíli.

Are you able to get all the clues on your way in order to know where to go? Are you mindful and enjoying unconventional tours in order to get to know the foreign cities? The Get Out Fun scavanger games will take you to the most beautiful places in the well-known cities. This is not a guide you will blindly follow, on the contrary, you have to find your way on your own by solving a few difficult tasks. However, complicated tasks are not an obstacle for you on this adventurous journey because you can always use hints in order to find the right path and successfully reach the end.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes
reviews: Poměr cena výkon je hodně špatný. Šifry jsou koncipovány tak, že řešení zná jen autor a jeho způsob koncipování šifry je hodně těžké zpětně pochopit. Za nás jsou to špatně šifry velké zklamání. Podobné šifry vymýšlím za jedno dopoledne a s daleko lepším obsahem. U mnoha šifer je mnoho jiných řešení a je opravdu nemožné odhadnout zrovna to správné, které zrovna autor označil za správné. Zkoušeli jsme pražskou tour de beer a pokud chcete ušetřit prostě si projdete pár hospod kolem miroveho náměstí a neutracejte peníze za tuhle blbost. | Cela unikovna mela az moc dlouhy pribeh, ktery nebyl zajimavy a zdlouhavy, na zacatku nam napsali at sbirame body, ktere pak k nicemu nakonci nebyli, byli jsme zklamani, ze na konci nebylo zadne vyhodnoceni ani odmena, nektere hlavolami uz byli i rozbite, celkove dost spatne :-( a to jsme se fakt tesili. | Sochy promlouvaly, příroda s náma mluvila, po tmě jsme byli totálně vyklepaní a do toho hlasy ze záhrobí. Puzzly byly přiměřeně obtížné i pro nás hloupější. Nejsme žádní nerdíci a přesto jsme si hru megaužili!!! | Nejdřív jsem myslel že je to normální únikovka ale tohle je originální tím že luštíte úlohy venku a zároveň si užijete hezkou procházku. Bylo to super, díky a udělejte další! 😊 | No tak jsem to zkusil a moc me to bavilo! Sice to ma nejaky mouchy ale to bude napraveno pry v dalsim updatu | Za mně super, je to jako escape game, ale venku, po krásné Praze. Prostě boží!!

title: HoppyGo
description:
Unlimited freedom of movement for everyone!
 
Do you want to head out for an adventurous weekend in a new crossover? Do you need a van to move your furniture? Or are you in dire straits because your car is being serviced? With HoppyGo car sharing, you can easily rent from more than 1 500 cars directly from the owners. Find the perfect vehicle for any occasion with over 300 car types in more than 240 cities across the Czech Republic. Get the key from your first rental within 24 hours since the sign up. 

At the same time, if your own car is parked in the lot far too often, you can join hundreds of car owners and start earning money by renting it to the others. HoppyGo will be your middleman. 

Is car the only missing piece in your plans?
1)	Create an account 
Signing up, filling in your profile and uploading necessary documents takes only a couple of minutes of your time. The approval process then takes less than 24 hours.

2)	Choose your car
Pick whichever car fits your need, choose the time of your rental and select your pickup location. All you have to do now is to wait for the approval from the owner. We recommend requesting multiple cars in case of some owners being busy. Finally, payment for the rental happens through app. You pay only for the car that has approved your rental first.

3)	Pick up your car or have it delivered to your doorstep
Communicate with the car owner via the HoppyGo app. Then meet the owner, go through the handover procedure and hit the road. You don’t have to worry, all rentals are insured to cover both drivers and owners.


Is your car sitting in the parking lot unused?
1)	Create an account within minutes
Becoming a part of the community of HoppyGo owners could not be easier. Then add your car, upload car documents and complete the car profile section.

2)	Fill in the rental details
Set the price for which you will rent your car and use our calendar to choose the times when your car is available. 

3)	Rent your car
Communicate with a driver beforehand and upload photos while handing the keys over for insurance purposes. You don’t have to worry, all rentals are insured to cover both drivers and owners.

4)	Collect the money 
The money arrives to your bank account in less than a week after the rental is finished.

Follow HoppyGo on
Facebook via https://www.facebook.com/HoppyGoCZ 
Instagram via https://www.instagram.com/hoppygo.cz/

Have a question?
Try our blog https://blog.hoppygo.com/ or give us a call at +420 220 311 769
releaseNotes:
Opening hours update
Minor bug fixing
reviews:

Stay away!! | Zdravim. Nacita se vam to hrozne pomalu. Az me to odrazuje v te appce neco delat. A to jsem na wifi i na datech a mam kvalitni pripojeni. Napr filtrace aut v Praze na zitrek. Dle znacky trva mesic a kdyz nedejboze chci seradit dle ceny, tak je to stale bile a cekam a cekam. | This app is disturbing. Nothing works correctly. Please fire the team who made this app. | Použij při registraci promokod Wolfman_CZ | Fajn myšlenka, jen se mi nelíbí způsob vyhledávání. Bylo by fajn mít možnost zadat pouze obec a rádius, v kterém se mi má ukázat nabídka vozidel. | I highly recommend this app, from both lender a borrower perspective. | Aplikace NEUSTÁLE spamuje otravnými reklamamy i když je to v nastavení zakázané. | Aplikaci využívám už dlouho ale pořád to má jeden velký nedostatek. Jakmile si na telefonu člověk začne filtrovat auta, tak se nenačtou. Ukáží se prázdné “bubliny” a nelze s tím nic dělat. Je to problém na všech telefonech i u ostatních uživatelů. Je mi to celkem líto. Znemožňuje to vyhledat přesný vůz. | Zobrazení chyby při historii jízd a zápůjček vozidel. Jinak skvělá aplikace👍 | U aut se opakovaně zobrazují různé ceny. Před dokončením registrace se vám zobrazují více než poloviční ceny! Chápu to jako podvod…lákadlo a mámení osobních info z lidí. Dva telefony, 2 aplikace, 2 různě dokončené profily a 2 různé ceny. Neseriózní! | Idea is very nice, I use hoppygo time to time, but app makes me crazy. I want to enter address and date and it doesn’t let me to set it for long time, after I am able to write something there it shows me cars far away. | Například mi teď nereaguje tlačítko potvrzení rezervace, což je docela zásadní nedostatek. | Ze začátku jsem si to založil jen tak, že to zkusím a už bych auto jinde nepůjčoval.

- rychlý
- jednoduchý
- peníze vždy do par dni. | Cena za výpůjčku Škoda Enyaq. V nabídce cena včetně nabíjení v průběhu výpůjčky. Následně strženo 1400 Kč za nabíjení v průběhu cesty 220 km. Vůz připraven s 80 % baterií a vrácen se 100 %.
Velmi nesolidní jednání. Rozhodně tuto službu nedoporučuji. | Nefungují filtry po aktualizaci, zkontrolujte to! | Rozhodně a jednoznačně ne!!!
Tato platforma vám zdevastuje majetek. Využije ho spolu a vaším časem pro vlastní obohacení. 
Z 25 zápůjček byly jen 3 bezproblémové. Poškozování vozidel, bourání, kouření, nedotankované, zničené brzdy, interiér. Drogový dealer na falešné doklady co nevrátil auto. Téměř totální škoda dodávky, zničená převodovka Peugeota a mnoho, mnoho, mnoho dalšího. Přečtěte si články na PrahaIN.

V žádném případě sem nedávejte svoje auto. Tito "marťani" nejsou schopní ničeho jiného, než opakování prázdných frází, lží, ignorace.
Až potom co skutečně hrozíte soudem a medializací, což stejně proběhne, začnou náznaky řešení, které ovšem nikam nevedou.
Komunikace s podporou se podobá otřesu mozku. 

Určitě se snaží na 100%, ovšem těch jejich sto je jako běžných 5%. Výsledek 0.

Vadí vám vaše auto? Zaregistrujte ho sem. | The app is much slower than it used to be and the usability also went down by a great deal. | The app is slow. And after a while of using the content is not displaying correctly. There are just blank placeholders and it has to be restarted.

Aplikace je pomalá. Po chvíli používání se obsah nezobrazuje - pouze prázdné karty a aplikace se musí restartovat. | Bez zadání karty je appka v podstatě k ničemu… | Skvela sluzba, ale mnoho bugu v aplikaci :( | Doporučuji, vstřícné jak půjčujícím tak řidičům. Zvací kód - pavelbuzek. Pokud byste někdo chtěl 500,- do začátku | Quick&easy car renting! Everything is super smooth with perfect application in your smartphone. Use every month. Lot of amazing vehicles available. | It has been some time since I’ve used hoppygo for first time. Their service is outstanding and I also appreciate good quality of cars. I can recommend this company. Their customer care is also excellent! | Mastodont ve skvělém stavu, výborné auto, komunikace s majitelem perfektní, vyřízení rychlé, Diky | Jsem rád, že služba hoppygo funguje. Sice je t´dozdlouhavější registrace, což je pochopitelné, ale pak už jde vše rychle. Z mého pohledu škoda, že není možné nabídnout motorku. Užitečné jsou filtry, je možné vyhledat auto dle ceny, typu karoserie či vybavení. Za mě dobrá alternativa ke klasickým půjčovnám a zajímavá možnost přivýdělku pro majitele aut. | Everything is working perfectly but one day of rental is simply not 24 hours as at normal rental places. If you take it on Wednesday 14:00PM and return it Thursday 11AM you will pay for 2 days despite the fact you used the car for less than 24 hours. | Chtěl jsem půjčit na svatbu kabriolet a obrátil jsem se na servis HoppyGo. To byla chyba. Našel jsem tam auto, “krásný” Chrysler Le Baron. Na fotkách naprosto krasavec, bílý, lesklý, úplně v perfektním stavu. Zaplatil jsem pronájem a v klidu čekal na den vyzvednutí, představoval jak krásné budeme v tom vypadat - máme skoro klasické auto, v hezkým stavu. Realita mě docela překvapila. Na autě chyběly kousky laku, obrovské žluté skvrny. Byl jsem v šoku a prosto nevěděl co dělat. Po krátkém hovoru z majitelem bylo řešeno rezervaci zrušit a bylo mě řečeno že peníze pošlou na účet za 3 dny, a celou částku za pronájem. Za šest dnů, žádné peníze ne přišly, a po telefonickém hovoru zjistilo se že bude vráceno pouze 50% z částky, protože “auto je technicky v dobrém stavu, a musíte počítat ze je starší”. Ve kterém technickém stavu to je - nevím, ale kosmetický stav je opravdu ošklivý, a nebylo uvedeno v inzerátu, a nebyly tam fotky těch defektů. Do konce už prošlo 8 dnů, a žádné peníze na účet se nevrátily, manažery aplikace neustále chrání majitele vozu, i s tím že žádná prohlídka předem nedostupná. Z tohoto vyplývají že zákazníky vůbec nejsou chráněné před podvodem ze strany majitelů vozu a nedostupné bezpečné používání servisu pro zákazníky. Servis nedoporučuji, nemáte žádné práva jako zákazník. | It’s a great app, easy for all parties, all nice, needs few improvements in the filters, but otherwise love it! | Doesn't open at the start!!! | Bezvadné auto. Ma svižný motor a je v perfektním stavu. | Different prices before and after registration… I’m not actually sure if that it is legal | Guys be careful of this service they used my bank card information without my authorization for withdrawing money above the agreed rental fees, and when I get back to them they mentioned that it is for cleaning and when I explained to them that this is a fraud from the car owner because he got the car in good status they didn’t listen to me so please be careful about your bank account information. | Miluju tuhle aplikaci:D vydelava mi, diky ni se nemusim zbavovat auta a jeste mi vydela na pojistku:D jsem prekvapena ze se vubec nekdo ozyva kdyz nebydlim v krajskem meste :D | Easy and best in Czech Republic. I love Volvo XC60 from Prague 5, Revnicka. 🤍 | Top | fantastic practical fast and perfect offer Recommend | Very good experience, even late arrival wasn't any issue | Už více jak půl roku mi nefunguje aplikace iP12. A nejedná se o individuální problém. Problém se už tu v komentářích objevil několikrát. Hold dobrá myšlenka, ale nedostatečný development. | Super domluva, bez problemu, auto krásné a ciste | A great selection of vehicles at great prices! | Široký výběr a nízké ceny - ideální služba pro ty, kteří si chtějí levně půjčit auto a ještě podpořit soukromé majitele. | This service is simply great, of course together with the app! | Děkuji a doporučuji | The app is nice and all, it works pretty well. But up to 7 working days to return the deposit? That must be a joke | Půjčení 24 hodin je pro aplikaci 2 dny | Moci využít již vyrobená a někým pořízená auta, čerpat z nich užitek, majiteli tak pomoct splácet cenu auta, které by jinak stálo na dvorku, a ještě mít k dispozici flexibilitu, které konkuruje jen volný carsharing, a neuvěřitelně široký výběr, to si troufnu označit za revoluční projekt. Aspoň v našich končinách.

Za mnohých okolností vás nicméně volný carsharing vyjde paradoxně levněji, protože zde není v ceně palivo, jak bývá zvykem. Pokud ale toužíte po jiném autě, nebo chcete být v osobním kontaktu s majitelem, kterého navíc všichni mohou otevřeně revenzovat (stejně jako majitelé řidiče), pak je toto perfektní rozšíření portfolia sdílené mobility.

Ocenil bych v aplikaci filtraci také podle technických specifikací vozidla (např. výkonu, rozměrů…) a přidání dalších údajů (provozní hmotnost, ne jen maximální, již zmíněné rozměry, točivý moment, možnost pro majitele vypsat spotřebu pro různé situace). Společně s ne vždy konkurenceschopnou cenovkou (holt mají hlavní slovo majitelé a je to dobře) tedy velmi symbolicky bez poslední hvězdy. | They have a great costumer service. As I needed fast approval of my profile and had an issue due to the quality of my uploaded documents, I reached out to them and a nice employee names Tereza handled my case fast, easy and with a very friendly attitude! | Aplikace mi na iP12 již půl roku nejede ... | I love the app and the idea. I am renting my car through the platform and could not be more happy. They have awesome customer service that replies within minutes and also picks up phone immediatelly (even on weekends). The only thing I am missing is loading prices for each days. I hope it will change and I will be able to create more dynamic pricing policy. | Use my code RC3Bi1oK

title: OMV MyStation v Česku
description:
Začněte objevovat nové cesty s aplikací OMV MyStation, domovem čerpacích stanic OMV v mobilním telefonu a věrnostním programem, který je vám vždy po ruce.


Sbírejte s každým nákupem na čerpací stanici OMV věrnostní body, které můžete proměnit ve skvělé zážitky a speciální odměny.


Použijte aplikaci MyStation při každé návštěvě čerpací stanice OMV a získejte řadu odměn a překvapení: kupóny, různé promoční akce, slevy nebo poukázky pro každodenní příjemné cesty. Nechte aplikaci stát se správcem vašeho auta ve vaší kapse, který vás odmění pokaždé, když přijedete na čerpací stanici OMV.


Svoboda objevovat.
releaseNotes: V nové verzi jsme opravili několik drobných chyb a vylepšili její fungování

Nelze tedy uplatnit sleva, kterou nabízejí v obchodě Billa. Styďte se ….. lákat lidi, na stažení nefunkční aplikace! | Aplikace nefunguje . Nejde se přihlásit . | Super aplikace - používám při každé návštěvě ČS na slevu na benzín, myčku a nákup zboží za zvýhodněné ceny. Doporučuji stáhnout :) | Skvěle fungující aplikace, používám jak pro slevu na palivo, sběr bodů nebo nákup zboží za zvýhodněné ceny. Doporučuji stažení aplikace :-) | Hodinu se snažím přihlásit registrovaným emailem a nic | Tried via email and via google account. Error - Incorrect social identifier. Waste of time. | Po instalaci vůbec nereaguje. 
Ať žije IT | Katastrofa, nemožnost se přihlásit hned po registraci, asi to kluci vymysleli skvěle. | Chtěl jsem slevu, stáhl app přihlásil, vše co chtěli jsem jim poskytl a nic u toho. Hlavně ze oni mají data na šmírování a kšeftováni. Tak si to užijte. | Muj ucet byl odhlasen a ani pres vsechny mozne pokusy vcetne zaslani kodu zpet k oziveni a prihlaseni k uctu se nezdarilo. Stravil jsem zbytecne 30 min s ozivenim uctu zaplatil jsem predrazene premiove PHM bez dodatecne slevy a prisel jsem o poradnou davku jiz nabytych bodu z predchozich tankovani. Bohuzel, nejsem sam dle obsluhy pumpy. Jestli si tohle precte marketak, tak si muze zapsat minus jeden zakaznik (aplikaci jsem odinstaloval a tankovat uz budu jinde) a pro developera vzkazuji, ze uz jsem zahodil hodne casu na to, abych neco jeste posilal. BTW developer, ktery nedokaze rozpoznat, ze prihlaseni a registrace jsou odlisne veci, mel sam venovat cas lepe s kontrolou chodu aplikace (updatu) a naucot se komunikovat. Zejmena omluva, pokud zpusobim potize, je zakladni komunikacni fovednost.  Tohle pisi pro ostatni, ja s OMV skoncil. | Některé osobní údaje ( např. datum narození, nebo tel. předvolbu), nelze zadat, takže není možné si založit účet a aplikaci využívat. | Aplikace po instalaci nefunguje, nereaguje. | Nedejte se napálit, aplikace ani slevy nefungují! Jen vás donutí draze natankovat, aby vám pak na pokladně řekli, že všude avizovaná sleva nemůže být uplatněna, protože mají “problém ve spojení ve serverem”. | Musím říct že ani nevím co je trapnější, jestli neustále odmítání obsluhy na otázku jestli už si nechci náhodou aplikaci pořídit, nebo produkty které za body v aplikaci mohu získat, nebo předražené palivo na zastaralých benzínových pumpách kde věcně chybí základní věci jako mýdlo na staré toaletě, nebo saponát ve vodě na umývání oken. Tak jako tak bych u vás nikdy dobrovolně netankoval, bohužel se služebním vozidlem musím každý den. | Nelze se registrovat, k ničemu | Aplikacia je ok ale opakovane sa stretavam s tym, ze ked chcem body uplatnit, obsluha nevie ako na to. Kavu si musim zaplatit a body mi strhnu aj tak. Trochu to pak cele postrada zmysel. Skoda, napad to bol pekny. | Prosím o možnost přidání karty do Apple Wallet, o možnost volby jen elektronické účtenky místo tisku papírové u pokladny - a do budoucnosti přidat možnost platby u stojanu. | Nefunguje, po pátém natankovani nepřipadalo žádné body | Nezlobte se, ale pokaždé když jdu natankovat nemohu se přihlásit. Nefunguje vám generování nového hesla. Žádám o to pokaždé. Za tři měsíce ani jeden email. Podpora Inka uvedena v app po zazvoneni spadne. | Zvažujete také dobití kreditu přes Apple Pay a zaplacení přímo u stojanu ? | Proč nelze přidat kartu do Wallet? | Chyby | Chybí podpora Apple Wallet a ceny v detailu čerpací stanice. Nestyďte se za ně. | Myslel jsem, že problémy s registrací už budou vyřešené ale bohužel ne. Při dokončení registrace (přes Apple účet), mi to jen napíše: "Chyba při registraci" - škoda, třeba časem vyjde aktualizace, která to opraví. | Pri aktivaci pres Ucet Apple se nedokazu ani zaregistrovat. Nakoci pokazde vyskoci hlaska ze “ve vsech radach identifikatoru typu identifikatoru nezbyvaji zadna volna cisla”… a dal se nedostanu.
Edit: diky za odpoved vyvojaru. Uz to jede, proto jsem zmenil hodnoceni ze dvou na pet hvezdicek 👍 | Kdybych si přečetla recenze, ušetřila bych si stahování aplikace , registraci a několik zbytečných pokusu se přihlásit .. | Zklamání, opakovaně se nelze přihlásit. | Zatim zadna hitparada. Karta nejde vlozit do penezenky. Za registraci zadne body. | Aplikace vypadá dobře, chybí mi ale podpora přidání karty do Apple Wallet. Má to své výhody, člověk se vyhne tomu, že aplikace zrovna v momentě placení u kasy spadne a nechce se otevřít. Prosím o možnost přidání karty do Apple Wallet. | Nelze se přihlásit ani po registraci ani po aktivaci. | Bohužel se nelze registrovat. V konečném kroku hláška “v radach identifikatoru nezbyvaji zadna volna cisla”.

title: FordPass™
description:
FordPass offers the ability to manage your vehicle right from your phone:

•	Send convenient remote commands – Lock, unlock, and start your vehicle using complimentary remote vehicle controls (1) – when equipped with FordPass® Connect (2)
•	Electric vehicle ownership support – Monitor charging progress and use Departure Times to pre-condition your battery and cabin (3) 
•	FordPass feature availability varies by vehicle and country. Images shown for illustrative purposes only


(1) Remote lock/unlock requires power door locks. Remote starting requires automatic transmission.
(2) FordPass Connect (optional on select vehicles), the FordPass App and complimentary Connected Service are required for remote features (see FordPass Terms for details). Connected service and features depend on compatible network availability. Evolving technology/cellular networks/vehicle capability may limit functionality and prevent operation of connected features. Connected service excludes Wi-Fi hotspot.
(3) Effectiveness of cabin conditioning may be reduced by extreme outside temperatures.
releaseNotes: • This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes
reviews:
Slabé pokryti od Vodafonu 
Systém špicluje mobil majitele namísto aby hlídal vůz. | Since I have done an upgrade, I am missing the “drives with the EV” that were showing fuel consumption and mileage. Is this feature still available? Thank you. | Po aktualizaci mne aplikace odhlásila a nepamatuje si heslo. Takže ji budu moci zase používat až se za pár dnů vrátím domů, kde mám heslo uložené. To vás bude bavit! Prosím, milý Forde, zkuste tu aplikaci svěřit někomu, kdo tomu opravdu rozumí. Navíc z ní jen postupně odebíráte zajímavé funkce, které ještě nedávno uměla. Čím dál horší, bohužel. | Alarm function was disabled. The app is loosing more functions that it had before.

Would be nice to set up what will be switched on after remote startup | As an owner of the Ford car I'd greatly appreciate if access through app to my vehicle would be more secure by implementing MFA and biometrics. | Works fine, but seems like a temporary product. I’m missing trip/fuel consumption data and possibly other OBD-like diagnostics. | již 14 dni čekam na aktivaci

title: iTranslate Converse
description:
Turn your iPhone into a translation device!  

Introducing iTranslate Converse, a revolutionary new speech translation App. iTranslate Converse turns your iPhone and Apple Watch into a two-way translation device. The simple design enables natural conversations in 38 languages, and automatically detects the correct language between two selected languages for a fast and accurate translation.

Speak directly into your iPhone’s microphone and dramatically improve results as well as create a more natural conversation experience. It literally turns your iPhone into the first real translation device.

SIMPLE & EASY
Tap & Hold to Speak. Release to Translate. The entire screen becomes your translation button.

SUPERIOR TRANSLATION ACCURACY
Works well in noisy environments.

BLAZING FAST
Delivers translation results in near real time.

38 LANGUAGES
Instantly converse in 38 languages.

LANGUAGE DETECTION
Automatic detection between the 2 selected languages for a seamless translation experience.

TRANSCRIPTS
View and export full transcripts for every voice conversation.


Learn more about iTranslate Converse at https://www.itranslate.com/converse

SUPPORT
Visit https://www.itranslate.com/support/ or contact us at help@itranslate.com

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/iTranslateApp
Like & share on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/itranslateapp
Learn more about iTranslate: https://www.itranslate.com

Supported languages & dialects for translation:
Arabic (Saudi), Arabic (UAE), Arabic (Egypt), Catalan, Chinese (Mandarin), Chinese (Taiwan), Chinese (Cantonese), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English (US), English (GB), English (Australian), Finnish, French, French (Canada), German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (Portugal), Portuguese (Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (USA), Spanish (Mexico), Swedish, Thai, Turkish

For a Complete Language overview: https://itranslate.com/languages

---
Auto Renewable Subscription Terms:
Subscriptions are billed monthly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.
The price corresponds to the same price segment, which are set in the "Apple's App Store Matrix" for other currencies.
* Your free trial subscription will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period. 
* Please note: any unused portion of a free trial period (if offered) will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period.
* You can cancel a free trial or subscription anytime by turning off auto-renewal through your iTunes account settings. This must be done 24 hours before the end of a free trial or subscription period to avoid being charged. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription period, and you will be downgraded to the free service.
* Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.

Terms of Service: 
https://www.itranslate.com/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy: 
https://www.itranslate.com/privacy-policy

California Privacy Rights: 
https://www.itranslate.com/privacy-policy#InformationCaliforniaPrivacyRights

• An internet connection is required to use the app.
releaseNotes:

To improve our App for you, we regularly bring updates to the App Store with improvements for both speed and reliability. If you enjoy iTranslate Converse, would you mind taking a moment to write a review on the App Store? We’d greatly appreciate it

title: Marriott Bonvoy
description:
Unlock extraordinary experiences with the Marriott Bonvoy™ app.

The Marriott Bonvoy App lets you elevate every aspect of your stay at more than 7,000 hotels worldwide. So you can spend more time taking care of the most important detail—enjoying yourself. Download the app today and discover a world of opportunity.

Check in from anywhere with Mobile Check-in. Let us know when you’re arriving and you’ll receive a notification when your room is ready.

With Mobile Key you can get to your room faster, and never have to worry about forgetting a key card.  Use it to open your room, parking garage, fitness center, lounge, and pool. 

Mobile Chat lets you talk directly to your hotel. Available just before, during and even after your stay, ask the front desk for local recommendations, request amenities and more while on-the go. 

Need something? Mobile Requests gives you a list of amenities to choose from to customize your stay, or even ask for something you forgot, like a comb or toothpaste.

Plan ahead while you’re out exploring. Browse and order food and drinks from your hotel’s menu at participating properties, and it will be ready when you return. 

Search hotels and book all from your phone. Get our lowest rate when you book directly with Marriott. Earn and redeem points for your stays, for a rewarding vacation.

Manage your account easily on the app. Check your point balance, view your stay history, folio, and more.

Want to book with points? Easily redeem points on the app to pay for your next stay.

Enjoy exclusive offers and content for Marriott Bonvoy members that you can take advantage of right away.

Not a Marriott Bonvoy member? Download and join, all through the app.

The Marriott Bonvoy App lets you enjoy more at Marriott’s 30 brands including AC Hotels by Marriott®, Aloft® Hotels, Autograph Collection® Hotels, Bulgari®,Courtyard®, Delta Hotels®, Design HotelsTM, EDITION®, Element®, Fairfield Inn & Suites®, Four Points® by Sheraton, Gaylord Hotels®, JW Marriott®, Le Méridien®, Moxy® Hotels, Marriott Executive Apartments®, Marriott Hotels®, Marriott Vacation Club®, Protea Hotels®, Renaissance® Hotels, Residence Inn®, Sheraton®, SpringHill Suites®, St. Regis®, The Luxury Collection®, The Ritz-Carlton®, TownePlace Suites®, Tribute Portfolio®, W® Hotels and Westin® Hotels & Resorts.
releaseNotes:
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

We are constantly improving our app to offer you a frictionless trip planning and travel experience. Thank you for trusting the Marriott Bonvoy® App for your travel!

title: Pelipecky
description:
Pelipecky is your travel buddy. It finds the cheapest flight tickets, highlights the latest news, offers, discounts and promotions, it shows you how to travel round the world. Use this application as a travel and holiday inspiration. Download our travel articles to your phone and read them later and offline.

BENEFITS OF THE APP

HOT NEWS
Just click on the section “Hot News” and get the best deals 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. If we find a great flight ticket, holiday package or a new flight route, you can be sure you’ll find them here. Don’t forget to enable the push notifications to get the best deals and latest news. 

SIMPLE FLIGHT BOOKING 
You can book your flight easily, without filling the passengers’ contact details. Thanks to the simple registration and intuitive order management you’ll find, book and purchase your ticket easily for yourself and your family members. It’s a fast way of making reservations allowing you to book your tickets before they sell out.

OFFLINE TRAVEL GUIDES
Our articles, guides, holidays, tips and news about destinations can be saved in the app and read later. For example at the airport or on the airplane. 

BENEFITS AND DISCOUNTS
We give special discount codes to the TOP and fastest users of our app. You can redeem the codes directly in the app op buy flights or accommodation cheaper.

CHECK YOUR ORDER STATUS
Do you like the flight tickets and gift vouchers from Pelikan? You can also find them in the Pelipecky app. After booking your flight you can check the status of your reservation at any time. No unexpected event can surprise you.

UNIQUE FLIGHT COMBINATIONS 
Combine flights from different airlines and use small local airports. The section TOP flights at the best prices allows you to find the best deals quickly and easily.

ROUND THE WORLD TRIPS
Plan, choose and buy a trip around the world with the Pelipecky app. The application offers an easy selection of return and one-way tickets or tickets with different arrival and departure airports. Discover our Multicity deals and see the whole world with the Pelipecky.
 
APPLICATION FEATURES
- Return and one-way ticket searching and booking
- Multicity ticket searching and booking
- Flight filters by number of transfers, airports, airlines etc.
- Overview of reservations and orders
- Login to the App
- Travel Articles 
- Saving articles and viewing them offline
- Hot News
- iMessage stickers
releaseNotes:
NEW FEATURES:
- functionality to mark promotional calendars as favorite
- premium features directly in the app
- brand new hotel reviews 



UPGRADES:
- adjustment of passenger selection
- better overview of the purchased products in the order details
- minor bug fixes

Každé letenky, co jsme kdy koupili jsme vybrali v téhle aplikaci. Samozřejmě letenky poté kupujeme u společností. | Aplikace k ničemu. Nefunkční, odkazy nefungují, klamavé informace v notifikacích. Neodpovídá realitě. | Vůbec neodpovídá skutečnosti, nepoužitelné | Absolutně NEDOPORUČUJI jak může firma která prodává letenky zavřít krám v 16:00 středoevropského času potom se už nedá vůbec nic vyřídit změna letenky problémy cokoliv. Tzn. že např. v pátek vám zavřou v 16:00 a do pondělka do rána prostě nejste schopný cokoliv vyřešit je opravdu takový problém udělat normální infolinku nebo alespoň e-mail ???!!!Jelikož vidím že to je asi obrovský problém tak doporučuju všem jinou společnost která prodává letenky | Vše na jednom místě,nemusím už checkovat pořád web a email!👍🏻

title: Trip.com: Flight, Hotel, Train
description:
Winner of 'Europe’s Best Online Travel Agency 2023' from the World Travel Awards.
 
The Trip.com app is your trusted travel companion whenever and wherever you are. Get the app now to create your perfect trip at a fantastic price!
 
#Why is the Trip.com App Trust-worthy?
 
24/7 SERVICE GUARANTEE ► You can rely on timely customer support and post-booking protection with our 24/7 service guarantee. Our awarding-winning customer support helps every customer with a stress-free trip.
 
24 LANGUAGES SUPPORTED ► Switch the app to your native language and manage all your bookings with ease.
 
31 CURRENCIES & MULTIPLE PAYMENT OPTIONS ► We have a payment solution for international travellers. All frequently-used payment methods supported in the app.
 
TRAVEL INSURANCE ► Fly with peace of mind with our comprehensive travel insurance plans.
 
OFFICIAL PARTNERSHIPS ► Trip.com app is an official partner of National Rail, Eurostar, Ryanair, British Airways, meaning you have access to industry-leading travel products. In short, you can count on us for a reliable travel experience!
 
MEMBER-ONLY REWARDS ► Become a Trip member and get exclusive rewards, such as earning in our rewards scheme Trip Coins that will help you save more in the future. Join us now for free and get more for less!
 
#How can you get the best service at the best price on the Trip.com app?
 
FLIGHTS.
 
FIND YOUR PERFECT FLIGHT ► The Trip.com app offers flights to around 5,000 cities worldwide. You can even book a chartered flight! The Trip.com app lets you filter by price, flight duration, travel time, airline, or number of stops. Pick a multi-city itinerary, so you can fly into one city and out of another.
 
LOW-PRICE MAP ► The map offers our cheapest available flights worldwide, from Europe, Asia to the Americas, Oceania, and Africa. Get inspiration from thousands of routes and find your next adventure.
 
PRICE DROP ALERTS ► Can't find a flight in your price range? Just set up a price drop alert. We'll let you know as soon as it hits the point you're happy with.
 
FLIGHT STATUS CHECKER ► Enter your flight number and get real-time flight info.
 
TRAINS.
 
WORLDWIDE TRAIN TICKETS ► Whether you're hitting the rails in Europe (incl. the UK, France, Italy, Spain, and Germany), mainland China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, or South Korea, you'll find everything you need on Trip.com.
 
OFFICIAL PARTNERSHIPS ► We connect directly with the train's information for updated schedule info and prices, which lets you search quickly through available fares, saving you time and money.
 
SPLIT TICKETS ► Book your journey in separate segments and enjoy lower fares without compromising on your travel experience.
 
LIVE TRACKER ► We'll keep an eye on the status of your train. Check back one day before departure for the latest information.
 
HOTELS.
 
ADVANCED SEARCH FILTER ► On Trip.com, you can browse more than 1.4 million options worldwide. Whether you’re in the mood for a money-saving apartment stay or a luxury five-stay hotel, a cozy B&B or a fun-filled resort, it’s easy to find the right accommodation.
 
WE PRICE MATCH ► We aim to offer you the best possible price. If you find a cheaper option elsewhere, we'll refund the difference.
 
VERIFIED USER REVIEWS ► We have over 30 million verified hotel reviews to help you make your decision.
 
HOTEL AND FLIGHT BUNDLE BOOKING ► Save money by booking your hotel and flight together. If your flight is rescheduled, we'll guarantee your hotel room.
 
AND MORE.
 
TRIP.BEST RANKINGS ► You can find top attractions, family-friendly spots, natural sites and much more!
 
TRIP MANAGEMENT IN ONE APP ► You can add itinerary to your calendar, or save as a photo for offline use.
 
CAR RENTAL ► Free cancellation available!
 
Download the Trip.com app now to discover more amazing features and create your perfect trip - just like that!
releaseNotes:
We've been working hard to improve the Trip.com app, to make sure you have the best trip possible. Here's what's new:

【TripGenie 2.0】
TripGenie is an AI assistant created by Trip.com to help users with travel questions. Voice chat with TripGenie to get instant travel tips and personalized itineraries tailored just for you.

【China Travel Guide】
Planning a trip to China? Trip.com has everything you need. Search the keyword "China", to access Trip.com's exclusive 2024 China travel guide. From airport arrival to accommodation, transportation, sightseeing, shopping, payment solutions, and more, our travel guide will help you get the most out of your trip to China.

【Trip Map】
Finding your way between airports, hotels, stations, and attractions too chaotic? Make Trip.com your travel assistant. Trip Map is a DIY feature you can use to visually display travel routes. Just tap to view your personal map, distances, and itinerary times, and even optimize your route.

【Chuang Asia TH x Trip.com】
Chuang Asia Thailand Dream Voyage Star Search! Search "Chuang Asia" and vote for your favorite trainees! The winners will have an extra sharing session during the show! 

We hope you love our new app version. If you need help or have any feedback, feel free to contact our online customer support or leave an app review.

Have a great trip! 

The Trip.com Team

title: Air France - Book a flight
description:
Meet a pocket-sized travel assistant designed to help you at every step of your journey.





From booking a flight, checking in, and receiving real-time flight updates to managing your Flying Blue account, the Air France app is your must-have travel tool.





BOOK A FLIGHT

Book your ticket for any of our destinations using your preferred secure payment method. To save time on future bookings, simply add your contact information to your profile, and we’ll prefill your details. 




OBTAIN YOUR BOARDING PASS

Check in, select your seat, and obtain your boarding pass directly in the app.




STAY INFORMED

Turn on notifications and get real-time flight updates and exclusive content about your destination. You can also share your flight status with your loved ones to stay in touch with those on the ground.




MANAGE YOUR BOOKING

Need to review your ticket conditions, update your contact information or make a last-minute change to your booking? Manage your booking seamlessly directly in the app.



ENHANCE YOUR TRAVEL EXPERIENCE

Go the extra mile and add one of our extra travel options to your booking with a simple click (seat selection, special meals, lounge access, and more).



A SPECIAL SERVICE FOR YOUR CHILD

Is your child traveling alone via the trusted Kids Solo service? Track and manage their journey directly in the app.



ACCESS YOUR FLYING BLUE ACCOUNT

Check your Miles balance, book a rewards flight, modify your profile, and access your virtual Flying Blue card!
releaseNotes: This update fixes some bugs to increase the app's performance. We are constantly working on improving your experience. Please take a few minutes to tell us what you think!

title: TIER - Move Better
description:
OUR MISSION: NO EMISSION

TIER is reinventing how we travel within our cities by offering shared electric micro-mobility options as an alternative to traditional forms of urban transport. Take a TIER electric scooter and choose a sustainable and emission-free way to get around.

Our safe and affordable scooters, bikes, and mopeds are fully electric and climate-neutral, allowing you to contribute towards a cleaner, greener, and more sustainable city - all while having fun along the way. 

WHY OWN A CAR WHEN YOU CAN OWN THE STREETS

TIER scooters are conveniently placed in your city to make traveling from A to B hassle-free. Simply rent a TIER e-scooter near you on the map, scan the QR code and go!

• Why take a TIER?
• No CO2 emissions with TIER e-scooters
• Find parking easily
• Beat the traffic
• Save time
• Explore new cities
• Rent to live a get-up-and-go lifestyle
• Ride e-scooters with friends
• Commute with e-scooters to and from work
• Renting = Sharing is caring

To rent rather than to buy is how we take back our cities, and TIER mobility is here to help. Download the app, sign up, and start sharing scooters in seconds. Here’s how to use the TIER app


USING THE TIER APP

TIER electric scooters, bikes and mopeds give you the freedom to explore your city and to get where you need to be in a smart, safe, and sustainable way. Simply open the app and rent a ride with a few simple steps.

HOW TO START A TIER E-SCOOTER & GET GOING

• Download the TIER app, sign up, and add your preferred payment method
• Find a TIER scooter near you on the map
• Scan the QR code on the scooter to unlock it and start a ride
• Push the e-scooter forward to flick the kickstand back
• Put one foot on the board and push off with the other
• Push down the throttle to gain speed
• Let go of the throttle or use the brakes to slow down.
• Surf your city and enjoy the ride!

HOW TO END YOUR RIDE

• Find a safe place to park the scooter and flick the kickstand down
• Open the TIER app and tap 'End Ride'
• Get out there and live your best life!

APP FEATURES

The TIER mobile app is truly mobile. A sleek design and easy-to-use interface allow you to make the most of your smartphone as a tool for fast and efficient mobility.

• NAVIGATE nearby electric vehicles
• SCAN the QR code on a scooter to unlock it
• RING a scooter if you are having trouble finding it
• VERIFY your license to use e-mopeds (not required for e-scooter use)
• STORE minutes and unlocks in your wallet
• REDEEM free rides with a discount voucher or promo code
• REFER friends for free minutes
• SAVE money with our deals in the shop

RIDE MORE FOR LESS WITH OFFERS IN OUR SHOP

Save money with our monthly or daily passes. When you’re on the go, it’s better to pay a flat rate and get the most out of your usage!

• RIDER PLUS skip the unlock fee on every ride + 300 minutes!
• MONTHLY UNLOCKS no unlock fees. Pay only for minutes. 
• DAY PASS enjoy up to 45 minutes during each ride for free + no unlock fees

TAKE A TIER AND JOIN THE REVOLUTION AGAINST POLLUTION

TIER gives you access to sustainable urban travel. With our fleet of shared electric scooters in 100+ cities worldwide, TIER is on a mission to change mobility for good. So whether you're headed to work, class, or just around the block, let TIER get you to where you’re going on our scooters, bikes or mopeds.
releaseNotes: We've made some great changes to our app! Take a look at them.

title: What Would You Choose? Rather
description:
Would You Rather is a fun and addicting game where you have to choose between two difficult scenarios. 

This app contains hundreds of the best hand-picked Would You Rather questions

Features:
- Hundreds of questions
- Vote for your favorite option and view real time statistics on what one is more popular
_ Frequently updated with more content 
- 2 game modes to try. Normal and Adults (18+)
- Submit your own questions to be added into the game 
- Works offline. No Wi-Fi is required to play this game

Would You Rather is a great game to play with your family or friends to start conversations. 

What are you waiting for? Grab your friends and have a fun by playing a game of What Would You Choose.

title: SAP Concur
description:
If you use Concur® Travel, Concur® Expense or Concur® Invoice at work, then download this companion app to your iPhone or iPad to manage your travel and expenses when you’re on the go! 

With the SAP® Concur® mobile app, you can:
• Review and approve expense claims, invoices and travel requests
• Snap a photo of your receipt and instantly add it to your expense claim
• Book a flight or train ticket, reserve hotel rooms or rent a car 
• Update or add new attendees to meeting invites
• Get hotel suggestions based on your preferences
• Capture and track mileage automatically
• Integrate your itinerary with TripIt to get real-time travel alerts and updates

*This is a companion mobile app for existing users of SAP Concur solutions.*

REMOVALS

title: NS Travel Planner
description:
About the NS app
The free NS app is your ideal travelling companion. It lets you plan your entire journey to any address in the Netherlands and keep up to date with the latest travel information and any disruptions as you go. You can also easily check where you can hire a public transport bicycle or shared car in your area, or quickly find the nearest P+R if you are travelling partly by car. See how crowded it is on the train and have your tickets quickly on hand. Everything to help you get going by whatever transport suits you best today.

Why traveling with the NS app
+ Best app in the Public Transport category
+ over 2 million users
+ Quick, safe and easy payment
+ The “Nearby me” feature lets you see exactly which forms of transport are available in the neighbourhood, from train, bus, tram and metro to public transport bicycles and shared cars. All in a single overview. So it’s the easy way to plan your entire door-to-door journey.
+ Arrange it all easily in Mijn NS. You can check your balance, access your journey information, simply change your travel class and view and change your season tickets.

Feedback
Every journey starts with the NS app. That’s why we’re always improving the app with new functions that will help you with your journey even more. If you have any questions, tips or other feedback, let us know in the app. That will let us make the app experience even better!
releaseNotes:
Every journey starts in the NS app. That is why we keep improving the app with larger and smaller changes that help you on your way even more.

If you have any questions or suggestions, let us know in the app.

Enjoy your trip!

title: ESTA Mobile
description:
The Electronic System for Travel Authorization (ESTA) app from U.S. Customs and Border Protection allows Nationals of Visa Waiver Program (VWP) countries to apply and pay for a travel authorization without a visa. The ESTA app is a mobile version of the ESTA application process and information that can also be found on the ESTA website at https://esta.cbp.dhs.gov. 

The ESTA app currently has two features available: Apply for New Individual Application and Search for Existing Application.
•	The “GET STARTED” feature allows travelers to create a new ESTA application, pay for the ESTA and submit the application to be processed by the system to determine if they are eligible to travel to the United States under the Visa Waiver Program without a visa. The system will provide the traveler with an automated response.
•	The “FIND IT” feature allows travelers to check the status of their existing ESTA application..
CBP recommends that you apply for ESTA at the time you book your travel, but no less than 72 hours prior to boarding.
releaseNotes: Fix to address scanning issue with some recently issued passports

title: Careem – rides, food & more
description:
Meet Careem, the everything app for your everyday needs. Rides, food, groceries, payments and more. 
Unlock unlimited savings and exclusive benefits with Careem Plus. 


Yalla, simplify your life with a tap. 

Careem Plus
If you’re looking for value and unlimited savings, this subscription is for you. Save AED 200+ every month and unlock unbelievable benefits on rides, food, dining out, groceries, cleaning, plus more!
*Now in Dubai and Amman only, coming soon to more cities

GO anywhere
Book a ride or schedule a pick-up for later with affordable and comfortable car types - including city to city*, Hala taxi or local taxi services*. Or explore the city on two wheels with Careem Bike*! Enjoy instant 10% credit back on 10 rides and unlimited 45-minute bike rides with Careem Plus.
Explore our ride services: Hala taxi |  Comfort, Executive, Premier rides | Careem Bike | Car Rentals
*Services and Careem Plus benefits vary from location to location

EAT everything
Get your favourite food delivered on time and straight to your door. Customise your order to your liking, and track your food delivery in real time. Or discover Dubai’s finest restaurants with Careem DineOut. 
With Careem Plus you can skip the delivery fee on food and enjoy special discounts on  dining out. 
 Explore our food services: Food delivery | CareemDineOut 
*Services and Careem Plus benefits vary from location to location

GET anything
Get your groceries delivered in a flash with Quik Groceries and enjoy no delivery fee with Careem Plus.
Book everything from home cleaning to laundry, tickets, salon & spa services and more with just a tap.
Explore our services: Quik Groceries | Laundry | Home Cleaning | Tickets | Salon & Spa | Delivery 
*Services and Careem Plus benefits vary from location to location

PAY anyone
The easiest way is Careem Pay. Send money abroad, pay your bills, split the check and more, with just a tap. 
Explore our services: Send money | Split Bills | Bill Payments | Global transfers 
*Now in UAE only, coming soon to more countries
releaseNotes:
We had a look under the hood, crossed some wires. Uncrossed others. Sprinkled a little tech dust, and now your app experience is better than ever.

In this release:
- Updates in Rides, Food, and Pay experiences
- Various fixes and improvements

Our driver called me at 2:55 claiming that he needs a payment in cash and that it'll be 100Dhs instead of 50-73 which was the range the app listed. What I didn't realize at the time was that the app was already charging us the Careem credit so the driver was trying to scam us into double paying.

We needed to catch our flight so I agreed but said I needed to withdraw from ATM at the airport. The driver proceeded to drive us AWAY from the airport looking for ATMs because I refused to pay a large withdrawal fee at the one where he stopped for us. 

When I found out he wasn't going to the airport I threatened to call support and police at which point he finally turned around. At the airport I found out he was trying to double charge us the entire time.

I contacted Careem support with this case and they did not react.
