title: ParkSimply
releaseNotes:
Děkujeme, že využíváte aplikaci ParkSimply. Po měsíci jsme pro Vás opět připravili další vylepšení.
Co je nového?
- Celkově jsme zrychlili aplikaci.
- Přidali jsme pro Vás nový mapový ukazatel pro ještě příjemnější a rychlejší způsob výběru parkovací zóny.
- Upravili jsme pro Vás podobu parkovacího lístku tak, aby byla ještě přehlednější.
- Optimalizovali jsme sledování stavu objednávek, aby nedocházelo k potížím při objednání a delších odezvách platební brány.
- Přidali jsme Vám ikonu indikátoru zaplacené zóny včetně možnosti prokliknutí na detail parkovacího lístku.
- Zvýraznili jsme parkovací zóny.
- Vylepšili jsme chování a zobrazení informací v Dynamic Island (iOS).
- Neustále se snažíme graficky vylepšovat aplikaci tak, aby byla přehlednější a snazší na ovládání.
- AXIGON - Optimalizovali a vylepšili jsme platby pomocí tankovacích karet Shell a EuroOil vydaných společností AXIGON.
reviews:
Lepší je jet vlakem než autem a používat tuhle aplikaci. Pomalá, platba projde možna na podruhé. Prostě kekel. | Aplikace neustale nacita zony. A nikdy nenacte. | Aplikaci trvá desítky vteřin načíst zóny na mapě, platební brána funguje tak každý třetí pokus. | Zlatá stará verze téhle aplikace. Nova verze je nepřehledná, načítá se i 30s než můžete vybrat lístek! Udělejte s tím už něco! | Update: po generační změně aplikace, kdy byla přidána možnost platby přes ApplePay, tak jsem měl chvíli pocit, že problém s QR kódy byl vyřešen. Sice aplikace vykazovala pomalejší odezvu, ale kódy načítala a platba přes ApplePay rovněž fungovala. Bohužel po cca měsíci už není možné vůbec přes QR kód zaplatit, kód je údajně neplatný nebo se vůbec nenačte. Takže použití aplikace člověka pouze rozpálí doběla a musí běžet k automatu, kde je fronta 20 lidí. Opakovaně říkám - škoda, mohlo by to být super, ale muselo by to spolehlivě fungovat. | Aplikace se zabydlel v Dinamicis ostrově a nejde se jí zabavit. Parkovací lístek dávno vypršel, apku i ukončím, ale stejně je tam.
Navíc polohu to určuje vždycky hrozně dlouho a vždycky blbě. | Při scanu qr kódu nedochází k jeho načtení, aplikace vypíše chybu ze se zřejmě jedna o jiný qr kód.
Při GPS lokalizaci nebyla zcela správně načtena poloha a tak mi aplikace přiřadila jinou zónu.

Pokud se nacházím uvnitř budovy, nelze mnohdy aplikaci využít vůbec, neboť manuální vyber “kde parkuji” nelze provést, a GPS nechytne signál. | ať zvolim nové GUI, nebo staré GUI, vypl jsem automatický vyber zóny, smazal, reinstaloval a znova, po 30 sekundách, to padne a pak nejde už ani zapnout. iPhone XR | Od aktualizace nefunkcni,pada,nelze pouzit | Super aplikace, urcite doporučuji😀
Nová verze je skvělá! | Dobrý den, aplikace funguje v celku dobře a jsem s ní spokojený. Jediný problém, který dokáže nepříjemně překvapit je, že aplikace nepracuje s online časem. Připravil jsem si v aplikaci nákup parkovacího lístku předem a platbu provedl až po zaparkování. K mému překvapení se ale na lístek propsal starý čas - tedy čas, kdy jsem si parkovací lístek připravil. | Po redizajne sa mi aplikácia používa o dosť lepšie, len by som poprosil doplniť o slovenský jazyk. | Aplikace Vám umožní zakoupit si parkovací lístek i když je třeba svátek a parkování se neplatí.🫤 Chtělo by to nějaké upozornění. Např. cizinci nemusí vědět, že je u nás státní svátek.🤷‍♂️ | Aplikace laguje.
Na Androidu běží v pohodě, ale na iOSu se neskutečně seká.
Prosím o revizi. | Dobrý den,
všude vidím, že je možné platit s Apple Pay, ale aplikace to reálně neumožňuje? UX je též jak z prvních aplikací. Dle ostatních recenzí to není individuální názor... | Aplikace nepodporuje ApplePay, zároveň aplikace po zaplacení padá a není možné si zobrazit platbu. Městské policii jsem musel pracně dohledat přes internet potvrzení o zaplacení parkovného | Dobry den, proc aplikace nepodporuje tak zasadni vec, jakou je ApplePay? Bude dodano v novejsi verzi? | S iOS17 se na iPhoneSE 2020 nedá ani zapnout. Otevře se v jednom z dvaceti pokusů.
Pokud si chcete přidat kartu, tak máte smůlu, při pokusu o přidání karty do aplikace se hryzne a přestane odpovídat.
Nevím co je tak složitého na tom, vytvořit aplikaci co jde zapnout… | Po instalaci iOS 17 přestala aplikace fungovat. Spustí se úvodní obrazovka a po několika vteřinách se vypne. Děje se i po přeinstalování aplikace. | jakmile aplikaci spustím, okamžitě spadne odzkoušeno na 2 telefonech chodím přes web | Proč nelze platit pomoci Apple Pay? | Kdyby šlo dat 0 hvězdiček tak to dam. Aplikace jako z roku 1998 , když se člověk konečně dostane k placeni tak musí ručně vypisovat údaje z karty . Nejde ApplePay v roce 2023. | Bohužel v mém městě nefungují jiné aplikace než Sejf (což je vtip z let 2000-2010, který nechápu, že je ještě možné jej v toce 2023 nainstalovat, ale to sem nepatří) a právě Parksimply.
Ocenil bych:
- lepší a intuitivnější práci s mapou s náhledy zón
- možnost skrýt klávesnici odklikem/gestem - protože jakmile kliknu na zónu, najede formulář s klávesnicí a na mapu / o krok zpět se prostě nedostanu, takže vynucený restart aplikace a jde se do mapy znovu - což je brutálně frustrující a přijde mi to prostě odfláklé
- je rok 2023, Apple Pay by nebyl?

Jako jinak to běhá, ale je to frustrující zkušenost, když to srovnám s přívětivým UX a funkcemi aplikací CityMove nebo MPLA, které znám z jiných měst, ale které bohužel "naprosto úžasný" parkovací systém v mém "pokrokovém" městě nepodporuje... | Presne takto nechcete aby vyzerala apka na parkovanie. Pomale, neprehladne, keby bola na vyber moznost platit v automate alebo budce, bude to rychlejsie.
Aplikace nema ani schopnost kopirovat cislo karty pre platbu, proste uzasne zmrvena vec. | První šok - pokus o platbu, platil jsem RB kartou a musel jsem vypisovat číslo karty, snad první aplikace na iPhone kde nefunguje ApplePay. Šok druhý - poté, co jsem úspěšně autorizoval platbu, aplikace zamrzla. Po restartu app jsem zaplaťpánbůh parkovné viděl. To nejlepší nakonec - po nějaké době jsem si chtěl ověřit kolik mám času a aplikace už ani nenaběhla! Sorry, ale je to crap! | Při zadávání údajů aplikace několikrát spadla. Naštěstí si alespoň pamatuje RZ vozidla. Nicméně slibované ApplePay není, musíte ručně zadat číslo karty, což při možnosti zkopírovat ho z bankovní aplikace nechápu. Když to nabízí banka a je s tím v pohodě, proč to platební brána neumožňuje?
Ale jako test odolnosti vašich nervů je to dobré. Zvlášť když po zaparkování spěcháte na autobus a na parkovišti máte na výběr buď automat na mince (a kdo nosí běžně 200 v mincích?), nebo tuhle dementní aplikaci co padá.
Vývojář na to asi kašle, když poslední update byl před 8 mesici. | Skoda ze sem nejde prilozit fotka. Kazdopadne aplikace nefunguje. Napad je to pekny, jen skoda ze se ho neujal někdo, kdo umí vyvíjet aplikace. | ApplePay nelze použít, nelze vložit zkopírované číslo karty z bankovní aplikace - je nutné ho zadávat ručně, takže nakonec je rychlejší vhodit mince do automatu. Vývojář zjevně přemýšlel pouze nad tím, kolik si za platbu přirazí, ale nikoliv nad tím, jak uživateli usnadnit platbu za parkování. | Za mě všechno funguje. Snad jedině hledání toho kde jsem, by bylo fajn na kliknuti jako má v Praze Citymove | A nicemu nefunguje nehleda zbytecna aplikace | Je to nějaká univerzální aplikace a ne nativní pro iOS. Neumí Apple Pay. Pomalé a nepřehledné. Aplikace tak minulého století. | Aplikace splňuje svůj účel a funguje tak jak má. Díky | kartu musite mit pri sobe a nelze jeji udaje registrovat pri nastaveni aplikace to je teda fakt vychytavka jak od Ládi Hrušky. | I přes velmi dobré připojení k internetu (data, wifi, hotspot) se nedaří aplikaci stáhnout mapu kde se aktuálně zdržuji - opakované výpadky zaznamenané v Plzni, Praze, Chebu a dalších místech… | Parkovací poplatek 70 Kč mi byl stržen z účtu, ale parkovací lístek se v aplikaci neobjevil. Musel jsem zaplatit znovu v automatu. | No evidentne da. UX lvl 90's, ale hlavne...nejde s ni zaplatit parkovani 🙈 zlaty MPLA | Myslím si ze IT si s takovým problémem pořadí pi načtení QR kódu spadne ….. tím pádem když chcete po hokeji kde je fronta 20metru využít pravé tuto aplikaci tak mate smůlu! Kdyby fungovala verim , ze by ji použilo spoustu lidi takhle k …….. | Složité, komplikované, pomalé, nestabilní. 

Není možná platba přes Apple Pay a ve výsledku je cena VYŠŠÍ než u termináni na parkovišti. V mém případě 180 vs 200Kč. | Pokud potřebujete rychle odjet a zaplatit, použijte aplikaci která je rychlá a funkční. Akorát že vůbec | ParkSIMPLY. 
No bohužel není tak simply jak o sobě tvrdí. Nejde přidat platební karta, chybějící Apple pay v roce 2023 vypovídá hodně o přístupu vývojářů. Nepodařilo se mi zaplatit ani v jednom z případů co jsem to zkoušel. Dnes je v HK hokej a v parkovacím domě se obvykle tvoří několika minutové fronty plné velice “příjemných” lidí. Rád bych si takovou zkušenost odpustil právě vaší aplikací. Bohužel nelze a tak dávám 1⭐️ 
Pokud se vám podaří aplikaci dostat aspon na úroveň funkčnosti, rád ohodnotím lépe a doporučím. Dnes bohužel takto. | Aplikace nejde otevřít. Otevře se startovací okno a po nějaké chvíli se aplikace zavře. | Ukradlo mi to peníze, a závora mě nepustila, takže jsem platil 2x, NIKDO TO NESTAHUJTE | Nejde zaplatit. Po potvrzení platby v bance aplikace zamrzne. | Dřív pokaždé kdy jsem zaplatil, aplikace spadla a nešla znovu otevřít, musel jsem odinstalovat a znovu nainstalovat. To se děje pořád, jenže teď aplikace vůbec nefunguje, píše to že se aplikaci nepodařilo načíst servery nebo co a že nemám přístup k internetu. To samé se děje i kamarádce a oba jsme momentálně na wifi. | Celkem fajn. Jen by bylo dobry, kdyby v appce byly vsechny zakoupeny listky (platby), ne jen ten posledni. Pred Policii se tezko obhajuje cela doba parkovani. | Na starem iPhone 8 ani na novem iPhone 13 mini nefunguje. Po zaplaceni a ulozeni platebni karty nebo po zvoleni bezplatneho parkovani appka prestane fungovat. Nepomuze ani zavreni a znovu otevreni. Jedine reseni je smazat a znovu nainstalovat. | Je to tak tezky udelat jednoduchou a funkcni aplikaci??? | Zadam SPZ, vyberu zonu, zadam kod vcetne FNHK na zacatku, kod nenalezen. Zadam kod bez FNHK na zacatku, aplikace beze zpravy spadne. Takto to je uz cca ctvrt roku. Vizualne je to appka na urovni studenta stredni skoly. Doufam, ze Fakultni nemocnice Hradec Kralove za provoz nic neplati. | Dobrý den, dnes jsem si nainstalovat tuto aplikaci, po zaplacení na vybraném místě v Hradci mi už aplikace nechce naskočit. 
Zařízení: IPhone 12 mini 
Nevíte co s tím? | Zaplatit 9 procent navic, to je jodne a vi to i developer aplikace.  Proto Vas nenecha precidt terms&condition pri/pred jejich odkliknutim. Scam

title: WiFi Map: Internet, eSIM, VPN
description:
WiFi Map is an all-in-one app that will come in handy whenever you're on travel.

#1 App for Travellers in 100+ countries

WiFi Map and Passwords
Always find a free WiFi hotspot around. WiFi Map will navigate you to the nearest shared hotspots, show passwords, and let you connect to the internet in a few taps.
• millions of shared WiFi hotspots
• offline regions to find WiFi without the internet
• detailed map with hotspots and POIs
• guided navigation to public WiFi
• speed testing capabilities

eSIM
Stay online even without a Wi-Fi nearby. Get our eSIM now and access the internet wherever you go.
• Internet in 70+ countries
• 30 days validity
• 1GB, 3GB, 5GB and 10GB available packages
• fast refill
• High speed 4G and LTE networks
• no contract
• activation in a few taps


VPN
Secure your internet connection when using public hotspots. Select from dozens of VPN servers and enjoy fast, secure, and reliable internet access to your favourite services.

Handy Widgets
Meet small but useful widgets that contain all the information you may need while traveling. Find actual rates, calculate tips, keep an eye on the weather, and time from a single app.
• currency rates converter
• world clock
• tips calculator
• local weather
• and more

WiFi Map offers a subscription plan that gives you more functionality including downloadable offline regions, fast and secure VPN, and completely disabled ads.
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• An account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

----------------------------
Help Center and FAQ: https://intercom.help/wifi-map-help-center/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wifimapapp
Discord: https://discord.gg/pVyvsFbsD5
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wifimap.io
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wifimap/
Telegram: https://t.me/wifimap_io
Website: https://www.wifimap.io/
Email: support@wifimap.io
releaseNotes: We’ve made improvements and addressed bugs to bring you an enhanced WiFi Map experience.

Forcing you to constantly buy a VPN probably so they can steal user data and sell stats on what users are looking at. With any luck there will be a wifi password in the app but probably just old passwords. I also don't plan on adding anything new since the app is such a bazmek. | I really lile the idea of the app. It is so useful. | Good idea | Proste nejvic volnych wifi hesel pro. Eskou republiku. title: Rentalcars.com - Car hire App
description:
Rentalcars.com Car Hire App.
Need a great car at a great price – fast?Download our mobile app and you can...
1) Book the nearest car at the lowest price.Need a car on another continent? Or just around the corner? With over 49,000 locations worldwide, our app will find you the right hire car in the right place – at the best price.
2) Pick your car up with your phone.The Rentalcars.com eVoucher is accepted almost everywhere, so forget the printer. Just save your voucher on the app and pick your car up with your phone.
3) Enter your details once – and only once.Every booking, every driver, every credit card… our car hire app stores all the information securely, so you don’t need to re-enter your details every time you hire a car.
A great travel app for people on the go!
The world’s biggest...As the world’s biggest car hire booking service, we work with every major car hire company in the world and serve over 7.5 million customers every year. That means we can negotiate the best rates – and pass the savings on to you.
For exclusive deals in over 49,000 locations, download our app today.
releaseNotes:
We update our app on a regular basis, making it even faster, simpler and more reliable.

It’s already the ideal companion for anyone who loves the freedom and independence that only a car can provide.

And each new release means it’s easier than ever to find the perfect car, wherever your journey takes you.
reviews:
After more than a month. Not possible even get the help from customer service | Rentalcar ist sehr komplex und übersichtig. Danke | Nelze provest | App used to be real great, but not it is really laggy, has troubles loading reservations, payment is problematic (maybe caused by pay gate), in result becoming quite unpractical and uncomfortable to use. | Nelze hradit kartou z české republiky. | All was perfect. | Rentalcars omezí vaše práva na minimum. Vždy vyžaduje úplnou platbu. Nárok na vracení ceny i když zápůjčka není provedena neexistuje. Nelze nic změnit jen když zaplatíte 100%. Je to podvod na zákazníky. Nevystavi fakturu k platbě. | Fu*k witch!!! | I can’t chose country. I use app in Russian language. I start tap name of country (Чехия). List starts to be shorter, but I can’t chose this (and any other country). Re-download of app doesn’t help. Additionally, I don’t understand - “for what is this app?”, if standard Booking application has same section for rent car. | S | Не может обработать платёж! | Super apka | Ok. | It´s better than the website. In app I was able to change my reservation easily. | Vyborne, jednoduche a prehledne! | Vse funguje prehledne a jednoduse. | Funciona perfecto más rápido que bolear en la web. Podes scanneado tu tarjeta y guarda tus detalles. 

Yo agregaría un filtro por compañía 

Muy buena | Did not inform clearly about the need to have some special paper driving license. I was denied to pick up the car at the location. Our vacation was ruined. Rentalcars did not appologizie at all and kept our money. Would not recommend to anybody!!! | Simple smart easy to use I like it very much 😉👍 | The booking works seamlessly yet with one huge drawback. The local renting company tries to make money on full insurance - as with only excess insurance covering only up to 1500 € you might pay unforeseen costs. E.g. in Sicily the price of the full insurance was additional 56% of the original rent fee paid beforehand.
I would recommend the full insurance option to be part of the initial booking so that such rip off is not possible.

title: ISIC
description:
Get access to thousands of student offers and services available to ISIC cardholders worldwide. Discover what student discounts are available to you and instantly prove your student status with your digital ISIC card! The International Student Identity Card (ISIC) is the only internationally accepted proof of official student status for millions of students in over 130 countries. 

Features:

• Search thousands of ISIC offers worldwide and redeem them instantly
• Verify your student status with your digital ISIC card
• Browse and filter discounts around the world at the location of your choice
• View discounts near you on the map
• Store your favourite discounts and get notified about new offers	

You’re a student and don’t have your ISIC card yet? Visit www.isic.org to get your card now and start saving both at home and when you’re travelling abroad.

The ISIC Association is the non-profit organisation behind the International Student Identity Card (ISIC). The application can be also used for the International Youth Travel card (IYTC) and International Teacher Identity Card (ITIC).

Tell us what you like, dislike and need for future releases. We value and need your feedback to give you the best mobile experience out there. Email us at mobile@isic.org and we will get back to you.
releaseNotes: We have added support for Italian and Chinese language.
reviews:

We have a turnstille in the entrance to our university and i always have to unpack my whole bag to find my isic, so it would be really nice to just beep with your phone and go…..

Considering that’s the apps main purpose its quite bad | V poslední době se nechce zobrazit isic karta. Nefunguje ani na wifi ani na mobilních datech. But after a while even that doesn't work and I have to reinstall the app. | Nespolehlivá aplikace, při první použití bylo vše v pořádku, ale potom už se nikdy nenačetla. title: Road Trip: Fun adventure town!
description:
Expeditions, adventures, merges, and puzzles await you in our exciting Road Trip game! It is an amazing life story of a girl Alex and her friends. Become a part of it!
- Expeditions to islands, locations, and caves.
- Hundreds of levels and cool riddles.
- Exciting plot.
- Merge and puzzles.
- Lots and lots of fun.
Hurry up and play our game and enjoy all its features.

Casual Adventure Game! Mobile Application Adventure Game. Casual Adventure in your pocket! Road Trip: Royal merge Adventure Games is an Adventure Game about traveling through the world of secrets and mysteries!  World with a unique history and events awaits you! 
        Mobile application Road Trip: Royal merge Adventure games is a mobile application that is always with you in your mobile device. Mobile game is an Adventure for the whole family. Road Trip is a whole Klondike Adventure! Real family island with different locations and mysterious places. Casual Adventure game is waiting for you!

         Our Road Trip game is a unique township of story-driven Adventures and journeys. Merge items and have fun with the events! Journey through our game will introduce you to Alex, the main character of this story!
   Join Alex, an aspiring designer, on a journey to discover the secrets of unexplored lands!
   Merge items Alex and her friends desperately need in their Adventure!
   Visit the unusual locations of the 1980s and enjoy their authentic architecture and interiors!
   Complete quests to advance in your travels with Alex and earn fantastic rewards!
   Solve challenging puzzles encountered along the way!
   Many colorful characters, different backgrounds, professions: cooks, mechanics, gallery owners, adventurers, shamans and scammers. Many animals - for each location of our game Road Trip!

  - 30+ locations with different geographical settings: empty ones are replaced by mountain peaks, snow forests, tropical islands! Urban landscapes with wild thickets, jungle - all this is available in our mobile game Road Trip: Royal merge adventure! Real road Adventure with a constant change of scenery outside the window.
  - Each chapter is a separate living world, a reference to a certain American state and iconic places like Roswell and UFOs and the like!
  - Each location is a small story. Our game Road Trip gives freedom of genres and moods: there are action-packed adventures in the jungle, traps and crocodiles, mystical ghosts of the Hawaiian Islands, chases and bizarre mechanisms, reality TV shooting (intrigue, investigation), dates and balloon flights. Treasures and architectural puzzles, caves and ancient civilizations! Love line and a triangle in the fight for the heart of our heroine Alex!
  - Setting in the spirit of 1960-1980 blurred timelines, lack of modern gadgets, nostalgia for a bygone time!
  - Road Trip: Royal merge adventure games has a huge number of different mini-games! Play for fun!
  - Every month there is an update with new mechanics/time events. We release a new location every week!
  - Event Expeditions, time-limited expeditions with new mechanics in the merge! Treasury rooms, crafting, garden beds, energy generators at the location, tournaments, season pass, wheel of Fortune!

Road Trip is a matching puzzle merge adventure game! Game of merge items for the whole family. Play our relaxing puzzle merge game. You’ll match and merge items, solve puzzles. You can play our Road Trip game without internet!

     The great merge journey is about to begin! Have fun exploring the worlds of Road Trip!
releaseNotes:
Alex's journey continues! In this update, you'll find:
- Daily tasks and gifts for our favorite players!
- New albums with collectible cards.
- Attractive deals and offers. Hurry, they are time limited!
- Bonuses, surprises, and lots of rewards!
Enjoy!

title: SWISS
description:
Book flights, reserve seats and access your digital boarding passes. With the SWISS app, your mobile travel companion for journeys with the Lufthansa Group network airlines, you can do all this and more.
Push notifications will inform you of your flight’s status in real time, so you are kept up to date throughout your journey.
With the SWISS app you are always well informed, from booking your flight to the arrival of your baggage at your destination so you can rest assured that your journey will run smoothly. Your personal data and personalized services can all be conveniently managed on your smartphone.
In short, the SWISS app ensures you are well informed about all aspects of your flight.
The main features of the SWISS app:

Before your flight
•	Book your flight, reserve your seat and add your baggage: All this can be done conveniently in the app. You can also book a rental car or reserve or change your seat on the plane if you need to. With the app, you also have the option to add additional baggage.

•	Online check-in: Use the SWISS app to check in with ease for all flights operated by Lufthansa Group Network Airlines. Your digital flight ticket will be sent directly to your smartphone. Use the app to show your mobile boarding pass at the airport.

•	Travel ID and SWISS Miles and More: You now have the option of adding several payment methods to your Travel ID account so you can pay seamlessly and easily anytime and anywhere. To log in, use your Travel ID or SWISS Miles & More login credentials. Enter your personal data and personalized services to adapt the SWISS app to your needs.

•	Real-time information and flight status: In the 24 hours before your flight, your personal travel assistant will inform you of all important updates about your trip. Push notifications will appear on your home screen, so you always know when it’s time to check in or if there have been any gate changes. This way you always have an overview of your flight and the most current information.

During the flight
•	Flight ticket and on-board services: With the SWISS app, you always have your mobile boarding pass and on-board services in your pocket, even during the flight and when you’re offline. This means you receive important flight information when you need it, ensuring that any changes to your flight don’t come as a surprise.

After the flight
•	Track your baggage: Your digital travel companion is also there to lend a helping hand after landing. You can easily track your checked baggage in the SWISS app so you can arrive relaxed at your destination.
With the SWISS app, you can enjoy a carefree journey. From booking your flights and rental cars to receiving automatic information and updates on the day of travel, the smartphone app is your handy travel companion. You can also manage your personal data while on the go.
Download the SWISS app now and enjoy your flight! Your personal travel assistant is there for you before, during and after your journey.
Find out about our flight offers at swiss.com and follow us on Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and X to stay up to date.
If you have any questions or require support, please do not hesitate to get in touch. You can contact us at https://www.swiss.com/ch/en/customer-support/faq.

title: epu
description:
Aplikace epu je navržena tak, aby uživatelům ukázala i méně známá místa a vedla je k udržitelnému cestování s ohledem na okolní přírodu. Na trasách vás aplikace upozorní na zajímavá místa, která byste jinak mohli minout bez povšimnutí a můžete také sbírat virtuální druhy rostlin a živočichů, o kterých se formou krátkých zajímavostí dozvíte spoustu informací. Ke každému druhu si navíc můžete vyplnit i zábavné kvízy.

Aplikace vás formou chytrých notifikací informuje o vstupu do chráněných území, poskytne důležité informace o pravidlech chování a vysvětlí důvody případných zákazů či dočasných omezení. Díky tomu se uživatelé učí, jak přírodu respektovat a každý tak může přispět k ochraně biodiverzity. 
Ve spolupráci se všemi českými národními parky a Agenturou ochrany přírody a krajiny (AOPK) aplikace na jednom místě sdružuje aktuální informace národních parků a chráněných krajinných oblastí v ČR. Uživatelé jsou tak informováni o aktualitách, pořádaných akcích, uzavírkách či dočasných omezeních.

EPU také poskytuje komunitní platformu, kde mohou uživatelé snadno pořádat různé dobrovolnické akce, exkurze, společné výlety či nahlásit závadu na trase. Komunita může sloužit také pro sdílení zážitků a fotografií, uživatelé mohou diskutovat o trasách a získávat cenné rady od ostatních cestovatelů.
releaseNotes:
- oprava chybného výpočtu rozlohy oblasti
- upraveny texty v aplikaci pro lepší porozumnění
- vylepšené intro
- vylepšené nastavení práv a notifikací

title: Hilton Honors: Book Hotels
description:
The Hilton Honors app has everything you need for the perfect vacation. Book a hotel, earn rewards, plan your trip, and so much more — plus, it's free.

Top app features:
- View and manage your reservations in one place
- Check in before you arrive and go straight to your room (skip the front desk)
- Choose your room prior to your stay
- Unlock your door with your phone using Digital Key
- Book your next trip and find hotel deals

Member benefits:
- Get the lowest price at over 7,000 hotels when you book direct
- Earn Points with every stay and redeem them for free nights and perks with our partners
- Enjoy free WiFi, late checkout, and no charge for a second guest
- Achieve Elite member status and get perks like free upgrades, free continental breakfast or a Daily Food & Beverage Credit, and more

title: Tandem: Conversation exchange
description:
**The language learning app where millions of people teach each other.**

Languages are a 'learn by doing' kind of thing. This particular method is at the heart of Tandem, the global language exchange community. Connect with native speakers, start chatting and finally reach fluency in the language you’re learning!

Reach fluency in 300+ languages, including Spanish, English, Japanese, Korean, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified and Traditional Chinese, and 12 different sign languages, including American Sign Language.

Why Tandem helps you to practice and learn languages:

BOOST YOUR VOCABULARY
For the times when you’re struggling to find the correct words, our in-app translation feature helps you compose a message or translate an incoming one. 

PERFECT YOUR PRONUNCIATION
Fit in with the locals and improve your speaking skills using voice notes, audio and video calls.

GRASP THE GRAMMAR
Help each other grasp the difficult parts of language learning with our message correction and comment features.

TANDEM YOUR WAY
Forget strict schedules and learning by the book. Embrace your personal language learning style—whether that’s messaging, calling, or even meeting in person. 

DOWNLOAD TANDEM AND MASTER ANY LANGUAGE NOW!

______________

What is language exchange?
Tandem language learning is the process of joining forces with someone who is a native speaker of the language you want to learn. Through conversation with your Tandem partner, known as language exchange, you improve your language skills and develop intercultural competence.

Tandem’s core value is to unite people across borders through language learning. Languages hold great power for unity, inclusivity, and equality. Language and cultural exchange are keys to unlock global understanding in our increasingly interconnected world. 

How to learn languages on Tandem:
1. Select the language(s) you want to learn in the app
2. Tell us about your language learning goals and your ideal Tandem partner
3. Search for native speakers of your target language in the community 
4. Kick-off your language exchange experience by sending your first message
5. Share topics with the Tandem community so you can have meaningful conversations about what interests you
6. Keep up the conversation with your new Tandem “pen pal” and speak like a native in no time!

Tandem Pro— Upgrade to unlock the ultimate language learning tools:
- Unlimited translations
- Find members near me
- Search members by city
- Tandem Maps
- Profile visitor insights
- Profile verification and badge
- No ads

Read the Tandem Blog to get top tips, tricks, and interesting facts about everything language learning: https://www.tandem.net/blog
 
Got a question? Contact us on support@tandem.net or chat with us on our social channels...

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/TandemAppHQ
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@TandemAppHQ
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TandemLanguageApp/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TandemAppHQ
VK: https://vk.com/TandemAppHQ 

Licenses: Tandem – Language Exchange is licensed by Tandem Fundazioa (http://tandemcity.info)
www.tandem.net/pages/termsofservice
releaseNotes: Thank you for downloading Tandem, a place to connect to native speakers worldwide and practice the language you are learning. Some cheeky bugs were trying to distract you, but we found them and, well, let’s say, you don’t need to worry about them anymore... :)

title: European Coffee Trip
description:
Find a good coffee shop in a few clicks! European Coffee Trip is a mobile app built for coffee lovers and baristas living in or visiting Europe.

We manually curate a list of specialty coffee shops around Europe, from big cities to tiny villages, to guide you to excellent cafes nearby! Our database features over 3500 cafes in 39 countries that we handpicked for the best coffee experience.

We build this mobile to make it even easier to drink tasty coffee wherever you are!

-- KEY FEATURES --

- Find a specialty coffee shop nearby
- Find a specialty coffee in any European city
- Search by proximity or navigate through the map
- Filter cafes based on your preferences
- Browse through rich cafe profiles with photo galleries
- Plan your coffee trip in a few clicks

Our database is stored offline, on your phone, so you can browse and navigate even without the Internet. We regularly review and update cafe profiles with new photos, opening hours and offerings. You can quickly check if the cafe is open or not!

-- PICK THE RIGHT CAFE --

- Types of coffee: espresso, filter coffee or cold brew
- Food menu: breakfast or lunch
- Plant-based and vegan alternatives
- Kids or dogs friendly
- Internet access and laptop friendly

Our goal is to make it easy for people to drink delicious coffee. Avoid bad coffee; get the app!
releaseNotes:
Here’s what’s new in this update:

•  Fixed: We've fixed an issue with Google Maps navigation. Earlier, some users encountered wrong or multiple results when trying to navigate to a specific cafe. With this update, Google Maps will lead you directly to your chosen cafe, every time.
•  New Sponsors in 'About Us': Take a peek at the 'About Us' section! We're excited to introduce new sponsors who are joining us on this journey to enrich your coffee exploration.
•  Minor Updates: We’ve made some under-the-hood improvements for keeping the app up to date.
reviews: This app really helps me to save time during travels by finding the best coffee spots for me. I can plan my trip before, choose according to location or by the best looking photos. Also, I can send a report if the coffee was bad… | Really, the headline says it all. This really is a best app when it comes to finding and exploring new and fascinating speciality coffee shops. In the past, this app helped me to explore plenty of coffee shops all around Europe. For the past few years I have been living in Prague and to this day I still find this app very useful. So the only thing left to say is that you keep up the good work guys. Thanks. | This app is perfect for anyone that enjoys specialty coffee. title: Pulse for Booking.com partners

Our new property partner app lets you keep Booking.com in your pocket. Manage your property easier and faster – plus keep your guests happy anywhere, anytime.

Whats going on today?
-Stay up-to-date on today’s arrivals, departures, new bookings, cancellations, modifications, and reviews

Interact with your guests in a few taps
- Stay in touch via live chat between you and guests
- Use pre-translated templates to quickly reply to frequent requests

Quickly view at a glance…
- Your performance, updated daily
- Your reservations calendar for previous or upcoming activity
- Reservation details including the number of guests, rooms, room types and nights
- Total rate and breakdown per night
- Applicable cancellation policies

Download our app now

title: Mercedes me Service
description:
THE MERCEDES ME SERVICE APP AT A GLANCE

YOUR SERVICE STATUS
Your calendar is always pretty tight? No worries, with the Mercedes me Assistant app you always know when your maintenance or annual inspection is due and receive timely reminders about it. 

BOOK YOUR APPOINTMENTS
Whether it’s time for your inspection or you want to change your tires: Mercedes me Assistant provides you with a direct link to your Mercedes-Benz dealership to book your appointments in just a few taps. 

FIND THE DEALERSHIP FOR YOU
Easily find authorised Mercedes-Benz dealerships near you. Not sure whether a dealership can service your car? Mercedes me Assistant only shows dealerships fit for you and your car.

PERSONALISED OFFERS
Want your Mercedes-Benz in good hands for maintenance? Get access to service offers that are specially tailored to the needs of your car (requires Mercedes me connect services), and book them right at your preferred service dealer.

LEARN MORE ABOUT YOUR CAR
Not sure how to pair your smartphone with your new car? Do you want to do some small repairs by yourself? Access curated videos and articles to help you get the most out of your Mercedes-Benz.

ALWAYS WELL INFORMED
Ever left wondering what a warning lamp meant? No need to search for the manual. Mercedes me Assistant shows you active warning lamps (requires Mercedes me connect services) and gives you in-depth information about them and what to do next.

Please note: 
The Mercedes me connect services only work with Mercedes-Benz vehicles equipped with the Mercedes me connect communication module. The range of functions depends on the respective vehicle equipment and your booked services. Your Mercedes-Benz partner will be happy to advise you. An active, free Mercedes me account is required for use. The functions may be temporarily restricted due to insufficient data transmission bandwidth. Continuous use of the GPS function in the background can reduce battery life.
releaseNotes:
We are continuously working on improving the Mercedes me Service app. For this reason, there are regular app updates. This update includes the following changes:
- Bug fixes
- Performance improvements
- Damage report
reviews:
Nejlepší aplikace | Dobrý den, 

bohužel není možné zvolit servisní partnera jinde než v České Republice, čekal bych že v dnešní době by to mělo být možné. | Super funguje... | Dobrý den,s aplikaci jsem spokojen ale mám velký problém s tím že si nemohu zvolit servis v zahraničí,(Německo ) kam obvykle jezdím jelikož to mám blíže.Přibude tato možnost v nějaké další aktualizaci ?

title: Fly Delta
description:
Welcome to Fly Delta, Delta’s award winning iOS app. With our dynamic Today screen which provides quick access to your boarding pass and other important day-of-travel information, Fly Delta makes travel easier than ever before.

• Enroll in Delta's SkyMiles® program and earn miles every time you travel
• Find, compare and book Domestic and International flights
• Book SkyMiles award tickets
• Purchase Delta Comfort+™ seats and Trip Extras, including in-flight Wi-Fi, Priority Boarding and more
• Reserve Preferred Seats like bulkhead and aisle
• Rebook cancelled flights or missed connections
• Manage your trips, profile and customize your travel preferences
• Check your SkyMiles account balance and current Medallion® status
• Check in, view your boarding pass and add it to Apple Wallet
• Pay for checked bags and track their location
• Check the latest flight status and receive flight and gate change notifications
• Save a photo to remember your parking spot
• Check your status on the upgrade or standby list
• View or change your seat
• Locate Delta Sky Club® lounges
• View interactive airport maps, public transportation details and weather information
• Get detailed info about our fleet and partners
• Map flights en route with an interactive flight tracker
• “Today” gathers everything you need for your day of travel into one convenient place
• “Notifications” ensures you always have the latest flight updates, gate changes and more
• View countdown to departure and arrival along with gate and baggage carousel information on Apple Watch

The Fly Delta app for iPhone and delta.com are always free to use on Delta’s Wi-Fi-enabled flights. Visit delta.com/app for more information.

When downloading the Fly Delta app, you agree that your personal data will be processed in accordance with Delta’s Privacy Policy which can be accessed via the link below or on our website at delta.com.
releaseNotes:
•	Copying your SkyMiles and Confirmation number is easier than ever - just look for the copy icon.
•	Expanded support for pre-select menus to partner airlines.
•	Continued enhancements to streamline the check-in process.
•	Minor enhancements & bug fixes to keep things running smoothly.
reviews:
Let’s be honest, airline apps are bad. They’re basically just bad websites in the shape of an app. Delta’s app has some of these details but is better than the competition.

But it is still a painful, often useless and broken app.

The app constantly reports errs with no explanation. In the case of network errors once encountered they can’t be reaolved without restarting the app, no matter how good your network.

The upcoming trips UI is a mess. It doesn’t even have my flight dates. It shows I have a trip from the 5th to the 23rd for example but when you tap into the detail the flights themselves don’t have this info. And indeed due to the time difference my return flight was shown as leaving at 1.35AM. On the 23rd? No dear boy, the 24th. If I were to use the app as my primary Delta tool, which is kind of the goal, I’d probably miss my flight.

Likewise the profile system is barebones.

I’m lactose intolerant and can’t set a special meal as a default. Delta optimistically assumes I might be cured someday and so I have to manually add my special meal for each. And. Every. Flight.

As software goes this is truly a brick. | Doesn’t work, I was not able to check in any flight. 5 passangers.. only 2 of them checked in! | It working compare to some apps from competition. | For online check-in, the app was utterly unusable: it didn’t allow to add any checked bags even though I had allowance for two. Human check-in had no such problems. On the day of my flight, the “Today” screen reported repetitive failures when updating the state of my flight. The airport website was much more useful. | ...unstable. I really like the idea of having all my flight info via Delta in my pocket. Actually, I still like it, it's awesome. Booked a trip to NYC in September, wanted to use the app to select my seats (I was going for the Comfort+ seats in the Economy class), but everytime I try to enter my MasterCard data, the app collapses upon tapping the expiration date selection. Every single time. The iPad app on the other hand, doesn't even notice I tapped the seats, nothing happens to them. If you could fix this feauture, I'd be happy for 5 stars!

title: TfL Go: Live Tube, Bus & Rail
description:
Travel confidently around London with maps and live travel updates on our official TfL app. Check live arrival times for Tube, London Overground, DLR, Elizabeth line and Thameslink trains as well as Trams and IFS Cloud Cable Car. Make step-free journeys and look up station facilities. See on the map when stations and lifts are closed. Walking or cycling? Our reliable journey planner will map a safe route.

The app is built around our iconic Tube map. To get started:
• Touch the map or search to plan your journey
• See the status of all lines
• Check how busy each London Underground station is right now
• Re-route as you travel - we’ll suggest alternatives
• Switch to the step-free map for accessible journeys
• Find out when your next train, bus or tram is due
• Look up which platform your train will arrive on
• See when the stations you want to travel through are quieter
• Check out station information and facilities such as toilets

Most recently we’ve:
• Added more information about station toilets – find out where they are by gender and which ones are accessible and/or with baby changing facilities
• Built a new map showing nearby bus stops – making it simple to see where you can catch your bus from
• Refreshed the navigation – it’s even easier to get to the features you want

Our simple and clear layout is designed to make using the app easy for everyone.

Planning your journey: We’ll suggest multiple ways to get to your destination – you pick the one that suits you best. Choose the quickest journey, bus-only or one that’s step-free.

Check before you travel: See how the line is running and when to expect your next Tube, bus, train or tram

Freedom to explore: Choose the right travel options if you or someone you’re travelling with needs to avoid steps, lifts onto a train or in a station.

Bus stops near you: Find the bus stop nearest to where you are, and next bus live arrival information for every route.

Available underground via Wi-Fi (or 4G in some places) for live updates on the go.

What users have said:

“I think that out of all of the transport apps I have owned on my phone, this is by far the best”

“I love how clean the design of the app is & how easy it is to use. The best part of the app is it’s simplicity & how it helps you to navigate across London so effortlessly.”

“The map is awesome! The ability to zoom in and out and see more/less information as you do so. The station information is really useful and seeing which lines/stations are closed or have delays at a glance is really helpful. It’s also beautifully designed! Very slick, clean, and responsive.”

“The app is beautifully designed and free to use. Step free mode also works really well."

“This is a must have app … very much worth the wait. Well done TFL.”
releaseNotes: Improvements to VoiceOver support, plus some other bug fixes.
reviews: The one fair finder is missing in app | Amazing application. I am absolutely charmed with it. | The app is beautifully designed and free to use. Step free mode also works really well. Just maybe add a night tube and national rail map.

title: Cabify
description:
Whether you want to move around the city in a cab, in an electric motorcycle, order private car rides or send your things from one area of the city to the other, Cabify is your transportation and mobility app. And without giving up the most important thing: the safety and quality of your trips.

Cabify, the safe transportation option for your trips. Reach your destination in a premium cab or private car.

How does Cabify work?

1. Reserve or request your car or taxi ride. Indicate in the app where you are located. Select your destination, as well as the type of transportation you want to use: Cabify, cab, electric moped or delivery.
2. Confirm your request to order a trip and that's it! We will provide you with the details of the car or taxi and the driver, either for a trip or for a delivery.
3. Always know the estimated price before traveling. We will tell you how much you will pay for your car or cab ride. In addition, you can select the payment method that best suits you: debit card, credit card or cash.
4. Share your journey. Send the details of your trip to family and friends so that they know where you are at all times and make you feel even safer.

In addition, you will always move with maximum safety measures.

What are the advantages of traveling with Cabify?

- The safety of your trips is our priority. All trips are geolocated and can be shared immediately with any family member or friend. They will be able to see which taxi or car you are in, which driver you are with, and even where you are in your trip.
- A very easy to use app. You will be faster than Usain Bolt ordering a cab ride, riding an electric moped or making a delivery.
- Delivery. We don't just move you, we move your stuff too. Our drivers will take what you want from one place to another in their cars or motorcycles. It couldn't be easier!
- More options for you. Because we know you don't always travel the same way, we have cars and cabs for every occasion. Cabify for your day-to-day trips, Taxi to get there as soon as possible, electric motorcycles or Delivery to receive what you want.
- Carbon neutral trips. We offset all the CO2 emissions generated by your trips with Cabify. Choose a transportation option that thinks about the environment!
- The best drivers. At Cabify we have the most selective criteria when it comes to accepting car or cab drivers.
- No surprises. We show the price before you request a trip. This way you can travel with the peace of mind of knowing how much you are going to pay.
- 100% customization. You decide how to move. Choose from the payment method that best suits you to what beat you want to play on your radio.
- For everyone. Cabify's app is accessible for people with sight impairments, and we have accessibility settings for people with disabilities.

Where is Cabify available?

Cabify is now available in 7 countries so you can get around by car or cab. Order your taxi driver in cities like Bogota, Lima, Madrid or Buenos Aires and start enjoying more transportation options with the leading taxi app: car rides, motorcycle deliveries, airport cabs, and more. Get to know in detail all the services available in each city at cabify.com.

Want to use Cabify for drivers and become a taxi driver?

If you're passionate about helping others discover your city, find out more at cabify.com or download the Cabify Driver app.

Looking for corporate transportation for your company?

Offer the best transportation app to your employees. Open a corporate account to have a large fleet of cars and cabs available for your company's trips and deliveries. In addition, our management platform will allow you to have greater control of expenses.

Download Cabify, your car or taxi transportation app and move or send whatever you want around your city.
releaseNotes:
We're working hard to make sure you've got the whole city within reach via our app. In this version we've made a few adjustments to improve your experience.
- If you have a discount, we'll remind you of it from the start and we'll show you the final price with the discount applied.
- We corrected a few small errors for an improved experience.

title: MobiMatter: eSIM Marketplace
