To je velké mínus v jinak skvělé spliksci. | velmi povedena app pro predpovedi pocasi a prehled lyzarskych stredisek zejmena v Alpach.Predpovedi jsou az na 9 dni dopredu,nicmene jak uz tak na horach byva,relevantne to vychazi tak max. na dva dny - vice dopredu se velmi casto pocasi rapidne zmeni-ale to neni chyba aplikace,ale vyssi moc ;-) doporucuji ! | The best of...

title: myAudi
description:
The myAudi app connects your Audi to your life and gives you innovative functions & services for greater convenience as you drive.

The fourth generation of the myAudi app is now even easier to use and provides even more convenience every day. The new version marks the start of a continuous update process that will gradually revolutionise the myAudi app with an intuitive and user-centred interface.
The vehicle dashboard is the start of this process. It has been significantly simplified on the basis of customer feedback and visualises information such as the vehicle status in the form of cards. The new quick action drawer has the most important vehicle functions, which are always just one swipe away.

Get real-time information about your vehicle at any time and keep a constant eye on your fuel tank level, driving range, service appointments, warnings and much more. Plan journeys in the app from the comfort of your own home and send destinations and routes directly to your vehicle. You can also remotely adjust climate control and open/close vehicle doors. (The availability of services may vary, depending on the model and equipment of your Audi)


OVERVIEW OF FUNCTIONS AND BENEFITS:

myAudi connect services
­	Keep track of important vehicle data and access information about your fuel tank level, driving range or oil level, right from your mobile device
­	Program the climate control to suit you, even before you get into the vehicle
­	Open and close your vehicle remotely

Audi e-tron
­	Use the myAudi app to plan and manage the charging process conveniently
­	Access specific information, such as electric range, charging status and remaining charging time

Navigation
­	Send destinations and routes from your mobile device to your vehicle
­	Plan your routes, including the walking route to the vehicle
­	Access contacts, addresses and your calendar from your vehicle

Service
­	Keep an eye on service appointments, upcoming maintenance, and all other information about additional work on your vehicle
­	Use the app to access your digital owner's manual 
­	Find your nearest Audi Service Partner
­	Manage costs and journeys with the digital cost and mileage tracker


You must register on myAudi to use the myAudi connect services. The availability of services may vary, depending on the model and equipment of your Audi. The myAudi app is provided by the importer for the applicable market. See the app legal notice for details about the importer.
Some functions depend on third-party providers and may not be available without restrictions at all times or in every country. We recommend a flat-rate high-speed data package to use our services – the applicable costs depend on your contract with the network operator. If you do not have a fast enough data connection, you may not get the full benefit of the features. Please also note any data volume restrictions imposed by your mobile service provider.
If you have questions, please contact us at kundenbetreuung@audi.de.
Running GPS continuously in the background can reduce the battery life.
releaseNotes:
- With our new Lock Screen Widgets, you can have information, e.g. the remaining range, displayed directly on the lock screen.
- Consistently fast and reliable: Our latest update brings the myAudi app back up to speed.
reviews:
Dear Audi team .  
   Last year I bought beautiful Q5 50 TDI 2020. 
  I am very confused by the fact that my application ( recently I have both) plug and play & my Audi…  
  I have spent €40 to make little control over very few options on luxury premium car. 
  To compare with  Lincoln Navigator  (wife) or even Volvo XC 90 -( my daughter ) … 
  It seems to me very poor coverage of many many extras I have in my car Audi…
   Please take more care about your recent offer of iPhone connection to “my Audi “application..
  It seems not very generous to pay €20 for very poor comparison to World leading SUV’s 
   Thank you very much, your Entusiates Vladimir Varhol | This is the only application in my iPhone which requires typing username and password after every turning on/off of the iPhone. Imagine doing this for every application in iPhone! It is absurd and make this app useless- I am not going to do this every day | Disappointed with the application for Audi RS7 last gen. actually, it can't do much... the other car companies are better with technology... where is the technical advance?????? | It takes longer to the car to react | The doesn’t always function as it should. The shop is impossible to use, failing even the most basic functions. Hot line availability is very limited. Very poor user experience. | Hello...aplication is very poor compare to e.g. Skoda app. I have a lot ideas how to improve. Feel free to ask me 😉. | Ještě horší app než u Škody. Mám zaregistrovaný mail a nejde se přihlásit. Pořád to píše nějakou chybu. Prostě za mne  šmejd! | The problem with this app is that it barely connects to my car. 
In half of the cases it doesnt even gets the latest status of the car or the car is not able to receive any command. Well, there is just one real function, the heating.
If the connection is successful, it always takes good 20 or 30 seconds to get ready. That means 20 seconds of waiting to switch the heating on. 20 seconds if you are lucky. In other cases I give up after one minute and try again. You dont really want to spend these minutes in the rush mornings.  
In unsuccessful cases it says “unknown error” or “not connected to the internet” (I am) or it just tries to connect to the car or do the task for a very long time. 
I like my brand new A6 but this app frustrates me so much. Such a disappointment!
After you fix this, also please add some more functions and I dont really mean a shop for bikes and scooters. | Velmi často se mi stává, že SW vykazuje “neznámou”chybu, auto nenačte, dálkově neodemkne atd. | Malé zlepšení přehlednosti by pomohlo. Také pod menu výbava by mohlo být více položek než jen VIN a barva vozidla . Zkratka by aplikace měla být více intuitivní .

Funguje dobře , ale mohla by být rychlejší při komunikaci s vozem. Nastavování nezávislého topení  pro 1 čas je nedostatečné . Doplnil bych spotřebu pro historické jízdy . | Nic moc apka do mob ! | The connection with my car is horrible via this app. The car availability is fifty fifty that car will not be reached. I am sad from this quality. | Audi should have better app than this. Škoda has way better app than audi. | The application looks nice and it’s simple to use. It would be great to include more features in! It’s very basic at this point! I was surprised when dealer offered me Bluetooth plug combined with other application to track trip data… This doesn’t feel right for a premium car manufactured in 2023. Please consider extending features of this application to not require a plug. | In general, the app doesn’t have much features, I’d expect much more (driving data, trips,…), especially from a premium brand.

All the car-related actions (lock, heating, …) take too long process.

As for the bugs, one of the latest is: supposedly, I cannot open a detail of a news (which is not in my language) due to no car in the app (of course it’s there). | Nefunguje odeslani  cile do auta do navigace | Hrozne, pomale, malo funkci, opravdova ostuda, meli by se ucit od Muska. | I’m not able to select another language in the app. The language is set depending on your residence country but it’s confusing if you are not native speaker. | Hey Audi, I think you can imagine that there are a lot of foreigners living in Czechia don't know Czech! Please give a choise of language in the app🙏🏼 Even only English will be perfect. | I enjoy the app, but will welcome more statistics about my routes. 
Great will be some alerts like when the car stays on one place for longer time and is not locked, or windows are opened.

I don’t know why after last but one update was disabled the possibility to run frequent actions directly by pushing on the icon of the app | Very slow app with many bugs like can’t load data etc. bad user experience:( | It just says that it is not possible to update vehicle status (eTron 2019).

Can’t view the baterry info, can’t start A/C, can’t do anything.

Can’t understand, why even basic test cannot be performed before the app goes live. | V nové verzi 4.13.0 přestala fungovat veškerá komunikace s vozidlem Q4. Aplikace hlásí, že nemůže spojit se serverem. Nepomohla ani reinstalace. Předchozí verze fungovala. | App 90% off time doesn’t work, even worse with each update. Now about one year of Q4 Etron owning I really hate Audi! What the support do?! | Cíle odeslané z aplikace se ve vozidle nezobrazují. | Doesn't Wok | Update of the data in the app takes ages and nit accurate (i still got low oil warning no matter that it is ok). But you cant see nothing more than mileage and % of fuel in the tank. I would expect something like Audi connect plug and play - history of drives, fuel economy, effectiveness etc.. This is not “vorsprung durch technika”… | Aplikace dobrá, bohužel nelze dokupovat výbavu přes My Audi. | Repeatedly falling down, disconnecting and connecting again. Unreliable. | First, the app can’t do too many things on my Audi A3 2020. I can only check whether my car is locked and how much fuel I have.

When I try to send a location to the car’s navigation, it takes eternity to actually fetch it in the car. I send it on my way to the car and receive it after like 10 Km of drive. Sometimes I receive it the next day… stupidest thing to send it over some Audi servers, when it can be sent via Bluetooth. But I know you want know everything about your customers.

Second thing is the annoying launch whenever I sit in the car. Can’t turn it off anywhere.. Just searching something on my phone and that damn app pops up in my face. Never seen that BS in any other app.

The only useful thing that keeps me from uninstalling is that I can check whether I locked my car if I’m not sure. Otherwise completely useless in my A3. You should start thinking about the users, not just yourself how to collect information about us. | Šíleně pomalé načítání, minimum užitečných funkcí, design .. | Proč firma jako AUDI neumí udělat funkční Aplikaci? Auta za milióny a apka k ničemu. Věčně nefunkční. | Aplikace je úplně k ničemu. Inzerované funkce vzdáleného ovládání vůbec nefungují ani po dvou letech update aplikace. Dnes se nedá přihlásit na servery myAudi, jak z aplikace tak už i z webu. Za rok to zase zkusím. Pokud bych viděl něco opravdu špatného na audi, tak je to tato aplikace a přístup audi to nějak řešit. | The app it self doesn’t show all functions as they are shown on the web page of my Audi…!!! Why??? Hey Audi wake up and look at Mercedes or BMW!!!!  I own and S7 Audi 2017… | Cannot register my car even after multiple discussions with support. | Unfortunately, this application is not good.
I don't understand if Audi have not the money to pay good programmers, but this app was done by a bunch of amateurs from school.
To clarify the problem, I will also write the car I have - the Audi Q7 E-tron
1) communication of the application with the car sometimes works, sometimes not. I didn't figure out where the problem was.
2) when I want to turn on the independent heating, the application sometimes responds for more than 1 minute, but sometimes it starts and sometimes it doesn't. I just point out that there is a SIM with enought data lmit in the car and the car is usually fully charged.
3) Unlocking / locking the car takes at least 10 seconds.
4) Restoring the condition of the car in App takes at least 10 seconds, sometimes 50 seconds!
 
I don't understand why such a company like Audi is not able to make an application that works without problems.

Hope it will be better in next version... | my car is very often unavailable, the data cannot be loaded and therefore, for example, independent heating cannot be switched on in winter. you can't mean that | Čím dal horší. | It seems that Audi is trying to make this app even worse with every new release. Huge connectivity issues. Nothing work as expected. I would like to give you minus one star but it is not possible unfortunately. | Často nefunguje nebo velká prodleva | This app is just "A Try" to be Smart. Good start for old fashioned car maker but poor for 21st century. No charging stats. Option to create trip tracking means to fill all by hand like in excel without using data from the car. Complicates interface. I like Audi, so hoping to make progress in IT soon. Two stars for e-tron itself :-)). | Tato aplikace je uplne k nicemu. Nic vlastne neumi a ani nenabizi, tahle appka ani v realu neodpovida screen-shotu v ramci teto nabidky v app storu. Jedine co vam to ukaze je, jak vase auto vypada na dokonale fotce. Jsem zklamany z celeho audi stylu ... | Audi A6 BJ 2020, in der App keine Anzeige von Füllstand, Fahrzeugzustand, u.ä.. | Shame. Shame. Shame. Somebody from Audi importer made a huge fail. Skoda or Volkswagen are online on app. Buying a Q7 was a obvious mistake. The seller even do not warn your that the Audi has not license for tele-services in CZE. I am going to sell it very quickly. The rumors says the services will be online in 2nd half of 2020 but it might happen that online sevices might be only for new models... | Hi guys. I could not event register in the app. This is a shame. | Well, Audi is a fine car maker, but that is probably all for now. 21st century is something they apparently try to ignore, because their approach towards ensuring reliability of this app may not be described by words admissible to these reviews. But this
might be too harsh rating for the app itself, since the problems are rather on the IT infrastructure of “connected” services. Is it normal that servers often crash just before weekend, so that comfortably resting Audi IT crowd does not make any remedy until Monday? Still glad that car goes without being connected to internet, but nothing more - navigation targets, remote control etc. is just nonexistent... would anybody use e-mail client if emails just stopped regularly  going in and out for two days? 
Two stars for the cars. | Koupil jsem AUDI A6 allroad v DRESDEN , ale ani to není záruka funkční aplikace. Absolutně se do ni nedá přihlásit a komunikace s autem je takřka nemožná . | Sorry guys, it’s 2019.. I paid almost 3 mil for Q8 and App myAudi is one of biggest disappointment in my life. The better aplication get owner of Skoda Kodiac. | Tak jak byla špatná aplikace audi connect tak ještě horší je myAudi. Důvod je to, ze z aplikace zmizelo i to málo co bylo v audi connect. I přes to ze v náhledu aplikace je vidět možnost ovládání auta tak to ve skutečnosti v ČR nefunguje což je u auta z roku 2017 za bezmála 3mil. velmi smutné. Pokud chcete aby tyto funkce fungovali tak si nekupujte Audi v ČR. | Z 10 pokusu o nacteni dat z vozidla se to podari jen jednou. Jinak stale zobrazuje chybu: (MBBConnector.MBBError chyba 0)
Prakticky nepouzitelne.

title: Adventurer: Hike & Explore
description:
Bring out your inner adventurer with the Adventurer app! Discover the wonders of nature on hiking and backpacking trails, conquer mountain peaks, and explore the great outdoors to experience unforgettable adventures.

Get inspired by hundreds of trails, treks and nature trips. The Adventurer app will be your unique guide for planning outdoor activities and orientation on the hike.

Everything comfortably in one place, without complicated research, a heavy backpack, or uncertainty.

HUNDREDS OF HIKING TRAILS, TREKS AND NATURE TRIPS
Choose and get inspired by countless outdoor trails, hikes, nature trips, walk trails, and backpacking routes. Every week we add new trails that will take you on another adventure that you will remember for a lifetime. Mountains, mountain ridges, deep forests, plains and other amazing places.


DETAILED INFORMATION FOR YOUR PLANNING
For each hike, trail, or trip you will find all the key information:
• Basic parameters of the trail, such as length, average duration of the hike, highest point of the trail, elevation, difficulty, type of hike, whether it is possible to camp in the area, and if the hike is suitable for dogs.
• Accommodations in the vicinity of the route that are possible to book.
• A detailed map that will show you, in addition to the trail itself, where you may find water sources in your vicinity, shelters for sleeping, or suitable places for camping and also attractions that you may come across during the hike.
• A detailed but engaging description of the hiking trail, which will help you always find your way around.
• Necessary equipment - if there is any equipment needed to finish the trail, you will know about it!
• Possible dangers - we want you to be able to prepare for anything.
• Weather forecast and daylight info - find out what the weather will be like on the day of your trip.
• Trail photos that give you a vivid and precise picture of where exactly you are going.

DETAILED MAPS & OFFLINE MAPS
Sometimes it is necessary to look at a trail from a different perspective. In the Adventurer app, you will be able to switch between several types of maps: satellite, tourist, and even outdoor.
Adventurer Club members will also have access to offline maps that will guide you even in the case that you don’t have access to the internet. You can also use various map overlays that allow you to see the approaching weather relevant to your location, light pollution in the area, and more.

GPS NAVIGATION TO THE TRAILHEAD
Don't want to spend precious time trying to find out how to drive to the trailhead? Well, you can forget all about that! Just use the navigation button that is part of each trail and the Adventurer app will show you the nearest route to the starting point of your adventure.

RECORDING OF OWN TRAILS AND PERFORMANCE WITH GPS ACTIVITY TRACKER
The GPS recording feature allows you to create your own trails. To plan the hike, the app will also show you the total length, time spent moving, the highest point of the trip, the elevation gain, the average pace, and the total climb.

DETAILED STATISTICS
You will receive a detailed performance record from each hike, which will then be reflected in the summary statistics, allowing you to monitor your overall progress.

ADVENTURER CLUB
With the PRO version of the app you will get:
• Offline access without the need for internet connection
• Map overlays - weather, wind, clouds…
• More types of maps - touristic, terrain, etc.
• Access to alternative routes 
• To use the Adventurer app free of ads
• Discounts on our partners' products - Adventure Menu, Skinners and more
• To become part of a community of travelers and outdoor enthusiasts
• To support a unique project - thanks to you, adventurer, we will be able to create new hiking trails and bring you experiences that will stay with you all your life.

Hiking trails app free - walking trails, hikes, and running trails

Terms of use: https://apple.co/3Cvvt52
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using the Adventurer app! This update includes:
- 7-day trial on Adventurer Club (premium app version)
- bug fixes and performance improvements
Download the update and go exploring, adventurer!
reviews:
Nejlepší apka na výlety 👌👌 | baví mě, když se chci vydat na různě obtížný trek, stačí zadat lokalitu a hned vidím kam se můžu podívat, zda je v okoli o možnost načerpat vodu, zda je cesta vhodná pro děti, psy apod. a zda je monost i přespat po cestě | Skvělá aplikace pro všechny dobrodruhy, kteří hledají inspiraci. | Skvela a intuitivni aplikace, diky ktere konecne nemusim travit cas vymyslenim vyletu a dobrodruzstvi. Za me 5/5 | Aplikace mě uchvátila hned po prvním spuštění, je nádherně zpracovaná, přehledná a obsahuje nespočet výletů. Strašně se mi líbí, že v aplikaci najdu všechno, co bych před túrou ráda věděla, například vím, jak dlouho přibližně trasa bude trvat, zda mohu po cestě kempovat či jestli je trasa dog friendly. V aplikaci je možno najít také možnosti ubytování v okolí trasy, což je za mě také velké + a pokud chcete opravdu někam vyrazit, máte to téměř bez práce s touto aplikací. 
Velké díky a klobouk dolů. | Výborná aplikace na výlety. Hezky zpracované a popisy také sedí. Doporučuji. | Nápad skvělý ale provedení příšerný. Aplikace se mi během túry někdy sama vypíná a nebo mě dokonce odhlásí ( i když mám zaškrtnuté pamatovat si mě, nikdy tam nemám svůj účet s musím vše vyplňovat znova). Když už se mi podaří zdolat túru bez problému, po uložení a dokončení trasy a vyzvednutí xp se mi pak aplikace snaží říct ze vlastně jsem žádnou túru neudělala, i když mi predtim napsala ze ji mám uloženou, tak najednou není. Docela zklamání 😔 | Aplikaci jsem využil ale chybí mi tam par věci.Hlavně bych přivítal kdyby tam šlo nahrát již absolvované trasy třeba s Garminu nebo jiné zaznamenané aplikace. Přeci jen člověk využívá i jiné chytré hodinky. A taky naštve když vám aplikace v polovině trasy vypne a vám pak zmizí záznam. | Nejlepší aplikace pro ty, co rádi chodí! Každý si najde své. Treky méně náročné, více náročné, výšlapy, okruhy,… Každý trek krásně popsaný, doložené fotografie a spousta užitečných informací. | Super aplikace, hlavně pro hikery. Akorát podrobnější info je za placenou verzi. Jinak super | ♥️
V případě problému, super rychla komunikace s vývojáři apky :)
Výletů plno a popsané do detailů. | Zatím super, jen by to chtělo více výletů v mém okolí. | If you hike, you don’t need anything else. Great platform and social network. | I wanted to use it after a while and the app is not working. So safe your money for membership etc and download ALLTRAILS :) see you on hikes | Kopie jiných apps, ne příliš user friendly. Malá databáze a srandovní překlad do angličtiny (defaultně nastavená na mém iP). Prostě zbytečná appka, které rádoby cool reklamky na sockách nepomůžou k větší popularitě… | Super aplikace, která jako všechny má nějaký ten nešvar, ale vše hned umí obratně vyřešit! A to se cenní. Navíc má spoustu super treků, které ti určitě nedojdou. Zejména u zahraničních výšlapů, máš super popis, který se hodí, když nejsi zrovna “jazykově” nadaný. Alespoň nezabloudíš. | Byla by to super appka, kdyby se neustále sama od sebe nevypínala | Skvělá aplikace. Dobrý popis cest. Skvělý je při rozcestí natočení telefonu na stranu a hned vím kam mám jít. | Skvělá inspirace 👍 | Skvela aplikace, ktera mi pomaha na kazdem kroku v prirode. Jen tak dal! :) | Skvělá aplikace, díky které jsme si naplánovali výlet bez jakýchkoliv problémů. V této aplikaci máte vše na jednom místě včetně vyznačených pítek. 💧Velice tuto aplikaci doporučuji pro všechny horaly. | It’s very user friendly! And so helpful if you are starting as a hiker… also so nice to finally find an app in czech with treks with the instructions in English :D | Skvělá aplikace s užitečnými informacemi pro dobrodružství. Ať už větší nebo menší. Díky ní jsem odhalila i spoustu hezkých míst, které máme kousek. | Appka vhodná jak pro zkušené hikery tak i pro začátečníky. Nemáš orientační smysl nebo si jenom nejsi jistý, podle čeho vybrat zajímavou trasu? Tak to je tahle appka ideálním řešením 😊 | Aplikace je skvělá pro dobrodruhy všech kategorií. Skvěle se hodí pro hledání vhodné trasy a získání všech důležitých informací, které k cestě potřebujete👍🏻 | Great app for discover new opportunities for hiking or some adventure! You can find there from easier hikes to difficulr climbing adventure! | Nelze hledat trasy, pokud nejsem přímo na místě | Zatím nezklamala 😍 | Na 100% ji využiji při svých oblíbených aktivitách | Perfektní appka na hiky a treky | Mnoho treků, které přibývají každý týden s detailním popisem a informacemi. Nádherný design. Skvělá komunita okolo aplikace - doporučuji zkouknout i úžasné rozhovory na jejich instagramu moderované příjemnou slečnou nebo překrásným fousatým moderátorem. | Nejlepsi aplikace na kterou jsem narazila. Naprosto spokejenost. 🤩 | This app is awesome choice for people who like to travel (especially hiking). You can find usefull built-in fetures, such as water sources and camping spots on the track or any equipment you need to succesfully complete every route. | Úplně perfekt aplikace hele. Zatím jsem nenašel žádnou nedokonalost. Vývojářský tým odvedl skvělou práci. Díky adventurerovi je pro mne procházka do lesa nevídané dobrodružství. | Naprostej top!!! Přesně to, co jsem hledala! 🤍 | Pri registrácii nie je možné v hesle použiť iné znaky ako písmená a číslice, bez registrácie sa do aplikácie nedostanem, takže ju inak neviem ohodnotiť. | Jen mě udivuje, že je někdo ochoten platit tak vysoké částky za členství a ještě ke všemu měsíčně.🥵  Vím že nic není zdarma, ale .....  
Držím pěsti s vývojem.  Dark mode by bodl. | Zdravim, hned po registraci mi appka spadne, 3x jsem zkusila a vzdy mi spadla..co s tim? | S přítelkyní jsme využili appku tento víkend a naprostá spokojenost. Zajímalo nás, zda bude appka opravdu správně merit nás trek, tak jsme ještě mimo to měřili přes garmin. Vše sedělo (čas, délku, trasu). 

Navíc design naprosto v TOPU! 😍(a to jsem si ještě před par lety vůbec nedokázal představit, ze budu nějakou podobnou aplikaci využívat). | Tahle aplikace je nejvíc, tolik výletů na jednom místě. 😍 | Konečně něco propracovaného na cesty!🤩🙏🏼 Doporučuji všema deseti. | Na appku jsem se hrozně těšila kvůli mapě blízkých tracků s podrobnými informacemi a fotkami. A to taky obsahuje. Jsem hrozně ráda, že tu něco takového je a že se podle toho dá i rozumně plánovat. Ráda objevuji nové traily. Dost oceňuji i reálné hodnocení obtížnosti tracku, které konečně obtížnost tras nenadhodnocuje, jako tomu je u jiných poskytovatelů. Je to zkrátka dělaný především pro relativně fit lidi. Za mě palce nahoru. | Nejlepší aplikace na cestování. | Moc se mi líbí přehledný a hezky zpracovány design. Ukáže vám i jaké túry máte v okolí, což je za mě super, protože nemusíte vyhledávat zdlouhavě na internetu, kam se tedy v okolí vydat + tam k tomu máte všechny potřebné informace, jako např. jak obtížná trasa je, co s sebou či předpověď počasí. Konečně vše na jednom místě. Rozhodně doporučuji. | Aplikace je přehledná a dokáže dodat inspiraci na túry a výlety, kterých je tu fakt spousta. Líbí se mi nápad, že vidím, jestli můžu vzít pejska a kde jsou zdroje vody, s tím jsem měl už dříve problém na některých trasách. Celkově je to moc hezky zpracované.
Rozhodně DOPORUČUJI

title: DPMO
description:
Aplikace DPMO umožňuje jednoduchý nákup elektronických jízdenek platných na linkách DPMO, a.s. přímo ve vašem telefonu.
 
Aplikace přináší možnost jednoduše zakoupit elektronickou jízdenku DPMO na pár kliknutí a následně se prokázat jízdenkou přímo v telefonu pomocí QR kódu. Mějte po ruce aktuální informace z dopravy, schéma přestupních uzlů nebo nám zašlete podnět prostřednictvím kontaktního formuláře.
releaseNotes: Drobné úpravy, zvýšení stability běhu aplikace
reviews:
Po nepodařeném zakoupení jízdenky nefunguje tlačítko "platba již proběhla" a nevrátí to peníze | Po aktualizaci hrůza. Nové UI se dá zvládnout i znovu vybrat platební metodu když moc nespěcháte. Ale že při dalším objednání jízdenky aplikace napíše, že "Platba bohužel neproběhla", ale později si všimnete, že platba se strhla a dokonce jízdenka je v aplikaci objevila jako aktivní je za mě chyba aplikace, která obírá uživatele o peníze. | Dnes přestala fungovat možnost ApplePay, po zaplaceni nahlásí aplikace chybu. U jiných aplikací AP funguje. | Aplikaci používám delší dobu a většinu času funguje bez problému, ale už se mi 2x stalo, že při platbě nastala chyba, peníze jste mi strhli, ale jízdenku jsem nedostal. (1x ve starší verzi, 1x v té aktuální).

Problém by možná šel reprodukovat takto:
1. Připojte se na data i wifi
2. Zvolte nákup jízdenky
3. V průběhu platby vypněte wifi
4. Platba by měla skončit neúspěchem, ale na straně banky by měla proběhnout 
(iPhone 8, iOS 16.7, DPMO 2.0, platba přes Apple Pay) | Veloe minus aplikace je nomoznost si koupit dopredu. Jizdenka se aktivuje automaticky za mne fatalni minus aplikace. Vlastne aplikace k nicemu jen draha nadstavba sms jizdenky. | Proč se nedá koupit měsíční jízdenka? | Škoda, že chybí možnost koupit více zónové jízdenky. Nemám tak stále důvod přejít z aplikace Sejf. Ceník jízdného i vyznačení zón by mohl být nějak přehledně zapracováno přímo v aplikaci a ne odkazovat na web. To je trochu amatérské, jak jinak celá aplikace vypadá hezky. | Neaktivujte jízdenky hned, v Lítačce jsem zvyklí, že se musí ručně kliknout pro aktivaci koupené, takhle jsem si ji “koupil” dopředu a když nastoupil, zjistil, že už mi skončila a tak koupil ještě jednu. | Dobrý den, 

aplikaci používám nějaký čas a vše běžně funguje bez problému. 

Dnes však nejdou skrz aplikaci kupovat jízdenky, objevuje se pouze upozornění 
“nelze založit objednávku”.

Mohli byste mi, prosím, pomoci tento problém vyřešit? Aplikaci jsem zkoušel smazat a znovu stáhnout, restartoval jsem i telefon. Bez odezvy. Děkuji. | Po prvním nákupu jízdenky již žádný nelze jiný nelze provést. Uplně stejně je na tom nyní aplikac Sejf, skrze kterou jsem jízdenky nakupoval skoro každý den! 
Prosím o opravu. Nenosím u sebe hotovost a nehodlám platit pokuty za něco, co nefunguje Dopravnímu podniku! Díky :) | Použivám už delší dobu a mohu jen doporučit. Mocnost | Aplikace moc nepomáhá když nefunguje a člověk si nemá v danou chvíli jak jinak koupit jízdenku pokud s sebou nenosí hotovost a spoléhá na appku. | Provedl jsem svůj první nákup a zatím se zdá být všechno v pořádku 😉😉😉. Tedy ještě mě nekontroloval revizor 😂😂😂.

Jsem rád za možnost Apple Pay 👍👍👍. | Okrem platby cestovného nezvláda prakticky nič, ani len vyhľadať spojenie.. Neštrukturované aktuality sú neprehľadné, posun na najnovšiu nefunguje, ďalšie informácie sú len odkazy na web (bez akejkoľvek optimalizácie pre mobilné zariadenia), celkovo je aplikácia mimoriadne hnusná a všetko možné, len nie užívateľsky prívetivá.. | Ušetří to hodně času než někdy na poslední chvíli vytahovat mezi lidma platební kartu a ne fakt si do tyhle appky udaje o kartě ukládat nebudu | Dělá to, co má - prodej krátkodobých jízdenek. Vše bez problémů, s doplněním funkce Apple Pay bude nákup ještě snazší. Vlastní aplikace je podle mě mnohem lepší řešení než obskurní Sejf. | Chybí platební tlačítko “Pay with Pay”. | Když pominu, že je možné koupit jen 2 typy jízdenek, což mi na většinu cestování po Olomouci stačí, tak je tu problém s placením.
Lze platit pouze kartou (nikoliv přes Apple Pay) což je značně nepohodlné. Buď dám zapamatovat platební údaje, nebo budu muset při každé platbě zadávat kartu znovu. Přesně pro toto funguje Apple Pay, dam kartu jedné společnosti, která je pro mě důvěryhodná a pak platím vše přes tuto společnost a nezadávám citlivé informace do každé aplikace, nebo jiné webové služby.
Aplikace je určitě dobrý nápad, ale chce to ještě dotáhnout. | Proč nelze zakoupit měsíčni nebo čtvrtletní jízdenku??? :( jízdenku za 18,- di můžu koupit přes sms, na to nepotřebuji aplikaci

title: Velkobílovičtí vinaři
description: Spolek Velkobílovických vinařů si pro Vás připravil přehlednou online aplikaci, která Vás pomocí mapy zavede do každého vinařství ve Velkých Bílovicích. V aplikaci kromě kontaktů a navigace do vinařství můžete vidět, které vinařství má právě otevřeno, kde probíhá akce "Za vinařem", jestli je možnost objednání degustace a nebo ubytovací kapacitu.
releaseNotes:
- zobrazení viničních tratí v aplikaci
- drobné úpravy

title: ProCamera. Raw+ Manual Camera
description:
THE ORIGINAL: ProCamera is the ultimate photo and video app for photography enthusiasts, creative minds, and professional users. Experience the power of a DSLR camera in the palm of your hand with ProCamera's robust features and seamless integration with your iOS photo library.

ProCamera brings a perfect blend of simplicity and sophistication, allowing you to effortlessly capture stunning images and videos with your iPhone and iPad. Choose from easy point-and-shoot mode or dive into full manual controls with just a tap, making ProCamera your go-to app for all your visual needs.

Elevate your photography with our comprehensive editing tools, giving you complete creative control over every aspect of your captured images.

––– FEATURE-RICH CAPTURE EXPERIENCE –––

- Auto, Semi-Auto, full Manual mode
- Independent focus & exposure control
- Manual focus & focus peaking
- Exposure compensation with zebra Stripes
- Portrait mode with depth preview
- Support for all lenses (ultra wide, wide, tele, LiDAR)
- RAW, ProRAW, TIFF, JPG & HEIF
- Manual white balance
- 48 MP photos (iPhone 14 Pro and up)
- Selftimer & ProTimer intervalometer
- Selfie mode with display flash
- OIS image stabilization on/off
- EXIF & metadata viewer
- Live Histogram
- Configurable capture quality
- Optical & digital zoom (up to 24x)
- Aspect Ratios (4:3, 5:4, 3:2, 1:1, 16:9, 2:1, 2.4:1, 3:1, golden ratio)
- Adjustable LED light
- EDR and ISO-HDR
- Anti-Shake
- Rapid Fire photo series
- Apple Watch Remote Trigger
- Powerful gallery with iCloud integration
- Support for iOS albums
- Graycard calibration
- Mirroring options
- Photo Compass
- Code Scanner (QR, Barcode,…)
- Date stamp & copyright field
- Volume button trigger & full screen trigger
- Optional on-device save location (Lightbox does not sync with iCloud)
- 3D Tiltmeter

––– ADDITIONAL VIDEO FEATURES –––

- Video resolution options (4K, 1080, 720, 480 VGA)
- Frame rates (24, 25, 30, 48, 50, 60, 96, 100, 120, 192, 200, 240 fps)
- Codecs (H.264, H.265 HEVC, ProRes 422)
- ProRes codecs (ProRes, Proxy, LT, HQ)
- Log profile ProRes
- High bitrate recording
- Record to external USB-C drive
- Connect bluetooth, lightning, USB microphones
- Stereo audio & Audiometer
- Disk space indicator
- Still photo capture while filming

––– PHOTO EDITING –––

- ProRAW/RAW Editing with EDR support
- Depth editing (Bokeh, simulated aperture)
- 80+ photo filters
- Wide range of pro tools
- Export options (resize, convert to jpeg, remove geotag)
- Perspective correction (with ProCamera Up)

––– PROCAMERA UP: UNLOCK PREMIUM FEATURES –––

Upgrade to ProCamera Up for access to exclusive features such as Auto Perspective Correct with Live Preview for professional-looking photos free of perspective distortion, Custom Camera Presets (Exposure, WB, Focus), Anamorphic Lens Support, (RAW) Exposure Bracketing, safeguarded Private Lightbox folder, and specialty photo filter sets. The optional upgrade is available as a one-time purchase or as a subscription. Terms & Conditions: https://procameraterms.cocologics.com

Discover the potential of ProCamera as your go-to app for capturing breathtaking photos and videos. Unleash your inner artist and transform your photography experience with ProCamera.
releaseNotes:
We are delighted to introduce a suite of enhancements to elevate your photography to new heights. 

[+] BLACK AND WHITE MODE
Capture stunning photos in classic black and white style! Now you can switch on the black and white live preview in the viewfinder to master exposure and achieve perfect contrasts for your monochrome shots (second page of control panel). Enjoy a 100% non-destructive workflow, giving you the freedom to revert to color or customize the black and white conversion at any time.

[+] TRUE HDR
Now you can effortlessly export your gain-map HDR photos as ISO-HDR photos in ProCamera’s Editing Studio (10-bit HEIC and 16-bit TIFF formats available). Although gain-map HDR is best for compatibility, HDR information can be lost when sharing. That’s where ISO-HDR photos come in handy, as they maintain the high dynamic range on all HDR-capable displays.

[+] HDR PHOTOS AS VIDEO CLIPS
Ever want to seamlessly incorporate HDR photos into your video projects? We understand the frustration when video editing programs fall short. ProCamera comes to the rescue with the ability to export your HDR photos as HDR 10-bit video clips. Easily integrate these clips into any video project, ensuring your visuals shine with brilliance. This feature is exclusively included in the ProCamera Up feature bundle. Simply open your HDR photo in our Studio, tap and hold the save button, and select this game-changing option. Dive deeper into this feature on our blog.

[+] FOCUS PEAKING 2.0
Precision meets efficiency with our revamped Focus Peaking for spot-on manual focus! What’s more, we’ve drastically optimized battery usage and the Focus Loupe has received enhancements for greater accuracy.
And for all ProCamera Up users, we’re excited to introduce an exclusive upgrade – the innovative Dual Color peaking feature. It’s designed to guide you more intuitively towards achieving the perfect focus setting, adding another layer of precision to your photography toolkit.

+++ 17.1:

[+] LOG PROFILE PRORES RECORDING
Elevate your videography with Apple ProRes recordings in Log profile on iPhone 15 Pro (Max). Enable it in ProCamera Settings: Video Quality > Advanced Settings.  

[+] RECORDING TO EXTERNAL USB-C DRIVE
Use the USB-C port on the new iPhones to record videos (ProRes, HEVC, H.264) directly to an external storage device.

[+] ACTION BUTTON SHORTCUTS
ProCamera now provides ready-made shortcuts to launch ProCamera in Photo/Video/Selfie mode with the new action button. When ProCamera is already open in this mode, you can press the action button to capture.

[+] LATEST IMPROVEMENTS
Optimizations for the new iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Pro generation, as well as improved handling of anamorphic desqueeze in ProCamera’s album.

+++++

If you have any suggestions or find a bug, please let us know via in-app support or email us at support@procamera-app.com.

Visit blog.procamera-app.com for the latest information about ProCamera.

If you enjoy our app, please consider leaving a review in the App Store or updating your previous one. Every single review is much appreciated.
reviews:
Přesto že si appku koupíte, uvitř Vás čekají další poplatky za premium a to jsou přeaně Ty věci které vyžadujete v appce za 250kč Nedoporučuji!!! 👎 | Vůbec nechápu tuhle aplikaci. Mám pocit že standartní fotoaparát který je v iPhonu už nainstalovaný fotí lepe. vůbec tam nejde dát 10 s nebo 20 s dlouhý čas. nikde nemůžu najít nějaký vysvětlivky co na co slouží | Líbí se mi stálé vylepšení appky | OK, bud can't pay “up”. | Thank you for this amazing app! | Fajn appka, líbí se mi třeba možnost srovnání linií už při expozici, na druhou stranu LowLight+ nic moc, nativní Fotoaparát dává při automatické několikasekundové expozici mnohem lepší výsledky. Používám iPhone 13 Pro a 13 mini. | Výborná aplikace, jeste dodělat slow motion a timelaps a bude to dokonale!! | Zkoušel jsem i jiné apky.Tato mi vyhovuje nejvíc . Chtělo by to Český jazyk. | The “capture quality” setting really have no effect on the final image, so it is not possible to get a photo with a more natural look as advertised here. I have taken a many series of photos for comparsion, but even after close zooming there is no difference between Highly detailed and Natural settings. In a direct comparison of photos with the native Apple app, even the ProCamera photos are a bit more contrasty, which is exactly what I didn't expect from the app.
In addition the app is unstable, crashes or shows a black screen instead of life view. | Nefunguje mi hey siri udělej fotku | Za mne velmi spatne, kvalita rawu horsi nez od iphonu…zklamani | Not usable for CRT video recording for retrogaming. Manual shutter focus lock gets reset to auto when switching lens between 0.5 and 1.0x. Then when switching from 30fps 4k to 60fps 4k, you cannot set shutter speed even as 1/60? Only 1/61 is the minimum. Unable to sync with 50hz and 60hz monitor refresh rate. | The app doesn’t function after update to iOS 16. It felt after every start | It can't focus on nearby objects like the native app. Not even in manual mode. Overall, it focuses slowly. | 👍 | Thank you a lot for the only one long lasting disadvantage of the ProCamera app - now solved in the last update - an auto reset of set time or ISO in SI mode when entering a preview of taken picture. Now the app is perfect! Great job 👏 | Ještě bych přidal podporu gimbalů a je dokonalá. | Po poslední aktualizaci nejde změnit ikona aplikace na ploše v nastavení. Je to sice prkotina, ale u placené aplikace by to asi mělo vše fungovat. IPhone 12 Pro Max.
Edit: Teď po opravě je to už za pět! Parádní appka.👍 | Proč je na sílu změněna ikona aplikace a ve výběru nelze provést záměnu za původní? Tak jak jsem byl zvyklý? Že by směr Apple? Jedině vývojář ví nejlépe, co já vlastně chci? Jinak dobrá aplikace!🤨 | ..a nejde mi dát zpět ta na kterou jsem zvyklý 😩 | Jak aktivovat noční režim v aplikaci na iPhonu 12? | Za mne spokojenost. | Po dnešní aktualizaci funguje perfektně. Díky | Zatím nejlepší, co jsem pro iPhone vyzkoušel.
Můžete si nastavit mnoho funkcí, které jinde nenajdete. | There is so much great functionality! But it is more important that one can use it easily. | peki15 | 👍👍👍 | Zajímavé , vyzkousim | Today I tried the selfie mode for the first time, and I got a bright green screen. It is in the app, because the default camera of the phone works. Could you fix it, please? | Skvělá a spolehlivá aplikace pro toho, kdo to s focením myslí, alespoň trošku vážně. | Jako aplikace na focení je velice dobrá, obvzlášť když se zapne HDR.
Má několik skvělých funkcí např. focení ve tmě.
Celkově je aplikace velmí dobře udělaná | that I am surprised that Apple hasn’t bought them long time ago :-))

It is unbelievable what quality pics it can produce in very low-light conditions. And in any conditions ;-) | ... | I like it | Good application, it does what I expected. I decided to use this because of iPhone missing aspect 16:9. There are number of paid features which I bought and never really used. Still missing live photos but this seems to be unique to Apple camera only | HDR a zejména noční režim jsou perfektní. Doporučuji. | Perfektní | I love you camera | Velká spokojenost | Hello,

There is some kind of change? The camera is not working on fullscreen anymore? I dont like the Black frame around... Is it possible to enable it?

Thanks | Vyuzijte vsech moznosti vaseho ifoto :-) | The results are rather disappointing. The app is very slow and buggy at times, on my iPhone XS. (all the pictures are now saved as Normal, no more Vivid od Dramatic filters etc). | Than U bought app, you will have to buy otber functions like HDR | Akorát to z vás vytáhne 27kč a pak ještě ke vsěmu to po vás bude chtít za každou funkci dalších 80kč.Rozhodně nekupujte!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! | Naprostá spokojenost!

title: Nomad eSIM: Prepaid Data Plan
description:
Travel like a local with Nomad!
Get high speed, flexible, no-contract eSIM data and SMS at unbeatable prices. No more switching out SIM cards - get connected in 5 minutes! Install and activate eSIMs in 165+ countries and 8 regions. Get international eSIM data plans from as low as $1.5 / GB across Europe, North America, Asia and many more. Regional and country-specific plans are also available to suit your travel needs.
Share your Nomad referral code to your friends, you’ll get 300 points (equivalent to $3) for your future purchases for each successful referral. Your friends will also get $3 off for their first purchase.

What is an eSIM?
eSIM stands for embedded SIM and allows you to get connected anywhere, anytime, on (most) flagship devices, without ever having to visit a shop or buy a physical SIM card. As long as your phone is compatible, you’re good to go.
Check compatible devices here: https://www.getnomad.app/shop/support_device

Nomad major features include:
*eSIM Data plans for 165+ countries and 8 regions.
*SMS packs for US, UK and Canada at this moment.
*Loyalty points, add-on purchases (top-up),  multi-currency payments, multi-languages and data usage monitoring.
*Get recommendations and find inspiration for things to do and eat while on your trip and much more coming up!

Why Nomad: The Easiest Way to Get Connected
Near-local Prices: No contract, no hidden fees, no unexpected roaming charges.
Connect instantly: No more waiting in line, get your eSIM contactlessly within 5 mins. Easy installation via QR code.
Convenient & Flexible: Keep your primary SIM for call & text, no more swapping SIMs at the airport.
Find Travel Inspirations: Select the descriptors of what you are looking for and get recommendations! Pin or save it if you want to shortlist the place, or swipe left to reject it and see more recommendations.

How Nomad Works:
*Buy an eSIM Data Plan: Search for your destination and pick any data pack - from 1 GB to Unlimited data plans
*Install the eSIM: Easy one-click installation or install via QR code. QR code will be sent to your email and Nomad App.
*Activate your plan: Only activate when ready to use, please make sure you're connected to Wi-Fi or have stable data connection.
*Buy a SMS plan: Choose a plan from US, UK or Canada - from 100 texts to 500 texts, and you’re all set! Anyone can receive and send texts to/from you. Your SMS plan is also good for both local and international texting at the same great rate!

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us at https://getnomad.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new or send us email through hello@getnomad.app

Visit www.getnomad.app to find out more about Nomad.
releaseNotes:
- new eSIM data plans
- UI update
reviews: I had bought eSim from Airalo which broke down suddenly and i wasnt able to reach their support for more than 2 days, but luckily I was able to get working eSim from here which literally saved me. Thank you so so much you got a new loyal customer now. 🫶 | Well well well. Had a bit of a reserved approach for this app before buying my first eSIM. BUT ended up buying eSIMs for both of my phones when I was in US, recommending it to my colleagues and friends. Don't mess this up when I'll be in UK. If it'll work even there the same effortless way, you'll definitely have an ambassador in me!

title: inDrive: Ride & Drive with us
description:
Silicon Valley’s new success story, inDrive is a free ride-hailing app available in more than 600 cities in 47 countries. We are growing fast by putting the power back in the hands of people.

inDrive first emerged as a taxi alternative — a mobility app where affordable rides for passengers would still mean well-paid rides for drivers. 
 
But now, there’s so much more to it. You can use inDrive to travel to other cities, send and receive packages, book a truck for your personal or business needs, and even hire a local pro to help you with whatever you need. You can also sign up as a driver, courier, or tasker.

The main idea is the same for all services: A fair price is the one you agree on — not hope for. inDrive exists to prove that people can always come to an agreement. 

What We Offer
CITY RIDES
Affordable everyday rides with no surge pricing. You get to set the fare and choose your ride based on the driver’s price offer, rating, number of completed rides, car model, and pickup time.

INTERCITY RIDES
A safe and convenient way to travel between cities. Specify your destination, pickup date, time and location, offer your fare and request a ride. 

COURIER SERVICES
This door-to-door on-demand delivery service is a fast and safe way to send and receive packages of up to 20 kilos. Offer your fare ​​and track your delivery in real-time.

FREIGHT SERVICES
Book a truck for your delivery and moving needs. Set the time and the fare and specify any extra details in the comments. Wait for the offers to roll in and choose the one that works best for you.

PROFESSIONAL SERVICES
From home improvement to tutoring and beauty care services. Describe your task, name your price and get skilled help from local pros you can trust.

Why choose inDrive
QUICK AND EASY
It's simple and fast to request an affordable ride — just enter points "A" and "B" in the app, name the fare you are willing to pay, and choose your driver.

OFFER YOUR FARE
inDrive provides you with a tailored, surge-free ride-hailing experience. Here you, and not the algorithm, decide on the fare and choose the driver. We do not set the pricing according to time and mileage like other services. You agree on a win-win price with the driver before the ride starts.

CHOOSE YOUR DRIVER
inDrive lets you choose your driver from a list of the drivers who accepted your ride request. Pick them based on the best deal, arrival time, driver's rating, number of completed trips, and even a car model.

STAY SAFE
See the driver's name, car model, license plate number, and the number of previously completed trips before accepting the ride. During your trip, you can share the driver's information and the real-time location of the car with your family or friends using the "Share Your Ride" button. Your real-time geolocation can be shared via messengers, social networks, e-mail, or SMS Text. All of that is there to make your experience safe & trusted. We're continuously adding new safety features to the app to make sure both riders and drivers can enjoy 100% safe rides.

ADD TRAVEL OPTIONS
Do you have specific requirements? Specify travel add-ons — SUV, extra stops on the way, a child seat, or accommodating special needs. You can write your specific needs or any other details in the comments field like "traveling with my pet," “I have luggage," etc.

SIGN UP AS A DRIVER & MAKE EXTRA MONEY
If you have a car, inDrive provides an excellent opportunity to make extra money. Set your schedule and enjoy complete transparency with inDrive. See your passenger's drop-off location and fare before accepting the ride request. If the passenger’s price doesn’t seem enough, you can always offer your fare or skip the rides you don’t like with no penalties.
Best of all, low-to-no service rates mean you make more money driving with inDrive!

We can't wait for you to experience it. Install the app and let’s ride!

title: camping.info: Camping Europe
description:
camping.info 2021 for Europe: The popular camping.info app, now with a modern twist! We’re pleased to introduce the latest version of the camping.info app, now with a new, user-friendly design that is both modern and easy to navigate. All of the other key features from our website will be integrated into the app as soon as possible.

You’ll find the best campsites in Europe with camping.info! Our camping app includes more than 23,500 campsites in 44 countries, and with the advanced search function, you can find sites on the map or according to a variety of characteristics.

camping.info is one of the most popular online travel guide for campers in the German-speaking world. With our website, printed travel guides and apps we help campers find everything they need to plan their perfect camping holidays.
In addition to providing users with the details of thousands of campsites across Europe, the camping.info community encourages lively discussion and exchange among campers and outdoor fans. More than 50,000 campers rate campsites on a regular basis, and our website’s database currently has more than 222,000 guest reviews. We will be integrating these guest reviews into the camping.info app in one of the next updates. 


FIND THE PERFECT CAMPSITE
With more than 23,500 European campsites in the camping.info database, you can find the place that's perfect for you and contact the site directly. Plus, there are more than 70,000 photos and hundreds of 360° pictures to help you decide. To find your perfect campsite, just set the desired search filters and you’ll receive a selection of sites that fit your preferences. The number of expected results will be displayed beforehand. With all this at your fingertips, you’re sure to find a site you’ll love!


18.000+ AVAILABLE RV PARKS
Find luxury RV parks as well as very basic RV sites in Germany and Europe. Detailed descriptions of RV sites and reviews from other campers will help you choose the next stop. You can submit your own reviews, upload your own campsite photos and update campsite data.

NEW DESIGN AND EASY TO USE
The camping.info app has a brand-new look! This is the most user-friendly version yet —The modern design and clear structure make your search for the perfect campsite easier than ever. Planning your holidays has never been more fun!

GET INSPIRED
Want to try out new campsites? Then get inspired by camping.info! Using the map, you can see all the sites in and around your holiday destination and test out your favourites. Once you’ve visited, don’t forget to rate the campsite and share your experience with the camping.info community.


COLLECT AND SHARE YOUR FAVOURITES

Just like on the camping.info website, you can save your favourite campsites on the app and call them up at any time. Tap the heart icon to add the site to your list of favourites. If you want to recommend a campsite to your friends or if you want to suggest one for an upcoming trip, you can easily share a site listing with them.


EXPLORE YOUR SURROUNDINGS
There's more than just a ton of campsites on the camping.info app: You'll also find thousands of hiking and cycling paths, sightseeing attractions, museums, theatres, festivals, concerts and much more! You can quickly and easily find leisure activities and events on the app’s map. With camping.info as your digital travel guide, you have everything you need to plan your perfect camping trip right in the palm of your hand.

The General Terms and Conditions apply and can be found at: 
https://www.camping.info/en/info/terms-of-service-b2c

The Privacy Policy apply and be found at:
https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/31003329
releaseNotes:
New update: Become part of the exclusive camping.info FANCLUB!

Great news for all loyal users of the camping.info app! With the latest update, you will automatically receive membership of the camping.info FANCLUB. Membership is now included in your subscription. As a member, you will receive numerous benefits and discounts at participating campsites and partners.

What's new?
1. camping.info FANCLUB membership: With the latest update of your app, you automatically become a member of the camping.info FANCLUB. Enjoy exclusive benefits at no extra cost.
2. digital membership card: Your personal camping.info FANCLUB card is waiting for you in your app profile. This digital ID opens the door to exceptional camping benefits.
3. list of participating campsites: Conveniently browse the list of campsites participating in the camping.info FANCLUB directly in your app. Plan your next camping trip with ease and anticipation. The number of participating campsites will increase significantly over the next few weeks.
4. exclusive benefits and discounts: On the profile pages of the participating campsites you will find special offers and discounts that are exclusively available to camping.info FANCLUB members. Use this opportunity to make your camping experience something very special.

Your benefits:
- Seamless access to exclusive discounts and offers.
- Easy planning and booking with the improved app.
- Unique camping experiences thanks to special member benefits.

title: Outdooractive
description:
The Outdooractive App for iPhone, iPad and AppleWatch is the perfect companion for hiking, cycling and other outdoor activities. With the app you can find and plan routes around Great Britain with ease. Go Pro and get access to exclusive features like maps from Ordnance Survey®

Best-in-class outdoor maps
Enjoy a high-resolution display of all maps and at all zoom levels thanks to our state-of-the-art vector technology. Our digital summer and winter layers are based on OpenStreetMap and Pro and Pro+ members can also benefit from many other maps.

Outdoor Route Planner:
Our Route Planner lets you easily plan and create routes based on your preferences. You can add text and photos to these, publish them within the Community or share them privately with friends. You can also import and export GPX files as required.

Recording your own Tracks:
The tracking functionality allows you to record your own tracks to include duration, distance, altitudes and an interactive altitude profile. Data from your iPhone's motion sensors can help us give you even more accurate results.

Navigation:
The navigation function with speech output lets you navigate comfortably from A to B on all routes.

Apple Watch:
Explore with our app optimized for Apple Watch. Record a track or follow a route on your phone and see it on your watch. Pan and zoom maps.

Global Trail Database:
Discover inspiring trail guides from tourism agencies and the community. Navigate with confidence on your next hike, run, bike ride, backpacking trip or outdoor adventure.

Challenges:
Challenges are a fun way to motivate yourself to be more active.  Earn achievement badges, win prizes, and reach your goals by using the app to record your activities.

Exclusively for Pro members
Add a Pro subscription and get all the latest maps from Ordnance Survey® providing accurate information about hiking and cycling trails, protected areas and details about many other outdoor activities. Download Great Britain Ordnance Survey® Explorer 1:25,000 & Landranger 1:50,000 maps.

Go anywhere : Outdooractive Pro works offline without mobile and data signals. Access satellite imagery and with our unique Outdooractive map you’ll get over 30 activity trail networks and official topographic maps from across the world with the following providers:

Great Britain Ordnance Survey Landranger & Explorer; France IGN; Germany BKG; Austria BEV; Spain CNIG; Italy; Netherlands PDOK; Norway Kartverket; Switzerland swisstopo; Denmark Kortforsyningen; Sweden Lantmäteriet; Finland National Land Survey; New Zealand Land Information; Utah USGS; Japan GSI and Global Map

Apple Health:
When you record a cycling, hiking, walking or running track you will now be able to save work outs to Apple Health. Data from HealthKit will not be used for marketing or promotional purposes.

BuddyBeacon:
Safety first: Share your real-time location with friends and family.


A Global Outdoor Travel Guide:
Helpful filters and our powerful search functions help you not only find routes, but also places of interest, accommodation and events.

Your iTunes account will be charged to the amount of the subscription fee after your purchase has been confirmed and after the trial period has expired. The subscription renews annually unless the automatic renewal is deactivated at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing cycle or during the trial period. Costs for any unused periods of the term will not be reimbursed. The option to deactivate can be found in your iTunes account settings. Your account will be charged for the renewal amount within the 24-hour period before the end of the current billing cycle. www.outdooractive.com/en/terms-and-conditions.html


If you have questions or suggestions, please visit https://www.outdooractive.com/en/helpcenter/
releaseNotes:
In this version we fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements.
Do you have any questions or suggestions? Shoot us an email to service@outdooractive.com
Your Outdooractive Team

title: Tube Map - London Underground
description:
Tube Map is the award-winning navigation app that includes the official TfL (Transport for London) Tube Map. Tube Map - London Underground works both on and offline and is the #1 Tube Map with over 22 million downloads!


Key features:


Uses the official TfL iconic Harry Beck London Underground map design.
Includes additional map views for the TfL Night Tube and Rail Network. Plus a bonus map that we have created that is more geographical. 
An easy to use journey planner that works with and without an internet connection.
Check line status for delays, closures and service changes.
See what time the next Tube is due with live departures from TfL.
National Rail arrivals and departures.
Journey planning made easy with real-time routing around closures and delays.
Use step-by-step directions in the journey planner to find your way around London.
Save your favourite routes for quick selection when on the go.
Save your Home and Work stations for up to date station, line and route information.
Find your closest Tube station wherever you are in London.
Tube Map – London Underground Apple Watch app available.
Line status widget
Travel Guide
Exclusive features also available; First & Last Tube Times, Tube Exits, Premium Line status widget and Priority Support.
NEW - Remove advertising subscription


With over 60 million downloads worldwide, there's a Mapway app for many of the busiest transport systems in the world including New York Subway, Paris Metro, Bus Times London and Berlin Subway.


Plan. Route. Relax.


Please note: whilst we endeavour to ensure that Line Status notifications are delivered in a timely manner we can’t guarantee this 100% of the time. There may be occasions when the functionality isn’t available due to technical reasons outside of our control. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.


Tube Map Premium available as an in-app subscription: 99p weekly, £3.99 monthly or £9.99 annually, or as a one-off purchase of £24.99. Prices may vary by location. Cancel at any time, for any reason. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of your chosen price tier. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings in your iTunes Account. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased, where applicable. Read our terms in full at https://www.mapway.com/terms-conditions/
releaseNotes:
Thank you for downloading the app. We regularly update the app to make it better for you. 


This release includes an updated map and some bug fixes and improvements for you.


To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your updates turned on.



Got a question? Tap Support in the About section in the app.

title: DOT Billetter
description:
DOT Tickets app is developed and owned by Din Offentlige Transport (DOT). DOT is a partnership between the traffic companies DSB, Movia and Metroselskabet to help create a better and more cohesive public transport system on Zealand, Lolland, Falster and Møn.
DOT Tickets app makes it easy to buy tickets and monthly passes for journeys on Zealand, Lolland, Falster and Møn. 
You can purchase tickets by entering your place of departure and arrival, either in the form of a stop, address, or place. You can also pick the zones you wish to travel from and to on the map. The 2-8 zones fast purchase is relevant for you, if you know how many zones you need from where you are. You can use that feature, if you give the app your permission to localization (GPS) so that the app can determine your start zone. Giving your permission to localization, which is voluntary, can also help you determine your location on the map versus your ticket's validity area.
Monthly passes can be purchased by entering your place of departure and arrival. You can also pick the zones manually on the map if you travel between 2 and 8 zones.
You can purchase these tickets in DOT Tickets app:
• Zone tickets for 2-8 zones
• Tickets for 9+ zones between a departure and arrival zone
• Commuter cards with Metro and DSB 1’ Regional Train as an optional add-on
• Commute20 with Metro and DSB 1’ Regional Train as an optional add-on
• Bicycle Metro
• Supplementary Ticket for Commuter Card (1 zone)
• DSB 1’ Regional Train supplementary ticket
• City Pass Small for zones 1-4 (24, 48, 72, 96 or 120 hours)
• City Pass Large for zones 1-99 (24, 48, 72, 96 or 120 hours)
• City Pass X-Large for zones 1-299 (24 hours)
• City Pass West for zones 101-199 (24 hours)
• City Pass South for zones 201-299 (24 hours)
• Event ticket Small for zones 1-4 (12 hours) and Event ticket Large for zones 1-99 (12 hours), available for limited periods in connection with events
• 12-hour ticket East, West and South for free traveling on Saturdays and Sundays for a limited period (December 2023 – February 2024)

These monthly passes can be purchased in other sales channels, but are displayed in DOT Tickets app:

• Youth Card
• Employee Travel Pass
• Company travel Pass


Payment in DOT Tickets app
You can pay with MobilePay or payment cards in DOT Tickets app. You can save your payment card details and access them via Touch ID, Face ID or a PIN code of your choice. In that way, you do not have to enter all card details every time you make a purchase.

Your payment card details are stored with Billwerk+.

The following payment cards are accepted:

• Visa/Dankort
• MasterCard
• Visa
• Visa Electron
• Maestro


NOTE:
Remember to buy your ticket before you start your journey.

Departure boards

You can create personal departure boards for your preferred transportation for all stations and stops on Zealand, Lolland, Falster and Møn filtered by the lines you want to follow.

On your departure board, you can see if there are delays or cancellations	.

When you create a departure board, you can get notifications about planned changes and you can add the board as a widget on your smartphone's home screen, so you always have it close at hand.

If you experience errors when using DOT Ticket app, please contact:
DOT Customer Service
Tel. +45 70 15 70 00
releaseNotes:
In this version, we have made it easier to refund tickets and commuter cards in the app by placing the refund button on the ticket to be refunded.

In addition to that, we have:
- Fixed the issue where commuter card renewal was ignoring if the Metro add-on was opted out.
- Fixed the issue where DSB first class add-on for commuter cards were not available if the zones were selected manually.
- Fixed the issue with departure boards for Metro stations repeating the same departure.
- Implemented security measures for increased protection of app data.
- Addressed minor bugs and improved overall app performance for a smoother user experience.

title: Yesim: eSIM with phone number
description:
Say YESIM to travel freedom with perfect eSIM Mobile Internet
 
Yesim travel app connects you to the best cellular networks across the world, all accessible through one application.
Additionally, with our new feature – virtual phone number, you can receive SMS message verifications or other important communications directly in the Yesim app, without needing an eSIM!
Yesim eSIM Mobile Data has you covered.
 
Must-have for Casual Travelers, Business Travelers and Explorers. 
No Wi-Fi needed and No mobile roaming. 
No dual Sim. 
No Sim card at all. No worries either.
 
Just choose the right data bundle, buy it and load it onto your phone before you go. This way you can avoid high data charges when traveling internationally.
 
Why Yesim eSIM Mobile Data?
- Super fast and easy installation process;
- Easy top-ups, wherever you are;
- 24/7 online support;
- Built-in VPN included;
- No more changing SIM cards;
- No Wi-Fi router in your pocket. Just a phone!

How It Works?

Step 1: Own an eSIM capable phone.
Be the proud owner of one of the following devices:

- iPhone 15, 15 Plus, 15 Pro and 15 Pro Max (not Dual SIM*)
- iPhone 14, Plus, Pro and Pro Max (not Dual SIM*)
- iPhone 13, 13 Pro (not Dual SIM), 13 Pro Max, 13 mini
- iPhone 12, 12 Pro (not Dual SIM), 12 Pro Max, 12 mini
- iPhone 11, 11 Pro (not Dual SIM), 11 Pro Max
- iPhone SE (2020) and SE (2022)
- iPhone XS, XS Max (not Dual SIM)
- iPhone XR (not Dual SIM)
- iPad Air (2014, 2019, 2020, 2022)
- iPad Pro 11 (2018 and 2020)
- iPad Pro 12.9 (2015 and 2017)
- iPad Pro 10.5 (2017)
- iPad Pro 9.7 (2016)
- iPad 10.2 (2019, 2020, 2021)
- iPad 9.7 (2016, 2017, 2018)
- iPad mini 4 (2015)
- iPad mini 3
- iPad mini (2019 and 2021)
Please note: Device compatibility also varies by country. Please check the list of eSIM supported devices – https://yesimsupport.zendesk.com/hc/articles/360006059318.

Step 2: Download the app.
 
Step 3: Find your destination from a list. 
Worldwide availability. You are sure to find something that fits your adventure.

Step 4: Buy & install your eSIM.
One-click installation! Connect worldwide with just one tap.

Easy peasy lemon squeezy.

Paying for your global data just got as smooth as sliding through cherry blossoms in Japan!

title: Flight Radar 24: Plane tracker
description:
mi Flight Radar turns your iPhone or iPad in to your own personal air traffic radar or flight tracker. Flights are tracked and displayed in real-time on beautiful maps near you or anywhere in the world. Point your device at a plane in the sky to identify it and where it is heading. Track the flights of your family and friends and determine the best time to meet them at the airport.

We are passionate about providing innovative flight status, radar and tracking apps. Please contact us for any features or improvements that you would like to see incorporated.

This is the FREE version of the mi Flight Radar Pro app.

Features of mi Flight Radar Lite that has made it the #1 travel app in over 10 countries:
* Track flights in real time
* Combined flight tracker and airplane tracker
* See an augmented reality view of the world, identify aircraft by call sign by just pointing your device at the sky
* See planes near you with real time updates on a map display. Click to see further details such as call sign
* Scroll the map view to see planes move in real-time anywhere in the world
* Have easy access to full flight details such as flight number, airline, aircraft type and tail number, photo (where available), departure and destination airports, distance to and from airports, altitude, speed, latitude, longitude and aircraft in-service dates
* Get airline for individual aircraft

Please note that coverage will vary depending on your location around the world. Data can sometimes be delayed due to FAA regulations. Flight positions are estimated using realistic physics based flight and route planning models and for some flights can cause inaccuracies in the real-time position updates.

CONNECT WITH US (mi Flights)
Like us on Facebook for the latest news on mi Flights apps.

Also by mi Flights:
mi Flight Tracker - Flight status and tracking
mi Flight Board - Airport Departures and Arrivals

HELP & SUPPORT
Visit our website www.miFlightsApp.com
Please email info@miFlightsApp.com for help and support or see the FAQ pages on our website.

DISCLAIMER
The use of this app is strictly limited to entertainment purposes. This specifically excludes activities that might endanger yourself or the lives of others. Under no circumstances will the developer of this app be held responsible for incidents resulting from the use of the data or its interpretation or its use contrary to this agreement. We reserve the right to anonymously track and report a user's activity using the app.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements.

title: Dott – Unlock your city
description:
Got somewhere to be? Take a Dott!
Simply unlock an e-bike or e-scooter in the Dott app, ride to your destination, and get on with your day – easy as that. 
To get started:
1. Download the Dott app
2. Check the in-app map to find a nearby e-scooter or e-bike
3. Scan the vehicle’s QR code to unlock it, and you’re off!
Pro tip: Grab a Dott pass to save on your ride. Or simply pay as you go with your secure payment method of choice.


Why choose Dott?
Dott is the simplest way to move around your city, safely and efficiently. Ditch the crowded commute and enjoy traveling in the open air. Avoid traffic jams and arrive at your destination on time – for a fraction of the cost of a taxi or car share.
Our e-scooters and e-bikes are available 24/7, making moving around your city a breeze! They’re brought in for regular maintenance and boast all the latest safety features. Plus, thanks to the smooth electric acceleration, riding our vehicles is a piece of cake.

Ride a Dott whenever you're:
* Meeting a friend for dinner
* Commuting to work
* Heading to class
* Going on a date
* Exploring your city on your day off, or sightseeing in other countries


Get around without breaking the bank
Simply pay for your rides as you go, at a price similar to public transport. Or, explore Dott passes to ride more for less: grab a pass for 24 hours, a week, or even a month to save on every ride. If you fancy a ride for free, just refer a friend and you’ll both get a free ride each! Want in on even more discounts? Turn on notifications to hear about our limited-time deals.

Where you’ll find us
Dott is currently available in 40 cities across Israel and Europe – with more on the way! Want to see Dott in your city? Drop us a line at support@ridedott.com.
releaseNotes:
We've made some small under-the-hood improvements to the app and added a few local features to make hopping on a Dott even smoother.

Enjoy the ride!

title: Gotogate
description:
Welcome to the Gotogate app!

Our app puts the world in the palm of your hand. Fast, simple, safe and secure–instantly access your booking details and experience real-time updates and notifications so you never miss a flight again. Easily update your booking with baggage and other services from our pre-travel store. Get access to exclusive offers like early check-in for free (a €15 value), plus save up to 70% on flights, hotels rental cars and so much more!

What are you waiting for? Download now and let’s get travelling!  

FREE EARLY CHECK-IN
- Exclusively for our app users, passengers can now check-in for their flight, months in advance – for free! Let us do the hard work for you and we’ll send your boarding card directly to your mobile device. 

BOOKING INFO AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Multiple bookings? No problem! All your bookings in one place–no need to head to the airline’s website or download their apps
- Easily access your booking info. From your reservation details, boarding passes the app has everything you need. Plus you’ll receive real-time notifications on gate or schedule changes in real-time, so you’ll never miss a flight again

BOOK FLIGHTS TO ANY DESTINATION, WORLDWIDE:
- Search and compare more than 650 airlines, big and small, to find the best deal there is.
- Flexible booking options – we get it, changes happen! Choose our Flexible Ticket option and change your flight when you need to.

AVAILABLE FOR A WIDE SELECTION OF BRANDS
- Get your booking info for many popular booking platforms including Gotogate, Supersaver, Supersavertravel, Flybillet, Travelstart, Travelfinder, Goleif, Travelpartner, Seat24, Flygvaruhuset, Avion, Budjet, Trip, Mytrip, Pamediakopes, Airtickets24, Flight Network and FlyFar.

ADD SERVICES ON THE FLY
- Already booked? Travel just the way you want by adding baggage, choosing your seat and more from our pre-travel store. 

PAY YOUR WAY
- Choose from a number of payment options available throughout the world.

FIND AND BOOK GREAT HOTELS
- The best places, the best prices – with more than 300,000 hotels to choose from, there’s something for everyone.

CHEAP CAR RENTAL ANYWHERE AND ANYTIME
- Search and find great deals on rental cars. Take the scenic route and explore your destination at your leisure.
